name: Bar Alisa Amiel
title: They lost my order before newyear eve.
review: They lost my order before newyear eve.. they say i swear but i didnt.. i just want them to ship me again the prdoucts with fast shipping on they bill.. but one product was out of stock so they cant ship the rest??? The costumer service lady was really not nice. Asos have a really bad costumer service...

name: Chinenye Egbe
title: Horrid they did not deliver my item…
review: Horrid they did not deliver my item after over a month and they offered a silly coupon of £4.80 on an order that would cost over £25 to replace

name: Menna Badawi
title: never shopping with asos again.
review: this is my first and last time shopping with asos. i ordered a dress on the 28th of november and it was said to arrive by the 20th of december. it was now the 30th and no information is being provided to me by customer service as to where my package is. they expect me to wait till the 21st of january to get a refund. i no longer have use for the dress. Also the fact that the tracking that is giving is only for “asos shipping reference” (terms used by asos customer service employee) is ridiculous. i have no intention of paying for return shipping. i have never been so frustrated by lack of answers by several customer service representatives.

name: Brennah Nicoll
title: Customer service is awful
review: If I could give customer service no stars I would!!!! I was waiting for 2 hours for someone to reply to my problem and once they did they did absolutely bugger all!! Not okay!!!

name: Matt
title: Paid for next day delivery for a parcel…
review: Paid for next day delivery for a parcel to arrive on the 21st December. Was told 3 times it would arrive on 3 separate dates, still no parcel. Spoke to about 4 different people  via the ASOS chat (all very friendly) but all said different things, turned out being a waste of time. Thanks Asos you ruined Christmas.

name: Jochem Westerbeek
title: Worst cusfomer service ever
review: Been waiting for 20 days now for one of my orders and after 10 e-mails I get a response with a tracking code so I can track my package as if I'm not capable of tracking a f****** package.

name: Aviram Edri
title: Waiting for an order over a month
review:
Waiting for an order over a month, 3 times I contacted you each time assuring me they would come back with a reply, I paid the order and I don't have the pants,
Whenever the same answers, I'm really discouraged by the poor service.

name: M. McDougall
title: Item lost in the post!!!!
review: Ordered a bikini for my holiday with next day delivery. Bikini did not arrive so after a week contacted Asos to find out where it was, was told to wait a further week! Still no bikini, when I contacted them again I was told it was deemed as lost & offered a replacement or refund! I really wanted the item for my holidays! Very poor service Asos!

name: Sophie Coan
title: Wanted my complaint escalated to a…
review: Wanted my complaint escalated to a manager to be shunned. I have a faulty pair of shoes that I would like replacing and the operator was not willing to help. Someone really needs to contact me about this

name: Melissa
title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE Item never sent, I’ve been ignored, no refund,
review: Placed order December 11th. Received shipment confirmation following day. Tracking has said pending since. It’s now January 1st. Have emailed customer service over 10 times now, only got 2 replies which I responded to then was ignored and reached out on twitter. The rep on Twitter told me I would receive a confirmation email within 72 hours on Saturday and the time has passed and it never came. Contacted another rep through chat saying she would process a refund and still nothing. This has been the worst customer service experience I’ve ever had and I strongly recommend you don’t support this company because they could end up wasting hours of your time struggling to try to get something you paid your hard earned money for. Also they just leave the chat before resolving anything. Most customer service will ask if there is anything else they can do before they just sign off the chat. 3 reps did this.

name: Emma
title: AVOID ASOS
review: Asos do not send all the items out that you order. They then suspend your account when you ask for the items or refund and you lose so much money. Currently waiting for over 1 hundred pounds back and it’s been 6 weeks. I kept a pair of sandals and the strap has snapped and still being ignored. I would strongly recommend avoiding ASOS.

name: Kirsty
title: Be careful of the new night time delivery service when ordering next day
review: It is a shame I keep going to back to asos as sometimes it’s never easy. Their support is very scripted and never really helpful (I don’t blame the staff I blame the business and the training). My current review is more about being careful when ordering on a next day service (I pay for the premier delivery service). Asos have started using a night time only service so between 6-10pm, this obviously doesn’t work at a business address.  If I’d have known I wouldn’t have placed my order at that address. There is no option to re-route and I now have to wait until they have attempted delivery multiple times before the order is returned to Asos and then need to wait for a refund.

name: customer
title: My order was due to arrive on the 29th…
review: My order was due to arrive on the 29th of December. It is clearly lost and they are refusing to help me saying I have to wait til the 4th of January until they will help me! I pay for premium next day delivery and this is not acceptable. I ordered the items in good faith as I needed them for this week and one item was for a present and we are now a day after the birthday. This is really not acceptable and if I would have known I would have used another more reliable supplier. It's also insane that they are making me wait over a week from when my items should have arrived until they will help me.

name: Nouran Talaat
title: I made an order number 455096578 on…
review:
I made an order number 455096578 on their 26th of November, and my order isn’t delivered till now !!

First I waited for the first 3 weeka and then after sending a lot of emails they told me the order was lost, and you can replace or cancle it now . So I asked them to replace it but to a new address as no one is now in the old address in Saudi as my husband left the country . And I emailed them the new address in paris and they confirmed . They proceeded with half of the order as the sizes were out of stock. And they send the package again to Saudi Arabia . And I sent many emails telling them that this address is wrong they still refused to cancle or refund me the order . And untill today I still didn’t get the order . Honestly worst customer service worst delivery experience worst communication ! A month and I can’t get and order or have someone communicate and solve the problem .

name: Parcelless_again
title: ASOS going more and more downhill
review: The customer service of ASOS and the other agencies they use are really bad. I pay for premium delivery but have on multiple occasions had problems receiving orders on time, getting the correct sizes and having missing items in my parcel. ASOS tries to scapegoat DWP for problems but it was them I was on live chat with for 45 minutes being told I had to get back in touch after midnight if I wanted to carry on trying to track down my order. I had to repeat 3-4 times that I wanted a refund before I was offered one. Service was excellent a few years ago, these days they really couldn't give a hoot if your a loyal customer or not.

name: Sharvani Bell
title: My delivery hasn’t shown up
review:
My delivery hasn’t shown up after several days after I paid for next day delivery. Was advised that I have to wait up to 7 more days to chase Hermes and sort this, even after I explained my circumstances above. 

No effort to help or get things sorted by the Advisor. Not happy at all.

name: Angela Orlando
title: Very disappointed in the satisfaction…
review:
Very disappointed in the satisfaction of resolving this issue!!!! My daughter was sent the wrong dress and instead of them sending the right dress i have to reorder!!!!
What kind of service is that! Told me to send back the wrong dress. So I guess I have to pay postage!!!! I already paid extra to have it shipped!!! Really Asos!!!!!
Not happy with service!!!!

name: Emma
title: Absolutely no explanation for why my…
review: Absolutely no explanation for why my parcel didn't turn up 3 times in a row. Ordered over a month ago for next day delivery that never arrived. Requested replacements that still never arrived. In the end I had to request a refund but before doing so I tried to communicate using Facebook chat as promoted on the website but didn't even get the courtesy of a response. The customer service team on the Gnatta chat facility aren't particularly sympathetic either. Really poor.

name: Sharon De Sousa
title: I bought my husband a hollister jumper…
review: I bought my husband a hollister jumper for xmas, from ASOS a site that I use very frequently. Unfortunately the jumper had 2 holes in the middle of it, above the pockets and were very noticeable. I got in touch with ASOS and advised them if this, and their response was to send the package back to them for a refund. This mistake was no fault of mine and is now a big inconvenience for me to have to package and return the item to get my money back.

name: Toni
title: Disgraceful ' delivery and service'!!!
review: My order was 'delivered' on 28th Dec, left on the side of the road!! I knew I would be home late that day so specifically stated please leave it in my safe porch! The delivery driver threw it on the side of the road, took a photo of it, and told me it was in a safe place!? I was horrified! I got home in the evening and hunted high and low in the dark along the whole road with NO sign of my parcel! I have continually texted, emailed and phoned ASOS but with NO definitive answer! I am SO angry by such appalling service and conduct!!! 3rd January and I'm still waiting for a reply from ASOS! Disgusting!

name: Robert Salazar
title: Horrible!
review: Horrible. Ordered on Dec 15 and “despatched” on 16th with estimated delivery shortly after. Package still in transit. Will never use again and trying to connect with them or UPS is a maze of hell

name: Abbi
title: Absolutely shocking, will never use ASOS again😡
review:
I placed an order on the 7th December for some presents for Christmas. I received an email on the 17th to inform me that my order had been dispatched and I could track it using the Yodel Link provided.  It got up until Christmas Eve and I still had not received my delivery. After trying all day I finally got through to someone on the live chat who said there had been issues with the courier and he would reorder my items and I would receive an email with an update within 48 hours. Panicked that the presents were now not coming, I had to go out Christmas Eve and buy replacement presents.
I then received an email on Boxing Day stating that not all of my order could not be fulfilled.
I phoned ASOS to find out what was going on, only to be told my parcel had never been dispatched as it ‘is a very busy time of year’. I couldn’t believe what I was being told and requested a manager called me back the following day to explain what on earth was going on, seeing as they had taken my money on the 7th and never even dispatched my package!!!!
Surprise surprise no call back from ASOS.
Then on Saturday 28th I received a call from a supervisor claiming that the parcel had in-fact left the warehouse but somehow it had disappeared! Unbelievable.
I will never be using ASOS again.

name: Mayank
title: Pathetic response from ASOS basically no solution…
review: Pathetic response basically no solution we are busy.....:26th Dec within NZ will be delivered on 9th Jan. What a turn around time...

name: Edona Staka
title: I’m very disappointed!
review:
I’m very disappointed!
I ordered a pair of boots on december 13 and it’s december 29 today and they haven’t arrived yet while estimated delivery was on december 27.
Really,shame on you!
I truly regreted trusting Asos! 
It takes days for the order to arrive in Italy like is is the end of the world!

name: Alex Brown
title: Poor experience
review:
I had a very poor recent experience the week before Christmas resulting in me needing to try replace whole order. Poor customer care and communication.
Placed order
Received email to state order dispatched
Order never arrived
Advised of error but would re-send
Sent someone else’s order
Further advised original order would now be sent
Part of order now out of stock
Email complaint
Never acknowledged

name: Mitchell Kristie
title: I didn’t receive my order and it’s like…
review: I didn’t receive my order and it’s like pulling teeth to get this resolved

name: MN
title: Endless product, delivery + service issues
review:
I used to love ASOS. Obviously, you're not getting the best made products, but stylistically they are above and beyond the best in fast fashion. However, I've had nothing but endless problems in the past couple of years. Issues with their products, delivery, things arriving damaged, and above all their lack of customer service when attempting to address these issues. In the past few deliveries, some of the issues I've encountered have been..

-- Sending back over $250 worth of clothes (with their return label and in ASOS packaging) and being told they never received them. I was out $250 and no clothes to show.

-- Most recently, received a package full of clothes covered in a skincare product I ordered from them which was put in the package with zero protection. The bottle broke and leaked all over the clothes.

-- Consistently I've paid for next day delivery and it does NOT arrive the next day. This is particularly annoying / upsetting when I'm sending friends and family birthday gifts from abroad.

Obviously things happen, but what really disappoints me me is ASOS's complete lack of customer service. I've not so much as received a discount code, a 10-20% back for the constant inconvenience/damaged order... OR worst of all, an apology.

Get your act together ASOS. You've lost a decade long customer.

name: Hannah Tanuto
title: Dissatisfied
review: Don’t even deserve a star for your rubbish customer service & delay. Lost a loyal customer!!! Full order didn’t receive, didn’t get an email in regards to it. I email them to let them know & didn’t get a proper response till a week later, only to say that most of my items are now out of stock. Ask for refund as it’s now taken them over a month to send my order, they said no cause the order has been packed, yet 3days later & still haven’t received an email about it being dispatched!!! Never buying form ASOS again, my experience has really put me off from future purchases.

name: Consumer
title: Worst customer care team
review: I ordered my parcel and paid for next day delivery so it would be here on Xmas eve in time for Christmas. I left delivery instructions for the parcel to be left in the porch. The dpd driver Harnek  didn’t bother to read the instructions left for the driver and decided to take a picture of my drive. I assume he didn’t even get out his van as there was no sorry we missed you card just a text sayin your delivery won’t come until after Christmas. I tried calling multiple numbers which were all automated voices and no help I phoned ASOS direct and got put on hold then hung up on. I was told I can’t collect it from their depo as the delivery address on my ASOS account had my partners name on with the same address. So after trying everything I could to receive this parcel I gave up as not one person seemed like they wanted to help. I had no choice but to wait for my parcel to be delivered today then get a text today (Friday 27th) saying your parcel will be delivered on Saturday 28th! I did not request this and this is now becoming extremely frustrating. I phoned ASOS to see why this has changed and they put me on hold then hung up on me. I phoned dpd and they told me they can’t help my parcel won’t come today and that ASOS has changed the delivery to tomorrow. I can not be bothered to be put on hold for ages then get hung up on or speak to people that have no intentions to help this is the worst customer care team I’ve ever spoken to and it’s such a shame as I did like ordering from ASOS but after this I won’t be and will send my items back.

name: Majlinda
title: You guys are ridiculous I am never…
review: You guys are ridiculous I am never using you again I hope you know that ! You lost my dress then can’t even replace it !!!! And I ordered it 2 months ago !! And can’t even offer compensation!! I don’t even care about the compensation as much as I do the dress. I love that dress and can’t believe you guys took so long to replace it that it sold out. I told you yes replace it and you continued to keep messaging me asking if I want a replacement then it was sold out. Ridiculous!!! Poor poor customer service I can’t believe it.

name: Yang Carterina
title: This is my first time to shop on ASOS.
review: This is my first time to shop on your website. I ordered on 29th, Nov. 2019. Today is 27th, Dec. 2019. I still didn't receive my package. It is really crazy.

name: Mayan Fattouh
title: customer care are not helpful at all
review:
customer care are not helpful at all
my package wasn't delivered it was overdue date
and it was sent with untraceable number which i didnt request.
i dont recommend it to anyone.

name: Chiara ER
title: your customer service is a joke
review:
Is taking 2 weeks to receive two invoices I requested as urgent because people don’t even bother to check if they are following the right procedure and to do the job they get paid for.
As result, I could have some clothing expenses refunded by my company as uniform but because of your appalling customer service I’m now losing that money.
What a joke.

name: Jenna
title: If you ask for a refund
review: If you ask for a refund, even if you return the wrong item they sent to you, they BLOCK you from their order system and you can't order again from them. This a real SHAME. I don't know why e-shops like you and DP have this strategy, but be sure that you are going to lose many clients in this way. You make the mistake but you block us from shopping again from you: paranormal, isn't it?

name: John Cooke
title: As other people have stated
review: As other people have stated, I have ordered 2 next day delivery parcels, and received one, the other has not arrived in 3 days. All customer service has to say is to wait in a rather patronising way. I have waited and still no sign of me order, would rather be told its missing than have to sit here listening to the same response to wait until the end of the day, conveniently at a time in which its impossible to do anything about the order as it will be too late.

name: George
title: Order missing, ignored by customer service
review:
Ordered 2 parcels on the 26th of december, one arrived next day as expected no problem.however I'm still waiting for my 2nd order.

No response from customer services, very unhappy and will cancel my asos premier subscription.

name: Taree Reardon
title: Shipment Not Received
review:
I am very disappointed as my shipment was not delivered on time, and as of today still hasn't been delivered at all. The representative I spoke with on 12/30 swore that the package would be delivered yesterday (12/31) even though FedEx had already confirmed that the package was lost. The representative refused to do anything to assist me, and the package wasn't delivered. 

Today I spoke with a differed representative who was better, however he advised me that I would need to pay for expedited shipping on future orders in order to receive them on time. The delivery date I received when I ordered was 12/31/19, and when the package initially shipped it had a delivery date of 12/27/19 before it was lost. I shouldn't have to pay extra for shipping just to receive my item. I don't think I will be ordering from your company again and will advise others not to as well.

name: Sagi Sharon
title: NEVER ORDER PRODUCTS FROM ASOS!!! BE CARFUL!!!!!!!
review:
Don't buy from them-
Unprofessional service and store!!!

 I bought two products on black friday from Asos. After more then a month, when I asked the costumer service to find out why is the delivery is taking so long- they told me that there' s been a problem with the delivery and my two orders cancelled and I'll get a refund.

That is basically just the person and compeny that should give you the products that you've been waiting for, just telling you-
"No products. And we don't care, just take the refund".

When a store doesn't give you any of the product that you ordered- you realize it is unprofessional.

name: Sohema Patel
title: I am really unhappy with the service…
review:
I am really unhappy with the service received. I requested an exchange and was given a refund. I purchased an item on Black Friday so I lost the discount price now! 
I’ve emailed them prior to returning for exchange and followed the advice given.
I then wrote to them several times and got robotic replies about the item being out of stock when I regularly checked on the website and was able to put it in my basket. 
I’m soooo dissapointed and feel like I was played by Asos. Was offered a 15% discount but that doesn’t even cover half discount I had. I asked for it to be matched but was refused. 
Communicating has beeeeen sooo hard with ASOS. Chats takes ages and emails have really delayed responses. 
I don’t blame people for abusing retailers like Asos. I Was honest and followed procedures but I lost out. 
I learnt.

name: Lori Albanese
title: so i send a package with 4 items
review: so i send a package with 4 items, i get credit for 2 items only and Poppie is saying to show her proof of postage. i did not take a pick of your label since i have premier.  so i paid for the 2 items, returned them and you def got them because you credited me for the $131 dress and the $57 shirt but ZERO for the other 2 items.  Before she rudly ended our chat, her last words were please send me the proof of postage and i will look into it for you EVEN tho i already told her i did not nor never take pics of the return label.  Very horrible customer service.  Make me wonder how many times i sent things back and never got refunded for them by Asos!????

name: Daric Carvajal
title: Package was never received and no…
review: Package was never received and no refund was given when guaranteed delivery was a week ago. Still no sign of package. FedEx issued a claim and told me it was lost and ASOS did not issue me a refund.

name: Shah
title: ASOS are shameful
review:
Not happy at all, ASOS clearly are interrogating customer with stupid question.

Ordered a coat was not at home, parcel was signed for by me with a scribble, then got a slip from Hermes(worst ever courier company in existence) stating the item was left inside the bin, clearly I didn’t advise ASOS or Hermes to do this.
Got an email from ASOS today asking me to confirm I’ve not received anything, when clearly they got the proof, the s##t has hit the fan

name: Orla Ní'Néill
title: Horrific, will never use again
review: I have on multiple occasions ordered items from ASOS. On the first few occasions I used the standard delivery and discovered that this takes 2 weeks! Every time! I then tried next day delivery, paid for the year of premier delivery and even using this it wouldn’t be dispatched from ASOS themselves for about 2/3 days on average after ordering! The next things I ordered I ordered the same day about 10 minutes apart from Adidas and  Tommy Hilfiger, I have since received and returned some items from both Adidas and Tommy Hilfiger with no sign of my ASOS package, two weeks post order. This will be my last ever order from ASOS. Their own brand clothes may as well be paper and they have never responded in a timely manner when I contacted customer service, it took them 4 days to respond to my query after I received the wrong item.

name: Naomi French
title: Terrible Customer Service. Shop at Nordstrom instead.
review: The customer service is the worst of all brands I shop with. The returns process is a mess and I've had returned items show as delivered to their warehouse that they can't track down for months and then it took another month of fighting with customer service to get a refund. Apparently Asos has no way of tracking your returns using their included return shipping label and they take forever to process returns so if you return a package within the returns window, but they dont process your return until after the window is up, they'll deny your refund. You always have to have proof of when your return was delivered to their facility. The customer service is a mess so even in the same email thread you'll talk to a different person every time and they have a hard time keeping track of your situation. You can't escalate an issue whatsoever and there is no phone number to call to actually speak to someone. My last order said everything was delivered, but was missing an item. The inventory selection is nice, but if you have have any order issues whatsoever or want to return anything you're in for a real nightmare. Save yourself the hassle and shop somewhere that actually has customer service, like Nordstrom.

name: Silvia Stanciu
title: I haven’t recieved  my delivery
review: I haven’t recorded my delivery, which was due on the 23rd. I paid for next day delivery only to wait for 2 weeks for Asos and DPD to carry out an investigation for a parcel that was obviously delivered to the wrong place and signed by the wrong person. There is proof for it, still, they have to investigate, not making me chase something I paid for to recieve the mest day, but also telling me the delivery company doesn’t consider themselves liable and I might have to pay for something someone else recieved. Can’t put into words how disappointed I am.

name: משי קורנפלד
title: You should be ashamed of yourself
review: You should be ashamed of yourself ! Im done with ASOS done!!

name: D
title: THE worst customer service
review:
I had THE worst experience with ASOS this last order.
My order never showed up and I couldn’t get a hold of anyone to help make it right FOE A MONTH.
$144 is a lot of money to spent on winter essentials to not even have them. I chose ASOS on Black Friday over other stores and I wish I would have chosen another place to give my business so I could have the items in a timely manner.
People took DAYS to respond to my emails (which is THE only way to communicate with them apparently).
After a month of trying to get my items they finally gave me my money back. Thank goodness because that was the ONLY close to good thing to come out of this. So basically, my money was basically held hostage for a month and I got nothing to show for it. They didn’t even offer me a discount code or anything.

name: Harry
title: Customer Care is terrible
review:
I enjoy shopping from ASOS. There’s good prices and usually I have no problems. However, recently I ordered an item and payed £5.95 for next day delivery. The item arrived today and when I opened it I realised that it was completely different to what I ordered. As I payed for next day delivery you can see my frustration with this issue.

I decided to speak to customer care to see what could be done about this and I spoke to an assistant called NIMAT. I explained the situation and was told that I needed to return the item and a refund would be given to me. I then asked how long this would take and was told 7 days and I would receive the refund after it has been spent back. Then I told them how much it was including shipping. However, I was then informed that I would not receive a refund for the delivery my order “was delivered on the estimated date”. Which it was, but my order wasn’t delivered... an item that was nothing to what I wanted was delivered. So anyone would expect a full refund as the issue was caused by the supplier. I explained this to NIMAT and was just told the same thing.

I wanted this item for New Years and now because ASOS made a mistake I won’t have it now for that time. I’m well aware this may sound petty but it’s not the fact that I won’t receive my money or the fact that I have to go out of my way to return the item, it’s because ASOS has a duty of care to all its customers and I feel like today that wasn’t met. 

I hope that no one else has to go through this and I just wanted to share my experience so people can understand. Finally, probably the thing that annoyed me the most was that NIMAT who was supposed to be there to help with my issue ended up ending the chat when I tried asking him another question.

name: EWilks
title: Long delivery time
review:
Frustrating experience recently after many positive orders placed with ASOS. 
Item ordered on 9th December. Still waiting for delivery and it's now 28th December. 
Been in contact with ASOS live chat a few times. Just keep getting told to wait longer (now 31st) due to processes out of their control. No replacement offered until then apparently.

name: FREE727
title: Want to give no stars but wont let me
review: Want to give no stars but wont let me. Missing items in my order 2 pairs of trainers total cost £140. Contacted to tell them about missing items asked if I wanted s refund or replacement.  Said replacement as yoh haven't sent them.  Latter that day recieved an email stating account blocked and advising to seek refund through payment provider.  I have tried to contact customer care on numerous occasions explaining that bag was not big enough for two pairs of trainers and the trainers are out of stock on website but they are not interested.  I understand that this is not an isolated case with ASOS.  I wonder how many people it has fraudulently taken money from and not supplied goods.  I am now waiting to see if my card company will reimburse my money but even if it does this is scandalous. Set of thieving bs

name: M
title: I have ordered the dress I wanted twice…
review: I have ordered the dress I wanted twice and I have been sent the item wrong twice. I have also received no compensation for this and this dress was for an upcoming work event and being a student can not afford to order a dress twice and then send the package back to then wait a long time for a refund. Asos has dissapointed a lot l.

name: nicole smith
title: ASOS sends used items
review: ASOS sent me worn shoes and refused to refund the order. Worst customer experience I have had with ASOS since shopping with them for ten years. I believe ASOS racially profiled me and refusing to refund my order.

name: Cameron AH
title: Ordered to a local collection point. Order not received and returned. NO REFUND
review:
Ordered to a local collection point. 

Got tracking updates to say it was returned to the send 3 times. Never dispatched to the collection point. 

Quiried this with customer services and they told me to wait a week... eventually got an email to say they have received my “returned items” and they will process a refund. 

Still no refund. Customer services themselves don’t know what’s happened. Ridiculous. To re order my items will be the exact same price and offered no incentive to return of which I will not.

name: Tal Peri
title: I wish i could rate zero stars
review: I there were zero stars i would do that. The costumer care team has no responsibilities, no options, they don’t answer directly on what they are asked about. It wouldn’t surprise me if i found out i am actually talking to robots. Ridiculous. Would never recommend asos to anyone ever again. Would never use asos ever again.

name: ליטל סייג
title: I waiting more than 3 weeks for my…
review: I waiting more than 3 weeks for my order, more than week until someone answers to my message on Facebook.

name: Jasper Kangai
title: Was so disappointed
review: Was so disappointed,  because my order should have been delivered on the 23rd as promised.  I never got it. Just enquired today the 30th. Was told it didn't leave thier wharehouse. Only one with nothing to open for Xmas☺️

name: Rollo Disco
title: Rubbish Service
review: What is the point of paying for next day delivery if Items don't turn up and go missing. Terrible customer service.

name: Alex
title: ASOS Delivery Updates.
review:
Paying for a next day delivery order and being told two days later that there is a chance it would arrive today? Brilliant.

The customer advisor I spoke to was not apologetic one bit.
I explained to them that I had ordered it Saturday in time for Tuesday as I needed to use it then. Did he apologise and listen to my complaints?... NO.

He kept trying to redirect me to the Hermes website to contact them, not that the fact that I told them i've been trying to contact Hermes prior to contacting them mattered at all.

Useless and disregarding to loyal customers. I still don't get why Hermes are a legitimate company who claim they are one of the leading delivery services, ridiculous.

name: Skirmante
title: I needed to exchange the size of an…
review: I needed to exchange the size of an item. With initial order I received 25% promo discount. To exchange the size, I need to return an old order and pay 8 Eur for return and re-oder the right size, however 25% discount was not re-applied. Which is totally unfair for the customer.

name: Shannon Hanly-Jones
title: Very disappointing and bad experience
review: Very disappointing and bad experience. Ordered some shirts during black Friday sales, 6 Decemeber. As of 27th of December and multiple messages to asos about my package, I am  now told it was returned on the 21st. Asos won't re ship the package and have to process it before providing a refund, 14 days. Sales are no longer going so cant get the same deal. All I get from Asos is their policy over and over again. Used to get good service from Asos, not anymore.

name: Nidy Diarra
title: order not delivered on time
review: ordered for new years eve and item was supposed to be delivered 31 december, i didn't receive the item and they tell me there is a delay with their shipping partners. i will get it on the 7th january don't relay on the next day delivery. very dissapointed

name: Judy Melon
title: Still not received my order and was made to feel I was a liar
review: Brought a few items on next day delivery, items still have not arrived. When I contacted ASOS to advised them of this no compensation was offered, they did not care and the best thing they said they could do is check to see what happed. When they returned back to my conversation I was told a delivery was attempted. Now would I be contracting ASOS if I received my goods. I was made out to be a liar. Very disappointed and unhappy and still not received my goods.

name: Jess
title: Don’t bother
review:
No communication as to where your order is.

Don’t even bother messaging them on Facebook as they’ll ask you a question and even if you respond straight away it takes them another 24hrs before they reply. So it takes about 3 days to let them know there’s an issue and then god knows how many days to sort it.

name: Ellie
title: next day delivery
review: Contacted Asos through Facebook chat to ask when next day delivery cut off was. They answered immediately with 11pm so I placed my order at 9:30pm as it was needed for the next day. After visiting twitter, I saw on their twitter feed that the cut off was 9pm. Contacted them to cancel the order or confirm that I would have the order the next day, to receive no reply on twitter or Facebook, even though they were replying to messages sent after mine. Managed to contact them via their online chat for them to say nothing can be done and that I had to wait for the order to be delivered before refunded even though it was their fault. Tried to email my complaint for it to bounce due to ‘inbox full’. Bad customer service.

name: Miss.Barnes
title: I ordered a dress and shoes and they…
review: I ordered a dress and shoes and they sent me the wrong dress , it stayed it was midi on the packaging but it was clearly a maxi dress, I contacted asos and now the original item that I ordered for a special occasion is out of stock , not a good experience for using this company the first time , I wont be using them again that's for sure ,

name: Sinead
title: Over 3 weeks and still no closer to get…
review: Over 3 weeks and still no closer to get an exchange!

name: Emma
title: order didn’t arrive
review: I ordered a present for my sister at the end of November, the present was supposedly delivered by Hermes they sent a text message to say the order had been delivered at 6.45 and signed for at the address. When I received the text both my husband and I were at home with our 2 children and not one of us heard the door. Soon as I received the text we checked in all the usual places and the order had not been received. This was on the 11th December. I sent a message to ASOS to confirm this information and after having to confirm my address and that I had checked and confirmed the parcel was not in any of the locations they asked for. I then had a second email asking to confirm these things again. I have finally had an email on the 27th December confirming that I will be able to receive a refund, hopefully this will be completed. I appreciate it is a busy period over Christmas, but I do not have the money especially at this time of year to buy 2 presents for my sister so she has now had no present from me on her 30th birthday. I haven’t had an issue with ASOS previously but I have been disappointed by the service this time.

name: Shiri Rahimian Zylberman
title: Worst buying experience
review:
It is already 2 month after I made the payment for a package from ASOS.
When I finally got the stuff 2 weeks ago things are missing
I am trying to get in touch with ASOS and all I hear is we investigate it
What about me ? What the about the things I ordered?
What about my money!

name: Alex
title: Worst customer service I have ever dealt with
review:
Worst customer service I have ever dealt with 

If I could give 0 stars I would! This has been the worst customer support I have ever dealt with. I am trying to find out how to get my tracking information for a return so I know when I would get my refund. What I dealt with was the customer rep trying to argue what 10 business days were and that I needed to find proof of postage. First off, regardless of the time period, they could not tell me how I would need to get proof of postage when using the return label that was provided to me in the shipped item. When they could not provide more detail instructions, I confronted with a passive-aggressive, rude customer rep who would be told me that no one could help me. I kept asking for clarification and asking what could be done if I used the return label that was provided by ASOS. 

I dealt with shipping items on a daily basis and what they told did not make sense for US customs. Clearly, they did not understand the difference between the two cultures. 

If ASOS is going to have customer service reps like this, they have lost my business and future businesses. This is ridiculous; I am just trying to get a refund on a small previous purchase, which shouldn't be this difficult.

name: Darek Jarząbek
title: I’m sorry to say that
review:
I’m sorry to say that, but your customer services has been shambolic.
I purchased the Christmas gift,  which was a speaker, on Black Friday 28th of November. The original price of that speaker was £119. Black Friday was £71.50. Today is December 23 and I don’t have the item which supposed to be gift and you sadly offering me £71.50 refund which you will give me in 10 working days! This is not fair!
I keep contacting Asos via phone and messenger. Some of the communications some you don’t even have a record of. On the 19th of December I contacted you via messenger where you replied to me and ask me if I would like to refund or replacement. As the speaker was available, I selected replacement. No one contacted me from Asos and I had to chase you a few times over the phone and messenger wasting a lot of time. Christmas is approaching and I don’t have a gift which I need for tomorrow. 
Thank you Asos. Never ever again.

name: suzy betty
title: worst customer service
review: worst customer service. was not of help at all. very very very rude! should be fired if I was the manager. bad for business.

name: bp
title: Paige was not helpful
review: Paige was not helpful. Not satisfied.

name: DavK
title: Very very bad
review:
Customer service pretty fast. Should update the app more often on the products that are out of stock so that when we pay for the item it doesnt take so much time to tell you that you will be refunded for the item that was out of stock and for the customer to wait for 2 months! Thats pathetic.
I hope that someone take this review into consideration.

name: Vardit Levy
title: Baddd delivery
review: Baddd delivery

name: Tom B
title: Do ASOS CARE? I don't think so (Hermes also)
review:
Do ASOS CARE? Very disappointed, I have used ASOS before and they were fine. The goods were great and delivery as expected. However, this time has been a nightmare and from my experience, I don't think ASOS care one bit. 

To be fair, I think the issue was with Hermes the delivery firm. I ordered on 14/12 and order was expected 19/12. 

I appreciate it's near to Christmas and everyone will be busy, however, having to use chat & twitter for updates wasn't ideal and I'm told that if it doesn't come by today 30/12 then at least I can get a refund or a replacement 🤔🤔🤔.  

I guess it teaches me a valuable lesson, don't buy Christmas presents via ASOS and don't expect them to care if anything goes wrong

I guess I can go and buy a late Christmas present from a bricks and mortar store now and hopefully at a discount in the sales...hey ho, every cloud #ASOS #HERMES

** UPDATE** 
Goods didn't arrive and refund was not issued from ASOS. Fortunately, I paid via credit card and they have refunded my payment as part of the claim service protection they offer

name: Angel
title: They left me without my Crissthmas…
review: They left me without my Crissthmas pressent. And did not give me any other option to get my purchase in time.

name: Alessandra Tansu
title: A star is too much
review: I bought three items for black Friday, never arrived. I contacted customer service over and over again but they only respond to a message after which you have to do it all over again, or they don't answer directly. They asked me to wait ten days longer than the order date and after this nefound and not replacement. Yesterday I ordered from the app of a friend a dress that they don't have in stock but it was still on the site, obviously the dress has not arrived and not even the refound. I put a star because it is not possible to put less. Shame on you.

name: IT
title: Shame that a company which was once so good seems to be going down the pan
review:
I've been a customer for years and their service was great. Things have gone down hill and fast. I ordered items on Black Friday and then returned some of the items, and am still waiting for a refund. After contacting customer services (which is a nightmare in its self) I'm non the wiser what's going on.

One of the items is faulty and I'm dreading the process of returning it, so much so that I may just repair it myself to save the hassle!

Shame that a company which was once so good seems to be going down the pan.

name: MB
title: Terrible customer care and damaged item
review:
Terrible. I ordered coat and they send me totally damaged item. I bought it at a discount on black friday and when I wanted to change the coat, it is not possible, but I can return the coat back and order again. No discounts, of course. So they send the destroyed item and I can order it again at a more expensive price. Great.
Customer service terrible - I deal with it for more than two weeks without a result.

name: Daniel Corman
title: Terrible customer service
review:
Terrible customer service. Terrible  delivery service. Terrible at dealing with complaints. 
Managers nevwr in the office when asked for. 
Literally I've called Mon to Fri and there was no manager I could talk to. 


 O/5 star

name: Nuraini Lee
title: The staff Ben helping me out is very…
review: The staff Ben helping me out is very fast and efficient in acknowledging my problem. All sorted out in less than 5 mins..

name: Sophia
title: Shocking, unhelpful customer service
review: I order from ASOS frequently and usually have nothing bad to say about it - fast delivery, easy returns, great clothes. However, this time I’ve received a faulty item so I got in touch with customer care to get a refund. I heard nothing for weeks so got in touch again. Still nothing. My coat was now falling to bits so I got in touch via the live chat, hoping to get a refund as the coat was now out of stock. The person I was speaking to was clearly reading from a script and was not amenable, asking i send back the coat so they could inspect it. I explained I was unable to do this as I don’t have another coat, so I sent pictures of the faults. I was still told that I would need to send the coat back for inspection (it’s 31st December and very cold...!) I suggested I would need to get the coat repaired and this would incur a cost. ASOS reluctantly agreed to help cover the costs of this, provided I do this myself and send a receipt. What a joke. I’ve already waited weeks with no response to get this quit frankly poor and unhelpful result, with no other compensation for the other time and resource this has incurred on me. To say this is shocking customer service is an understatement, for such a huge organisation and the price I paid for the coat, I would have expected a lot more . Very, very disappointed.

name: Leanne
title: Rubbish Service 3 times in a row!
review: Last 3 orders were wrong - first they had sent the wrong item completely, second they send me the wrong size shoes and order was missing a top. Third time they sent me a skirt they don’t even stock!!!!! Fed up with poor picking & packing service, feel like taking my custom elsewhere after my recent experience s.

name: Charlotte Law
title: Lost confidence in Asos
review:
Placed an order last night using a gift voucher, order went through on the app etc and all fine 
Looked on the app this morning as thought it was strange I didn’t receive a delivery notification and noticed the order still says ‘we’ve got it’ so contacted CS on chat. 
I was told payment wasn’t taken from a new £50 voucher and my order hadn’t shipped and had no email (also checked junk) to notify me there was an issue with my order.
The items I ordered went out of stock too and the advisor wouldn’t even offer any sort of discount or apology

name: Lilly bravo
title: This page is all FAKE REVIEWS
review: This page is all FAKE REVIEWS. If you go anywhere else you can see everyone in rage about how horrible their customer service is. I returned an item because the wrong item was sent to me. They didn’t even refund my money. I spoke to numerous amount of people on the live chat option they provide but they are passive aggressive and all unhelpful they just stick to the scripts that is provided and don’t really assist the customer. & if you want to reach a supervisor or someone in management? FORGET it. They will end the chat before providing you with that information. You can tell customer service isn’t the priority for this company. I’m sure they are told to not link management at any cost. They’ll rather have you suffer and not refund you what they owe. THEY BASICALLY STOLE 200$ FROM ME AND IS UNWILLING TO HELP ANYONE. I WOULD ADVISE YOU TO SHOP SOMEWHERE ELSE TRUST ME. I would never want anyone to experience something like this. You know it’s bad because I never ever ever wrote a bad review I don’t even give less than 5 stars to anyone on uber. You have to legit steal for me like they did for this to happen. GO SOMEWHERE ELSE.

name: rinat ben nahom
title: Tried to help but didnt know to say…
review:
Tried to help but didnt know to say where is the package.
Not make sense that you dont know to say where is my order that I already paid for
And that I need to wait 3 months dor refund!

name: Sarah Chattoo
title: My order was 2 days late and I paid for…
review:
My order was 2 days late and I paid for premium next day delivery.
I have been told my delivery will arrive in 3 days time making the delivery 5 days late if it arrives. 
They would not give me the delivery cost back. 
terrible!

name: Alex Hayward
title: Never going back unfortunately
review: Honestly always used to love Asos,their choice in clothes and delivery service.Never going back to Asos once i finally get my most recent order which is needed. Whenever needing my delivery to be on time it always ends up getting delayed,not happy with the service. Customer care were quick to respond so credit for that however saying sorry and assuring my order will be here almost 2 weeks after the delivery date isn't good enough and does not make me want to shop there again.

name: Jamie Jackson Reed
title: I was promised a refund and still haven’t received it!
review:
I was promised a refund due to complications with my account details and not being able to access my account to complete a return.

A month later they then told me that I was only aloud to be given a returns voucher which was definitely not what o discussed with the gentlemen over the phone.

I’m really not happy with this company.

They are a nightmare to get in contact with if you have issues and then refuse to help their customers.

Really unprofessional service.
Order from somewhere else

name: Tobbie Tuttle
title: Worst Experience Ever
review: Worst Experience Ever! Not concerned at all with helping the customer achieve a desired result. Only concerned with them being right! Unyielding, unwilling to see where I was coming from and how to fix my problem that I was having with their product! Terrible leadership in the way they direct their customer service to deal with situations! I WILL NEVER ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY AGAIN

name: Nancy
title: Premier delivery
review: Premier delivery? More like goodbye delivery ! 2 weeks and no sign of my package, customer service does not exist in my opinion as they have been no help and still no package, I may as well walk to and from the depot myself and collect my parcel, maybe then I’ll receive it. This has happened on numerous occasion, this is the final straw, au revoir Asos

name: Cherity Wilson Tate
title: FINALLY reached someone at customer support.                                       I love ASOS and have ordered many…
review: I love ASOS and have ordered many times. I love the clothes, pricing, and timeliness in which items arrive. However, I have had great difficulty, with many unsuccessful attempts, reaching customer service to find the status of a return that did not show as processed. I used the appropriate return labels which are scanned at drop off so it should have shown in your system that return was en route. I finally was able to connect with a customer rep (after many attempts at messaging and emails as stated above) and Jamal helped by advising the return package was in fact received and in process. I do not have any complaints, what so ever, about Jamal but as a whole the customer support you provide is pretty difficult to say the least.

name: NATALIE FALCO
title: Never delivered
review: Never delivered. No one has answered in two weeks. Don’t know if I’ll get a refund or resent. Spent $250

name: Carmen
title: I wish I could give them lower than a…
review: I wish I could give them lower than a star. As a premium member, they are truly so rude and its so unacceptable. I ordered 5 pairs of shoes, one after another. Each were the wrong size!! All 5!! I reached out to the team on FB, and each time they just told me to return it. Eventually they said they were out of stock. They took days to reply too! Of my 5, the first 3 were priced at 145 GBP and other 2 at 79 GBP. I returned via post the first 3. I should get 145 GBP x 3 returned right? But no, ASOS returned me 2 x 79 GBP!!! I am furious. I then am on ASOS chat for an hour. And she (Elise) was so rude! She didn't understand my problem. She had a harsh tone, and she could not be bothered to help. Eventually she has said that all is solved. I said how much am I receiving back total then? She says she doesn't know! She says she'll contact me later, and that I should close the chat. Good job ASOS, tell the customer to go before they even feel like the problem has been resolved. CHECK YOUR PRODUCTS ASOS. WRONG SIZES IN WRONG BOXES. YOU RUINED CHRISTMAS.

name: Darya Kochegina
title: Can't get my money back!
review: I made the order. Didn't received it. The ASOS team said that they made the refund. HALF A YEAR AFTER -NO REFUND!!!!! Tried to figure out what the problem,  but they again and again wrote me the same - we made the refund, it should come to you in 10 days. Half a year it didn't come. Send them the screenshot of my bank account. Nothing...

name: Danillo Abreu
title: Bought a jacket during Black Friday. Never arrived.
review: Bought a jacket during Black Friday. The delivery is over a week late and they told me to wait for another month. Just terrible customer service. Avoid it.

name: gloria1
title: Not really helpful
review: Not really helpful. I had a problem with my delivery and the agent told me to sort things out by myself with the delivery which is not my job.

name: Sy Rahman
title: Did not give me price adjustment and…
review: Did not give me price adjustment and just said it cannot be done, This is ridiculous, I just purchased 9 items and they went on sale. I am never purchasing from ASOS ever again, very disappointed!

name: naomi negash
title: Was charged for shipping when I spent…
review: Was charged for shipping when I spent more than the required amount for free shipping, received the wrong size for an item just wanted to exchange it for the same thing but the size I actually ordered and was given a hard time about something that was the company’s error took me a literal hour for a partial resolution  and now I’m waiting for an email that I may never get not shopping on this website again, customer service is non existent

name: James Hartland
title: Asos - specialists in wasting your time
review:
Ordered a 3 piece suit from Asos in the Christmas sales. Several days later I received an email to say the trousers and waistcoat are now out of stock however they have other items on their website. Not much good when they won't match the suit jacket I bought... Will have to waste my time sending the jacket back once it eventually arrives. 
Do yourself a favour and buy elsewhere.

name: Linda
title: Never got my order and can’t talk to…
review: Never got my order and can’t talk to anyone to find out where my order is

name: Daniel
title: Extremely poor communication, bad delivery times and all round rubbish service
review:
I have now waited for 21days for my parcel to arrive, it was finally signed for but not by Me and therefore was classed as delivered. It is quite clear to see that this is a major fault. While this was occurring I tried to contract the Asos team on facebook messenger. They replied once and then proceeded to ignore my messages.
Finally, I was able to speak to someone on live chat and then I had to wait another 4 days to see if they were going to send me another parcel out + delivery time which would have made the minimum time I could get my shoes ~30days from my order. This is quite clearly not acceptable.

name: Frances Knowles
title: Lack of communication and a very negative experience
review: I have had a very negative and stressful experience. One of my orders was cancelled and just never arrived so I chased up Asos and finally a replacement order was sent as there was some issue with it apparently. Then when I returned some of the items in my order I did not receive any refund information. I have spent couple of weeks waiting and then sending multiple emails to Asos customer care with no reply. I understand that this is a busy time but I have basically been ignored. I had wanted to do my shopping online to save time and make it easier but it has just been a negative and stressful experience. If I had not kept trying to sort the refund I don't think I would have ever recieved one. I have shopped online many times at Asos but am very upset and disappointed with the service now.

name: Xavier Gréhant
title: French website is completely broken
review:
French website is completely broken. It reloads all the time, doesn't store the shopping cart. It always forgets who you are.
It's impossible to buy anything. It"s even impossible to write to tell them. It always goes back to "hey, first time here!".
I like the design of their products. The front end of their website is great too. But they should fire their entire backend team because it's costing them their Christmas sales.

name: chris robinson
title: Whole order wrong
review: Ordered 9 items, the most expensive item wasnt even in the bad which i got given and it had already been opened, how amazing is that? 7 of the items were either wrong item, wrong colour or wrong size. Only 1 item is what i asked for. Absolutely dreadful decision to order for black friday.

name: Wong Gary
title: Very bad experience with ASOS…
review: Very bad experience with ASOS service, have been buying stuff from ASOS for a long time but now Im gonna look elsewhere. Order stuff since 29Nov, The items never came and not only did they not contact me but waiting for me to find them to ask about it only to have them say oh we lost your order, what do you want a refund or a replacement if u want a replacement , it will be on standard delivery. WOW poor customer service and arrogant company. Really hope next time if they know they screwed up their orders please bloody hell contact the customers also reply their emails if not do not put it there as a way to contact ASOS

name: Arn Cart
title: Delivery is so bad!
review: Second order in the last 6 months and issue with delivery every time. Tired of it, really disappointed.

name: Bryce
title: Terrible customer service policy
review: Terrible customer service policy.  I ordered a pair of white Van's slip on shoes, size 9.5 with a holiday promotion discount. When I received the shoes, they were a size 8. This is absolutely not acceptable as this is not what I ordered. These were a Christmas gift and I needed them before December 24. They advised me that my only option was to return the incorrect shoes, wait for a refund, so that (in my financial situation) I would have the funds to repurchase the same size of the same shoe in hopes that I would receive the correct size.  I ordered the correct size to begin with and felt punished by having to return, wait for my refund in order to have the funds to re-order. I didn't do anything wrong in placing my order and yet was made to feel like it was my fault.  I will now be just returning the shoes and try to find a similar promotion elsewhere to repurchase.  I will not be shopping at Asos again and will be advising my friends who introduced me to Asos to not shop here again.

name: Aron Theising
title: Bad customer service
review: Bad customer service. Jae was clearly just a talking head with no agency to actually solve problems.

name: Adrien Gerard
title: Rem was efficient on the chat
review: Rem was efficient on the chat, I hope my delivery is on its way now.

name: Carlita Victoria
title: Worst customer service ever
review:
Worst customer service ever. They do not care about customers. They don’t take the time to read emails and are not helpful in anyway. 

Terribly rude, no phone number available. Awful, awful, awful experience.

name: Brodie Tomlinson
title: Really poor quality shoes with the ASOS…
review: Really poor quality shoes with the ASOS DESIGN label, would defiantly not advice, scam with the high prices and cheaply made produce

name: Wendy
title: Bad customer service
review: Hi I received the worst customer experience ever and I am still receiving it. I bought premier delivery on the 3rd November and only received it two days ago a whole month later and I am not being reimbursed for that month. During the period of trying to get my premier delivery I spoke to four different people and the customer service I received was poor. Your colleague Craig spoke to me in a rude manner and didn’t report my issue And nothing was done about it. I am so appalled by this whole situation

name: patrizia aranzulla
title: It was bad and didn’t help
review: It was bad and didn’t help

name: Andrew Morgan
title: Dreadful
review: If I could give no stars I would - dreadful service in and around Christmas - if I could give a rating out of a 100 it would be 0 out of 100

name: Elisa Harca
title: Mia was the worst customer services…
review: Mia was the worst customer services person ever - not helpful at all.

name: Yonatan Darmon
title: Customer service couldn't refund me and…
review: Customer service couldn't refund me and cancel my order which delivery didn't arrive.

name: Brad Pearson
title: I ordered off this company this year
review:
I ordered off this company this year in the summer months, I purchased two items ready for an event the following week to not only receive the items on the day before but also the items received were both wrong! After months of complaining I eventually got refunded the £50 which I had spent but they didn’t give me the £10 back for next day delivery. There is hope if your willing to go through a stressful time with the terrible customer service, but eventually you will get your money back. 
Keep on trying!

name: Luisa Bocconcelli
title: Absolutely horrible
review: Absolutely horrible. I've never been more disappointed in customer service. I had an order which never arrived, I was promised a 30% off code for a next order (I have screenshots to prove this) and I never received it! I tried reaching out to 7 different customer service agents and all told me they were "looking into it", but it never happened. I was guaranteed by two different agents to receive the code within 24 hours and never did. F*** you asos, last time I order with you!

name: Hila Merin
title: A waist of time
review:
I placed an order on the app that was supposed to arrive by the 23rd of December. On the tracking system I can see that the latest update occurred on the 14t of December and it shows the parcel hasn’t left GB yet. The common sense is that the parcel wouldn’t arrive by December 23rd cause it’s tomorrow!!!
The representative I chatted with told me to wait until the 24th cause only by then she could check further into it. 
Why do I need to waist my time again on this issue when it’s clearly already is an issue by now and I don’t really have to wait 2more days for it to become an issue !

name: Isabella Aston
title: ignore delivery promises and then ghost you
review: Do not abide by their delivery promises. Absolutely no response on Facebook or twitter or other way to contact them. An absolute joke. 0/10

name: Bonnie Chan Donnelly
title: delivery expired but no help were given…
review: delivery expired but no help were given from both ASOS and the courier.

name: Mary Ann Pagliaro Gorman
title: I gave ASOS one star because there was…
review: I gave ASOS one star because there was nothing lower. They are completely unconcerned with customer satisfaction. They are difficult to reach with problems and would not but from them again.

name: Fraser
title: Honestly riddled with problems
review: Honestly riddled with problems. Non existent customer service. Just shocking no one else has tried to compete as what they do is awful

name: Lauren
title: absolutely terrible customer service
review: Usually I receive good customer service from Asos, and would expect to given their platform on social media and how they appear to be prompt in replying to queries and complaints. However this time I was ignored repeatedly, misinformed more than once and eventually reached no resolution as the outcome I now have is not the one I wanted. I think the way in which they responded with clearly copied and pasted answers to complaints and concerns I was raising was a waste of my time and I am dismayed that if I place an order with them again, the same result is likely to occur because they did little to rectify the problem as it was happening.

name: umar zamir
title: No items delivered, and misleading customer service agents!
review: Twice they’ve failed to send out my order in the month. One order was never delivered and I received a refund for it. Second one, I called up after a week asking why there was no progress using the track my order section in the app. They told me there was an issue at the warehouse and that they would send out a the order with next day delivery. Two days later, I received an email saying “confirmation of return” and that they refunded. I never received my order in the first place so what bloody return are they taking about. Really poor service and not what they used to be. Last time I’ll go back to them!

name: Medhat Hamouda
title: Sad Service
review:
Sad Service I never expected that
they lost my order and they put me through hell

name: Rose
title: Absolute trash. Company is worthless
review: Absolute trash. Customer service sucks.. I ordered boots so excited they were sooo so cute and I ordered the last pair in my size... I get my box today and it’s a completely different style of boot? Hideous. I contact customer service. A HOLES they were so rude at one point a guy literally just said “nah” to me hahahha like what? So unprofessional. You messed up on my order that I paid for and you’re going to be rude to me? Also ended the chat on me.. I’ve never had a customer service agent end the conversation on me. Absolutely rude and disgusting. Hate this company.

name: Amber Lynn
title: Don't rely on ASOS to delivery your…
review:
Don't rely on ASOS to delivery your package on time, or good cusotmer services in Canada. I ordered 2 dresses for some Holiday events and they were expected to arrive 2 days before the first one. they didn't come until 2 week PAST the expected delivery date. Come to find out it's because ASOS entered my postal code wrong on the packing slip. I emailed ASOS customer care three times, once to ask why it was so late as the tracking only said "left Facility" a full week past the expected delivery date, and all they did was tell me how to track it, which as i stated in my email i already did. When I got my package I sent them pictures of what was entered on  my order and what was put on my package, and all they said was sorry you you expected it sooner. They responded that it's out of their control. How is what they entered as a shipping address not within their control? 

Also CANADIAN shoppers - they do offer a discount to offset the duties, but it is buried in their website and not something they will honor if you miss it after placing the order but before it was shipped. I paid $52 in duties for a $170 dollar order... 

Overall really not impressed with the lack of attention to detail, and even more unimpressed with the accountability of the customer care team after the fact.

name: Joli Powell
title: My return has been lost and they can’t…
review: My return has been lost and they can’t do anything about it.

name: Abby
title: faulty item poor delivery service and customer care
review: a jumper I’ve ordered is clearly covered in foundation so disappointed in that, also my last order was left in my back garden which is very easy to see into and access where my order was stolen and I had to complain about that last time! The same thing has happened again literally chucked over onto a chair in the pouring down rain! I am so angry not only with the delivery being dumped in my garden again for anyone to take whilst raining and then to open my order and it to be covered in make up I think it is absolutely disgusting, also made several complaints to ASOS about this and the best they came back to me was return the jumper and we’ll send you a new one which they can’t even do as it’s not in stock so I’m left having to replace a Christmas present last minute, no other form of apology or attempt to rectify the situation and please a loyal customer if anything when talking to customer support they were rude considering the amount of faults! Very disappointed and unlikely to shop with them again!

name: Sarah Hitchcock
title: Never got back to me regarding my…
review: Never got back to me regarding my problem. 3 months and still haven't had an answer nor refund. Appalling customer service. Now there is no live chat available.

name: Stella Gketsiou
title: slow
review:
slow, incomprehensible, rude at times, repetitive, extremely predictable, unhelpful, unnecessary

You only good working for the Greek gov - thank you!

name: Tram Anh Nguyen
title: BLACK FRIDAY SCAM!!!!!!!!!
review:
I used to be a loyal customer, I even purchased their premier delivery for one year because I purchase many many things from here but from now on never am I going to order more from them again!!!!
My order placed since Black Friday have not reached me yet. It has been 2 weeks!!! The tracking link is useless as it does not show any update at all. I emailed them, contact via Facebook and live chat numerous time but all I got is the radio silent!!!!!! No sign of my items but my money was sure as hell deducted from my bank. This is ridiculous. I am really disappointed!!!! This is beyond ridiculous at this point

name: Max
title: Jae was highly unhelpful and ASOS chat…
review: Jae was highly unhelpful and ASOS chat has been advised to tell everyone to wait until after Christmas Eve to inquire about package delays even for packages that aren’t gifts. This is highly misadvised and ASOS is basically refusing to offer a solution for this problem. Tell your chat team to do better and be more helpful. I knew ASOS packages already took long enough but this is the most ridiculous and useless service I’ve ever seen.

name: Mystique 1001
title: If I could give no stars I would
review:
If I could give no stars I would. I have never experienced such terrible, condescending, inflexible customer service. With two separate team members, so clearly not just one individuals poor work ethic. 
This company is not flexible and definitely not transparent with their customs charges. They just keep repeating that hidden in their help files the information is available. How does that help me after I've already ordered? 
Then they had the audacity to tell me I could have had 15 % off during the ordering process to offset the customs charges. Again, how does that help me after the fact? No offer to credit it to me after even! 
They did nothing to take responsibility and did not care at all if they retained my business, or that they seriously kinked my holidays. 
Don't shop here unless you want to over pay, wait too long for delivery, and be treated like garbage.

name: Sarah Kai
title: Dishonesty and incompetence
review:
I ordered a dress on nov 18th for a wedding I am travelling for on December 23rd. I was told it would arrive on Dec 10th. On dec 8th I was worried about potential delays and contacted customer support asking if there are any delays and they said:

Hi Sarah,

So sorry that you are worrying that your order might not turn up. 

I've checked and can see your order is being delivered by TRAKPAK  and is due to arrive by 10/12/2019 .

Tracking isn't available on this delivery - but don't worry, it's on its way. If you haven't received your order by 10/12/2019 , please get back in touch.

I hope this is of some use to you. Hope you enjoy the rest of your weekend.

Best Wishes,

Brian

ASOS Customer Care
-------
the 10th came and went and still no dress. So I contact customer service again on the 13th and they tell me to check my post office and see if it's with a neighbour (it's an office building so that wouldn't happen).  But I followed up with the postal service anyway and they couldn't find anything associated with the TRAKPAK number. 

so a week after the delivery date I contact customer service again only to be told that the expected delivery was changed to December 31st. I was never notified of this, I was told 2 days before the original expected date that everything will be fine. 

Well the 31st is too late, I ordered a month in advance to avoid bullsh** like this. I contacted customer services before the delivery date to BE SURE things were fine, and STILL I get lies and incompetence. I did everything in my power as a customer (save for paying 30$ for express shipping) to prevent this late minute emergency on my part but ASOS didn't play their part. They failed and strung my around and screwed me over.

This was my first and last time ordering from ASOS. Their incompetence and lack of communication has turned me off from the company and I will be a loud ambassador of why you should shop there.

name: Darren
title: Delivery Address
review: Your chat reference is: 24646752

name: Brooke
title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
review: I have purchased a few items through ASOS over the last few years and have never liked anything I've ordered from them. Every time I tried to give ASOS another chance, I was extremely disappointed with the quality and sizing, especially the petite collection (most dresses were still too long and large). The most recent time, I received the wrong size from what I ordered. Customer service was HORRIBLE and AWFUL to work with as they would not help refund my card, although the company is the one who made a mistake. I will never purchase anything off ASOS again.

name: Cole
title: Scammers!
review: Scammers! Lying about when I’ll receive my package but the tracking says the post office has the package for weeks now

name: Antria
title: I am very dissapointed and frustrated…
review: I am very dissapointed and frustrated with how they handle their mistake!!! I was waiting the black friday discount to order a christmas gift and it arrived incorrectly. Now I have return the inorrect item waiting for my refund and also paid an extra 9.50 euro for the delivering tge incorrect item back to them! I am not able to purchase the correct item as it was not a cheap present and in addition they offer me a discount of 15% instead of 25% which i initailly had and initially said to me that I would have!!!!! The incorrect item was a bag cheaper than the one ordered! I am searching the problem with european customer service

name: Kirsty
title: Abysmal customer service
review:
The customer service is nothing short of abysmal! I have Premier Delivery, placed an order on 29.11 for delivery 30.11. I have yet to receive this order (now 19 days later) and ASOS can tell me absolutely nothing. 
I have had no apology, no offer to re-send the goods or to refund me. I have to constantly chase on email and the reply is always a pre-written blurb every few days which never actually addresses any of the points I have made. There is no phone number to be able to actually speak to a person and nowhere to make an official complaint. 
The customer service during this issue has been and still is appalling, I feel incredibly undervalued as a customer. ASOS do not care about the time, stress and frustration I have endured because of this.
it is still not clear if i will ever receive these goods or when I will eventfully get my money back, never mind an apology.

name: Saina Penrake
title: I have never had a bad experience with ASOS until now
review: I have never had a bad experience with ASOS til now. I ordered over 2 months ago, returning one item & exchanging another. The item that was meant to be exchanged never got sent back to me & now after emailing & contacting 4 times, I’m slowly giving up. I have just checked & now the item seems to be out of stock! What a waste of time. I was told that my item was resent to me & of course I waited weeks after to still not have it. Don’t bother exchanging!

name: Tal Mor
title: order 456681153.
review:
ive contacted you by facebook. i took 3 times until i was answered.
 i ask for a replacement and got a refund instead. although the item was in stock the all time.
really bad experience for me. and worse part i still didn't get joggers...

name: Barbara M.
title: EVERYTHING IS AWFULL
review: EVERYTHING IS AWFULL

name: Tom
title: I've had a really poor experience
review:
I've had a really poor experience. 

I returned a pair of boots that were too big, requesting an exchange a size smaller. After receiving nothing and having no contact from ASOS, I contacted their customer service.

After being advised that the boots had gone missing, I was given a refund rather than an exchange. Unfortunately the boots had now increased in price, so I was told I would need to re-order and then request another refund. 

ASOS were not willing to assist any further and did not want to give me any other options for correcting their error. I was told I could not make a complaint. I

I would expect considerably better customer service from such a large retailer. Please be wary if you are dealing with their customer service teams.

name: Ola
title: horrible experience
review: horrible experience. Each 'adviser' gives you different information. I paid for next day dleivery, didn't arrive - contacted them and they said the delivery will arrive a week later then get a message next day saying that the carrier couldn't deliver my parcel because nobody at home- contacted ASOS again, they said not to worry they will contact Hermes and I'll get my parcel the same day.  Contacted them again - back to the 'week later' delivery - refused to cancel my order and even refused to change my address because I won't be there and nobody will have an access to the building. Unacceptable, poor and disgusting.

name: Sonija Klijnsma
title: 3 weeks no order received | chased up | refunded | still available on site????
review: 3 weeks & no order received. No communication from ASOS no tracking either. I had to follow up & to my disappointment was told they were sold out... HOWEVER ASOS website still had one of the items listed for sale in my size???? Completely dissatisfied.

name: Renae
title: Lost package? DISSAPOINTED
review:
As I explained the issue on ASOS end with my late delivery. All I was given was the option to replace the order or get a refund. They had no sympathy and told
Me that even after I’ve been waiting patiently for my package that mind you NEVER came, they would send me an email in 48 hours. So again I need to wait. I really
Hope this “customer service” is an area which you improve on because as I told Kameron or the robot, it left a very best taste in my mouth and I was genuine upset that I couldn’t wear the dress I planned on wearing to my birthday. 
I won’t be shopping on ASOS anymore if this is how you treat you frequent shoppers. I’m also a person who NEVER complains or will write a bad review to anyone or any business.
Renae

name: Sathina Gloria
title: Package delayed over 2 weeks which is…
review: Package delayed over 2 weeks which is very disappointing

name: jo 123
title: Crooks
