review: The worst experience ever. Wrong items received and then they proceeded to block me and obstructed me returning the items I didn't order. Resulting in forcing me to pay for clothing I didn't order. Crooks. Would not recommend unless you enjoy being robbed

name: FU
title: If i buy a gift voucher for a friend…
review: If i buy a gift voucher for a friend over seas it shouldn't matter where they purchase from.... having to redo a voucher is BS!!!

name: Isiah Copeland
title: I ordered a package on 12/14
review: I ordered a package on 12/14. I hadn’t received any tracking info and kept tracking thru ASOS app. FedEx showed the tracking info pending meaning it had not been received by ASOS. I contact ASOS on 12/18 and get a response on 12/19 that my package was unable to be located and would be replace and I would receive a confirmation email in 24 hours. 30 hours later? I had not received that email. Contacted ASOS again to be told there was no record of my previous interaction. Supposedly my package had been lost and would be replaced and I would get confirmation in 24 hours . I ordered this 11 days before I needed it and the lack of urgency in customer service and gross unprofessionalism has discouraged me for ordering during holidays from this company. Now I will be empty handed on the holiday and out of $300 to even go somewhere else! Also get a number, the chat is not efficient!

name: Emily Hoffman
title: Extremely poor customer service
review: ASOS does not have a customer service phone number. They claim to have a live chat for customer service on their website but it never worked when I attempted to use it. The only way I could get in touch with ASOS was to use twitter where they told me to DM them. They first told me that I could return the faulty boots they sold me but then changed that answer and said I could not. Responses to my messages on Twitter took many hours and attempting to work with them wasted an incredible amount of my time. Their responses were condescending and they never took responsibility for selling faulty products. The ASOS representative (or more likely multiple representatives) who were messaging me always tried to shift the blame for my faulty boots elsewhere. When I made it clear that I would not be shopping with them again they tried to appease me with a 15% off one full priced item coupon that expires in less than a month. I do not trust ASOS to stand by their products and I recommend people avoid buying from them.

name: Katharine
title: Absolutely appalling customer service
review:
Absolutely appalling customer service. 
I was sent a damaged eyeshadow palette which had woefully inadequate packaging so I’m not surprised it was smashed.  
I tried for literally hours to get through on the ‘chat’ customer service but was always in a queue.
Will never be ordering from ASOS again

name: Z
title: Disappointing chat service
review: Disappointing service with responses from Joshua that were probably as equally helpful as an automated system would have been.

name: Renee
title: Waited forever on an order
review: Waited forever on an order. O er three weeks late. Talked to three different ppl via chat and Facebook, and got three different reasons as to why was late. Once the dress came, I realized zipper was broken. So unimpressed with this company and it’s cheap a** clothes 75 bucks for a dress that looks like it cost 10. Don’t waste your money

name: DressingGown
title: I will no longer use this company!
review:
Signed up as new customer on website to recieve 10% discount code and then proceeded to order a £99 Hair dryer through them.
Unable to input discount code after multiple attempts. 

Placed order anyway 10 days before Christmas, to be delivered to local supermarket collection point. 

I then attemted to contact customer service via Messenger & twitter regarding order discount code, no phone number available. 
Recieved un helpful statement after 25 hours, stating order has been delivered.
Went to delivery collection point to be told the package "is missing" and to contact ASOS.

Again contacted customer support again regarding order to find out, its been returned to sender and i will recieve a full refund. 

Now with less than 5 days until Christmas, i can expect a full refund within 7 days, but no attempt to contact me using my mobile or email address to notify me they had cancelled the order!! 

Appalling service. 

i now need to find a replacemnt last with no time left to do so....

name: Nnenna
title: Terrible terrible and unreliable
review: Terrible terrible and unreliable. I am shocked that ASOS is in business with fastway courier in Dublin that take so long to deliver even after a person paid extra for next day delivery. ASOS has a due diligence to satisfy their customer’s need and I am beyond angry, annoyed and disappointed. Please do better

name: Molly
title: Worst customer service!
review: This is absolutely the worst customer service I have ever received in my life. An error was made by ASOS, and the customer care team will not resolve it, despite there being an easy and clear solution. Each response is from a different person, some of whom have clearly read the previous messages and understand the situation, and others who clearly have no idea what’s going on.

name: Madison Hawkins
title: This company just wants your money
review: This company just wants your money. They don't offer exchanges, so be cautious of ordering items with a promo. They won't honor it if you need to buy a different size. Lewis and Sara both failed to help me and presented awful customer service for the company. Really bad first experience.

name: Flor Taniaa Reyes
title: Most awful customer service experience…
review: Most awful customer service experience to the day. I've been a loyal customer for years and never had an issue with ASOS. Amy or whatever the  agent name is was simple rude and inconsiderate.

name: Ioana Fiter
title: I cannot believe that a Big brand like…
review: I cannot believe that a Big brand like Asos could be so big liars. I have ordered a  turqoise Ellesse tracksuit,size M for my husband and came on green. Even the size was totaly different & the worst material ever. Definitely i won’t order ever again from Asos or recommend it !! 👎👎

name: charlotte roy
title: This company is absolutely ridiculous…
review: This company is absolutely ridiculous my order is over two weeks late it is now the day before Christmas Eve so now the person I bought this present for won’t be getting there presents because of ASOS, they need to change there delete company with Hermes they are absolutely disgusting and now my Christmas is ruined and ASOS customer service is disgusting

name: Don Williams
title: Garbage
review: “Order by December 23 and get it before Christmas!” Maybe Amazon can do this but this isn’t the first time ASOS has promised you something and hasn’t delivered. Now the estimated time of delivery is December 31. ASOS is garbage. I once ordered Converse Size 11, I got Size 9. Terrible customer service as well.

name: Harassed by asos
title: I spoke to agent chloe
review:
I spoke to agent chloe. Extremely unhelpful and robotic. My same day delivery order that I paid extra for did not arrive in the time frame. The parcel was attempted to be delivered 2 days late but I had left for the holidays and had asked it to be rejected. Now I receive emails that the parcel has been received on the 22nd and there is no signature. 
I take this up with ASOS and while I’m chasing ASOS customer care as they refuse to reply for some strange reason, I receive an email on the 24th that my order is on the way to be delivered. Then miraculously it is delivered and signed by someone. 

How can there be apparently “two” deliveries made on the same order?
If accordingly to city sprint the order was delivered on 22nd (as updated on the tracking) then what was delivered on the 24th (and the tracking shows the job was created on the 24th)

It seems like city sprint lied. They never delivered anything and when they were contacted by ASOS they decided to pretend to deliver once again. 

When you paid close to 10£ for a single delivery, you want your order to be delivered when you need it! Not when ASOS decides to send it... and if they had to then they don’t need to scam customers of their hard earned money by charging more!

Trust me guys, don’t go for ASOS express delivery. It’s a scam. 
Asos is the worse site to order clothes from. You are better protected with AliExpress, which has way better customer cafe policy. ASOS is terrible. Come 2020, we should raise our voices against this unethical company!

name: ligal ravia
title: I received wrong item
review:
I received wrong item . I should receive legging , instead I got black top . 
Also In another order I had a delay of 2 weeks !!!!!!!!!!!! It’s unfair and un acceptable. And nobody gave me a Compensation.

name: danielle
title: terrible service
review:
I placed an order some time ago. i received the order the next day the skirt that was sent to me was the wrong skirt. I sent it back the next day asking for the correct skirt. I sent it recorded tracking. Asos has received my return 2 weeks ago i still have no refund or email to say what is going on. i speak with asos and they said sorry your order must have got lost in the warehouse.
terrible service

name: Felix Mmeka
title: I was not informed I had to pay for Customs prior payment
review:
I made an order and after taking roughly a month to get to its destination, I was surprising to me then asked to pay Customs charges of over 37% of my order payment.

Honestly, This was extremely irritating because I was informed about this prior payment on the site and honestly made the order quite useless for its purpose.

Thanks.

name: Dara Davey
title: Beyond furious with your company and…
review: Beyond furious with your company and customer service in the aftermath of a missing bridesmaid dress for a wedding. I have used your website for years. I will no longer be using your services.

name: Lisa
title: ASOS IS A DISGRACE, ESPECIALLY DURING CHRISTMAS!
review:
Tbh I wouldn’t even give 1 star. I wouldn’t give them anything. THE EMAIL IVE RECEIVED FROM THEM IS DISGUSTING!
I’ve been shopping on ASOS for years!!! I’ve been a loyal customer and it’s always been a “go to”. There would be times where I received bad customer service or they forgot to send bits of my order but I always shopped from them. However recently I placed an order for some clothes for Xmas and some Dr Martens that I’ve been trying to get for ages and I found they had 1 size in stock which is a size smaller which I usually go for but I thought they stretch out anyway! I received my order the next day but my DrMartens were not included? I immediately contacted Asos via Live Chat and told them and she was happy to either give a refund or replacement. I REALLY wanted the DMs but when I checked online they were all out of stock. I did explain I would love a replacement but I’m not sure if it’s possible as they’re out of stock. She assured me that she would pass over my details onto stock team and usually receive stock regularly. I was abit annoyed as I specifically got next day delivery because of the boots but I thought it was fine. I received an email yesterday from them( bare in mind Christmas is NEXT WEEK) basically telling my account is blocked and anything returned back will not be refunded. They are also basically accusing me of LYING saying that “it’s rare items go missing from ASOS”. 
I am now unable to contact them, make another account or get a refund for £210 DR MARTENS THAT I NEVER RECIEVED. I also had to return a couple hoodies from that order a couple days so now I won’t be getting a refund for that either. Nearly £300 I won’t be getting a refund for. I AM NOT HAPPY ABOUT THIS!!! They just completely blocked me without me having any say in this it’s disgusting. During Christmas too. Terrible.

name: Jasmine C
title: i ordered a dress that i wanted to wear…
review: i ordered a dress that i wanted to wear on New years from ASOS which was shipped on dec 3 and suppose to arrive for dec 20 and when i asked asos on facebook about this they told me to let them know on Jan 14 if i dont receive it. that is horrible customer service as i told them it was for new years and i am not sure what im suppose do with that as i wasnt helped at all.

name: hanan hashim
title: The shipment was not delivered due date
review: The shipment was not delivered due date

name: joanna stuart
title: Don’t waste your time
review: I ordered a dress next day delivery for my work Christmas party. It has never arrived. Two weeks later I have been told it was lost and refunded and told to reorder the dress if I wanted it - needless to say, the dress is out of stock and cannot be ordered and it did not arrive for my Christmas party, nor at all, despite ordering two weeks in advance. For such a large company, their customer service is disgusting. As a loyal customer spending a considerable sum monthly, I would advise you to stay well away.

name: Jennifer Callender
title: DONT ORDER FROM ASOS
review: I paid extra to receive a coat I wanted to wear to an event   The coat has not arrived. I received an email saying the cost was delivered and signed For. I did not get a knock on the door. I did not get a calling card and none of my neighbours on my small close received the delivery. This non delivery was supposed to have been carried out by a company ASOS uses for delivery. 24 hours have passed and it seems that ASOS is unable to do anything until they hear from this company  the fact that they use an unreliable Company who they seem unable to chase means that I am unlikely to get either another coat sent out or a refund in time.  TO AVOID ANY DISTRESS DO NOT ORDER FROM ASOS particularly if you’re depending upon an item to wear to somewhere you consider important to you

name: Aidan Grant
title: I have used ASOS for years now
review: I have used ASOS for years now. I thought they were good until today. I bought a couple items and paid 10 pounds for next day delivery. Still haven't got my items. Then when I asked for a discount code or some sort of compensation, I was told no. I needed the items for an event. I understand its Christmas and you're very busy but customer service is everything.

name: madison hobbs
title: Not ordering from ASOS again soz
review: Took 2 weeks of me chasing for them to tell me my order had been cancelled 18 days prior and were unable to offer me any form of solution or apology despite this being the second order of mine that they messed up  (however the last person was polite n got me the information I needed )

name: Fiona Clark
title: After failing to receive my order that…
review: After failing to receive my order that was due for next day delivery (I paid for Premier delivery) I contacted Asos via Facebook messenger on 2 seperate occasions. My messages were read by members of the asos team however I did not receive a response. After contacting Asos for a third time via live chat Joshua advised that I have to wait until the 19th of Dec before any further action can be taken. That is a full week after the order date despite paying additional money for a 'premier' delivery service. Both the courier Hermes and Asos have offered nothing but poor customer service on this occasion. This experience will make me think twice about ordering with Asos in the future

name: Eleanor Whelan
title: Ended the chat before confirming with…
review:
Ended the chat before confirming with me that I was happy with the answer and service provided 

Not happy with the outcome provided or the exchange service when using the option in the returns slip

name: Aimee
title: I was sent a pair of shoes that were…
review: I was sent a pair of shoes that were received in an awful condition, they were £99. They came with no stuffing in the box, the box was too small so they were all bent and misshaped. They were creased and bent and heavily marked however I have been desperate for these shoes so I was willing to keep them for a discounted price. The customer service advisor basically said I either keep them at full price or send them back, no inbetween, no negotiation. This isn’t the only time I’ve received Awful service.

name: Lily Dale
title: lost my order
review: lost my order

name: Emily Sheedy Davies
title: Take days to respond and provide no solution
review: Take days to respond and provide no solution

name: Happy Customer
title: Cr#p customer service
review: Cr#p customer service. No item received and also used myhermes to send the parcel, who is also one of the worst delivery companies in existence. No contact possible with either company. Definitely avoid both companies and any other company hiding behind email with no phone number to call if there is a problem.

name: bree
title: worst online shopping site
review: I've order here about 5 times-- bad experience every time. I always cave each holiday as it seems like the go-to place to shop and everyone seems to rave about it. Any item I've ordered is always either poor quality or defective. Thin material, sizing has always been off, and colors often are different from what is pictured. Going through customer care is the real nightmare though. It takes weeks to get a refund back. They have a policy that says once they receive it at the warehouse, the customer has to wait 10 ADDITIONAL days for them to "process it at the warehouse". Still, after the 10 days I've had to contact them to initiate the refund. They rarely get back via email so it's better to use the live chat feature on the website. All together, just a horrible experience each time. Never worth it. Never have had so many bad experiences at one online retailer.

name: Eloise
title: Worst customer service ever received
review: Worst customer service ever received

name: Kelly a
title: Be aware and do not Order From Here I…
review:
Be aware and do not Order From Here I placed my Order on 12-02-19
Dident receive it Untill 12-14-19 
It’s Said my  package was delivered On the 13? Reached out to customer service and they did not respond Witch Dident show up Untill 14!!? Okay Fine when receiving the package I got my husband boots that did not come in a box they came in a bag very professional (Sarcastic
They was Smashed an had No shoelaces?? Really contacted customer service again on live chat spoke to someone name hana < The rudest person I ever spoke to in customer service remind me who this was a Christmas gift today is 12-17-19 I asked nicely if they can send out a replacement pair they told me I need to return the item within 10 days for a full refund they cannot send out another pair which is their fault missing shoelaces and damaged I asked to speak to a supervisor over the situation an Hana<<< had an attitude and said they are under the same umbrella? Really I kindly told them that I could not afford to buy another pair for my husband at the moment I told him to refund my money and I will send out their damaged boots he basically said no and there’s nothing he can do The worst person I ever spoke to him they don’t have a phone number to get in contact with them I Facebook messaged them but no response it’s horrible because you spend your hard-working money and these people take advantage of that and they don’t even want to send you a good item and want me to pay for shipping it back this place is Hell!!! I do not recommend anyone to shop there

name: Chloe walker
title: Do not like contacting over live chat
review: Do not like contacting over live chat, prefer a person on the end of a phone, trying to explain that yodel had messed up the delivery was just ridiculous, my parcel is now almost a month late will not get here in time for event and I am now waiting to hear back from ASOS as they are doing an investigation, which doesn’t help me in the meantime. Not happy and it took me a full day to get in touch with Asos live chat in the first place!

name: Melissa
title: Failure to send exchanges
review: ASOS failed to send an exchange for the third time. The continually do this, especially when there are higher discount codes used so customers must reorder when the discount period has ended.

name: Jean Emmanuel William
title: Bad delivery bad customer care service…
review: Bad delivery bad customer care service no tracking number. Asos is no more a good online fashion store

name: Matt
title: Terrible experience from start..
review: Terrible experience from start... I’ve ordered Christmas gifts for my girlfriend definitely abt 3 weeks ago , ive paid for next day delivery and received wrong item 3 days later ... I’ve spoken to someone on the phone and I’ve been told to send wrong item back and it was 10 working days and they still told me that they haven’t recived it yet ... I’m very annoyed now because I know already that I won’t get my items before Christmas and the items that went missing are currently out of stock ... so I reckon it will end with money refund which I will have to wait another two weeks.... so from my point of view it was a waste of time to order from ASOS!!!

name: Rhianna Williams
title: Shocking delivery service... over 2 weeks and still nothing...
review: My order is from the 29th November and I still have not received it. No one from hermes has responded and ASOS took over a week to reply. Still not received anything, and my order still says estimated delivery for the 9th December on my account. Standard delivery is 3-5 working days, maybe 7 in busy times. Currently at: 19 days and counting...

name: Ana
title: Disappointing
review: I've been a loyal costumer for years, but won't continue buying from Asos. I waited over 2 weeks for my parcel, received no information regarding day or time of delivery, and suddenly got an email saying my parcel was sent back to their warehouse. No one knocked on my door or rang the buzzer. I got in touch with their costumer service who assured me they'd resend it to me. I provided  my building code, phone number etc..... I never heard back... and again no one rang my buzzer...only to once more receive an email saying my parcel had been sent back to them. What a colossal waste of time.

name: Kelly Flanagan
title: HORRIBLE customer service help and delivery
review: Made an order on December 15th that was supposed to arrive the latest by the 20th. Both the app and customer service confirmed with me, before the 20th, that it would be delivered on time. Neither of them were correct or any help at all. My package won’t be delivered until January 2nd. I needed my order to wear through the holidays. Complete waste of my money and time. Now I need to rush around the day of an important event to find an entirely new outfit. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. I’m a brand new customer and heard nothing but good things. I will never spend my money on this site again and make sure nobody that I know does either.

name: l3ushy
title: Horrendous courier company.
review:
Maybe not a bad review of ASOS, but more the courier service they are using, myhermes. They have been absolutely dire from start to finish, and we have still not received our parcel, which was a Christmas present that evidently we will now not get.
To begin with we were sent the wrong item by ASOS. After trying to sort this for over a week, they still didnt manage to issue us a code for the product we wanted, bought at the same price as listed on the Black Friday sale. We sufficed for just getting a refund and bought the original product more for more than it was listed for when we bought it on Black Friday. ASOS still haven’t rectified this. 
So when we reordered, we found it was being delivered by MyHermes. Apparently they made an attempt to deliver but this was clearly not true. After wasting my whole day inside waiting, for them to say they had attempted at the end of it, was an absolute joke. We contacted myhermes via live chat and phone, livechat insisted they would pass on my phone number to the courier so we could direct them to the property if they found it difficult (it isn’t difficult) which evidently did not happen, no call. I called myhermes and was greeted by the most vile human in the world. I explained I understood it was a busy time of year but surely they should have measures in place for this, overall the man was just rude and spoke over me the whole time despite me being understanding. I expressed my concern of not receiving my package. He showed little interest and assured me he would pass on my number to the courier.
Anyhow,
Here we are again. Email saying it has been delivered. It hasn’t and we did not give permission for our package to be left anywhere, especially in our non existent ‘porch’. 
Both ASOS and my Hermes have lost my custom. This is a formal complaint and I wish for it to be responded to by the complaints procedure.

name: N
title: Truly does not understand what customer…
review: Truly does not understand what customer service is. Their team is unhelpful and dishonest.

name: Michael Meloni
title: Extremely poor support when things go…
review: Extremely poor support when things go wrong. Christmas order sent express and purchased a week before cut offs ended and the best Asos customer care can do is tell me to wait until Jan as it's a bit delayed. It's like they don't even understand Christmas is the 25th. I get that shipments sometimes go wrong but how a customer service team responds when things go wrong says a lot about the level of customer care they provide. No phone support and they refuse to escalate issues. I began to think i was typing to a chatbots not a real human. Awful

name: Vinni Paget
title: Lost Order - Poor Customer Support
review:
ASOS lost my order and didn't tell me that it was lost. So a few days after the expected delivery, I tried to contact ASOS to find out what happened to my order.

I messaged them several times, in many different channels (Email, Chat, Messenger) and only heard back a couple times. Even then, no one could provide me with an answer about where my order is. 

It is now 1 month since I have made the order and still have not received any tracking information. I finally heard back from someone today who confirmed that it has been lost and that they will process a new order for me. Unfortunately, this means that I will not receive my package before Christmas which was the whole point of my purchase!

name: Anthony Maddison
title: Never received the item, and never received a reply to the order chase.
review:
Placed an order which didn’t arrive unfortunately, chased this several times with customer services over the course of 2 weeks, but received very limited response and nothing helpful. I then lodged a dispute through PayPal which also got no response, and finally had to use Paypal buyer protection which was settled in my favour, also due to no response. This took me nearly a month all in all. 

This was my first time using ASOS, and also sadly my last. Very poor service and one I’ll avoid in future, better to pay a little more and actually get the item.

name: Harry Yang
title: Poor customer service & no issues were resolved! Hate it!
review: Fedex attempted to deliver three times. Once on Sunday when business location is closed, once on Monday and once on Tuesday but they said they can't find my address anymore that day -- ridiculous! Contacted customer service, but no help. They would not redeliver nor give discount code. Asked me to repurchase but that defeated the purpose of my 30% off during Black Friday! Like, I'd rather pay the amount I previously did to have the package resent. Customer service wouldn't budge and sounded snarky throughout the conversation. Highly disappointed. I would give this no stars if this was an option! I'm incredibly irked and annoyed.

name: s
title: if there's option for "-1" I will rate…
review: if there's option for "-1" I will rate your website with it!

name: martina quinn
title: Waited for Christmas present to arrive…
review:
Waited for Christmas present to arrive that was ordered on the 24th of November. It never arrived even after several emails and a phone conversation where I was told the present would be fast tracked. 
Still waiting

name: Ай Нура
title: your consultants are disrespectful
review:
your consultants are disrespectful
delivery is bad/
have not tracking number/
aliexpress very very good than asos/

name: Sarah Coleman
title: My customer experience of Asos has been rubbish…
review:
Asos rubbish customer service this Christmas. 

I ordered 2 parcels 
1. 7 Dec £80 Standard delivery due to arrive 17 Dec
2.14 Dec £30 delivery next day 

The 14 Dec £30 order arrived incorrect on 15 Dec.

The only way they said I could resolve this was for me to return the item for a refund. Then they would send a replacement.  

How does that help me get it for Christmas????

Their only suggestion was that I order again another £40!!  They would refund the next day delivery.

When I did this they refused to refund the delivery unless I call up once the parcel had arrived.

Having spent 60 mins speaking to them to find this out, I expect, I will need to spend another hour recovering my £5.

I won't be shopping with them again.

name: Sharene Abouhana
title: Horrible experience
review: Horrible experience. The ski suit I ordered has mold everywhere and the robot customer service was no help. I am looking to purchase items from companies that CARE and ASOS just showed that they are careless.

name: wallis
title: nothing ever arrives correct
review: i’ve shopped at asos for 5+ years now and honestly i can count on 1 hand how many times things have gone right! from orders being lost to items arriving wrong or broken to the abysmal customer service i receive every time! recently ordered a pair of pyjamas for them to send me a pair 5 sizes smaller than i actually ordered meaning i couldn’t take part in our pyjama day in work! working in retail myself if a customer had as bad experiences as i have had we’d do our utmost to make sure the customer feels like we care but with asos it’s almost like they don’t care. it’s sad really.

name: Michael
title: Put in order 13th december paid express…
review: Put in order 13th december paid express post still haven't received delivery.

name: Sophie
title: I’ve been waiting over a week now for a…
review: I’ve been waiting over a week now for a response as to why my account has been blocked and I’ve had nothing so I made a new account so I can actually order and they blocked that too! So bizarre

name: Liam
title: Order was never shipped after 3 weeks of waiting
review: Order was never shipped after almost three weeks of waiting. After trying to contact customer services on live chat on several occasions, I got through to someone who said the order had not been shipped. Therefore I could either have a refund or a 'replacement' order. When I asked if I could just reorder the original items, I received unclear and conflicting responses. Throughout this whole order, I received no correspondence from ASOS about my order being cancelled/lost/never shipped, so if I didn't contact them, I would have essentially lost over £150 worth of items. Currently awaiting refund but terrible service throughout

name: Constance Vane
title: No respect for loyal customers total scammers
review: I had an awful experience with ASOS. I’ve been a really loyal customer and have been using Asos for years, in the last year alone I spent nearly £1k!! On 30th November I ordered some Christmas presents in their Black Friday sale, I usually have premier (next day) delivery but this wasn’t available, standard delivery said 11th November. I got my confirmation email that it had been dispatched on the 5th, then after that NOTHING, I emailed them on the 14th chasing my order and got no response, then out of the blue I received an email saying that they had got my return! I was refunded so I called them straightaway, I would have reordered but 3 of the items were now out of stock and the rest had gone up in price, so even without the three out of stock items I would have ended up spending £65 more. They then told me that it was a mix up at their warehouse, it hadn’t been shipped so the staff assumed it was a return (this is a massive lie because it wouldn’t have had a returns label on it and I hadn’t marked the returns sheet inside) they offered me a 15% off voucher as a ‘gesture of good will’ and the guy on the phone told me they could only give me 15% because I’d only spent just over £100! I then asked for their complaints email and tweeted them asking them to respond. Their response was ‘if you want the items order again’ to which I responded that was very unhelpful, I was then just sent another 15% off voucher ‘to make it up to me’ (I can’t use these together and I can’t use them on sale items either) basically, they held my money for two weeks, gave me no update and then tried to fob me off with a 15% discount code when you can get 10% codes online for free. SCAMMERS and they don’t have any respect for repeat customers!!!

name: A
title: Poor customer service
review: Do not shop with the company. Really poor customer service. Rude employee put the phone down on me on Friday at 2pm and still waiting a reply about my complaint - ridiculous. Will only deal with complaints after 72 hours and only via email.

name: Intense Swede
title: DISGRACEFUL!
review: DISGRACEFUL!! OH OH yet again I am here complaining about ASOS.. Ordered five items totalling 200.00 on my premier delivery next day delivery.. but NO NO NO delivery three days later. ASOS insist the order is on its way.. but where is it I said. Hermes courier yet again have it and they have not delivered it. WHY OH WHY have ASOS changed to Hermes, they must be the WORST in the UK.. slow, rude drivers and always late, no delivery info.. I could go on. ASOS are a bunch of SCAM ARTISTS, they have £200 of my money yet I have no clothes from them..and the online chat people are so rude its awful and they never reply to emails. DISGRACEFUL

name: Stacey White
title: Awful Company
review: Awful Company, ordered on 29 November and still no delivery despite being with the courier and out for delivery 5 days ago. No further updates on the order and refusing to refund me, want to leave it until 21st December. Explained it's a present that I need on 18th December but 'Teggan' on online chat just ended the chat, How do you get a refund from this Company?! Have bought from Currys so am out of pocket now and want my money back!

name: Dekel
title: Slow shipping
review:
I started ordering online with ASOS because the shipping is so fast.
But the last the service was really bad, 3 weeks and I still haven’t got what I order.
If I would have wanted slow shipping I would have choose AliExpress.

name: Matt Lawson
title: Terrible terrible customer service.
review:
Spoken to 4 different people now, they all said they would speak to the courier and get back to me. Non have followed through on anything or solved any issues.

I appreciate parcels are late this time of year but it's been a week since it should have been delivered and it was Christmas presents, it is 100% lost as has been at the Farnborough depot since Friday 13th at 2am. I just want my money back and to be able to use that money to buy another present. 

To be clear... I JUST WANT MY MONEY BACK

Slow replies. With no answers to my questions. Generic answers missing the point. I have spent alot over the years with ASOS but the way they have handled this last order was terrible. Never again.

name: Jackie Holton
title: I placed an order on 9th December and…
review: I placed an order on 9th December and as of 21st December it still hasn't arrived  I have been assured it is on its way three times and nothing! Very disappointed and angry as it is a Christmas present

name: Jodyanne Chinloy
title: No help ,no answers
review: No help ,no answers

name: Cristina Ranchal Rubio
title: Worst customer service ever
review:
ASOS lost my package (a jacket I bought for my brother for Xmas that I purchased on Dec 2, so way in advance to make sure it arrived on time. On Dec 19 I found out they lost it... but none notified me, I had to reach out to customer service to know. The tracking number never worked. No solutions that could fix the issue were offered to me. My bother won’t have his jacket for Xmas because of the terrible service ASOS provided. The worst was to hear that it was my fault because I should have contacted before... 
The only solution was to buy again the jacket in asos.es (but even though, the jacket won’t arrive on tîme) Also, I had to pay more as ASOS didn’t offer me any discount that matched the price I paid on ASOS.co.uk. So apart from not getting the jacket on time, I had to spend more money. I won’t buy on ASOS again. I don’t recommend it to anyone.

name: Gilbert
title: Great response from customer service, but confusing communication on delivery
review: Lets start positive, though I had to wait for 10 minutes or so, the live chat person was very good and very professional.  For that they get 4 starts. However.....I ordered an item for Christmas and a couple of days later I got an email that it "was returned and credited".  Funny, I never got it to return!  Then, 7 hours later I got an email that it was shipping.  There was even tracking info with DHL.  4 days before Christmas and customer service tells me they couldn't ship.  Then why was I told it shipped and why did DHL have an active tracking number?  I should have gotten an email that the order was cancelled due to lack of inventory or whatever.  I asked for a courtesy credit to encourage me to reorder and this was not available.  This would have gone along way to have made me feel better about this.  Sadly, I cannot recommend this provider.

name: Alex
title: Delivery lost, nothing being done!
review: Ordered 7 items. Only 1 was delivered. Yet MyHermes marked delivery as complete. MyHermes are impossible to get in contact with and Asos are doing nothing about this. I ordered and paid for next day delivery due to the urgency of the delivery and still several days later nothing is being done. In fact every single time I have ordered clothes from Asos there has been a problem with the delivery. MyHermes are atrocious at what they do and have me rethinking ever using Asos again. I would never recommend this service, and in fact would caution people against it.

name: EVE
title: Bad customer service from your representative
review:
Your customer service doesn't try to resolve the problem. 
You've made a mistake. Instead of trying to resolve the problem, your representative on the chat keep force-closing the chat.

name: ITony I
title: Bad service I waited my order above 10…
review:
Bad service I waited my order above 10 days and the answer was sorry we lost your shipment would u like to refund surely is this excuse!!!
What happened to we r sorry and we will make it comes faster!!!!!!!
I’m so upset with the response and I will make sure to not order from it again

name: raed bz
title: Sorry my order from 29 Nov not come…
review: Sorry my order from 29 Nov not come also not help

name: Athina Kounna Malietzi
title: my order refunded by Asos
review: Your warehouse refunded one of my orders! I have to wait my money to deposited back to my card! I ask for a voucher since this is not my mistake and your employee said that this is not possible! In addition I have tried to put back in bag the items that I initially order but most of them are out of stock now! Maybe you don’t care if you loose one client but I cannot give the Christmas gifts to my people. A big thank you for that!

name: Never shop with Asos
title: Do yourself a favour and never shop with them.
review: The company uses the postal service for their deliveries. So be prepared to wait a very long to receive your package. Also, these cheapos don't provide tracking for your packages so you will have no idea where or when your package will arrive. As of 19 December 2019 it is 10 days over the scheduled delivery date. I will never ever shop with them again and I recommend you never shop with them either. I have never experienced such bad customer service in my life.

name: I
title: Bad delivery and customer services
review: Delivery with Hermes is always bad but asos customer service was also terrible, took forever to respond, 15 days to deliver my order which came in a bashed box (Hermes fault not asos about state of box). Wouldn’t normally mind waiting this length of time over December but their customer service was awful when I asked for updates.

name: Emily Russon
title: After being a loyal Asos customer for…
review: After being a loyal Asos customer for years I am disappointed to be writing this. Asos refunded my parcel instead of exchanging it for another size- which I had requested. They then refused to help me and insisted I paid full price for the new item (I had previously used a 25% of code). I used the online chat to try to resolve the issue to which I was treated like mud. Proceeded to use the messenger chat and the twitter help, these left me with no replies. Shocked how they can treat customers this way.

name: David Smith
title: Customer service is horrendous
review:
Customer service is horrendous. I purchased Premier delivery, however it was not activated by ASOS. My premier delivery still isn’t resolved after 2 months of Facebook messages (as no direct email or contact number available) 
Such a painful experience

name: Ewan Macpherson
title: Poor service
review: Poor service, slow and in the end no help

name: Nhu Nguyen
title: Instead of spending time writing fake…
review: Instead of spending time writing fake review to boost your company I wonder why Asos workers don’t spend their time focus on customers issues and try to deliver items on time !!!!

name: Ed
title: Your customer service aren’t very helpful. Worst CS ever
review: Your customer service aren’t very helpful. One cut me off without even answering my question (namely Rebecca) n the other when ask for specific items, provide me with one that get me no where. If that’s what your customer service is, I think it’s best to close the whole department.

name: Redees Phagami
title: Estimated delivery was 12 of december…
review: Estimated delivery was 12 of december and delayed and promissed to deliver in 24 of december But failed to deliver and Replaced! Never experienced such service.

name: Cheyenne Elliott
title: They suck and have terrible customer…
review: They suck and have terrible customer service

name: Christopher Wong
title: Delay and over promise delivery
review: Delay and over promise delivery. Did not even fulfill delivery.

name: Waren Bell
title: Asos was just Useless
review: The customer service was unable to give a credible reason to why my account was blocked and also was unable to get me to the right team needed in order to get my concerns resolved, and finally they were unable to provide a telephone number to speak to a manager or supervisor. Very useless customer service in 2019.

name: Sienna
title: The customer adviser did not have all…
review: The customer adviser did not have all the information it needs to resolve issues. no certain time line was given until i receive an answer.

name: Roland Hope IV
title: HORRENDOUS customer service by Devinia…
review:
HORRENDOUS customer service by Devinia and Rebecca. This is why it’s important to have an actual phone # for customers to call. When these representatives for ASOS get frustrated they can just “end the chat” without notifying you beforehand and quite frankly I don’t think that’s professional at all for someone that has been a Asos customer for over 3yrs. I specifically ordered my package to be shipped via UPS 2nd day air and when I track it online it states it was shipped via Ground. I’ve asked countless times, in the event that my package was shipped with the wrong shipping option what can be done to rectify the situation? Am I given a refund for the taxes? Can I be given a new label to forward the package where I need it to go? Overall, terrible
Customer service.

name: JP
title: My order was not delivered when it was…
review: My order was not delivered when it was agreed it would be. The slot assigned by Hermes was missed. Neither Asos or Hermes were able to tell me why and I am without a Christmas gift for a loved one. Well done !

name: Racha
title: This is the worst experience and the…
review: This is the worst experience and the most unprofessional team I've ever seen. I made an order that apparently your team cannot track and cannot know where is it. How do you not know which delivery company you are working with and what company is providing this service. How are you unable to locate your package. if YOU are unable to know where it is, how am I supposed to know? Also, next time please be CLEAR and PRECISE when you are supposed to deliver it. Because I wouldn't have order it if I knew it would take so much time and I'm leaving the country. AND when your team asks me to check my local postal and there are hundreds of postal around me, are you asking me to do your job and run around the postal to know where is my package?

name: Laura Michelle
title: Lost order no refund or anything
review: Hermes have lost my order and getting in contact with asos for a refund is absolutely impossible I will never ever be shopping with you again. Thanks for ruining a Christmas present and leaving me out of pocket by a lot

name: natalie mclean
title: Wrong item sent
review: After being a customer of ASOS for many years I have been completely disgusted with customer service I received today! I order a trouser suit for my mum for a wedding next week and ordered next day delivery with it being the Christmas period. She received 2 pairs of trousers instead of pants and jacket! When I called them up to tell me I was told that the pants would have to be sent back first before they send out the jacket even though this was their mistake. Even though I explained to them it is Christmas week and I would never receive the jacket in time for when it was needed they do not care and said my only other option was to ORDER AND PAY for another jacket right before Christmas and wait for the money to be refunded once they receive the trousers. I am absolutely disgusted in this customer service they refused to let me speak tk a manager regarding this and could only do a complaint via email. Safe to say I will never be ordering from this site again

name: S Hoque
title: Disappointed
review:
Disappointed. 
I placed an order on a dress that was £150 and received the parcel on 2nd December 2019. I got my delivery but opened it to see that I got given PUMA trainers instead? The order number and everything else was correct so I don’t get how someone can get a dress and a pair of trainers mixed up. I called the Asos team and they said that they can’t give me a refund until I return the item and that I have to PURCHASE the dress again. But guess what? The size I wanted was out of stock. The person I spoke to did not care at all. I ended up purchasing another size and they said that I’ll be getting a refund within 7 working days. It is now the 21st of December. Where is the refund? I have received NOTHING. Will not be using Asos ever again. Very disappointed.

name: Tom
title: your company is awful
review: your company is awful, package arrived with a massive rip in it, which damaged the contents of the package, Dean on chat was less than helpful, Thank you for ruining Christmas ASOS!!

name: MS
title: Customer care is a shambles.
review:
Customer care is a shambles.
Under resourced, long waits, no solutions. So disappointing.

name: Natasha P
title: DO NOT TRUST ASOS UNLESS YOU ARE PURCHASING A WELL KNOWN BRAND
review:
I bought a dress and received it after a pretty long wait. The dress was completely different to what it shows on the photo online. In the title it claims to be a mini dress but when I walked down the hallway with it on it touched from wall it wall it was huge. If you want to return anything it’s going to take 17 days to have the money put back into your account. I now have to cancel my 18th birthday plans as I don’t own any dresses and have used the last of my funds on Christmas shopping. I carefully planned everything but what I didn’t plan on was ASOS not being a trusted website. 
Not only that but I got in contact with an ASOS worker through their chat to ask about the returns. It took an entire hour of slow robotic messages for her to say that I “just need to return it” . She did not touch on the fact it was falsely advertised stating “I understand it didn’t work out FOR YOU”  and they didn’t want to see photos of the real thing either when I offered. Not a single care. It is physically a completely different dress anybody who would’ve bought it would be spewing too it’s not about the lighting or the sizing the dress itself it not what it shows on the photo. Horrible experience, horrible outcome my birthday is in a few days. Zero help or sympathy from ASOS.

They are not willing to investigate false advertising through their site. That dress is still on the market for the next person to be disappointed. Nothings being done and nothing will be so simple don’t trust ASOS. It was said to their face by a customer who received it. Completely careless.

name: Sophie Fogg
title: AWFUL!!!!!!!!!!!
review:
AWFUL!!!!!!!!!!!

I had to contact ASOS after they had sent me the completely wrong product. The product I initially ordered has now gone out of stock so I am unable to reorder what I wanted. ASOS have provided no solution to this other than to 'keep an eye and see if it comes back in stock'. 
It was a christmas present and I am now unable to gift that present as it is a week before christmas and the item is out of stock. Really poor customer service.

name: Sean van den Ordel
title: Useless. Don't trust their promotions - they will make your order unsuccessful and then not care.
review: I ordered a Jacket on Black Friday for 25% off. It said that it would arrive by the 11th of December. It never came. I tried to get in touch over facebook (One of the options on the website), no one got back to me. I then spoke to someone on the chat bot online and they said that my order was unsuccessful and could offer me 10% off my next order. All I wanted was my jacket that I ordered for 25% off and apparently there was nothing they could do. I was never informed that my order was un successful - If I was I may have got back in time to order at the promotion price. Useless.

name: Daniela Bozadzhieva
title: I found this chat very unhelpful
review: I found this chat very unhelpful. Complete loss of my time and effort. ASOS messed up both the orders I placed and did very little to keep me as a client, which is a pity.

name: David Junior
title: Awful
review: I have never being treat so bad like this for a retail company totally frustrated !

name: Sumit Prashad
title: HORRIBLE SERVICE DO NOT BUY FROM THEM.
review:
HORRIBLE SERVICE DO NOT BUY FROM THEM.
I ordered a pair of size 12 shoes, and I received a size 6. I returned it and lost money because they dont refund you for shipping charges. I ordered another pair and they gave me a size 11. Now its impossible to contact them because they have no line and will not reply to their facebook messages.
Oh and DO NOT believe these 5 star reviews they are made by ASOS workers to boost their customer service ratings.

name: Kornel Zielinski
title: Awful Customer Service
review:
Horrible delivery service via Hermes, placed order on 16th December and my order still hasn't arrived and it's 21st December. I spoke with Abbie in customer service but no compensation offered or refund. I was requested to send the items back when eventually they arrive and that I will receive a refund in 2020 due to the Christmas period. 
Awful customer service!

name: thom lodge
title: Delivery when it suits them
review:
I ordered with instant delivery as I am heading out of london shortly and needed some last minute presents. 
Be warned they dont mean instant for you they mean instant if that's possible otherwise it could be three days. As this is the contract with their delivery company there is nothing that they can do to help with changing or being helpful in any way. 
This isn't the fault of the people on the chats as their company clearly just wants to protect themselves which is why they have to copy and paste responses about apologies and contracts. 
No thanks Asos, will be using a company that seem to care about people rather than internal service level agreements.

name: Doaa Ramadan
title: Very bad and slow customer service as I…
review: Very bad and slow customer service as I received the wrong size so I needed to returned it back for five days now im trying to contact them to get the right address to return my order and no feedback from them

name: Omar Warfa
title: Worst customer service I have ever…
review: Worst customer service I have ever experienced. I bought items almost a month ago and yet my package went missing from their site during transit and ASOS is refusing to honor their word and send me a new package. They keep saying to wait another day. Next day comes and they say wait another day. I've spent $200 on items and have gotten nothing so far even though my delivery date was weeks ago. Customer service is nonexistent and I have yet to be transferred to a manager. Do not spend your money here

name: Kaki Lo
title: The delivery is delayed and CS team never reply email
review: The delivery is delayed, request for refund but no one is handling. CS team never reply email, I have to contact them in other way like FB messenger. Even someone replied, I still haven’t got the refund as they promised.

name: Christine Travis
title: No dress, finally got help with my refund.
review: I ordered a dress for a holiday party, but unfortunately it never arrived as it was missing from the box at FedEx.  I made several attempts over 10 days to reach out but got automated responses.  I finally reached Yusuf through the chat feature and he was kind enough to process my refund.  He deserves 5 stars.  But I have no dress and very little time to find one.

name: Morgan Cotton
title: If I could give less stars I would
review: If I could give less stars I would. I ordered a pair of pants in sale for them to be delivered with stains on them. Upon asking for a new pair at the same price I was told by one employee this was possible then once ordered and back on chat to recieve refund for the difference  in extra I paid I was then told no and made to feel like I was lying about the chat. This has still not been resolved and I have paid out over £60 to ASOS when I originally paid £27!

name: Yasmin
title: What a joke
review:
Normally I would give 4 stars or something. I have been ordering from ASOS for ages, but what happened now ruined everything. 
I ordered some clothes three weeks ago and they still have not been delivered. I have chatted with asos multiples times the past weeks and they just kept saying 'just be patient and wait', while it was obvious that DHL lost the package. So after three weeks I was kinda done with it so I requested a refund which they (at first) refused to give, They kept telling me to wait (really?!). Anyway I just chatted with a customer agent once again and she finally requested a refund (thanks Penny!), but the fact that I had to literally beg them various times for it is just horrible.

name: Megan
title: My parcel got damaged in delivery and…
review: My parcel got damaged in delivery and therefore was not delivered to me. However no one from ASOS or the delivery company contacted me to tell me it would not be coming. It was next day delivery also. ASOS customer service was  shocking, days to reply to my queries and told I would have to wait up to 7 days after they received the parcel back for a refund when they know I have never received it in the first place. Also told I would have to re order myself, they would not just put the order out again when they know I won’t receive it in the first place. Terrible service.

name: Bev Blair
title: I ordered a dress on 21/12 and expected…
review:
I ordered a dress on 21/12 and expected date of delivery was on Sunday 22/12. It failed to arrive. On tracking the order, it said the driver was unable to locate the address. Mind you I had multiple deliveries from ASOS over the last 4 days. My address has not changed. 
I tried contacting ASOS and they were not helpful in resolving this matter. I’ve also tried to contact Hermes with no success. 
I bought the dress as I want to wear it. Now I’m being asked the ASOS rep to wait until the 20/12 at the end of the day.
I don’t think I want to be shopping at ASOS in the future, as  they are very unhelpful in resolving issues

name: Sidsel Marie Trøen
title: Unacceptable delivery/shipment system…
review: Unacceptable delivery/shipment system not being able to track my order before Christmas. Not acceptable to have to wait until 8. January for further assistance when the order is a Christmas gift.

name: Abdulaziz
title: Very bad experience
review: Very bad experience

name: Alex Foster
title: Failed delivery - No help available
review: I ordered this suit to arrive at my office, paying for next day delivery. The following morning I logged in to track my order and could see it had an alert and was delayed by a road closure, but it was on it's way. At around10:30AM, a delivery arrived at my office containing lots of different Asos orders for many different people, but none of them were mine. This was concerning, as it indicated that all Asos orders to my office address had been grouped together and mine had been missed. I checked back on the tracking system and this time I noticed a discrepancy. My parcel was processed by the depot by 8:22AM, it was on it's way at 8:42AM. It was then back in the depot again at 10:42:AM. Then it was back out on it's way again at 11AM. In between the hours of 8:42AM and 10:42AM, is when all of the other deliveries arrived at my office. In addition, my parcel had been 'on it's way' from my local depot since 11AM. Nothing changed on this delivery status till I pursued this further at 3PM. By this time, it was clear to me that something had gone wrong. The item had been on its way for over 4 hours. All other Asos orders had also been delivered to my office in one parcel earlier today, just not mine. And the status hadn't been updated in over 4 hours, indicating it was simply stuck in the back of the van. I realised this, so tried to get in contact. I first called Hermes, but was advised by them that it was the responsibility of the Merchant, so to get in touch with Asos. I then got on live chat with Asos and described the situation to the agent. I explained to them that I was sure that a problem had happened with my delivery (and why) and it needed chasing up because it was crucial I had my suit today, as it is my work Christmas party. I explained that Hermes had told me it is Asos's responsibility to chase up and find info relating to my parcel. I asked if the agent could call Hermes because of this. I was told this would not be possible by the agent, as Aoso don't have a number for Hermes. This is an outright lie. I asked to speak to a manager, but I was told that this wouldn't be possible either and then the chat was disconnected by the agent.I was, in essence, hung up on. I then got in contact with Hermes again via livechat. I explained the situation once again. I explained that I needed to know if it was going to arrive or not, as otherwise I would need to go out and try to buy a new suit before shops shut. This time, I was told by the Hermes agent that my parcel would be delivered by 8PM. I asked the Hermes agent if they could 100% guarantee this and I was told that yes, it would be with me by 8. I also asked if it would be possible to re-direct my parcel so I could wait at home, but I was told no. This was slightly frustrating, as it meant I had to wait at my work address for 3 hours past the end of my shift. But I waited, as I had been given full confirmation that it would be with me that evening. I waited until 8:25PM, and no suit arrived. This is not acceptable. I spotted the problem with my delivery before 3PM and reached out to both Hermes and Asos to report this. No one would listen and responsibility was passed from one party to the other. When I did finally speak with someone, they gave me their word that it would be with me by 8PM. I stayed at work 3.5 hours later than the end of my shift. I didn't purchase an alternative suit as I had confirmation that I would receive the one I purchased. All of this could have been avoided if someone listened to me when I tried to make contact in the first instance.

name: Stefano Delfini
title: Honestly ordered some slippers 18th…
review: Honestly ordered some slippers 18th december they said it was coming saturday 21st and nothing.. sent them a email which they were quick to respond too then found out there was a problem.. woudnt trust them or use them again.

name: Max
title: The worst customer and delivery  service ever
review: The worst customer service experience I’ve had ever. The boy Brenan never let me finish conversation and ended chat. My delivery is delayed and he advised to wait for it to 2 nd January. Used ASOS 1st and last time.

name: Aleisha Newlands
title: Abdolutley usless....terrible company…
review: Abdolutley usless....terrible company would not recomend or use again EVER 🤔

name: Daniel Reaveley
title: I wanted to know why my parcel was not…
review: I wanted to know why my parcel was not delivered yesterday. When I paid for premium delivery. I was given no help at all just told to please allow until the 30th not the service I paid for. All I wanted to know was why my parcel was out for delivery with a delivery slot of between 5pm and 7pm yet at 6:55 the tracker updated to saying sorry our courier couldn’t deliver your parcel today. There was no knock at the door and no attempted delivery card posted. Very poor service account will be getting closed

name: jxhxax
title: the customer service is absolutely…
review: the customer service is absolutely crap. contacted them on messenger, email, online chat no one resolved my issue isn't I was on this chat for 40 minutes and the lady Deborah wasn't helping me she decided to switch the chat to another college where in 5 minutes she helped me.

name: John Annon
title: The agent was being extremely difficult…
review: The agent was being extremely difficult when asked to have a manager contact me she said managers don't deal with queries , she said it will go "to the relevant team". How am I supposed to know who that is? Asos really need to sort out the courier services they use because hermes are trash!! I pay for next day delivery but never get it thanks to them and now someone's enjoying my purchases as their Christmas present somewhere!

name: Courtney
title: Item didn't arrive
review: Item didn't arrive when was told so didn't have any up to date tracking details. Was just told on live chat by ASOS to keep up to date with tracking which I did and wasn't given any other tracking details! Not happy with the service

name: איתן לנדר
title: Kamran was rude
review:
Kamran was rude and closed the chat in the middlem of
A conversation , very bad costum service from his side .

name: Αννα-Μαρια Παπαγρηγοριου
title: Disappointing!
review: Disappointing!

name: Yong
title: Worst worst worst customer service I…
review: Worst worst worst customer service I had yesterday!! I ordered from ASOS on the 3rd of December and chose the next day delivery option. Haven't got any update since from them and have been contacting customer service daily using chat online. Their service was so rude, advicing me to wait until end of each day and if there isn't any progress to contact back in the next day!! I have to apparently wait until the end of 4th working day AFTER MIDNIGHT to contact for a possible refund. But I chose the NEXT DAY DELIVERY OPTION!! The worst bit of the whole experience is I was told off that there is nothing they could do to advice as it was MY FAULT THAT THE LATE DELIVERY BANNER WAS POSTED ON ASOS ON 28 NOVEMBER 2019. I WAS TOLD THAT I SHOULD READ BEFORE I ORDER IN THE FUTURE. The customer service analyst was also very eager to close the chat and was very sarcastic throughout the conversation. Poor poor service!!

name: Karim
title: I unfortunately recieved a wrong item…
review: I unfortunately recieved a wrong item after waiting long time for delivery!! This is the first time i deal with ASOS & it’s not acceptable at all!! I was waiting the jacket for a special occasion &ultimately i was so disappointed!

name: Sam
title: "Online is what we do best" Anonymous is what they do best
review:
"Online is what we do best"

Ok so the order was fine, arrived all items correct no problem. 

Sent a coat back as didn't fit, coat recieved by ASOS royal mail proof of reciept, 4 days later no update,  contacting these rogues is impossible.  
2 emails, Facebook messages, sat on their live chat for an hour waiting for an agent, I even set up a Twitter account and still nothing. 
ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING..... ANONYMOUS AND UNABLE TO GET IN TOUCH WITH US should be their  match phrase.

name: M
title: Terrible customer service
review: Terrible service. An admin error from ASOS led to my order not being processed correctly by them and now refusing to give me my order at the discounted price it was originally ordered at. No update or contact provided at all after patiently waiting for 2 weeks. Shocking customer service!

name: Natalia Bartkowska
title: Very bad customer service
review: Very bad customer service. Been waiting more than 2 weeks for my order and the customer service wouldn't contact the courier. They ask me to wait a bit longer

name: Anisha Condreay
title: phenomenally terrible experience.
review:
I placed a 60$ order on Nov. 6. The package got returned to sender, after two weeks of trying to get hold of them, i got an email  saying when they received the package back they would email me and refund me. It is now Dec. 14. I have heard nothing, and i cant get hold of anyone.
also, their student discount is an empty promise, apparently it only applies to some items. I've yet to find anything that it DOES apply to.
UPDATE: they finally refunded my money, IT TOOK THEM FIVE MONTHS. but at least i got my money back

name: Delia Aguilar
title: Slow delivery! Changed delivery date 3x so far
review: Ordered on the Dec 6th expected delivery date changed 3x times so far, as up now arriving on Dec 17

name: Menna Al Sheiby
title: Terrible delivery service
review: Terrible delivery service. Very unprofessional. Avoid.

name: Colette Boyd
title: Awful company
review: Absolute disgrace of a company 3 weeks after order was placed still hasn't arrived spoke to 2 advisors and still no joy will not be ordering again

name: Hayley Gape
title: Poor customer service- gift card issue
review: Poor customer service when contacting them around a gift card that didn’t work. I messaged them on the 10th December and It still hasn’t been resolved.

name: Mel
title: First and last order
review:
Placed order 02/12/19 with ETA 19/12/19, contacted chat to query reason for delay as it’s been sitting at depo and delayed since 18/12/19. There website states fires causes delays however I have received 3 deliveries from same depo this week.
Was advised that wouldn’t be delivered until 30/12/19, depo is 25kms away and again receiving deliveries from same depo. I was advised information available through help page and even at time of order relating to delays but why would I actively seek this out when I placed order and it showed eta of 19/12/19. (Allowed buffer for delays)
I placed order through ASOS based on ETA and receiving before Xmas and to get push back like this is not acceptable. This is my first and last order.

name: P.
title: Atrocius customer service
review: Ordered 28 Nov, shipped and paid for 6 Dec, estimated delivery 9 Dec, Track order says "Received by Hermes" Sat 07 - and no further details. Obviusly stuck in a Hermes van, contacted asos 5 times as I need dress + blouse tomorrow, they told me they can replace or cancell the order. I lost Wi-Fi, asos closed the chat, contacted asos again: they tell me to wait another day! What customer service is this?

name: Kathryn Brown
title: 0 stars out of 5
review:
I ordered an item for a Christmas gift, using a Black Friday discount, which arrived faulty. I emailed to ask what to do, no reply after four days. I contacted someone via web chat who said my options are to return the item and request an exchange but there’s no guarantee of the replacement arriving on time. My other alternative is to reorder now and pay full price. 

After being a premier customer for a number of years and ordering many times from them I have now been completely let down. This wouldn’t happen if I had purchased the item from a store - a straight exchange would have happened in minutes.

Unfortunately for all the convenience offered, when things go wrong ASOS completely fails in many areas. I’ll be deleting my account.

name: Silvia
title: Very disappointed with my last…
review: Very disappointed with my last purchase. I have been ordering for a while from asos.com but have never been charged custom fees. I was asked to pay 4200 yen this time and Asos customer service was rather rude trying to explain to me why they failed to inform me about the hidden fees associated with my order.

name: L
title: Entirely unhelpful staff
review:
Entirely unhelpful staff, policies that are not helpful to any issue that I’ve had. 
Worst customer service I have ever received over the course of placing and order to now when I have not yet received the order and will not be able to receive it.

name: Ali Athar
title: I paid for expedited shipping yet they…
review: I paid for expedited shipping yet they dont require a signature upon delivery. they dont care that your order could get stolen if you live in a metropolitan area, there's no way to have them ensure the package gets a signature. their customer service chat says "there is not a complaints department" how are customers supposed to work with a company unwilling to work with you or have a chat.

name: laurens d'hooge
title: Order never arrived and no help from…
review: Order never arrived and no help from Asos

name: Kash Samuel Banks
title: I have been fraudulently conned of £195…
review: I have been fraudulently conned of £195 and I have asked to speak to a manager but they refused to transfer me or do anything. My package was not delivered to me and signed by someone else (I suspect the DPD driver) and I was told that is the end of the story.

name: Helen
title: Absolute joke of a company
review: Absolute joke of a company, received email to say parcel been despatched, did not turn up so customer care team said they reordered as there was a problem was told I would get email in 24 hours but nothing so  called them again and they then say 48 hours then still nothing then call them again and they say out of stock but yet they took my money there customer service is appalling and all tell you different things they should not be trading

name: Michelle White
title: Will NEVER order again
review: Ordered over 2 weeks before we needed the dress delivered. It was supposed to be to us by Dec 4th. We needed it by Dec 14. When it didn’t come on the 4th we messaged to find out what they could do and they told us we had to wait until after 10 pm on the 10th. There hadn’t been updated shipping info since November 30. It was clear the package was missing but they didn’t seem to care. Instead they just said sorry we don’t actually care that you didn’t get it and we can’t get it to you by the 14th. If they had done something about it the first time we messaged them, they could have fixed the problem but it seems that ASOS doesn’t care about customers. After all that I’ve had to email and message 4 times to get them to process a refund.

name: Sam Turner
title: Wish I could leave 0 stars
review: Wish I could leave 0 stars. Awful service. Placed an order and had an email to confirm they were very busy but to be assured my order was being dealt with. Never received order confirmation and after a few days I checked on my account and it had an estimated delivery date. After a couple of weeks I had a despatch email but never received the item. A few days later I had an email confirming I had returned the items. I was charged and Asos had my money the entire time with no intention to deliver the items. The items have gone back up in price since. I will not shop there again and would not recommend this company to anyone. They do not reply to you. They just dont care. Avoid at all costs

name: Claire Bressler
title: Terrible service
review: The last two people I chatted with were helpful. However, I chatted with three other people who weren’t helpful at all. Asos’ costumes service is terrible for US at least. I would never recommend this to a friend and a one star is an over statement for me. They are secretive and wouldn’t tell you something that the next person you chat with will.

name: Ccc
title: So bad
review: So bad, your staff can not help me to follow up anything, also, I cannot receive any shipping confirmation email, your website it’s not user friendly ,

name: Cheddar Cheese
title: horrible company and HORRIBLE customer service
review:
horrible company and HORRIBLE customer service. purchased items on the 2nd of December only to have them never delivered, and automatically returned without any notice whatsoever. they also have to wait until the items arrive so they can refund me even though I'm not the one who returned the items. this has just been an utter waste of 3 weeks and the items I want are now out of stock and I don't even know if I will even get the refund money. The customer service has been appalling.

DO. NOT. BUY. FROM. ASOS.

name: Veronica Trinidad
title: Received wrong item just in time for…
review: Received wrong item just in time for Christmas! I should have listened to the reviews. Now I’ll have to fight to get my money back.

name: Rosie
title: Why do i pay for premier delivery?
review: In my experiences with Asos I have struggled to see that they value their customers loyalty. Having had premier delivery for a year, I don't understand how they get away with not providing the service they promote. Multiple times throughout this year i have not received parcels on the next working day, due to 'Transit problems' due to the courier, that were 'out of their control'. And having complained about each and every delay, the lack of compensation or acknowledgement for Asos' clearly major problem is astounding. The job of the consumer should not be to present these logistical errors to the retailer, Asos should identify these problems and rectify them without the customer having to wait in a queue to 'chat' to someone or send an email and get a response in the next '24 hours'. Asos should offer reasonable compensation for their mistakes and not allow the customer to feel cheated for paying for something they do not receive. But having complained about paying £9.99 for something i do not receive, Asos replied with their T&Cs stating the potential for delays. Following this, the chat was ended without my choice of giving a reply. And this 'Chat' service was only used following no response from an email i sent more than 24 hours before.

name: Ferhad
title: Will not be returning to asos ever and…
review: Will not be returning to asos ever and will make sure my friends and family is no longer your customer. Shoes came with defect. Asos does not offer free returns from my country and wants me to pay for big shipping cost so their workers can examine the shoes if it was because of wearing or factory defult. I literally contacted the day i got shoes and sent them picture of defect right away. Asos wants me to pay for their fault waste my money and time because they don’t check their items before sending so they can earn easy money. Of course no one would pay for the shipping cost of overseas postage. This is how asos force sell their items with faulties. Worst customer service, worst policies not any customer friendly policy or representative. Keep it this way and you will have no customer. Tricky company

name: rasheed liadi
title: This is so appalling from Asos
review:
This is so appalling from Asos.com Placed an order on the 15th of November and was supposed to deliver within 5 days as estimated delivery date stated the 20th. Waited well over the 20th and I have reached out to Asos and they claim the parcel was with Yodel. I called Yodel and guess what? They sent me back to Asos that the parcel was never passed to them but the label was created. The level of incompetence is just upsetting because ''Ironically'' I'm still yet to get an update on whereabout of the order. Sad!!!
I have been requesting for refund ever since then and all they can say is to wait until they finish their investigation with yodel. It's been a month now.
ORDER NO.:
452247153
SHIPPED DATE:
15 Nov, 2019

name: Jake Hutchinson
title: It took over 20 minutes to be connected…
review: It took over 20 minutes to be connected with the online chat service. Upon waiting for the chat to commence, it then took 18 minutes for the customer assistant to respond with an answer to my query, which was also very unhelpful. Overall the service was poor when comparing to other online chat services.

name: Olivia
title: Terrible customer service
review:
This whole customer service experience has been a nightmare. I ordered an item and paid for two day shipping, I then received the incorrect item and my conversation via chat with customer service was very disappointing. I would expect the company to take ownership of their mistake and do everything in their power to get me my correct item as soon as possible. Instead I had an unpleasant conversation with somebody who kept repeating that I would have to pay for the item again and pay for the additional shipping cost before I could get a refund for a mistake that was not my fault. I will be contacting the company again as I am very disappointed with the customer service as well as the tone of the messages from the representative. 

I expect someone to contact me immediately to rectify this problem.

name: Sarah Thorn
title: I am normally asos biggest fan however…
review: I am normally asos biggest fan however the level of service from start to finish over the last couple of months has been shocking. Issues from Hermes either not delivering parcels at all and "getting lost in transit" to Hermes not collecting parcels when organised through the returns pick up. Asos advising it's not there issue and hermes insisting you contact asos. Contacting and wasting time and effor through the very slow customer care to be advised that an order will be present and thrt would honour the same 20% discount code I originally ordered for this not to happend. When contacted again the customer care advised someone would be in touch on 24 hours - no one for in touch and then to finally waste 35 minutes explaining this to yet again another customer care operative only to be advised that they can not honour the same 20% discount code on all items only full price items is a joke!!
