To then have the same arrogant operative cancel the 20% code that can knkt be used in full times dispute having an expiry day if mid January and disconnect the chat is disgusting. I also pay premier deliver and multiple numbers of my delivery have not been next dispute me ordering within the required time. Shocking and terrible all round service!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Rhona Ferguson
title: Spoke on ASOS online chat with…
review: Spoke on ASOS online chat with Guillaume. Had returned an item for an exchange to be told it wasn’t in stock and the exchange wouldnt be sent. The item had been in stock the whole time. Noone was helpful or sorted the issue and the chats just get ended if they cant be bothered helping you anymore

name: עומרי בן שושן
title: The worst shipping service I have ever…
review: The worst shipping service I have ever seen

name: Victor Castillo
title: Probably worst customer service ever
review: I placed an order on their website and didn't realize it picked up my previous address, after I received the confirmation e-mail noticed the mistake and quickly got in touch with ASOS and explained the issue. The customer service agent explained that it was not possible to cancel the order or amend the shipping address, he then suggested I should physically go to that previous address once the package was delivered and ask the current resident to "give it to me" because there is nothing else ASOS can do!!! Bear in mind this is in the USA where mail is considered federal property and any issues around it a federal offense. How crazy is that!?

name: Em
title: Slow customer service
review: Duplicated my order without sending confirmation and taking too long to answer to queries regarding refunds. Another order came in with the box opened so items were lost.

name: P
title: Bad service
review: I've had an appauling time trying to deal with my order. I was sent the wrong item. It has taken 2 weeks and 4 attempts of talking to someone from ASOS to have my issue resolved. Quite often I was given no information and kept being told to return to the chat on different days. I am thoroughly disappointed with the atrocious service I have received from ASOS in the last couple of weeks.

name: Karen Lisa
title: Ordered my Christmas present 30th…and waiting waiting waiting
review: Ordered my Christmas present 30th November was meant to be here 11th December, and still waiting, waiting!!!  NO communication from Hermes and I am left chasing ASOS can't issue me with a refund because I have to wait till the end of the 20th December, and i can't request a refund till the following day. Let's see how long the refund takes to be back in my account, take the money quick enough.  So No clothes and No refund and at this rate No Christmas presents too !!!

name: Eszter Fabriczki
title: Ordered before the holiday cutoff date...
review: I ordered items before the holiday cut off date, and my parcel has been stuck inexplicably in Germany for 4 days. DHL told me they can’t tell me anything, I should talk to ASOS. ASOS customer service keeps sending me some prepared bs and telling me that my parcel should arrive today. I keep telling them my parcel is stuck in a different country, but to no avail. Now they’re saying it will arrive by January 6th, meaning a month after I ordered these gifts for the freakin holidays!!! Unacceptable and shameful...

name: Isaiah H. Poellnitz
title: Terrible automation infrastructure and…
review: Terrible automation infrastructure and they basically stealing money through lack of efficiency. I had an order returned because of wrong address, I have sent emails, Facebook messages for weeks and I have no response. This type of thing should be illegal. If you can't pay for customer service and match your speed for returns then you can't afford to be in this space.

name: Cathy
title: Poor delivery
review: Customer service are unhelpful and take ages to respond. I have been waiting from the 31st of November until now (19th of December) for my order which was meant to be delivered no later than the 12th of December. When asking customer service they were extremely unhelpful. Busy period or not this is an online store, you should sort it out.

name: Tiptoe Ten
title: The worst experience EVER.
review:
The worst experience with any online company I’ve ever had. Been lied to, time wasted, taken money and refuse to refund me after their even worse courier have advised me for the last 4 days my parcel is lost. 

NEVER using ASOS again. Customer service has been nothing short of a joke. 

Shameful.

name: Mor
title: I was supposed to get my package by…
review:
I was supposed to get my package by Dec. 12. When i didn't get it i talk to your customer service that told me to wait until Dec. 18. When i didn't get it by then i talked to your service again that noe tells me to wait until Dec. 23. This is unacceptable and i don't think i need to wait a month to get my order.
Im very disappointed from your service. And for a client that buy from you a lot i don't expect this treatment.

Im sorry but your customer service is not what i expected. Very sad to get this service from a company like you....

name: Lauren
title: Adviser ended the chat
review: Adviser ended the chat? I have been left with no accurate date of when my delivery will arrive. No offer of good will gesture. Generic copy and pasted answers. Not willing to cancel order when delivery not met as told I am responsible for cancelling 15 minutes after placing order. I would have had I known I would have been waiting 3+ days for a delivery placed next day order. A loyal customer who always shops at asos, has renewed premier delivery for the past 3/4 years treated this way? There's no loyalty from asos.

name: Marzieh Ahmadi
title: NIMAT was not helpful and was rude.
review: NIMAT was not helpful and was rude.

name: RJ
title: Appalling customer service.
review: Appalling customer service.

name: Jenny O'Neill
title: Appalling communication and staffing issues
review:
I have tried every single contact method possible to get in touch in regards to my order, which the company took TWO WEEKS to notify me was not in stock.
On Facebook messenger I have received no reply, I waited in a queue to live chat for 2 HOURS, then gave up.
I emailed them and got a bounce back saying their mail box was full and please email another time.
Absolutely UNACCEPTABLE to just take your money and provide no support when there is an issue.
Appalling service.

name: Adriana
title: I still havent received my Black Friday…
review: I still havent received my Black Friday order... Bravo!

name: Jodie Giblin
title: Worst customer service ever received.
review:
Worst customer service I have ever received. Appalling.
Doesn't even deserve 1 star but can't give none!

name: Peter Davis
title: Terrible firm
review: Terrible firm. I had such a bad time trying to get them to deliver that I won't use them again. Unfortunately I forgot to tell my wife, watching her go through the same pantomime . How does this firm stay on business ?

name: jess d
title: Shambles of a company DO NOT USE
review: Items ordered on 1/12 on standard 3-5 day delivery. Got estimated delivery date 11/12. Dispatch 9/12 still no parcel. Contact ASOS who won’t do anything until they speak with currier. Speak to Currier directly says parcel returned due to damage. ASOS won’t accept this for 48hours and now say I have to wait a further 7 days to see if they receive my parcel back and then maybe issue a refund which will take another 7-10 days DO NOT BUT FROM THESE IF YOU’D LIKE TO ACTUALLY GET THE GOODS YOU PAID FOR

name: Clarissa M
title: Unhelpful
review: My issue remains unresolved and I have been referred to a specialist team who are unable to give me a timeline.

name: Sophie Titchener
title: Awful experience
review: Awful experience. No help at all. Will never use asos again

name: Félipe Hernández
title: missing package 📦
review:
I being buying more then a few times clothes form ASOS. 
I had never have a problem but my last package did never make it or got missing.
I try to contact them and they send me messages from different costumers services.
Part of that order was for my Christmas presents. 
They know that I didn’t get my package and it’s being a week. 
They haven’t send me a message that if the are going to remplace my stuff, give me a credit or just a refund.
I dint think I would order again from them even when I do like there deals and clothes.

name: Carmel Hayes
title: Awful customer service
review:
Awful customer service, completely unhelpful. Avoid CHAT, complete waste of time, robotic answers. I would give -10 if I could, 1 star flatters them. 

Gnewt couriers, awful, awful delivery courier ASOS are using spoilt our christmas -I paid £5 for next day delivery we waited in all morning and Gnewt claimed they had delivered the package but did not ring our bell or even leave a card to say failed delivery.  I'm then told i have 30mins to go the the depot to collect the package myself or it will be delivered after christmas. What a dreadful service, sharing to warn other customers.

name: Ann
title: This company does not even bother to…
review: This company does not even bother to offer customer service, I've emailed them to ask where my order is, no one has replied yet for three days. Terrible!!!

name: Tamri Tsiskarishvili
title: Wrong Delivery
review: Having a problem with an order, while connected to costumer service department but they didn't care at all. I ordered Adidas trainers, which was placed in Women Section on their Website, but when the package was delivered i found out that it was men's shoes (larger size than women's shoes). I do not recommend this company to you.

name: Wei Ming
title: Customer care does not care
review: Having an issue with an order (missing item) is already a frustrating matter to begin with. The live chat that was supposed to help resolve the issue was even worst.

name: Vincent Fehr
title: Poor customer service, taking my service elsewhere from now on
review:
I have contacted customer service once a week after it's estimated delivery date and was delayed repetitively until 2 months passed the date of order. Regardless of the fact that that address the product was sent to was incorrect, I should not need to have to jump hoops in order to get my package WAY past the ESTIMATED delivery date.Customer service was extremely robotic and inauthentic. It often felt like I was not talking to an actual human being because of the reiterated comments relating to my order. I asked kindly like a hundred times to receive my refund but to no avail. 

It's a shame the situation was like this and errors were made on both ends but I am not interested in continuing my service with ASOS as I have been treated with poor intentions (Customer Service assuming i was lying throughout the entire conversation)

Gavin "Vincent" Fehr

name: customer
title: ASOS lost my 700 euros order
review:
I made a 700 euros order. 
It's been a month and I still haven't received it and ASOS is not giving me any concrete updates on the matter.

name: Laura Elliott
title: i paid for something to be delivered…
review: i paid for something to be delivered and haven't recovered it

name: Nic29
title: Poor customer service and no way to complain
review: Failed to deliver my items that I'd bought on black friday then cancelled the order. After contacting the customer service team they failed to price match my original order when I needed to reorder the items. When I asked to speak to a manager to make a complaint they said they dont have a complaints department and a 10% discount was all they could offer. This still left me out of pocket for their mistakes

name: KT
title: ASOS Delivery is a joke
review: ASOS Delivery is a joke. Orders are usually late or left outside unnattended, drenched in water and unsigned for. The clothes are good quality and sizing is usually right along with good prices however, there inability to be reliable for on time and good quality  delivery makes this company bad. Their lack of competent customer service advisors add weight to this also.

name: kerry doyle
title: Poor customer service response
review: Yes the clothes are great and the App works well, but wait until you need customer services.  They ignore messages and emails repeatedly over days.  They use poor courier services, which is not acceptable.

name: Annoyed
title: Their level of customer care is…DREADFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE !!!!
review: Their level of customer care is shocking ... it is like talking to a robot , no compassion , understanding !! I will not use them again and will certainly make my friends and colleagues at the large retailer I work for know of my poor experience

name: Izzie Kitching
title: Should be no stars
review: Should be no stars. I pay for unlimited next day delivery, and my past THREE orders have been delayed - and not just by a couple of days (which is still unacceptable) but over a week. The website proudly states the NDD option, as well as dates to receive items by Xmas, this is just false advertising. I’ve been a customer of asos since 2009, but unfortunately I won’t be giving my money anymore to a company that lies.

name: luke John
title: Slightly damaged item
review: Slightly damaged item. Was hoping for a voucher or small refund to account for it rather than go out of my way sending it back and waiting for replacement. Offered to send video and pictures as proof but they aren't interested. Seems like they're just hoping I take the damaged item and get out of their hair.

name: Hayden
title: Absolutely useless
review: Absolutely useless. I've waited over a month and have been told to wait and wait. The tracking on my order said the package was damaged and cannot be delivered. Fedex told me to contact ASOS. ASOS told me to wait until December 15th. I contact ASOS again and they tell me to wait further. I ordered the item on November 29th.

name: LD
title: It took 11 days of me attempting to…
review:
It took 11 days of me attempting to contact to finally get a refund for a product I'd sent back a month earlier but they didn't process. 
I had to send multiple messages and they were not reading prior messages, just asking questions I'd already provided the answers for. With back and forth every day, I eventually got a refund processed after waiting 2 hours to get online on the chat service. Less than acceptable.

name: Stephanie Fenning
title: Shocking service and customer care!
review:
Placed a large order for next day delivery on the 13th December. This order did not arrive and when tracked it stated it has been signed for and delivered at 18.30 on the 18th December! No delivery attempt was made. We have CCTV on the property and no attempts have been made, never mind the fact it states 18th when the delivery should have been the 14th. 
I contacted ASOS and after making me jump through hoops they finally placed a replacement order which the assured me would be here the next day (21st December) ... this order has still not arrived and they are now telling me to wait until the 30th of December before they can process a refund and give me MY money back! So now I have spent over £160 and have nothing to show for it yet ASOS won’t give me my money back! Absolutely shocking customer service. More than happy to take my money but not provide the goods or service I have paid for. These were Christmas and birthday presents which I ordered weeks in advance on a next day delivery service. Now I am going to have to go to the shops on Christmas Eve with a newborn baby to ensure my nephews have gifts for their birthday and Christmas!

name: Seeking Aesthetics
title: 3 weeks later , no delivery and no refund !
review: Absolutely shocking customer service and lack of care. Ordered 5 items 3 weeks ago. Chased on my estimated delivery date to be told there was an issue and my order had not been processed. Email confirmation sent 16days after order placed confirming dispatch. Hermes still have not received the parcel from asos. 21 days after order placed, no items, £109 out of pocket and no communication from asos regarding sorting it out. What great service from a huge company.  Shambles !!!!

name: jenny
title: Ordered from them for years
review: Ordered from them for years. Often having to return over half now since quality has rapidly gone downhill. Just experienced my first time with customer service. It's horrendous. Due to how terrible it is and how awful the clothing is, I'm not shopping here again.

name: Anthony
title: Unhelpful
review:
Unhelpful, did not empathize with customer. Provided a discount code that in no way provided benefits or leverage. 10% off on full-priced items only. is this a joke? 

Issue: Purchased a product 3 weeks ago and when I checked my estimate delivery on the 17th, the order said it was shipped. However, I found out that it was a technical issue and that it still wasn't shipped. When I asked the customer service rep to handle the issue, I was told that they were out of stock. So why did I buy it if it was not in stock? JOKE.

name: Saja Abulaban
title: Disappointing never again
review: Disappointing

name: Sherri Wynne
title: I have been a huge fan of the Asos…
review: I have been a huge fan of the Asos brand for years but I've been severely let down. I ordered some items that I was in love with! Apparently they were damaged while being shipped so the delivery partner would not complete the delivery. I was told to reach out to Asos. When I reached out I was met by one of the rudest reps I've ever experienced. In the end, she basically told me I'd be refunded once they received the package. No discount for the inconvenience or even an actual email to notify me that the issue even arose. I found out because the package did not come when it was guaranteed to be delivered. After speaking with her I emailed Asos to let them know about the experience I had with the rep & to validate her response. It was over the holidays so i expected them to take a while to respond. I never received a response. After over a month passed, i reached out again to let them know I still haven't received my refund & the tracking status is still showing as damaged at the same location it was over a month ago. This rep was kinder, however, it felt like I was being dodged. He told me that he was sorry for my inconvenience & that they were able to issue a refund & I should receive an email confirmation in 48 hrs. After he sent the email he ended the chat. Without me being able to respond or ask any questions. I'm hoping I actually do receive an email confirmation for my refund. This sucks because like I said, ASOS is/was one of my favorite brands to shop. I will be refraining from purchasing there now after this experience. It was too negative the entire time for me expect it will get any better the next time I purchase.

name: CPS
title: Let down on a next day delivery order…
review: Let down on a next day delivery order and only due to myself chasing this I find out my order was lost on it's way out to me. As this was an order placed in time for Christmas I feel very let down by ASOS

name: Reecy TooBlessed Loyal
title: DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY!!
review: This is the absolute worst company I have ever purchased anything from. I ordered two pairs of size 15 shoes for my husband, and received both size 14 shoes. I even ordered them express. There is no customer service contact number, I emailed for assistance to replace the items before Christmas, they are very slow at responding, and  the responses were garbage and pasted sentences that made no sense and had nothing to do with what my issues were about.  This was a very disappointing and disgusting experience and ASOS ruined my Christmas for my family. I’m so disgusted.

name: Josie Alice
title: Anita amazing, ASOS... not so much
review: Anita who I spoke to on chat was really helpful and processed the refund for a parcel that has been lost for 5 days immediately. Overall, the customer service experience is hindered by ridiculous policies and contracts that mean you can't speak to couriers... the biggest online fashion retailer in the world can't talk to the people with their stock? It puts lovely people like Anita in harm's way as they take the brunt of the frustration and outrage experienced when being told that there's nothing anyone can do, particularly at this time of year. Hire more people, retrain those/scrap temps who regurgitate copied sentences saying nothing can be done and start listening to your customers. People are voting with their feet as ASOS can no longer be trusted to get a parcel to you or compensate in that situation. Again, thanks to Anita for doing her best to resolve the situation despite all the red tape in place.

name: Target
title: This company is pathetic
review: This company is pathetic. I ordered the denim girlfriend jacket in mid wash size 10 long, but I received the SHRUNKEN denim girlfriend jacket. I’m livid because I ordered it specifically so I could have it for Christmas which I now will not. However, to make matters worse when I went to go REorder it it is sold out. The only “advice” I was given was to return the jacket I did not order and turn on alerts so I can wait again to rebuy the jacket again and hope they don’t screw it up again.

name: Jeroen Van Vlierberghe
title: Customer centricity and building loyalty not a part of ASOS strategy
review:
On the positive side: very friendly and quick feedback from the support team

Poor: short term customer focus that fosters a negative experience. If a company is not able to deliver on the promise they make and in addition doesn't want to acknowledge that, it has a big impact on credibility...

name: Hannah
title: This company is a joke!
review:
This company is a joke. 
I made an order at 5pm on Sunday for next day delivery, which I paid extra for. These items were needed for an important event the following day, I waited all day and still items were delivered. I then spoke to a Kamran on the live chat who said I needed to wait until midnight that day to see if it got delivered (even though the shop I was collecting from shut at 11pm) 
Surprise, the order didn’t get delivered. I then started a live chat with Jordan who then told me my items may not get delivered until 31st December! I asked them a few questions and they did was blame their courier. I asked if I could cancel the order so I can go elsewhere and buy an outfit and he closed the chat! Quite possibly the rudest customer service I have ever received and it’s put me off from ordering from ASOS again! Sites such as Boohoo and Pretty Little Thing I know stick to their guarantee of next day delivery so will be using these from now on. 
ASOS you are seriously going downhill and I am extremely disappointed

name: Rose Stephanie
title: Terrible painful experience BUYER BEWARE
review:
Customer service representative Laura sent me this link. 
I’m in tears right now over the worst customer service interaction in my life. 
I’m an online shopper primarily and never had a run around like this. 
I wish I could speak to a supervisor but no phone number. 
I will never shop again on ASOS. It cannot be trusted.
I purchased a black Fred Perry sweater. Received white color. I contacted customer service to hold black sweater in my size for exchange. 
They said they can’t do that and the black sweater is low in stock and advised me to purchase again. To my surprise, the black Fred Perry sweater was on sale and I bought two. I receive them and they were white again!!!
I am now with three white Fred Perry sweaters. 
I asked them to check inventory for the black sweaters as clearly they are unaccounted for but they are refusing to do that.
This isn’t even a silver of the poor treatment I have been getting as a customer. 
This is a plead to customer to help me.

name: Angry customer
title: Lianne and Marco was very rude didnt…
review: Lianne and Marco was very rude didnt want to help me at all.

name: Lauren Douglas
title: It has been a week since the…
review:
It has been a week since the conversation started, days have passed in between responses.

I still have not had a direct answer to my question, ridiculous customer service.

name: Jack
title: Awful service
review: I ordered a parcel 17 days before a holiday, in the week previous I contracted them several times via Facebook, Twitter and a phone call for there employees in which I got no help whatsoever, after being promised it would arrive on a certain date by server all different people it didn’t and was three days late than it was promised. Awful experience,  o have been a loyal customer for over ten years and have found the staff very rude and the people not helpful at all. DO NOT BUT FROM THIS OVER PRICED AND UNHELPFUL COMPANY

name: Michala Roberts
title: very disappointed
review: It took 3 days for customer service to get back to me, and when they did the information given was unhelpful. I ordered a pair of shoes, was sent the completely wrong pair, and by the time customer service got back to me the shoes I wanted originally were sold out. The only option I was given was to return the wrong pair for a refund, but nothing about the fact that the shoes I ordered are out of stock. I sent a follow up message detailing my frustrations and have not gotten a response. That was 4 days ago. I feel like the responsibility is on me to fix asos’ mistake and I am not being helped or compensated at all.

name: SB
title: Would give ZERO stars!!
review: Would give ZERO stars! Absolute joke of a customer service team. Package was due for delivery, never appeared, when I asked what was happening was brushed off before eventually being told it was actually being sent back to ASOS for no reason and basically ‘tough luck’ if you want them again you can reorder but you’ll need to pay full price, despite buying them in the Black Friday sale. Was ignored when I asked to speak to someone on the phone rather than just over twitter. Some of the worst customer service I’ve ever experienced.

name: Jane
title: Worst customer service ever and you…
review: Worst customer service ever and you still have my money 3 weeks later !!!

name: ELIZABETH BRINKER-RITCHIE
title: Price on the delivery box! Why?
review:
Good response from Ryan on chat...but disappointed with Asos indicating the price of the item on the box!!!!!!!!!!!!
It is telling someone at Australia Post... small box....130 dollar item... worth stealing!!!!!!
Not happy!!!!!!
And the turn around time of 72 hours to  responding on whether there is a replacement available is not good enough in this situation!

name: Viktória Liskány
title: Horrible customer service, misleading people, different delivery information
review:
Horrible customer service, misleading people, different delivery information, but they are not providing proper info where is your package. 

I ordered my package on 28th of November, as I wanted to make sure it will arrive on time. However I never received email that it left the warehouse, they are not able to provide you information about the package, you have to contact with them also to get your tracking number, which clearly shows that it is this in the warehouse. If you ask them about your package before the delivery day which was on 10th of December in my case, they say wait until the 10th or wait until 17th. Once the delivery day passed and clearly your order is nowhere, they inform you to wait until 31st of December... 

This is unacceptable, once you request them to refund your package, they said wait until you receive it... Thank you ASOS! Well played.

name: Abdul Razaq Ananda Azwi
title: Worst delivery system and customer service
review: Live chat is unresponsive and does not provide any solution.

name: Leticia Ramirez
title: My package is 10 days late
review: My package is 10 days late , my requests for help have received useless, or no replies.

name: Veronica Sanchez
title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!!!!!!!
review: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!!!!!!!. ZERO CUSTOMER DRIVEN!!!! THEY DON'T EVEN TRY TO HELP, THEY JUST ANSWER THE F**i SAME QUESTIONS THEY HAVE POSTED ONLINE AND DON'T MAKE AN EFFORT TO GO ABOVE AND BEYOND FOR THEIR CUSTOMERS. LITERALLY SUCK!

name: Charlotte
title: Awful customer service
review: Awful customer service. They did not offer a solution to my problem and the staff couldn’t have cared less about my bad experience with them. They had an attitude of deal with it or cancel your order we get thousands of orders and we don’t care about issues with your one order.

name: Brandan
title: After paying for next day delivery I…
review: After paying for next day delivery I waiting in my home the allotted time frame and 2 hours after to make sure I was home for my parcel because I had a prior engagement that evening which is why I needed my delivery...after it jot turning up and being given a half arsed excuse from the online chat....the order never arrived....I’m also still waiting for my refund for delivery and we are now 2days after the estimated delivery and it still isn’t here....tried tracking my order with the delivery company and it hasn’t yet reached them? Yet Asos has stated multiple times it’s left the warehouse and with the delivery company? Was then sent an email saying my delivery is delayed until the next working day....15 minutes later I received another email stating I would be receiving my parcel today?....4 hours later once again and I’m still waiting for it? With no response from ASOS...what is going on?

name: kcw
title: Delivery like it's the 1970s
review: Delivery is terribly slow:  10 days!  What a joke.  I queried the wait on the 'chat line' to see if I could upgrade my delivery.   'Too late', they told me and what about cancelling I asked 'Too late' they told me again and 'rules are rules'.  This morning, several days later,  I checked the status of my order and they still haven't sent it.  Come on!  My daughters and I will be shopping elsewhere from now on.

name: Ella
title: IF I COULD GIVE ASOS ZERO STARS I…
review: IF I COULD GIVE ASOS ZERO STARS I would. If you are ordering from asos, forget about customer service. I’ve been ordering from them for years now and they could simply careless about their customers. I’ve had two incidents with ASOS. The first time I thought was just bad luck but after this time , I will never shop on ASOS again or recommend it to anyone. First experience involved me sending it to another address that was not convenient to me, I notified ASOS and they said it was too late so I go and pick it up from the address and low and behold IT WAS NOT THERE. I told ASOS someone took my package , but instead of offering me a replacement package, they told me I need to notify the police. And what about the money I spent ASOS? Nope they don’t care. Second incident is that they send me an item that’s faulty and they sent the wrong size. When I asked them for some sort of compensation, Tara kept insisting that I return the package. The item is out of stock so returning the package means I would lose the item. I liked the shoes and would have been okay keeping them if I wasn’t paying full price for them. I tried to explain that to her and she stated the only way I could get my money back is by returning the item. I then asked to speak to a manager to which she stated she “couldn’t do” because they have protocols they need to handle and then rudely ended the chat on me . Even shein refunded me when their item was faulty . Waste of money. I rather just buy the items from the companies themselves than support an industry with no customer service.

name: Lisa Johnston
title: RUN!!!!!
review:
ASOS is by far the worst company I have ever dealt with. I ordered two pairs of shoes on Black Friday because of an amazing deal. I received my package fast but they sent the wrong size shoes! I immediately contacted them and they didn't seem to care at all. They just said send them back. I planned on it but I asked if they do an exchange and they said no, that you have to repurchase the items if you want them before they issue you a refund. I said fine whatever...since your company made the mistake can I have a coupon code to get the shoes at the same price I originally paid? The said a "special department" does the coupons and that they would review it and send me one but it would take 24-48 hours....how fricken ridiculous that the customer service agent couldn't just give me one since they screwed up. I ANXIOUSLY waited for them to contact me to give me the coupon code because both pairs of shoes are limited stock in the size I was supposed to receive originally. I was emailed by them today that they will not be giving me a coupon code until the shoes are returned to them which can take up to 10 days according to them. 10 DAYS!!!!! I'm scared to death that the shoes will be sold out by then and all because ASOS doesn't care about their customers at all. These were meant to be Christmas presents and because of how they're being I doubt I will even be able to get the shoes at all. I am absolutely appalled that they treat their customers like this, I only tried them because I've seen YT influencers shop with them often and recommend them. I am WARNING everyone  I know to run, do not order from them, they screw up and don't care. They just want your money and expect you to spend more money to fix their mistakes. I was originally upset they just wouldn't do an exchange but fine whatever I got over it and just said give me a coupon code so I can hurry up and order the shoes before they're sold out, but they essentially said F U. Please please please do not shop with this company. BEWARE!!!!!

***Update***
Shoes were returned, money was refunded, I was NEVER given the coupon I was supposed to receive. It wouldn’t do me any good anyway as the items I were supposed to originally receive are sold out. They still don’t care.

name: Luke Revill
title: You've got rid of web chat
review: You've got rid of web chat, and I had to use facebook messanger, thecustomer consultant didnt listen to my question and asked for a lot of detail which was irrelevant, had 3 touch points to get the right answer.

name: CHARLIE
title: AVOID
review: terrible. delivery driver fraudulently claimed I signed for the package and asks failed to resolve 2 separate queries regarding items going missing

name: Elad Sharka
title: Worst service that i ever witnessed
review:
Worst service that i ever witnessed
Dont buy from those lieres who dont take responsibility

name: Adalbjorg Oladottir
title: No change of up-dating a delivery- Money lost…
review: No change of up-dating a delivery adress within few hour of ordering.  We are stuck with our order with wrong address and no way of getting a refund or change delivery methods.   No understanding at customer service just "computer says no"

name: Sumreen
title: re my order wrong address
review:
Spoke to Daniel re my order - he quickly sorted out the issue which I was a little bit embarrassed about and gave me reassurance it would be sorted.


I take that back. The issue never got sorted and ASOS were very UNHELPFUL following this they even said that I would have to resolve the issue myself which would INCLUDE me having to go back and face someone who was ABUSIVE towards me.

name: Steph
title: Not worth the hassle, customer service sucks and no complaints process.
review:
I’ve used ASOS for years and only had a few small issues in that time but my recent experience has been absolutely horrendous. I made a large order for next day delivery, due to be delivered on Friday. Friday came and went and I had absolutely nothing, no communication at all. I checked the order number on Hermes and there was an update saying my order was delayed. On Saturday morning I got a text to say my order was out for delivery and then later that it had been delivered. When I got home I checked the delivery to find there was a large amount missing and no communication from ASOS to say that anything was being delivered separately. 

I spent the next few days trying to get an answer from ASOS but the social media staff just kept asking what items were missing. On Monday I checked the Hermes tracking again and there was an update saying “there’s been an issue with your delivery, please contact sender”. I used the chat option and after answering several very unnecessary questions about what was missing I was told my delivery was damaged. I asked the advisor why I wasn’t informed and they couldn’t tell me. I asked for the majority of the delivery to be refunded and for one single item to be resent. She promised she would do this. 

I received the refund but 4 days later I still had no notification of my redelivery. I spent a further 30 minutes on chat to ASOS and after further inquisition about what was missing was told that they can’t do a refund and reorder at the same time so the item wasn’t reordered for me. 

Exasperated, I asked to raise a complaint. The advisor gave me the link for the help page and only agreed to log it when I asked why he couldn’t just do it. I asked what the process was for investigating and resolving the complaint to which he replied “there is no process, I’ve taken the complaint”. 

He then advised that I would get an email with 72 hours to advise my item was on its way, it’s out of stock so I won’t hold my breath. 

Horrendous customer service, horrendous process, epic waste of my time.

name: Benjamin Small
title: DO NOT ORDER ANYTHING FROM ASOS AS IT WONT COME
review: I ordered a coat on the 28th november and chose standard delivery as it said i would recieve it on the 2nd december which was fine as i needed it for my holiday on the 6th. I recieved an email sating they were busy and i would recieve a confirmation email soon. I recieved the email at half 1 in the morning and the delivery date had changed to the 9th so i called them the next morning and they said due to black friday they had to extend the delivery date. I asked them to cancel it as i needed it for my holiday which they said they couldnt do as i could only cancel an hour after placing the order even though it wasnt despatched. The package was despatched on the 6th and has been with hermes now since sunday, the 9th has been and gone and we are now on the 12th. I called and spoke to asos on rhe 11th who advised i needed to wait 4 days till they can offer a refund. Having just got off the phone to them they have advised i was given the wrong information and i had to wait 7 days after the delivery date. Very unprofessional if you ask me, they are quick to take your money but not quick to give it back when its their mistake. Will never order from asos again!!!

name: Isabel R.
title: I ordered a Nike hoodie for my daughter…
review: I ordered a Nike hoodie for my daughter and the item was delivered to someone other than me and I sent ASOS CUSTOMER CARE an email and the would not help me out. I gave them my order number and they are asking me to send them another email from I have no idea where. So now I'm out 60.00 and a hoodie for my daughter . Don't shop from here people. They don't care if you recieved your package or not.

name: Matt Harrington
title: Don’t pay for premier!
review: Terrible customer service taking 6 days between responses via messenger. Then, the response is ignorant to the original points raised. Shocking customer service.

name: Clay
title: I have been waiting for a package for over a month.
review: I have been waiting for a package for over a month. When talking to customer service, they advised me to check with my neighbors or other safe spots like behind the garbage and recyling bins incase it was put there.... they then told me that it may be at my local post office, but were not able to tell me what company or provide a tracking number. THEN they told me to check back in 3 weeks from now and they can assist me further. Until then, they can't assist. It is a Xmas present that i ordered that they wont help me find. I will never use this site again and i suggest no one else does either. Terrible customer service.

name: Lauren
title: Unhelpful exchange
review: Unhelpful exchange, I have not received any answers and do not know when I can expect to hear back from Asos. I am extremely disappointment at this poor customer service.

name: Edward Roberts
title: items in order not received
review: I ordered over a week ago. The item finally came and I only received 1/3 items that i ordered. I contacted ASOS and the rep offered to resend the items but it would take over a week. I was upset since they didn’t try to offer a better solution like expedited shipping. Once i mentioned it, then it was offered. I was told someone would contact me within 48 hours to get the shipment sent and no one has contacted me. Now at this point i want a refund.

name: Sam Welch
title: Terrible, have lost control over their business during Christmas
review: I have been a regular customer of ASOS and pay for premier next day delivery, but during this christmas period they have completely lost control of their business. Orders placed on 27 Nov have still not arrived and no updates have been given. It is christmas time and people are ordering gifts and travelling, and I have now run out of time to organise new gifts for my family. I have tried contacting ASOS on Messenger, Twitter and Email and have had no responses after several follow ups over the last few days. On social media I see a lot of people with the same issues. Not good enough, especially when paying an annual subscription for premier service.

name: Paulo Lage
title: Awful everything
review:
Awful everything. Never again. Would recomend you stay away.

My girlfriend wanted some shoes for Christmas, I saw 2 pairs she wanted and waited until Back Friday to get them.

The pair she wanted the most was sold out, fair enough, I'll buy the other pair as it is available.

Proceed to check out and notice that if I add 8 euros extra, I get free shipping. So I add 4 little things and it's done.

Now, today, the 6th of December, a damn week later, I get an email saying "oops, actually we don't have the ones we said we did have, here is the money you paid for them".

So now I get back the money paid for the shoes, but now I wasted Black Friday trusting this company, will have to buy the same shoes at a more expensive price because they can't manage their stock and I now I still paid for 4 other products that I would not have bought if not for the shoes. Ridiculous.

At least ask if I want to wait until they get back in stock or if i want to cancel my entire order, not just nitpick your mistakes away and the client harmed in the process.

Terrible decision making behind this.

name: Brita Bakk Ugulen
title: I feel scammed
review:
I ordered 2 pair of jeans with a 34" inseam. When I tried them on they were wayyy to short, so I measured them. The inseams were 10cm shorter than what it was supposed to be on both jeans!! And it was too tight on the hips, so it made my butt look really bad. BTW the jeans were from COLLUSION.
I honestly feel scammed.

name: Marcus Brodber
title: Not Very Helpful
review:
I have been shopping with Asos for maybe 10 years. I erroneously entered the wrong delivery address and seeked their help in finding a resolution. I was quickly told that there are no options to resolve same and I would have to hope that the recipients rejected the package.

This is unacceptable customer service for me. What if Asos made the mistake wouldnt they have to find a resolution? I expect more assistance from a company I have spent so much money with over so many years. It was my mistake, however there must be some assistance that could be provided for a customer who is at risk of losing their package.

I am not shopping with them again.

name: Vera Kaye
title: awful customer service from Rebecca
review: awful customer service from Rebecca, very snotty and unhelpful. I have tried to pay extra for next day delivery but they wont let me do this. On completing my order it said it would be dispatched in the next 3 to 5 working days. I ordered on a Sunday. When I received my confirmation email it said the order could take up to 10 days. I am due to move house in 7 days from the Sunday I ordered. So my ex landlord will have a field day with the £494 of Christmas presents. o well done ASOS. Its caused me to have panic attacks and my stress levels are through the roof. I will never order with them again. Just feel

name: Ellen Lilly Gearing
title: Still yet to receive my gift card and unclear returns policy
review: Instead of receiving a refund I got a gift card instead. It was not made clear at all on the returns slip and given that it was a new change in Asos' policy I feel it should have been clearly stated on the slip that a refund would not be generated after 28 days to avoid customer confusion. I assumed 45 days would still follow the exact same returns policy procedure. If I had known I would have made sure to send the items back within 28 days.

name: Daniela
title: Time waiting for chatting
review: after 36 minutes waiting I have a chat with someone😡😡. The girl it was very good and helpful but for everything else bad.

name: Roc S
title: Buyer beware
review: Buyer beware, customer service is terrible if you have an issue with your order. Check, check and triple check your order. 3 extra units got added to my order for reasons I cannot explain. I tried to cancel within seconds of receiving the confirmation email but the system did not allow for cancellation. Then when I tried to get online help for someone to remove the extra items and at least issue me a credit so I could purchase something else (they claimed cancellation was impossible) they refused. Seems I will have to endure paying for duplicate items that I never intended to order. They know most won't bother sending them back as the international shipping cost at your own expense just adds to your losses. I wonder how many others were caught out with this same unscrupulous practice. Check the reviews and go with a more reputable company that is willing to correct errors with online ordering systems within minutes of placing the order. Will never use this company again.

name: Nastiya Kartavtzev
title: Your costumer service is bad
review: Your costumer service is bad, never have the answers or the willing to help the costumer, hope that someone will read this and do something with that

name: JC
title: I had an issue with an order not going…
review:
I had an issue with an order not going through and when I contacted the chat support, the person didn't seem sympathetic to my situation at all and didn't have any sense of urgency in helping me get the issue resolved.

It's like they had an "I don't care if I have your business or not" attitude.

name: Gotie
title: I order the dresses for over a month but still haven't receive the dresses yet..
review:
I order the dresses for over a month but I still haven't receive them yet. I was given a reference number and was told by the agent with the reference number and my address, I can contact my local post office to track the package. However the agent then said the order is untraceable. 
With common knowledge, a post office needs a tracking number in order to track a package, the reference number in my order is not the information which my local office can use. 
I'm very frustrate right now as I need the dresses for Christmas and I'm so worried that it won't be delivered on time.

name: Ana
title: I will never order from ASOS again
review: Out of 5 things I ordered I will return 4 (and still in doubt about the fifth piece). All things are very poor quality and do not match the picture at all. The coat I ordered smells really bad, is different colour and texture than the picture, it fits poorly etc. The sunglasses I ordered do not match the picture as well, they seem much bigger in real life. The bralette I ordered is complitely different colour and texture compared to the photo (in real life bright pink, in the photo pastel lilac). The belt I ordered came damaged and does not match the photo as well. The shoes I ordered are really poor quality. Overall, I am deeply disappointed and will not purchase anything from the website again!

name: Kate
title: Very poor customer service
review: Very poor customer service. As a premium subscriber who has paid extra for yearly next day delivery, I asked where my parcel was as it had already been 4 days since I placed the order. I was then told that I shouldn't expect it for another two days due to delays and that as a premium subscriber I'm not exempt from potential delays. I was then palmed off and told that they would be ending the customer service chat as there was nothing they could do and they wouldn't be reimbursing me for the extra I paid for next day delivery. Awful service overall and very confusing why anyone would pay for a premium next day delivery service which doesn't actually deliver.

name: Ahmed
title: Do not deal with “Aramex” delivery it…
review: Do not deal with “Aramex” delivery it is the worst .. never get order in time evvveeerr

name: A Mills
title: A sad sorry company gone to the dogs
review: No delivery of item 11 days after the supposed delivery date, which left me with no graduation dress. But worse, they have not responded to any emails asking for help with locating the parcel. They've just taken my money and provided no goods or assistance. DO NOT use Asos if you want an outfit for an occasion within the next month. I've used Asos for years, unfortunately it looks like they've totally gone down the pan and I'll take my business elsewhere.

name: Matt
title: My item changed description
review: My item changed description, photos and colour after I had ordered and when I saw it I asked if they could change it ( the order still hadn't left ASOS) but to no avail. Now I will have to go through the hassle of returning it and buying the right one.

name: B L
title: Good & Bad
review: Customer service was wonderful, this is not a critique on how the agent supported me. I am annoyed that my package is late/lost and that I'll have to rush to find what I need. I'm annoyed that standard shipping can't confirm a tracking number (not clear at order) giving zero information to the ASOS team, or myself. This was my first order, and will be my last.

name: Damob
title: Used to be fantastic! Massively gone downhill...
review:
I always used to shop at ASOS - Infact, I have probable spent thousands of pounds with them in the past. Not just because I thought they had well priced clothes, but also because the customer service used to be fantastic. Any issue used to be dealt with with the customers best interest at heart, they were loyal to their customers, and in return customers were generally loyal back.

Lately, I have had a few issues, and all of them have been dealt with appallingly.

1. I ordered a jumper which took around 3 weeks to come. This was only after I made endless phone calls to DPD, ASOS customer service, along with messages on their Facebook messenger. They told me that they needed to wait 5 working days for DPD to respond. Another wasted week. Eventually the jumper came, but I wonder if it would have ever showed up had I not spent realistically over an hour of my life making calls and sending messages.

2. The same jumper was too big, so I sent it back and asked for a replacement. Again, I heard nothing for about 2 weeks, so yet again I got in touch with ASOS customer services. Arbz basically told me that the issue was no longer their responsibility and they were not sending out another jumper, as they haven’t received mine.

Unfortunately, I stupidly mis placed my proof of postage, so am unable to prove that I actually sent it back. My word is simply not good enough after many years of being a loyal customer and several thousands of pounds later.

3. Why are ASOS no longer rewarding their loyal customers? I understand that they are in a bad place financially (high turnovers, low profits/non-existent profits), and will likely need a bail out in the foreseeable future. However, cutting money by offering poor customer service = bad retention, and ultimately means less turnover. 

Come on ASOS! How about you remember how to properly look after your customers and begin to focus on what really matters to your business again!

name: Sino
title: I dont understand
review: I dont understand, why it is so difficult to send an email with a code for students to my adress. Always mistakes and no support.

name: kwame Koranteng
title: I ordered some items and paid extra for…
review: I ordered some items and paid extra for next day delivery and its been almost two days now and i still haven't received my items. This is a very appalling service with ASOS as if they cant guarantee next day delivery, they shouldn't include that option when customers are buying products online. And its not like i live in a remote part of the UK where its impossible to deliver stuff. This is just ridiculous.

name: Janni Chohan
title: Questionable Customer Service Standards & Policies
review: Customer service standards and policies are not standard to US apparel companies. Closer to European standards, little to no customer service standard.

name: Laura Rowland
title: My query was never answered.
review: My query was never answered and just continually palmed off with process, which is not in line with customer service.

name: Mary Skorda
title: the girl was very sweet but your site…
review: the girl was very sweet but your site is outrageous!!!!!!

name: Nhat Ton
title: False advertising
review: Be aware of your account being closed without notification or explanation. An online shopping site which offering free postage and return but then terminate service to customer due to return frequency? I had made thousand dollars of purchasing before getting deactivated without notice, then chasing after their customer service and being terminated time to time during the chat when I need to sort out the return for my last order (which has not been delivered yet and can no longer be lodged a return from my account). I don't think anyone deserve to be humiliated this way when you pay money for a service. ASOS need to learn their lesson. If you can not afford a sale or a service such as free postage or free return, DO NOT offer it.

name: Aberella Schmierer
title: Not the best online store to shop at
review: Not the best online store to shop at. Be sure to figure out all of the promotions you are given before ordering. As they might only tell you after you received your items. If the form fit properly be prepared to pay for the customs charges and return fees.

name: Liam
title: Horrible customer service.
review:
Horrible customer service.
Ordered something Oct.17th and still hadn't received it 2 months later. No updates were given on the order throughout that time.
Also was only given a refund after 2 months of waiting for the product and was still charged 30$ for shipping.

name: Anton Covali
title: Read this through and you will be "impressed"
review:
Read this through and you will be “impressed” how Asos works. 

I placed a big order during Black Friday sales. The order was worth 1000 euro and had in total around 55 items. Due to the fact, that you can apply promotions only with orders less than 500 pounds/euros – I had to divide it into 2 parcels, therefore I received 2 confirmations and 2 tracking references for both packages. 
I was e-mailed regarding delivery date, and was patiently waiting for the order. 
On the actual delivery date (it was Friday), I received an e-mail that 1 out of 2 packages was not delivered due to the fact that address was UNDEFINED (I received many other packages from other couriers and never had an issue), where second parcel was still on delivery way and should be expected on Monday. I started contacting Asos – they said there is nothing they can do, Asos transferred this package to delivery company and have no responsibility for it, and according to tracking information from delivery company package is going to be returned back to Asos distributor centre.  Of course I got upset, its Holiday time, Black Friday sales and presents for family. I asked them what we can do about this situation, and if it’s possible for Asos to re-send this package to me again. They said that according to their policies, that are not allowed to re-send the orders, and all they can do is provide a refund. Basically, they said that I should expect money back on my account within 14 business days, meanwhile I can add all the items to the cart again and place a new identical order – this is the only solution they provided. I said okay, I understand everything might happen in this life and let’s move forward. 

When I started placing new order, I realized that 20 out of 25 items that were in my order are currently OUT OF STOCK, because everything was sold out during black Friday. That was a big problem, since there were many specific items that I really needed. I also took in account, that Black Friday had 25% discount on all items, where I didn’t have that privilege anymore. Logically, I asked for the Asos representative on the phone, to at least generate a new discount code for me as it was available during black Friday. After all the frustration, I still wanted to understand their part and go forward with it. All I asked is to “put me in the same shoes” as I was when placing the order which was not delivered – this is the only fair solution. Please take in mind, if Asos provides 25% discount code, I STILL CANNOT BUY ALL DESIRED ITEMS BECAUSE THEY ARE SIMPLY OUT OF STOCK. Eventually, my shopping experience went fully in a wrong way. Eventually, Asos representative said that there IS NOTHING AT ALL THEY CAN HELP ME WITH. ZERO HELP WAS POVIDED. They were not willing to provide any sort of compensation…. I also explained them that I am leaving the country for Holidays, and really need my orders according to delivery date, but again there is nothing they can do…. I truly did not see any human being cooperation..

Getting back to the second parcel – first parcel was not delivered and send back to Asos (on Friday), where second parcel eventually successfully arrived on Monday!!!! HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE??? 
Just to clarify. Both parcels were ordered at the same address. One parcel doesn’t get to the destination point and reason was: ADDRESS UNDEFINED, where second parcel successfully arrived 2 days after?????!!!! 
Where is the logic???? None of the parcels should of been delivered in this case. There you can clearly understand that it was an issue with delivery company or specifically delivery person, who simply couldn’t find the address in one day, and eventually found it 2 days later…..
After receiving second parcel on Monday, I called Asos immediately to clarify how is that possible. They said they are also very impressed that this happened, and it makes no sense how first parcel was not delivered but second got the point. Eventually, they could see that its totally not my fault and it creates a big issues for me as a customer. Therefore, I asked them again what we can do about first parcel that was not delivered, since I really needed those items. Their answer was not different: there is nothing we can do – please place a new order. I asked them straight forward: 

1. What about 25% discount that was available during black Friday? I don’t have that option anymore.
2. And what about all the items that I purchased and are in stock anymore? 
Answer was typical: nothing we can do – we apologize for inconvenience. 
In my opinion you have more than enough power to make your customer happy and satisfied. Desire is another question. Eventually, I decided to let it go. I lost too many nerves in last couple days having all this discussions with Asos, meanwhile zero help was received. 

I just decided to let it go…. I’m a fighter type of person, but I realized if they are not willing to help after all my tries and effort – than I cannot make them help me. I still needed my clothing items, so I went online, chose new items (since items that I ordered before were out of stock..) and proceeded with the order. Before making the payment, I decided to call Asos again to ask regarding Premium Delivery. (Reminder: I have to go abroad for holiday and have time limitations, therefore I cannot wait for another 2 weeks for standard delivery, and had to use Express delivery). 
My question was next: If I am physically located in the Netherlands, but I use Asos UK region for shopping, would Premium Subscription work in this case? Asos representative who was speaking with me on the phone, asked to hold for a minute while he can discuss it with his team, when he got back he assured me for 100% that I can purchase Premium Subscription in Netherlands and use any store region from Europe to make a purchase. All European countries work in chain, and it doesn’t matter from which region you order – it will be delivered within 2 working days by Premium Delivery. I said thank you and proceeded with the order. Eventually, when I received an order confirmation it said delivery should be expected by December 20, which is 2 weeks/not 2 days - after order was placed…….. I called Asos again… Every time you call them – you speak with different person of course. What you think they said? No sorry, if you are from Netherlands you can only use Premium Delivery for Netherlands Region…. HOW THE HELL is your staff so UNPROFESSIONAL AND SO UNEDUCATED? They provide fake information to customers, who suffer from it.. Instead of helping me out with my issue, they put me in even worst situation. 
Eventually, I decided to never come back to Asos anymore and spread the word about this situation to others. I am waiting for my new placed orders to arrive and I will forget about Asos as a bad dream. This is the worst shopping experience in my life. I lost five days contacting Asos daily through the phone and online chat, spoke with 20-25 different representatives, where none of them provided needed help, but oppositely were providing disinformation and being rude.

Couple more things from my conversations with Asos team, which “killed me” : 
1. If you go to Asos.nl which is Netherlands region website, under support page they do not have CHAT option available at all. It’s simply disabled for Netherlands. I had to go to UK region, where eventually my order was placed, in order to communicate through CHAT. Ten out of twenty times, Asos representatives were not even willing to cooperate with me, and their reason was: 
Sorry, you are from Netherlands region, and you speak with Asos UK. We are going to transfer you to NL team where they can help you out. EVENTUALLY THEY SIMPLY CLOSE THE CHAT. There is not transfer. Employees are not even aware that NL region doesn’t have CHAT OPTION. WHO ARE THEY GOING TO TRANSFER ME TOO????? That is crazy and fully unprofessional…. They simply hang up on you and say we are going to transfer you, where nothing eventually happens and you sit and wait there like an id1ot..
2. Staff is very uneducated. They tell you things which they have no clue about. PREMIUM DELIVERY information was fully wrong. Information was fake and manipulated me to do the wrong moves, where I have to suffer again. One employee says one things, another employee says completely another thing.
3. Besides contacting Asos through Online Chat and Phone, I sent them 2 emails, where response should be received within max 48 hours. None of my emails were answered, its been a week. 

P.S. I am a good person, but I truly hate you for your service and the way you deal with customers. I will do my best letting people know what kind of service you provide especially during HOLIDAYS.

name: Kate Sk
title: Unbelievable
review: I ordered on black Friday the DKNY textured leather zip around purse(large) and they sent me the DKNY leather zip around wallet(small). At first I thought that it was just a mistake of them. But when I saw what they have done I was shocked. They changed the discriptions AND images AND prices.The purse is now called wallet and the wallet purse!! On black Friday the wallet(small) was way cheaper than purse(large). I paid for the large one and they sent me the small one and they havent even apologised for it!!! Unbelievable!! I have been customer to ASOS for years but  I'll never purchase anything from ASOS again!!!

name: Bethany Cerro-Hughes
title: Awful experience!
review: Awful experience! Had a nightmare trying to sort out all three of my orders and it still hasn’t been resolved. I had a reply to my first email but they didn’t resolve anything, just pushed me to the side. I have sent a further 4 emails which have all been ignored!

title: Azeem is a monkey anus
review: Azeem is a monkey anus.

name: Victoria Sadzot
title: Still waiting for me money !!
review:
First my order was delivered later than expected. I could not pick it up on time because I was abroad (i needed the order to go on vacation but it was delayed so I couldn't get ...), so it was sent back to you (fine, anyway I wasn't planning on keeping it). And now, I have been waiting for more than a month to be reimbursed but my parcel is still at the warehouse and God knows why, no one pick it up so that I can have my money back !! (the parcel has been there for more than a month). 
This is a desastrous first experience and it will be my last ! Didn't expect this from Asos and didn't know it was possible to have such deplorable customer experience ...

name: Zero Red
title: So bad, never exchange
review: So bad, it hurts. I ordered shoes, and received an item that was different to the picture of what I ordered. Customer services were reluctant to admit they had made a mistake and informed me asos do not allow for complaints to be made. So I had no choice but to follow the standard returns process. I asked for an item exchange as I want the shoes and returned the wrong item on 19/11/2019. I heard nothing for weeks so asked customer services what is going on, to then be told my return had been lost in transit. The support agent apologised and booked an order to be sent out next day, and to look out for an email confirming this. I receive the email, to my shock, it says I've been refunded. Not what the agent said and not what I wanted. Though I'm not surprised, they made so many mistakes.

name: Matteo Capriles
title: Package was returned w/out my acknowledgement -  Ashleigh was the only helpful costumer service representative
review: So, Ashleigh was wonderful, after talking to several individuals that were dismissive of my frustration Ashleigh was kind and offered insight about the situation. It is truly unfortunate that the issue with my order did no get resolved, but glad that Ashleigh took the time to validate my poor experience with ASOS.

name: Galini Stavropoulou
title: My order was never send to me!
review:
My order was never send to me!! Very disappointed about your service!! I lost my money!!
I was my first and my last order on ASOS….....…..................................

name: Stephen
title: Terrible customer service!
review: Booked a courier to pick up a return and they did not show up despite waiting in for a 12 hour collection window. After waiting 30 minutes on the live chat, the customer service adviser said no collection was attempted and with no apology said I should try another collection method and sent a link to Hermes website. Day wasted. Will not order with Asos in future.

name: Saffron Peacey-Wilcox
title: Very frustrating
review: Very frustrating, didn't listen to me. Ended the chat before I finished, just because she was, that was the end of it. Both know my order is not going to arrive, but I have to allow another day just incase its going to suddenly dispatch and be sent and arrive at my house tomorrow. All know that won't happen...... Useless.

name: Jenny
title: The worst. Not about the customer. All about the company.
review:
Absolutely the worst place I’ve ever had to deal with, when returning a faulty item. 

The system didn’t generate a QR code. All email folders checked and account didn’t register a return. Online for three days trying to return an item only to be thrown back to my order page. So unable to return item. 

Extremely frustrating... 
 Only form of contact is texting. No one to speak to and they’re unable to access accounts. 
The service is all about the company And money and NOT ABOUT THE CUSTOMER.

name: Stephanie
title: I would leave no stars if this was…
review: I would leave no stars if this was possible. ASOS are just awful. The customer service is appalling, they send incorrect items, don't send items and don't refund. In total i'm sure i have wasted on average 20 hrs dealing with ASOS trying to get things rectified - ASOS' issues I might add. DO NOT USE ASOS.

name: Luke Crawford
title: Extremely unhelpful
review: Extremely unhelpful

name: Elly Hsueh
title: BS policy
review: weirdest and worst policy for not being able to cancel nor change delivery address even if the parcel hasnt been collected and shipped out. super unreasonable.

name: Eleanor Manley
title: Customer service on Twitter is slow and deliver is rubbish
review:
Customer service on Twitter is the slowest I have experience for any company!

Delivery is SHAMBLES! I ordered 9 items using my next day delivery on Wednesday 4th December at 7am. The items did not come the next day (Thursday 5th December).
3 of my 9 items then arrived on Friday 6th December at 4:50pm. I called Asos customer services who said they would get the other items sent out to me and they would be with my by Sunday 8th December at the latest (she even said on the phone they could come on Saturday 7th December! but more likely Sunday). I asked the lady to change the delivery address to my home address as it was currently set to be sent to my work address which I am at on Monday to Friday. 
I then received an email today at 3am to say 3 of the 6 remaining items would be with me on Monday 9th December. The other 3 items are now out of stock (they weren’t when I ordered them!).
I called Asos customer services again to ask why they are coming to me on Monday 9th December as I was told on the phone they would come today.
The lady then tells me the 3 items in stock will be with you on Tuesday 10th December, not Monday 9th December like the email says! I also explained I will not be home in the week so to change the delivery address, however you are unable to change the delivery address back to my work address now?! 

I cannot believe this. You should be embarrassed.  
I understand slow delivery and I could have handled all my orders arriving on Friday 6th December... or even today. But to now say it will be with me on Tuesday 10th December at the very earliest and that it could even take as long as the 16th December is ridiculous!

Some advice - don’t use Hermes if they are being slow. It doesn’t make you look good at all.

name: Michelle
title: I would give zero stars if I could
review: I would give zero stars if I could. Non committal, unable to satisfy my complaint satisfactorily and no emphathy for my situation.

name: Hasnain Puri
title: Was of no help,robotic attitude  and…
review: Was of no help,robotic attitude  and had no information regarding the manner. Pathetic service

name: Tamara
title: The usual terrible customer service…
review: The usual terrible customer service from ASOS - the worst of all the online giants...

name: Dominic LaChance
title: Although very friendly and…
review:
Although very friendly and professional, the customer care representative didn't seem to have access to the necessary tools to help me track my order, and all he was left to answer me with was some corporate, pre-determined answers that I know didn't come from him. Also, I was told to wait until December 23rd, when my order was placed on November 8th. I could have made the clothes myself by now.

Never ordering again!

name: Sahil
title: worst customer service ever
review: Sara was awful in dealing with my concerns. She ended the chat because she couldn’t give me a straight up solution. ASOS sent me the wrong shoes and she was advising me to pay more as if it was my fault.

name: Stela
title: Waiting for my order over 15…
review: Waiting for my order over 15 days,inpossible to connect with customer service team, as from 10 e-mails they answer  ones, told me to wait to 9th of December. My estimate delivery date was on 28 of November. I tried online chat but I am always on a  Que, and nobody answer. I am tired of sending an e-mails. Cant get my money back and do not recieve my items, same time no answer. Worst service and online shop. I will never purchase anything from them

name: Ace Music
title: I've been having issues with delivery…
review:
I've been having issues with delivery from Asos with hermes, they havent delivered 6 orders I've placed in the last 3 weeks conservatively and Asos havent done nothing about it, and I'm subscribed to a yearly delivery.

Asos have turned into a joke now, and I'd advice anyone not to shop with them.

name: Sabrina
title: ASOS - No regard for peoples time, money or environment
review:
ASOS is not able to fulfil their orders in the time frame stated! I placed an order on Friday and even though I have next day delivery it said the estimated delivery date would be the 4th of December. I got an email saying they where extremely busy and I would receive an email confirmation in a few hours. When I received the confirmation approx 8 hours later the delivery address was pushed to the 11th of December. I immediately tried to cancel but I was unable to as it was outside the hour period. I needed to cancel or amend the address as I am moving to France on the 5th of December.

I have been told that I cannot cancel or amend the address even though it’s not being dispatched for 10 days. And it’s an error on their end as they are not fulfilling the orders in the time they stated. What Asos have suggested is no 1 that I illegally access the property I am vacating - even though I have said on a number of occasions that I will be in a different country.

The 2nd suggestion which disgusts me is that they are willing to let the order me packaged. Then sent to a currier for delivery - once the currier attempts a number of times it will then be returned to Asos. If the order is returned to Asos they will then process a refund. I am disgusted at how much of a waste of time and money this is. Not to mention the affect this will have on the environment if this is their solution to this issue. 

It is also a waste of my money and they have no regard that the order may go missing.

I will be boycotting Asos until they find a way to be more sustainable. Or show come care towards their workers and they environment. Absolute disgrace!

name: Shauney Parry
title: DONT BUY FROM ASOS WORST COMPANY
review: ASOS is probably the worst company I have ever had to deal with I have so many complaints because of their incompetence and rude staff but apparently there’s no way to make a complaint no one is willing to give you a head office email address, no compensation is ever offered no help ever given just rudeness from staff and your basically told to just deal with it

name: Hannah Willen
title: Horrible customer service
review: Horrible customer service, absolutely unhelpful! Policies are awful, not buying again from ASOS.

name: Emily Hanna
title: I wish I could put less than 1 star
review: I wish I could put less than 1 star! Things take too long to recieve then if you need to return takes 45+ days for a refund leaving you emailing randomly for a hope of a reasonable response! Also they dont advise you of the custom fees you will incur and leave you with almost 10% extra in fees to pay to clear your items. For a large order like mine it worked out to be a few hundred pounds I wasn't expecting! Worst experience ever. Still chasing my refund!

name: Kee Lee
title: Good customer service
review: Good customer service

name: Fiona Middleton
title: Parcel not received
review: Parcel not received. Tried to contact Courier, generic responses and dieected back to Asos. Spent half an hour on line only to be told may get replacement or refund. Can't check stock, no timescales, can't contact anyone in person. Useless compared to Amazon Customer Care/ contact

name: James
title: Awful customer service
review:
Fazari was rude throughout, showed no understanding of my problem and was a long way short of helpful. 

Very disappointed with ASOS on this occasion, and will not be shopping with them again.

name: Nessa
title: My black Friday experience ruined!!
review:
My black Friday experience ruined!!

I for one will definitely reconsider ordering with ASOS again.
The website duplicated my order. I went VIA the live chat to cancel one once I realized I had been charged twice to be told it is past 60 minutes and I had to return the item back in my own time. This is a massive inconvenience and very unfair. I am well within my consumer rights to cancel an order within 14 days. ASOS deny customers this right through their process. Customer service is very poor and when you ask to speak with a manger they deny this with automated messages

name: Gen Bakir
title: If I could give them zero stars, I would
review: If I could give them zero stars, I would. Their refund process and customer service is so terrible, I’d rather pay more elsewhere than shop with them. Honestly, it’s not worth it.

name: Azela Aziz
title: Very shocking how a big company deals…
review: Very shocking how a big company deals with customers, to be told that there is nothing they can do with my order been delayed when I paid for premier delivery and couldn't use it until after placing the order. Very disappointing how I as a customer spend money every month shopping at this company and when it comes to a simple problem that should be handled with care. I get told nothing they can do when other companies around are dealing with same stress and are not treating faithful customers this way. Totally unfair

name: Tomer Azumi
title: Good luck receiving a refund
review:
Waiting for more than one month for refund after I got the wrong product type (And returned it).
The customer service in Facebook messenger reply in a delay of at least one day without even looking at the last messages written in the same conversation.
Worst service I’ve got ever !

name: Madison Karpoff
title: First and last experience with asos
review: If I could give less than one star, I would. Your team has been extremely unprofessional. I reached out yesterday on Facebook, got a response asking my inquiry, and never heard back until after I tweeted your team today. They did not respond to my problem on Twitter but replied to my FB messenger from the day before. Then they didn’t answer my response to the fb messenger until I tweeted again. I tried to email but ASOS website is so slow and uncooperative. I am waiting to hear back from a new team of customer care and hope that ASOS does right by me. This was my first attempt at a purchase from ASOS and may possibly be my last.

name: Jo
title: Far from disappointed as I didn’t not…
review: Far from disappointed as I didn’t not receive any updates on my order due to a technical issue as advised from customer care. They couldn’t let me know where is my order and had me wait after the due date of the delivery to tell me the order never left their wear-houses!!!!
