This has caused me spending more money to find another dress to replace the one I should have received plus additional time for it as I have only 3 hours to replace it if I find something! Totally unprofessional, need serious work on their policies! I will NEVER attempt to buy from ASOS again!!!! You have officially ruined my awards ceremony. Thank you!

name: Chrissie Irvine
title: Poor customer service when trying to…
review: Poor customer service when trying to get a refund! Delay after delay and the customer service team unwilling to help or put you through to a manager...still waiting for my money!

name: Nadia B
title: most broken customer service you'll experience
review:
First order with ASOS and so far it's terrible. I won't ever put order again! 

In short: the customer service is terrible, delivery never attempt and tracker useless, supposed to be a next day delivery 8 days later still waiting! They refuse to allow me to place a new order (the parcel is in transit somewhere) at the sale price. the customer advisors cut the chat 3x on me!!!

They are useless, gestion is terrible, they don't reply. Everything is made to build frustration. They send you copy/past that are not relevant. 
It's an international company, well known and having funds but they can't even put a bit of money on customer care issues, RIDICULOUS. 



WORSTE EVER 




If you want the full story:


My order has been placed to be sent in the evening, the courier never came. In the email I've received it's stating they attempt 2 delivery before sending the parcel back to the sender; Tracker not updated for 3 days (I've paid £8 for a next day delivery) and here is the nightmare of the customer care beginning:

You can't call the service so you get this choices:

-  messenger text with automatised reply - useless and no one will reply don't waist your time
- email - no reply
- text chat 

I've been in contact with 5 different persons through the chats, and it just got worst and worst;

First one is asking me to wait at least one day (so a next day delivery not received and a tracker not update for 3 days is not sufficient), ok then I'll wait!

Second person, is sending me copy/past of random things I already know, I've been trying to explain to her for 20 min that I'm asking for my order to be re-issued and she CLOSE the chat on me and send me an email stating I'll be refunded!

I reply straight away asking to not refund but to re-issue the order (sale order) no reply;

Go back on a chat get no one replying for 15 minutes and then get cut out;

AGAIN on the chat end up with a person telling my order is already in Warehouse (which is not) and they can't do anything. I ask to place a new order with the same price and they refuse without any reason. Get the chat CUT ON ME AGAIN.

On the chat again - what a joke -, same b*llsh*t again!!! Send a screenshot showing they should attempt to deliver twice, the person reply "your email doesn't show your order", LOL that's your templates go and ask you marketing team to change this!!! They say my order is at the Warehouse - which is not and I will be refunded in 7 day, but then the opposite it's still in transit and will be refunded once received. 

I'm losing my patience and now only copy past just as they do, over and over again - might takes me a few years before I get someone competent.


Go back on the chat and get some one sending me the same things over and over again.

They don't even read what you asking, they don't even know what they are doing!

name: Aisha
title: Poor customer service from Olufemi
review: I ordered a jumpsuit, the price went down the next day, asked if I could get a refund in difference, as Im constantly buying from ASOS, and as my trainers were faulty in less than a month. I thought it would compensate for it. A staff member Olufemi gave me the worst customer service on there online chat and ended the chat with me when I wasn’t even finished with my enquiries . Really disappointed, was not expecting that kind of service, as I never have problems with Asos.

name: Vivian Chou
title: SUPER SLOW delivery service
review: SUPER SLOW delivery service. My order took up to a month to receive and the tracking status wasn't even updated. When my order arrived, the jeans run small and to return the item, it costs you $22.4 for the shipping cost...

name: Teresa
title: Been emailing customer service for a…
review: Been emailing customer service for a week now and still no reply. My order is no where to be found, ordered these clothes for a holiday to new york and now been left with nothing, fuming. Maybe if customer service had replied to me this wouldn't have been the case. Never shopping here again.

name: Krishna
title: Bad customer experience
review: I wouldnt recomend buying two of the same things from asos. I bought 2 shoes and one came brand new and still packed and the second was used and wore and the customer service is really poor and now no one can help get a express exchange for a event. Surely wont be buying anything from here again.

name: Kat Inna
title: The worst experience and most…
review: The worst experience and most confusing. I ordered an outfit for the first time with ASOS for the Black Friday event! Received the pants and not the top. Now the top is sold out in a size 2 so now I will purchase the size 0 that may or may not fit. The company asks me to place a separate order with shipping fees and without my original discount that was applied on Black Friday. They will “reimburse me later” which is hard to believe because it took forever to speak to one agent !!!! Not to mention they sent me to about 5 different agents within 10 minutes to start where the other one left off. How utterly confusing and weird. I will never be shopping with them again. I will make sure all my followers on Instagram don’t as well.

name: Luceifer Robins
title: My Christmas items were damaged and…
review: My Christmas items were damaged and sent back. They couldn’t resend them which is really annoying!

name: Alan
title: Waiting ages and no response
review: Ordered a few bits from them 10 days ago, still not received them and have emailed asking where they are and they are not replying. I understand they may be slightly busier than usual, but considering they have £100 from me, I expect to at the very least be kept updated as to why it is taking so long. Most likely won’t buy anything from them again.

name: Christian Chicharito Brooks
title: Disgusting customer service
review: Disgusting customer service, could do way more for your customers and some feedback for john. would be best not to be so argumentative

name: Laura
title: Extremely unhappy with ASOS
review:
Extremely unhappy with the service ASOS have provided and I am a very disappointed customer! 

Firstly I initially wasn’t aware or even made aware that my order had been cancelled last Thursday !!! After having waited in for the order with no luck I logged in to my account to find it had been cancelled! 
I find it insulting after contacting ASOS that they indicated this was because of my payment as this was NOT anything to do with my payment details as I had since used the saved payment details on their site. I believe it was because ASOS simply can not deal with the demand of customers ordering on the deals you have offered on Black Friday ! And then don’t even bother to let the customer know! 

Secondly, not only were some of the items now out of stock which again, was not my fault as I had correctly ordered them on Thursday, I then find it very disappointing that when having to re-order these items I can not even get them on next day delivery, despite having paid for the premier delivery service! I would not be recommending the premier delivery service to anyone in future and will also happily explain how you have failed in this area and take it further! 
I am very unhappy about this and would like to log a formal complaint with the way in which this order was dealt with. Poor customer service from a big company! 

A very unhappy customer and unprofessional service!

name: Brogan
title: ASOS live chat with the very unhelpful John
review: I needed help with an order, as one order would be delivered on my paid for next day premier delivery on the correct date, and the other order wouldn’t be delivered until 10 days later as ASOS had put it through as standard delivery! I go online to chat with someone to help, and John was the most unhelpful ASOS chat worker I have ever come across. There was nothing he was willing to do to help, and wasn’t even able to explain to me why this mistake has been made. My order was for items totalling over £400, so to have to wait so long for this to arrive is just ridiculous! I cannot cancel my order, I cannot get it sent with my other order to come at the same time, so ASOS, thank you for being so unhelpful!

name: Alana
title: I am disappointed that you were unable…
review: I am disappointed that you were unable to help me with a lost item. Not only am I out the $200 but I now no longer have the items either.I am a pregnant women who ordered a number of maternity clothes that were not right. I will not be shopping with ASOS again.

name: Ian Hamilton
title: ASOS poor service
review: ASOS had been great... until there are problems then there is nobody to speak too and it takes forever to sort out (I’ve been on the same problem for 5 weeks now !).

name: Moss
title: Lost Parcel, Horrific Communication & ZERO empathy
review: After raising a concern about the failure to deliver my parcel 4days after next day delivery was guaranteed, and no updates provided I reached out to ASOS and DPD. DPD finally informed me after I reached out twice that my parcel had been lost but all updates on the investigation would be sent to ASOS. ASOSs response (at 5days after the item was supposed to be delivered) was for me to reach our again because they weren’t sure what was happening right now and completely ignored my request for a new version of the parcel to be sent, with the sign off ‘hope this helps’ - the irony was not lost on me as ASOS have quite literally done absolutely nothing to help.

name: Lani Chafai
title: I've got 0 help
review: I've got 0 help

name: John Luke
title: Delivery not on time. Poor customer service.
review: The shipment was supposed to arrive on Nov 22nd. It's Dec 5th and I finally got a helpful representative(MIHAELA) I'd contacted the chat, email or facebook messenger at least 5x the previous two weeks and received no helpful information other than please wait. I will not use ASOS again.

name: Jan
title: Very disappointed
review:
Very disappointed with ASOS’s lack of flexibility on delivery and cancellations.

Will not be shopping with ASOS again.

name: Jason McGregor
title: Not helpful at all
review: Not helpful at all, just a big waste of my time

name: Allyson Wood
title: The worst customer service I have ever…
review: The worst customer service I have ever experienced! My original order was returned but never delivered. I reached out to customer service to replace my order and they wouldn't give me the 30% off I received when I placed my first order. They would only give me a 15% off promo code. I placed a second order, only to realize within 30 seconds of placing it that one of the dresses I placed in my cart was no longer there. I quickly re-ordered it using the same promo code. My card was charged, but the order was cancelled because the promo code was invalid. I reached out to customer service for a second time that day and they said they couldn't see the order and I needed to wait a hour. I waited a few hours, reached out to customer service for a 3rd time in one day, and they would not help me or reissue the promo code. Needless to say, it's been a very frustrating and disappointing experience with ASOS.

name: Ayeesha Abdulmajeed
title: Unreliable
review: they were unreliable and not organised

name: sydney
title: unimpressed.
review: I ordered a dress in early November for my holiday parties in mid to late December however somehow my shipment got lost, I was never provided with a tracking number and i now come to find out I can expect the dress no later than Dec. 31st... I am extremely disappointed with both the lack of organization and the lack of communication at Asos. I sent an email and a direct message through Facebook to Asos inquiring about my parcel and they never got back to me. I have loved this company and was more than aware that the delivery can often take up for 3 weeks but I never expected that a single dress could take 6 weeks to arrive. Ridiculous.

name: SP
title: Atrocious service!
review: To be honest I didn’t even want to leave one star but I couldn’t complete the review without pressing something. ASOS customer service or lack of is atrocious. My parcel was meant to arrive next day (I pay an annual subscription). Asos online chat can’t contact Hermes. Hermes lied and said they tried to deliver when they clearly didn’t as I was at home and also have CCTV. I now have to wait a week to allow them time to deliver my next day delivery. Go figure!! Why do company’s bother with Black Friday promotions if they can’t fulfil delivery?

name: Dom
title: What a Premium Experience!
review: Purchased Premium Delivery for a year on 28th November and used it to order one item. After this, my Premium Delivery has not been activated. It has been 4 days now, still nothing. I need several items urgently for an event this week, no one seems to care. Customer service are doing literally nothing, no solution to my problem. Now I have to search for these items elsewhere (very last minute), thank you Asos, I will not be using your services again. Let's see how long the refund takes...

name: Marah Jerbi
title: BAD EXPERIENCE
review:
first and last time I'm going to order from asos! 
received a wrong order ! while I paid for express Delivery, yes I received it so fast! BUT NOT WHAT I ORDERED!

name: Naide Christina
title: faulty item
review: I have recently ordered a men’s onesie which was meant to be a Christmas present, upon arriving and after checking this item I can see there was a rip in the arm. After raising this with customer services the only option was to return this item for a refund and if I were to re-order I would need to pay for delivery and then get back in touch with ASOS to have this refunded. I do not find this process helpful since you would think ASOS would offer a code at checkout however there is no real help and i feel this is a massive inconvenience especially as I waited nearly two weeks to receive this item. Not happy!

name: Charlotte
title: ASOS is great until you actually have a problem!
review: ASOS is great until you actually have a problem! I’ve spent the best part of 4 days now trying to contact someone, worst customer service I have ever experienced, think this will be the last time I shop with them.

name: Jocelyn
title: Bad delivery
review: Why doesn’t your company ship the goods in the order of payment? I don't think it's fair that we made orders before other customers, but had to wait longer than those customers.

name: Katie Booth
title: 2 and a half week wait for the wrong boots not once but twice?!
review: When you order a pair of Ugg Boots over two weeks ago, the wrong pair sent out twice??? Customer care team have you on hold for ages then put the phone down! Then they say to send them back for a refund because there’s a problem? Yeah there is! How hard is it to get a number right???? Obviously very hard

name: Mostafa Rahman
title: I am going on holiday next thursday
review: I am going on holiday next thursday. I had ordered this morning and as estimated delviery showdd as tuesday. I thought okay no problem no need to pay extra for next day or same day delivery. However after i paid asos changed expected time to 10th december. I contacted them and their customer support is absolutely ludicrous

name: Laura O Connell
title: I would have given no stars if…
review: I would have given no stars if possible. Have been dealing with my different members of the customer care team for approx three months and continue to have my issue unresolved. I have asked for the contact details of management and to date have not received them. Will never be dealing with this company again once my refund has been processed.

name: Amina Begum
title: Very BAD
review: Very BAD - do not shop with these narcasists

name: holly
title: Broken Jacket.
review: Paid £200 for a north face jacket, it came with a rip in the bottom with the stuffing coming out. Tweeted ASOS hoping for an urgent reply as it’s a Christmas present, to then have no reply, emailed again and finally had a reply which was no help. Returned the jacket a week ago asking for a exchange as I want the jacket but a not broken one; still to hear nothing from ASOS which took two separate DMs and a tweet for them to finally get back to me with an answer.

name: Jonathan Vasquez
title: not helpfull at all.
review: not helpfull at all.

name: Holly Smith
title: Stole £400 from me and then ignored me
review:
Stole £400 from me. 

I have the collect+ receipt saying that my return has been delivered, and they refuse to acknowledge that my parcel has been sent to them. 

I spent the last week messaging every day on facebook messenger for them to ignore me most days. On the only day they did reply, they said that they hadn't received my parcel, which is a straight-up lie as Collect+ said they had delivered it. They didn't even check the receipt that I sent them. They say they'll reply within one hour, but I waited days for them to get back to me.

name: faruk akkas
title: i have ordered an item and ASOS workers…
review: i have ordered an item and ASOS workers said we can not provide the tracking number this is the first time i see shipment without tracking!!

name: Veronica Anane
title: Very bad experience I received from…
review:
Very bad experience I received from ASOS  where you pay for express shipping you don’t get order 
On the delivery date they give you .. I needed the dress very urgent that was why I paid for express shipping you guys are full of disappointments always

name: star luvins
title: Customer Service is not their Piority
review: Customer Service is not their Piority, spent so much hours searching n buying only to have packed half your items n indicate All. Always missing an item 😡😡😡

name: Lily
title: Send wrong item TWICE, offer no compensation
review:
I order a dress from ASOS website, received the wrong item the first time. Later on I got the same promotion code and shipping fee returned - only when I asked for it. So I ordered the dress again, also using the next-day delivery shipping because I need it asap. And, this time they send the wrong thing again, and it's the same dress that they sent last time! It is either the provider's fault for providing the wrong dress or ASOS just displayed the wrong pictures online. They didn't even bother to double check the order before sending out! 
I contacted the customer service, they said that they would check in the warehouse, told me to return the dress and not to re-order. Of course I'm not going to reorder. In fact, I will never shop with ASOS again! No compensation, no offer, no nothing, for wasting my time and energy on this one dress!

title: Late delivery, bad customer service
review:
Ordered a parcel to be delivered on Monday, however, at the time of delivery both Monday and Tuesday, I was not home. I received an email advising that neighbors were not home to take the parcel. This is a lie as both days there was always someone home.
On the email it specifically said delivery will be attempted twice after failed first delivery TWO CONSECUTIVE days in a row. Yet I was told today on online chat that there will be no delivery today and instead it will be done tomorrow.
I requested to cancel my order and issue a refund as I will not have any need for the order that is this late.
Adviser told me he is not able to do so.
I requested to raise a complaint. I was told they will pass the feedback. I was not given any reference to my complaint and adviser closed the chat without any warning.

Poor. Service. Extremely disappointed

name: Aisling
title: I regularly order with ASOS and…
review: I regularly order with ASOS and recently received an order containing the completely wrong size(even though I clearly ordered correctly) this order was a gift for my mum (which was even delivered late) so you can imagine the inconvenience this caused. ASOS does nothing to help customers other than advise to return and PAY for express delivery for another jumper. Why should I pay for express delivery when they made the mess up on this size? Then the same person who advised this also closed the chat without resolving my compliant. Very rude.Not satisifed.

name: Cătălina Griţco
title: They close accounts without any further…
review: They close accounts without any further explanation! Awful customer service!

name: Natasha Khumalo
title: I still don't know where my order is…
review: I still don't know where my order is and Asos has no way of finding out.

name: Rob Hall
title: Tuan is absolutely useless at their…
review: Tuan is absolutely useless at their job, they need removing from position at the earliest opportunity. Failed to listen to any of my issues and constantly sent the same pointless response which just frustrated me further.  Ended the conversation themselves without actually helping me in anyway, honestly you need to employ someone who cares about the customer, Tuan is far from this and needs to find a job that suits them and their personality better.

name: mirazul islam
title: Very bad services
review: Very bad services

name: Lauryn Garza
title: Wrong Shoes Delivered
review: I was sent the wrong sneakers in the same size as I ordered.  It seemed to similar to a bait and switch to me. Asos sent me a cute pair of sneakers, similar in some respects to the ones I ordered hoping that I’d either like them enough to keep them or too lazy to return them...  For my first ever order I’m so very bummed and disappointed.  Glad they were for me and not a gift.

name: Private
title: quit the automatic answer!
review: Bad explanation and communication. They have been using already made answer and apologize for the confusion cause using those automatic answer. No help got.

name: Olivia
title: Surprise changes to delivery standards
review: ASOS changed their standard delivery times without informing anyone. This means my Christmas order is coming much later than expected. There has been no correspondence or assistance from ASOS in resolving this issue.

name: Finnian Fanning
title: My order was said to be delivered…
review: My order was said to be delivered despite me not being able to find it anywhere. I spoke to a support agent and they are going to process a refund and were helpful with that but overall I was disappointed with my experience as a first time user as I spent a lot of time trying to look for a parcel which I was told was delivered. I do not feel like using this service again nor do I plan on recommending it to anyone in the future.

name: Fiona Robertson
title: Is there anyone at Asos who actually…
review: Is there anyone at Asos who actually deals with complaints? Or do you just chatbot us all to death?

name: RS
title: Ignored
review: Ordered 2 items on Sunday 1/12. Was supposed to be delivered on Wednesday 4/12. On Tuesday the delivery was moved to  Wednesday 11/12. Asked what was going on on messenger, chat, email and I have had NO response at all. Disgusting customer service. I know it’s Christmas time and it’s busy but a response would be nice.

name: natsuko
title: very slow and bad attitude
review: very slow and bad attitude

name: NML
title: As per usual ASOS customer service was…
review: As per usual ASOS customer service was completely rubbish. Emailed and received no reply went though chat process twice then got a patronising bit of extra advice togo along with the very basic answer I needed to save us all some effort.

name: Nimesh Shah
title: Worst customer service
review: Worst customer service! Over 2 days and no reply to query relating to delivery via facebook! Even offered to pay additional and have not got a reply! Have since emailed however no reply even though I immediately replied to their response!

name: Regan Kellie Edwards
title: Do not order from here they will lose…
review: Do not order from here they will lose your order and not even let you know!

name: Louis
title: Placed an order
review: Placed an order, didn't notify me that it will take up to 11-days to deliver. Once I checked told me est. date, was too far off so I wanted to cancel order. Wouldn't let me cancel. Ridiculous company, will never purchase from again.

name: Letricia Annin
title: Not happy with asos.
review: This was my first ever order and I didnt get them and the only thing the could do was refund my money as the product was there any more.

name: dylan1653
title: Worst customer service I have ever received.
review:
Worst customer service I have ever received. Contacted around 10 times now regarding my premier delivery that was paid for over 3 weeks ago and its still not been added to my account. Every time I have contacted I am told the same thing that its been passed to another team and will be resolved within 48 hours but every-time it gets to the time scale nothing is done. I have basically paid for a service I cannot use. 

Even better when the customer advisors end the chat on you when enquiring about this again.

name: Jose
title: tired of this company!
review: I’ve ordered from ASOS two times. Both times I’ve had a really bad experience. I wouldn’t recommend this website if you’re trying to get your stuff on time for a special occasion. They’re absolutely the worst at getting things out. I’m done shopping with this company!

name: Hila
title: It is so unfortunately that I have to…
review: It is so unfortunately that I have to give you just one star,i just have to let you know that i have been i touch with asos via Facebook regarding a package that didn't arrive,its been almost a month!! And they still cant find my package ,in the mean time, they ate waiting to hear from tou delivery company that tou work with and still no answer for a month!! The package is worth almost 700 hundred shekels which is not small money.please i just want to get my package or get my money back.

name: Mendy Vanunu
title: Feels like you having a chat with bot
review: Feels like you having a chat with bot

name: Renee Rose
title: Customer service were no help…
review: Customer service were no help considering your website wouldn’t allow editing of an order. I was within the timeframe and instead was directed here.

name: Shiffy
title: USA residents STAY AWAY!
review:
We live in the USA, for some reason it directed us to the UK site.
Even after we entered a US shipping address it allowed the order to go through.
This is after offering us "2 day shipping" for a yearly fee, to then inform us it will take over 2 weeks to get our order!!!
After reviewing our order and reading the confirmation emails, and realizing what's going on, we tried to cancel the order (a little over an hour after placing the order,)  and it did not allow us!

And the dont even have a costumer service call center!!!

name: Scott
title: Three orders wrong within three months
review: Three orders wrong within three months, no compensation for them messing up order other than saying reorder the same items and then sending back order, it has taken me FOUR DAYS FOR A REFUND TO BE SORTED OUT. Emails were ignored on a number of times really bad customer service, very reluctant to use ASOS again because of my experience of my past orders being messed up and now this chasing up a refund.

name: Sara Mae O'Brien-Scott
title: The customer service representative…
review: Order was inexplicably cancelled. The customer service representative left the conversation before all my questions were answered. The final message says a couple minutes passed, but that is not true.

name: Takesha
title: Delayed delivery
review: My order has been delayed, went into a live chat to get an update Tucn was of no help. Only thing he provide was this link. Im really disappointed with what's happened, this has never happened to me before, I paid for next day delivery intentionally to get the order the next day

name: Marie Vossen
title: Horrible customer service
review:
Always been a loyal customer, recently took the plunge and decided to pay for a year next day delivery. Ordered maternity clothes last wednesday as I am busting out of my normal clothes. It is now Monday and still nothing. Tracked my parcel, it has been at the depot for days, it has been out for delivery a couple of times, just nobody has delivered it. Now back at the depot. Spoke to their online customer service who advised my to "give it till thursday"  when I said this was unacceptable he promptly ended the chat. 
There is so little maternity available on the high street that online is my only option and asos has let me down big time

name: Alanna
title: Faulty jacket faulty service
review: Received a faulty jacket and was reassured I could get a replacement, I indicated on the return slip that I would like an exchange although Asos decided to refund me instead, even though the jacket is still in stock in the size that was ordered. As this order was put through with a one off discount code I’m no longer able to get the item at the price I purchased it. Asos are now telling me that I have to contact unidays for a code even though the fault lies on their part. I’m extremely disappointed as I have used Asos for years and always been happy with my purchases but this has really put me off returning.

name: Michelle Curtis
title: I ordered my items from ASOS on 29th…
review: I ordered my items from ASOS on 29th November, I have paid for next day delivery. I am still waiting on them and its 11th December. I have chatted with one Customer Care person from ASOS on the 10th December and they said I could order them again on next day delivery .... so I could have them by 12th December. Second person told me that I won't now get them till December 16th. Their are presents in that package that I want to give on Saturday .. and now I have to buy new ones. I asked the second Customer Care agent if i could get a code for a discount for next purchase and he said no. I think it is shocking service that I have paid for next day delivery and now I am still waiting for my package. And it won't come till week 4.

name: Ruth Shmylo
title: Lost my items
review: Lost my items, refused to resend them, wouldn't give me the same discount I got when I ordered them

name: Sang
title: Think before you buy
review: I heard so much about this Asos, that I had to try, and when I was looking for a dress for Xmas party I ordered it in late October to be ready for end of November... Well, Asos then cancel the order and tells me they are out of stock, so I then set notification options... Dress back to stock. I ordered again.. And this time after 7 days from shipment I decided to search for help. Turns out dress is lost.. Great, left me with 3days to find new outfit.I'm pretty new and bought few items but I don't know sizing or quality from pictures, I return few items. Then Asos decides to tell me that my account is now flagged for high returns volume... Seriously?!  What a poor experience. I will think twice before I order again.

name: Sophie
title: Asos is a horrible site
review: Asos is a horrible site. I am in a sorority and had my whole family buy our matching pajamas from this site. No one got any of their pajamas on time so we had to buy really ugly matching ones last minute and my little felt very left out and confused all because asos would not send my stinking pajamas. The chat customer service is horrible and very unhelpful, they told me my pajamas were “lost” and it was a painfuuuuul process to get my money back. Do not count on this website or buy from here. Horrible experience, worst costumer service.

name: Shannon Eckersley
title: Not very helpful
review: To be honest, I did not find this service helpful. They offered me no solution or compensation for the error and it was a bit of a waste of time.

name: Andy
title: Fundamentally poor communication.
review: Neglected to mention when I made the order that the delivery time had been increased from 3-5 working days to 11 until after I made the order. Failed to promptly reply to email enquires. Fundamentally poor communication with customers.

name: Neha Budhdev
title: Unable to help
review: Unable to help, asked many unnecessary questions only to refer me to another customer service team who would contact me by email. Not satisfactory.

name: Jayne Bishop
title: Disgusting customer service , never again !!!!
review: I ordered a jumper and paid for it , it was never delivered but I received an e mail telling me thank you for my return !!! I had never received anything let alone  returned anything . It was a present and it let myself and my son down ...they took 4 days to get back to me after I sent 7 emails . They told me I would have a refund in 10 days but here we are day 9 and still no refund . They suggested re ordering the product if I still wanted it but I found  the risk of losing more money that I paid upfront unacceptable so I went to Zara and bought a beautiful jumper there .....still no refund from Assos

name: Salman Sharif
title: Awful experience
review: Awful experience. Paid for Premier Delivery and but it wasn't available when I placed my order, even though it had been activated. Chat help was absolutely helpless. Couldn't care less about the service I had paid for and what they had promised to deliver for it.

name: Emily Quinn
title: Not up to usual standard
review: I have always had good experiences with asos up until now. I appreciate this is a busy time of year but that is no excuse for the lack of communication and the extremely long delay in sorting my issues. I could not get in touch with anyone for a week and was offered no explanation as to what was going on or why I had not been contacted. Although my issue has apparently been resolved, it has taken 10 days to reach a resolution.

name: Sam
title: Loyal customer but will now no longer use
review:
I’ve placed over 100 orders with ASOS over the years and never had problems up until the last 6 months. 

Now I have an issue with every order. They are all different issues such as, orders not  being dispatched, orders going missing in transit, refunds not being given, or the wrong values being refunded. 

I was previously a customer who placed an order every week, but I will no longer use the website as I don’t have the endless free time to spend speaking to their customer service team.

name: Karen Safo-Barnieh
title: Terrible delivery delays
review: Terrible delivery delays

name: Jan
title: Refused to Give Me My Refund Back
review: I had to return two items, because the sizes were incorrect. After I returned both, I was only given credit for one and ASOS refused to give me credit for the other item that I returned, because a promo code was applied at checkout. Basically, after I returned two items, the total amount that I spent dropped below the minimum ($250) required for me to use the promo code. While I understand the reasoning, I'd say that most of the stores would have refunded the amount as credit, but ASOS did not. Not the smartest thing to do when trying to grow clientele. I will highly recommend ASOS to consider giving refunds to customers even after they return items after using the promo codes, as most stores do, especially because customers will only know whether the size was correct after trying them on and I feel that I am being punished for doing so here.

name: Jonathan
title: having to pay full price if I want my order due to online glitch on their end
review:
Place an order yesterday as part of the Black Friday deal they have and paid for the order expected them to come this Wednesday

Received an email this today saying my order hasn’t gone through due to a glitch on their end, rang them up to discuss about this.

They say if I want the clothes that I ordered I will have to reorder again and be charged at full price!!!

That’s is completely unfair on customer side if things as this wasn’t my fault but an error in their end which I understand things like this can happen but to say that if I want the clothes I will have to pay them at full price and not at the discounted price for what I originally order them at.

Ask to be put through to a manager but there is no one available and it will take 24 - 72 hours for them to get back to me

I don’t get why as a customer I should be worst off when none of this was my fault and the fact you didn’t offer any form of compensation

name: Janushan Uthayaranjan
title: Order didn't arrive
review: Order didn't arrive, I have waited like 2month now, for my packet, and  the costumer help is very slow, they said they will find out something as fast as possible and now I have waited two month man....

name: GRIZZLY THE BARE
title: Chat was terminated by Amaar before…
review: Chat was terminated by Amaar before query was resolved, never using them again.

name: Lena
title: Bad customer service
review: Asos don't support any environmental protection (they prefer to sent articles back and order them again to get a discount instead of editing the purchase order. For me, it is unacceptable these days..

name: MF
title: I placed an order
review: I placed an order, the order originally went through and the next day I went on to check the status and it then said the order was unsuccessful. I tried to figure out why and they said that they didn't get authorisation with my bank even though the funds were taken out of the account. The customer service was in now way helpful as some of the items I wanted were now sold out.

name: MA
title: Package never dispatched problem at…
review: Package never dispatched problem at warehouse. Parcel week late. Emails sent and same response each time like a robot, no one actually bothered to read the emails. Asked for it to be delivered to an alternative address as the address originally sent to was only convenient if the parcel had actually been sent when it should have been. This request was ignored 4 times. Had to travel to the original address 14 miles away to collect, complete joke lack of customer service. Didn’t deal with my complaint. I will never use again.

name: Hassie rana
title: fricking liars we just sent few dresses…
review: fricking liars we just sent few dresses to overseas for our cousin and when they arrived they were asking for another $140 tax they didn’t mention the $140 tax and when we asked the customer service oh my god! they were soo rude and didn’t satisfied us. DON’T EVER BUY FROM ASOS

name: AV
title: Asos shoes brand don't fit as expected
review:
Asos shoes brand don't fit as expected

Asos shoe strap was way too long , dont fit properly and make your shoes look weird.

name: emma deighton
title: asos i just ordered something would…
review:
asos i just ordered something would cancel the order. talked with jordan 
not buying from you again

name: Maëlle Bidegaray-Lucani
title: I will never use Asos again
review:
I will never use Asos again. 

They canceled my black Friday order without telling me anything. I discovered it days later because I wanted to track my package and I contacted them by chat. The customer service just replied that “it can happen”. No excuse, no goodwill gesture, no nothing. Now of course all the item that I ordered on the Black Friday are out of stock or at a much more expensive price... SUCH A SHAME 

Don’t trust them, they have NO customer service at all, so if they do something wrong, too bad for you! 

SHAME SHAME SHAME

name: Emily Kargul
title: Worst Customer Service
review: After my package went missing I contacted ASOS for assistance, like FedEx requested me to do. ASOS told me to wait two week to see if it showed up, nothing came. Contacted them again told me to wait another week, still nothing came. Contacted them a third time told me to wait another week. At this point it seemed a bit ridiculous that I had to wait over a month to get an actual resolution to the problem. I asked for them the send me a replacement order, that they said they would overnight. The package did not get it overnighted. Instead just got the run around by customer service, with them having to confirm my address multiple different times with multiple different people. In the end I did not end up getting my order because they ran out of stock of EVERY item I purchased. If they just would have resolved the problem it earlier they would have kept a long time customer.

name: Ema Čeko
title: I am disappointed because it happend…
review: I am disappointed because it happend for the first time that my order was not proceeded and I lost my discount. The ASOS company did not compensate for that in any way.

name: Zara
title: ASOS live chat customer service is terrible
review:
ASOS is amazing I love it. This review is about the appalling and inconsiderate customer service I received over the live chat. I feel as though the advisor called Thomas didn’t care about my misinformation by ASOS and my need for my order. Please read the full chat for further information. The chat reference is 24365898
Thank you

name: Jae Dyche
title: I received an incorrect item
review: I received an incorrect item, a extra small crop top rather than a size 10 maternity dress. Rather than be able to directly help me I've been pushed around to different departments while the only item that I wanted is selling out. The company can potentially give me a code but with no estimate as to how long it'll take. All the while I'm sitting here with an extra small crop top. There is no contact number where I can call and speak to anyone directly other than the chat function which representatives can only give me the same information about returning an item which I can find online.

name: Nick
title: disgusting company.
review: ASOS are a massive company, and do not care for customers, they are money grabbing, and polluting our environment. I tried to cancel an order that wasn’t due for delivery until the 11th of December, (it is the 1st of December right now) and I couldn’t cancel the delivery of my parcel, due to me missing the cancellation time. This means my parcel has to be delivered to me, and then Delivered back to them, all because they can’t be bothered to cancel the order, ‘because it has already been packed’, it’s disgusting that a company of that size does not have capacity to look through orders and not deliver the ones which are not needed. All in the hope that the consumer forgets to return the item, and they make money. I will never shop with ASOS again, and I will always deter my friends from using them. They have just cost themselves more money, for me returning the item, and them having to pay the postage fee,

name: Samira Aminzare
title: Worst customer service and courier
review: Worst customer service and courier - fraudulent and never deliver parcels but claim you signed for them! Never shopping here again.

name: Clyde Liu
title: Takes too long to response
review: Takes too long to response

name: Adeib El Masri
title: Terrible customer service
review: Terrible customer service. I tried contacting yall MULTIPLE times. I didnt get a response. I was left in a cue for like 90 minutes and then it expired. I tried contacting yall multiple times no one answered it was pointless. and when I was finally able to get ahold of someone (3 days later) I was told "theres nothing we could do" so it was all for nothing. I wasted so much time on hold FOR NO REASON. terrible customer service. I miss your customer service from 2 years ago. I am SUCH a loyal customer ive made all my friends shop with you guys. I almost exclusively shop from asos so you can only imagine my disappointment.

name: Alex
title: On more than one occasion ASOS has…
review: On more than one occasion ASOS has failed to correctly refund for items that I've returned. They recently removed the option of next day delivery due to demand even though I've subscribed to their Premier Delivery service.

name: mohamed maher
title: did nothing to help and says site rules
review: did nothing to help and says site rules

name: Nichola Barrett
title: WORST SERVICE EVER
review: I ordered my order from ASOS and paid for express shipping, I got an email 2 days later saying my parcel would arrive 5 days after the estimated date. I then sent several emails to ASOS with no reply as if you pay $15 for express shipping you clearly need it by a certain date. I then used the chat function on the website and they refused to help me. After contacting 2 separate posting companies that have dealt with my parcel and spending 2 hours on the phone I found out that ASOS has not actually put express postage on my parcel. I will not be shopping with ASOS anytime soon. DO NOT ORDER ANYTHING IF YOU NEED IT BY A CERTAIN DATE. I am now left without an outfit for my event and have to buy something new and then go to the hassle of returning my product and getting a refund.

name: Lolly A
title: An awful experience from start to finish
review: An awful experience from start to finish

name: Eva
title: Worst delivery!
review: Been waiting for my package for 3 weeks now. They keep saying the delivery is estimated for tomorrow but it never does. Worst website I have ordered on!!

name: Kali Renz
title: Husband’s Order Stolen & Theres “Nothing They Can Do”
review: Terrible customer service. My husband, who rarely ever orders clothing online, loved and ordered a jacket he was so excited about. His entire order was stolen. He called Fedex, they had him contact ASOS, who said he needed to speak with Fedex and that there was nothing they could do. After being told to go back and forth between the two several times, ASOS finally told him he had to wait until the 10th before they could either start the refund process or resend his items. The jacket is said to be low in stock yet there’s “nothing they can do” for five more days? It’s not his fault his item was stolen. I’ve dealt with several other clothing companies who do whatever they can to solve your problem ASAP. This customer service is a joke. It was the first and last time we will ever buy anything from them.

name: JP
title: Product purchased on discount
review:
Product purchased on discount, but not supplied.

I purchased a pair of shoes in stock on sale, money was deducted then the order was cancelled due to no stock. Weird.

Asos now won't honour the price even though the item is back in stock.

name: Angelica Alexis
title: CONSISTENTLY poor customer service from…
review:
CONSISTENTLY poor customer service from beginning to end. My parcel never arrived and went missing, the replacement parcel (missing multiple items) arrived split open. Further to this customer service via chat (thanks for zilch Robyn) offered completely nothing for their poor service and customer experience.

Making a point to not order anything from ASOS again. Appalled by every touch point in the experience with ASOS. ASOS used to be good but has really declined.. this is further exacerbated by The Iconic's incredible service.

name: P Nakhunthod
title: I paid for next delivery but 5 days…
review: I paid for next delivery but 5 days after I ordered I have not received my pascal yet

name: T
title: Just bad
review: would be leaving zero stars if I could. They sent me the entirely wrong item, then when I tried to contact customer service, finding out they don't even have a phone number, I was told "oops, sorry our bad" is a tone with sass you could feel coming out of the keyboard. Turns out, I have to return it, wait 6 weeks to get refunded for the item cost as well as the return fee, figure out how to get back the $100 charged by Canadian customs and then on top of all that I have to place en ENTIRELY new order in order for them to send the right dress like this is somehow my fault and they can't get it together to simply exchange my item. Truly, could not imagine a customer service team being more useless than this.

name: Aman
title: The worst online service I have ever…
review:
The worst online service I have ever experienced!

False advertisement, no tracking updates provided, no guarantees, no communication or information...just the worst service ever. 

Placed an order November 4th, apparently it was shipped November 5th and delivery date was suggested November 27th. 

When I paid for my order there was no option of choosing express post which is the ONLY way you can track your oder. Of course, why would they offer me that service, especially when I was eligible for it for FREE!

It is now November 29th and I STILL DO NOT have my package. In fact, when I reached out to 'live chat'I was told to wait until DECEMBER 23RD!!!!!!!!!! On top of everything else....they told me not to contact them until AFTER December 23rd!!!!!!!!

My event is taking place December 7th and I ordered a dress a month before thinking that should MORE THAN enough time. 

They took my money upfront....why didn't they wait until December 23rd to do that? I'm so worried they took my money and that's the end of that.

name: Abby Schmierer
title: Do not order if you live in Canada
review: Do not order if you live in Canada! Worst customer service. On top of the item amount you have to pay customs. If it doesn’t fit, you have to PAY to return. All of that money is not refunded. The customer service rep I chatted with was terrible. Thanks Jasmin. You suck. I’m am so dissatisfied. The product wasn’t what I expected either. Ran super large. I tried to find reviews on their website without any luck. Most likely they wouldn’t have many great reviews!  Disappointed.

name: Ross Dewar
title: Shocking Service
review: Delivery estimation say it will take 11 days to come, when I enquired about this the help was no use whatsoever

name: Georgia Fletcher
title: ASOS experience
review: This is my second time ordering from ASOS - first time the package took a month to arrive, second time it never arrived. They only provide a dispatch number not an actual tracking #. At least the chat support are somewhat helpful. We will see if my refund comes through.

name: jimmy zheng
title: Really bad customer wont take care of their mistake the right way!
review:
I ordered whole bunch of clothes on 11/30/19 and paid for express shipping
When I received my clothes today I realized they made a mistake on one of the item they gave me a sweater instead of the sweatpants so I contacted them right away to tell them the order issue but the first thing they want me to do was to return their sweater. It’s holiday season I have no time to return this so I told them to refund me the difference between the sweater and the sweatpants (sweater was $20 cheaper) and they still won’t do that for me. W T H! W T F! I dont wanna spend my time on ur mistakes! I have to say they have nice selections of clothes but SUPER BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

name: Jennifer Gaudette-Besserer
title: Horrible customer service
review: Horrible customer service, they don't tell you there will be huge customs charges at pick up that aren't included at checkout. can't get ahold of anyone that works there, no phone number to call, not helpful at all and would definitely never order from there again.

name: Neverasos Again
title: Terrible terrible service
review: Terrible terrible - ordered and carrier said they had my order - next email from ASOS says returned to them! I never received it - AVOID AVOID this company!

name: Yinka
title: Terrible operations and service
review: Terrible service. Lost my return package. Apparently It's a well known problem that they loose packages all the time, Unfortunately I didn't know that and this time I forgot to retain the evidence. You would think that they would document the return label that they include with your order in the event that it gets lost but nope they have no clue!   It's really put me off shopping on there again. It's always better to shop at brands who value you not put you out of pocket for over £100. It might be a small amount to them but its not to the average customer.

name: Giannis Rocopos
title: Not good enough
review: Unfortunately, customer service is not polite at all... Solutions are slow to be found or never found. I am honestly disappointed. Customer service is the reason I will stop using Asos even though they have a great stock. Anyway... I hope it improves. Most of the competitive websites are miles better.

name: Patricia Horta
title: Disappointed with material quality!
review:
I bought what I thought an amazing jumpsuit to celebrate mine and my boyfriends birthday.
I paid £40 and the material used was not what I was excepted at all... my jumpsuit completely ripped on the bus! This was extremely humiliating and ruined my mood.
The quality of the product was extremely poor. 
I'm very upset has I waited a month to used this product on this special occasion.

Patricia Horta

name: Sam Huntington
title: Premier Customer... Premier Badly Handled!
review: I ordered two parcels a week and a bit ago with my premier delivery as I always do - usually little to no problems - this time, didn’t turn up. Was obviously not impatient enough to deal with it immediately, but a few days in and still no parcels I was irked. Was told when I contacted ASOS that this couldn’t be dealt with until a week later - why? No explanation given. As a premier customer, I was just told that this happens and that it’s in the terms - so basically, pay your subscription and accept if it goes wrong, as a company, they’ll do little to help.  Once that week was up, I was simply told that they didn’t know where they’d gone and would try and get replacements. Bare in mind, both products are currently on the site as out of stock - something that they weren’t a few days ago which if ASOS had dealt with already, would of been with me. Didn’t even have the audacity to suggest pushing the orders quickly, but rather usual standard delivery if everything goes smoothly. It will not!

name: Nezar Kamal
title: Very very bad customer service
review: Very very bad customer service

name: Bri Ho
title: stupid cancellation policy
review:
Cancellation period is ridiculously short. Only 1 hour. I made a mistake purchase, and now I have to wait 20 days for a refund. And I don’t get refund on the delivery even though I didn’t want it delivered in the first place. Yes, I talked to customer services. No, they were not helpful. Just kept restating the policy with zero empathy. 
Incredibly disappointed ASOS. Across reviews, you’re doing terribly.

name: Lindsay Morrison
title: inconsistent customer service and slow response times
review:
I ordered a sweater for my boyfriend to be shipped before his birthday (November 17th).
The status showed as delivered on Nov 16 but he did not receive the package. I called fedex and USPS to initiate an investigation. I spent at least 2 hours before I got a case opened.
I then contacted ASOS and followed all of the required checks for a missing package as per their instructions. They assured me a replacement would be sent out within 72 hours via express mail. Shortly after, I received another message indicating I needed to complete those checks again. Days later I was told a new replacement would be sent and I would receive confirmation with 96 hours despite already giving me a similar response. It’s been 4 days now and I still haven’t received any confirmation email the second time around. This process has been very frustrating and has taken way too long. It’s now November 28 and as far as i can tell, there hasn’t been a replacement sent out. As a customer I really don’t appreciate the inconsistent responses and would just like for this to be resolved. 

Update*
It’s now December 12th- a month later- and ASOS has sent me a message telling me I was refunded. I ended up losing $10 when it was all said and done. Def won’t be ordering from them again!

name: Nad
title: Do not trust this company
review: Do not trust this company. Two items missing and they sent me to credit company they don’t want to know just want it money. Stay away

name: Lindsey Roy
title: My package was lost
review: My package was lost. I had bought the items were there was a promo on the website. Customer Service said they would refund me my money but I had to fight to get the replacement discount. So frustrating when it was not my fault.

name: Jemima
title: Dreadful customer service with a clear…
review:
Dreadful customer service with a clear lack of respect for their customers.
Spent over £300 on orders which were expected next day. 
Received an email to confirm & on the day of delivery I received a text confirming the time slot.
So far so good. Until the delivery time came and went, and then the next day.. and the next day. I raised the issue to ASOS via email - no reply (and getting quite worried as I hadn't received any updates.)
Raised the query again via their chat service. No adequate answer given apart from a pre-written message stating "For order number XXXXXXX I can see you were refunded XXX GBP on the X December 2019. Please allow 10 working days for the funds to appear in your account."
I asked for clarification, and was told that if I wanted the items I would have to re-order (not possible since 90% of the items are now out of stock). Some back and forth with the rep and I was advised "If you have any further questions please visit our help pages", the chat was closed as I continued to type.

Still £300 down and awaiting a refund for an order I never received. Won't waste my time with ASOS again.

name: Tobi Oyelekan
title: Order not delivered
review: The very first time I tried to use Asos, I waited like forever for the item, it wasn't delivered, the track site was on transit for so long that the estimated del date passed, I had to request for a refund because it doesn't seem like the order was going to land. Very disappointed. Upon all the hype. They just processed my refund today and I'm awaiting it, I hope I don't get disappointed too. By the way, they've good customer care, they're quick to respond. As much as I loved that sneakers 😔, thank you Asos.

name: P M
title: Premier Delivery and Customer Service FAIL
review: After ordering for years I decided to bite the bullet and sign up for premier delivery (next day shipping for a year) - my first order after signing up was delayed, and item was missing, the second page with order summary and shipping label was missing and it came in a cardboard box that was falling apart. In a chat with Navpreet, when I told them all of this, they weren’t very understanding and I asked for some return bags since I can’t use the original box. That request was denied and I was told I can ‘ship using bin bags’ - like I would risk the items that way. It feels very unprofessional and no effort or gesture was made to alleviate the awful experience I had. Very disappointing

name: Olivia
title: ASOS are usually really good however…
review: ASOS are usually really good however today I received my order open with a dress missing and with another of the dresses I ordered smells of smoke. I chatted to the ASOS care team and they couldn’t care less about what’s happened. I think they need to work on customer service.

name: C123
title: Slowest refund ever and the customer…
review: Slowest refund ever and the customer service team just stalled with the same questions asked by different customer service people. Felt like no one was on top of my case. It’s been 25 days and still not refunded...

name: Lucinda Whittaker
title: Late order and bad customer service
review: My order is due to arrive later than the original date stated.  I went on to live chat to see if they could help me with this however the person I was chatting too (Tuan)  was little to no help, and ended the conversation on me as I made a basic request to see if he could help get my parcel to me in time.  Poor service, bad attitude and closed the chat when it suited them and not the customer.

name: annoyed
title: The case of the disappearing order.
review: My order was seemingly eaten and didnt appear in my recent orders nor did I get a confirmation email, yet I still paid for it and have proof of purchase via paypal email. As of yet theres been no actual help, just a bunch of faffing about for 20 minutes before being switched over to "a specialist." This is the second time my order has been magically erased and yet I still pay for it. Not happy.

name: Rachel Chan
title: ASOS use couriers that can not fulfill…
review: ASOS use couriers that can not fulfill the demands of next day delivery. Customer service teams are very unhelpful and told me to wait an extra 4 days for my items despite paying for next day delivery

name: Turcan Daniel
title: Very bad customer support. SHOCKED!
review: Very bad customer support. I've addressed the customer support team several times the last days in order to get my missing order issue sold (order placed, paid, and that's it! Yes, the delivery part is apparently missing!) , and after being told I will be getting a refund, they send me a email where they basically call me a scammer and tell me they won't refund me anything. SHOCKED!

name: Foyez Ahmed
title: Asos customer service
review: Customer service is pretty much non existence. Wish I read the reviews before using asos.

name: LK
title: Horrible customer service
review: Horrible customer service ! Advised they would pay for alterations then 2 weeks later said they would not.

name: Sheniqua
title: Terrible customer service.
review:
I have been a loyal customer of Asos for several years, encouraging others to shop there. I usually have a pleasant experience. This has been my worst experience. When I received my package I noticed one of the items bags was ripped. Then I noticed another item was just thrown in the bag. The presentation was poor. On top of this 5 of my items were missing. 

When I reached out for customer service I noticed that they were very difficult to contact. I only got through to someone once I tried to send an email. Then once I did I did not receive any explanation for why my items were missing nor was I reassured that they would be sent to me as soon as possible given that I had ordered them with one-day shipping applied. I had to ask the representative if they would be shipped in one day. At this time, 4:47pm, about 4 hours since I spoke with the first representative, I still do not have an updated email of when my items will be arriving. Then when I asked the representative if I would be receiving any courtesy credit for my inconvenience the representative basically ended our chat, which was very rude and dismissive. I was shocked to have such feedback from a customer service representative. When I asked to be connected with someone else the representative refused to do so and then abruptly ended our chat. I am also shocked that the customer service representatives of a large clothing retailer are not trained to give any compensation either in store credit, shipping credit, refund on late items, anything at all for customers who they inconvenience.

name: Erika
title: My issue isn't with Shannon but with…
review: My issue isn't with Shannon but with the entire ASOS customer service policy. The seam on my jacket ripped and I sent in a picture of it. It was clearly a faulty item but I otherwise loved the jacket. All I was offered was a refund which would be fine expect I really want the jacket. If items are clearly faulty then it should be easy to have a replacement item sent once the faulty item is returned. Or some sort of partial credit of some sort. It just seems like a bad system that doesn't make anything easier for the customer. Love your clothes but bad customer service really deters me from ordering with a company again.

name: Zhao Lin Tay
title: Late delivery, No sense of responsibility
review: Late delivery. No sense of responsibility. I chat with the live customer service officer 1 day before the estimated date of delivery. They brushed me off and closed off my chat saying that it is not late yet.Looking at the delivery tracker, it is obviously going to be late as it is still in UK and I am in Singapore. Today I chatted with another customer service officer. He just told me that it will be late by 9 days and closed off my chat again.

name: pissed
title: i got false informatio
review:
i got false informatio
they said my crd is not working and then nit turned out ASOS doesnt deliver items from UK to austria
So stupid!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Rooki Kamal
title: after placing an order of nearly 400…
review: after placing an order of nearly 400 pounds they were unable to provide tracking information that worked. the delivery service said they didn't receive the order from ASOS on the day I was expecting it and even tho asos assured me later that I will receive it that night. it still didn't come. after I phoned them they said it actually never left their warehouse that since its past the delivery date they can only sent a replacement order without an extra charge for next day delivery or refund. so I asked them to send the replacement order and they said I will receive a confirmation email and be able to track it AND THEY REFUNDED IT

name: Fher Palomino
title: Untrackeable delivery service
review: They sent me my order by an untrackeable delivery service and nobody knows where my package is. OK! Terrible!

name: Brandon
title: BAD EXPERIENCE
review: I am convinced that ASOS really doesn’t care about their customers. I purchased some pants that ended up being the wrong size. They don’t offer exchanges in US so I was told to return them and just repurchase them. Well when I went to buy them the price increased by $12. I don’t think that it’s fair that I would have to pay that price when I had already got it for the discounted price. I spoke to customer service and they couldn’t resolve after taking forever to figure out a decision. I will no longer give ASOS my business and will tell me friends about my experience.

name: Hate asos
title: I would put zero but that's not an…
review: I would put zero but that's not an option. I had a delivery stolen and was inquiring about what to do and the carriers the company uses and received horrible service. I was asking about carriers and the agent Sarah tells me I can pick it up on store and I explained where I live it's not close or convenient and she proceeds to say that I can just get a refund which I did not want so I said I would wait and see what follow up email says after they have investigated. After the chat ends I get an email stating I am getting a refund and will not get a replacement for my package. So clearly your customer service does what they want and doesn't listen to what the customer is requesting. And then she had the audacity to send a list of locations for in store pick up which I said I did not want. So now I have no package and am more annoyed by dealing with people who don't listen.

name: Ben Dover
title: ASOS = FALSE ADVERTISEMENT.
review: Asos display student discounts through external sites like unidays and vouchercodes, however its false advertisement as they state you can use the code with sale items then when you use the codes it doesnt work so i contacted the support team who basically just told me that it was a lie and didnt give me any student discount at all.

name: רותם גוזלן
title: I can't believe that you can't do…
review:
I can't believe that you can't do nothing about cancel a order! 
too bad for  me it was the worst shopping experience I have experienced.

name: marushka silva
title: This is the worst customer experience…
review: This is the worst customer experience ive had in my life. How this company remains in business is beyond me. I received a completely damaged product and they offered me NO alternatives. Basically, too bad that happened to you. I'll never buy from Asos again.

name: Giota Tsakou
title: Wrong Price-Praice The lord I had a Voucher Discount!!!!
review:
Terrible customer experience when it comes to their mistakes.

They had a wrong price on the site, i paid with the wrong price and the found a whole bunch of excuses in order to not refund me.

The product price was 30 GPS on the official merchant site and the initial price they had was 64 euros!

So, I bought the product for 31 euros with -wait for it-70% discount!

name: Samantha Smith
title: Horrible
review: Horrible! Talking to a brick wall. I cannot believe how ineffective and inefficient this process is.

name: Amanda Puppe
title: Lost package no explanation for what…
review: Lost package no explanation for what happened just an automated system responding. Never had this issue before until now. Horrible and stressful experience!!!

name: Shana Green
title: They don't issue refunds for lost…
review:
They don't issue refunds for lost packages.

Me: I'd like another package to be delivered since they lost it and I was expecting delivery last week

ASOS: AS they have not declared this as lost yet we will need to allow a little more time for this to arrive with you. If this has not arrived with you by the end of the day on the 3rd December 2019 please do get back in touch confirming that we have the correct delivery address for you.

Me: I am expecting to wear these items for an event this week. This is not my fault that they lost the package and they have not provided any updates. You all have my money so either I need a refund or I need another delivery sent asap

ASOS: AS explained this has not been declared lost at this time. Please do allow until the 3rd for this to arrive with you
If this has not arrived with you by then please do get back in touch and we will get that looked into for you 

Me: This is poor customer service as you all have already taken my money and I haven't received a package. Please issue me a refund now

ASOS: This is not something that I can do. As there is a delay with the carrier we will need to allow a little more time for them to get this to you

Me: let me speak to your supervisor

ASOS: Our mangers are not customer facing here at ASOS . We are all trained in the same way to the same high standard. This means that no matter who you speak to and what level they are on all the information you are given will be the same

Me: this is incredibly poor customer service. how do i get in touch with a manager

ASOS: We do try very hard to get all parcels to you on time Shana. However there can sometimes be delays with the carriers that are beyond our control. Rest assured the will get this to you as soon as they can

name: Amanda Harding
title: Appalling service by three representatives.
review:
Appalling service by three representatives Redmond, Olivia and another. I was advised from my Hermes tracker that there was a problem with my delivery when I phoned Hermes I was advised that ASOS had cancelled my order. Therefore, contacted Redmond and Olivia who both fobbed me off saying that their Hermes Tracker system was advising them that my package would be delivered by 27th Nov!! I even asked both of them to contact Hermes on my behalf to find out what was going on and was advised that they couldn't do it. I once again contacted Hermes and was told that ASOS had requested that the parcel be destroyed. I immediately got in contact again by live chat (you can't speak to anyone by phone!!) and said that I wanted to know their complaints procedure. This time my 4th contact with ASOS I was met by Werner who looked into this properly and told me that yes my package had been destroyed, at last someone believed me!! They immediately apologised and said that they would get my order redelivered, great. Well done Werner.  Werner would get a 5 star service but because this is for ASOS is a whole my rating is 1. I will not be ordering anything through ASOS again and I would advise others to think very carefully as to whether you want the same hassle as me. I think I was very lucky to find Werner to finally resolve my complaint I don't expect others would be so lucky.
So update.. Only part of my order could be reorder as one of the jackets is now out of stock!! Live chat another amazing representative called Jordan who was incredibly pro-active and helpful in resolving my queries. ASOS if only all your staff could be amazing as Werner and Jordan you would be getting a five star service just a shame about my original contact with Redmond and Olivia.

name: Rachel Teegarden
title: Disappointing Customer Care Experience
review:
First of all, I'd like to say that I was really hopeful because I've had pretty good experiences with ASOS customer service in the past, but today was not the case. 
A week and a half ago, I ordered a pair of shoes through ASOS and finally got them today (I recently moved and accidentally had them shipped to the wrong address so I had to wait and pay extra shipping to have them forwarded). When I opened the shoe box, I was a little surprised because the shoes looked too big. When I ordered, I remember seeing something that led me to believe they were already in women's sizes, so I ordered my normal size. But they were men's size, which means the shoes I just got are about 1-2 sizes too big. 
I contacted their customer care in hopes that they would be able to honor the price I previously paid for the shoes. I bought the shoes mostly because I noticed they were on a good sale, and since I bought them, they went up $8 (which after paying $8 unexpectedly to have them forwarded to my current address wasn't something I wanted to do). 
The customer care rep said that because the item I ordered was in men's sizes, they couldn't honor the price. (Earlier, I had gone into my order to see what I looked at that said it was women's size, and the product page isn't even available anymore  - there may be a way to view it on their end, but I couldn't even look to make sure it was in fact my fault). I was told that nobody had the ability to change the price and they didn't have any discount code they could give me. 
So I can either keep the shoes that don't fit me, not have the shoes I want, or pay more money for a new pair. 
Honestly really disappointed in their customer care and the way the situation was handled.

name: Pavan K
title: I had a very bad experience with my…
review:
I had a very bad experience with my recent purchase, Order No.: 452812100

What I placed in my order was a different shoe that what was delivered. It would have been nice if I was notified immediately if an item is not available instead of sending some random item which I did not like.

Now I have to travel out of the country and I don't have time to return the item and cant use it because of the wrong item being shipped.

What I ordered:

Original Penguin Steadman Retro Sneaker in White

What was shipped: 

Original Penguin Retro Sneaker in White

name: Charlotte Crotty
title: Literally the worst customer service ever
review:
Literally the worst customer service I’ve ever experienced. 

I bought an order that equated to almost £200 for a prestigious event. The items arrived. Despite using their ‘fitting assistant’ the trousers wouldn’t even go round a child’s leg, and the jacket which was £100 on its own had loose thread every where and bits missing. 

I filled out the form for an exchange and posted it first thing the next morning. 
I contacted customer service to enquire how long it would be till I got my replacement order and they said it would take up to SEVEN WORKING DAYS to even receive my order let alone to when I’d get a replacement of my order. 

I informed them that this was pretty urgent and I needed a replacement and I’d already sent the item back for exchange. They told me I should have sent back for a refund and that if I needed it urgently then I would have to REPEAT my order to the tune of another £200!!! By this point I’d be almost £400 down, with potentially two suits on their way back, and all before Xmas. 

The worst bit was they ended this whole condescending exchange with a smiling emoji after suggesting I should fork out more money. 

Absolutely awful service.

name: GBD
title: Very poor customer service.
review: Very poor customer service.

name: Aya Sofya Bath & Beauty
title: If I can give ASOS 0 stars I would!
review: If I can give ASOS 0 stars I would. The customer care center is terrible and doesn’t provide any realistic solutions. The script that they are made to follow doesn’t even make sense for my issue. I want my money back...I didn’t get my item and waiting until the 28th is unexceptable why did I pay for two day shipping to get it on two weeks later. I will never shop from ASOS again

name: ellis jones
title: Palesa was unhelpful and ended the chat…
review: Palesa was unhelpful and ended the chat before the issue was resolved. I was on the chat for 45 minutes trying to get answers before she decided to end the chat without saying anything about it

name: Manjit Lockhart
title: Awful service after a chat with…
review: Awful service after a chat with "danny"! Asks falsely advertising next day delivery yet not abiding by their promise. I premier service that i pay for and after my efforts of trying to resolve this issue, not even a discount or refund of my premier service for the delay to my package! Completely unacceptable!

name: Zk
title: Ridiculous return policy
review: Great website, lots of variety however I don’t see the logic in how if my order was sent incorrectly, why I have to pay to order it again. I then wait for a refund on the previous item and email back to get my shipping fees and discount refunded? Absolute joke of a system. If my l order was sent wrong it should be fixed without me having to pay again.

name: Hasmik Chalabyan
title: My problem is not solved
review: My problem is not solved. I didn't get my package and you tell me that I should wait 24 days. I cannot get a refund or compensation for now. I cannot track my package. Poor service ASOS.

name: Tzach Mordechai
title: I am a fashion buyer for this matter
review: I am a fashion buyer for this matter, not a lawyer

name: Essie Harris-Wade
title: Poor customer service
review: Returned my order but was not refunded for one of the items. Contacted customer service twice now saying must be referred to a special team. PLUS the item was incorrect to start.

name: U M
title: Terrible resolution service
review: Terrible resolution service. Was sent the wrong item with next day delivery. I was on a timeline and needed the outfit for a trip overseas. I explained this situation to ASOS and they told me to return the item and that I would be reimbursed in 7 working days. They made no mention of sending the item again, or offering to sent it again. I instead had to fork out more money for another next day delivery. ASOS did not bother to promptly reply to my requests for alleviating the payments.

name: Vi Olet
title: Asos billed me 4 times for order then cancelled my order
review: Asos were having technical issues that saw me being billed 4 times for an order - it would take 48 to sort and my original order was cancelled and they REFUSED to give me a gesture of good will discount 👎

name: Aleks
title: My order arrived with one of the items…
review: My order arrived with one of the items broken. The refund for that was issued, but one of the other items was not the right size.
