I asked to return it and purchase another size at the same price as I purchased the previous item and the rep who I spoke with said they were unable to do that. Terrible customer service, it is industry standard to be able to do that. Ive used Asos for years and they have always been able to do these exchanges. Its a shame but I unfortunately will not be shopping here again.

name: Wildskindesigns
title: ASOS have issued me with a voucher…
review: ASOS have issued me with a voucher worth £287 because I posted a parcel back on Monday instead of the Friday. I have spoken to two customer service agents and they are refusing to give me my money back. I was also told I can't speak to their manager because they are not customer facing (very unprofessional) This is a large amount of money and the parcel was posted back only a day late. It's disgusting that they won't make any exception for such a large amount of money and short period of time. The customer services just seem to fob you off, and they couldn't even tell me their complaints procedure, or give me a phone number so i could speak to someone. I feel completely fobbed off by them.

name: Melita Dedden
title: If I could give a ratinf of zero - I would!
review:
If I could give a rating of zero - I would. 
I have been an active customer with ASOS for 10 plus years and spent thousands of dollars on their website, but I am absolutely appalled by their robotic approach to customer service. 
Pick up your game ASOS

name: Agnieszka Zukrowska
title: Coat arrived with 4 broken clasps and…
review: Coat arrived with 4 broken clasps and no label.  I was told that in order to be partially refunded i needed a quote  from  the  repairer.  Its a joke. The label was missing too which meant that the coat was already returned before.  Its now  out of stock so even replacement is out of question. Delivery was 1 day late too.  I am disappointed, frustrated and not happy.  However the advisor during the  live chat was absolutely brilliant and  trying their best to help.  Lovely customer service.  Thank you

name: Luiza
title: Bad customer service & Delivery
review: I have ordered an item from ASOS since the 16th November 2019. And I have not had an update or my item delivered since. I have spoken to the member of staff several times on which has given me the incorrect information and almost called me a liar when I called them , luckily I had everything written on an email confirming that they have advised me the postal method company has been in touch with them and they were investigating things further and they have denied this via phone. I haven’t  received my parcel still and Asos did not give me a solution as a customer or offered a refund  which I did not know what to do,I will look for my customer rights and legally obtain this as I have been taken away my money without a parcel, information or any solution for my issue.

name: Le Anh Dang
title: I opted for free shipping and for the…
review:
I opted for free shipping and for the past 2 weeks, the Trakpak website just shows departed ASOS so I got worried. I emailed Trakpak but didn't get any reply. I contacted ASOS instead via online chat to ask about my order. Turns out tracking isn't available and the ASOS representative told me that the package has reached my country. Overall I'm not happy with ASOS customer service but I wished they would have told me that tracking isn't available beforehand.

Edit: Changed my review. It's after the promise delivery date and no package. Customer support asked to wait further. This is incredibly frustrating and unpleasant to deal with. Wished I didnt waste money on this website. Why give tracking number if it can't be tracked???

name: Or Litani
title: Really bad expirience
review: Really bad expirience. Asos never helped me with issues. Never take responsebilities for problems. Really dissapointing!!!

name: Nic
title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE.
review: Sent me the wrong colour shoes and the wrong size. Took weeks to sort out the issue & when I finally thought the problem was resolved following a email I received saying my exchange will soon be on the way. I get emailed saying I’ll refunded WEEKS after I have been waiting on my item. To add to that, nothing complimentary to make up for such bad service. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE.

name: Yirong Elizabeth Shen
title: Very rude customer service, useless
review: Very rude customer service. Not help to solve the delivery problems. The customer service person feels like a robot

name: Esther Gavin
title: The first couple of experience with ASO…
review:
The first couple of experience with ASOS was amazing. However 
I recently made a purchase, what happened was, the package was delivered but not to my address. I contacted customer service chat and it was the worse. It took me 40 minutes to talk with one of the robot machines because I don't think there is a real human behind and another down bummer is there is not a physical phone to talk with a real person in a real-time. My problem hasn't been solved and I will wait until Monday to see if any changes have been made. Unfortunately, I will never do any other purchases on ASOS. I love their clothes but have very poor customer service. It is a hassle.

name: Melanie Eynon
title: Unhelpful really answered chat it had…
review: Unhelpful really answered chat it had taken over a week and didn’t resolve issue, if another service like asos starts up I’d move my custom and it’s only a matter of time before this happens.

name: Gem Ginx
title: customer service agent at ASOS was…
review:
customer service agent at ASOS was terrible. His name was Oliver. He did not help me at all and totally dismissed my questions. He should be fired.

The chat reference number is 23645514.

name: Eranda Boci
title: I'm waiting one hour in the chat trying…
review: I'm waiting one hour in the chat trying to solve one problem i have and Jordon ,and Dan they didn't help me ,they let me to wait and in the end they didn't help me.

name: Quyen Hoang
title: I've never experienced customer service…
review: I've never experienced customer service worse than ASOS. It has been 2 and a half weeks since I placed my order and still haven't had a resolution (or anything delivered to me). I have had to contact customer service on numerous occasions. The last chat was over half an hour long where the CS agent took about 15 mins to read over the notes of my previous chats (they weren't long chats as ASOS are never able to resolve anything or provide any additional information) and then took about 5 minutes before answering any of my questions (and no questions were answered satisfactorily). I do hope this person was training as that's not an acceptable response time. I honestly don't see the point of their live chat function when they are never able to solve anything themselves. Fingers crossed that I get some sort of solution from them soon...

name: Luke Sait
title: I spoke to Laura and she didn't even…
review: I spoke to Laura and she didn't even apologise for the 35 minute delay - that is basic customer service. The issue was on ASOS' behalf but I still didn't receive an apology for that and when I asked for some form of compensation, I got told that nothing could be done apart from to wait for my refund to come through. I have been a loyal and regular ASOS Premier customer and am very disappointed with Laura and her very poor and basic knowledge of customer service.

name: Shawn Master
title: Ordered a pair of shoes in 10.5 US
review:
Ordered a pair of shoes in 10.5 US, but they came in 10. Went on live chat with customer service, and they said I can send back the sneakers for refund and then re-order. When I told them that I can't do that because the size I ordered (10.5 US) is sold out now, they said all they can do is give me a refund and then I can wait to see if the size comes back online.

Didn't offer me anything for my hassle (gift card, promo code, etc.) and didn't seem apologetic at all. Very disappointed.

name: Steph Turnbull
title: DO NOT USE
review: Absolutely horrendous customer service payment taken for my order twice and told i would have to wait 10 working days for my money back will never use asos again

name: Zainab
title: Order said it had been delivered by…
review: Order said it had been delivered by yodel however nothing has been delivered to address. Spoke to Elise on online chat and she says there is nothing she can do and will take 48hrs to receive update from yodel. Strongly advise asos to find a different delivery partner as this seems to be a constant struggle when ordering with someone whose courier service is yodel.

name: Usman Majid
title: Poor delivery service
review: I ordered some Jean's like a month ago. Still haven't received them? And I get told everyday that I will receive them the next day after complaining but never happens. Poor service don't even offer you anything like a good will gesture.

name: Danielle Sweeney
title: Disgusting all round
review: My order arrived 3 days after the estimates arrival date to find the box had been left in the rain outside Hermes depot all weekend as advised by the driver, the parcel has electrical goods and presents in, who wants to gift someone electrical goods or clothing that has been left in the rain all weekend? The box was so damaged it has opened, when I contacted ASOS they have told me I have to arrange for the items to be returned I’m not sure how as the box is so damaged I don’t know how I would get it back to them, I advised I would like my items to be re-ordered and delivered to me next day, my request was ignored, I asked for a free next day delivery code, my request was ignored, I asked to speak with a manager, my request was ignored, I asked how I am supposed to send my items back if the box is fault again i was ignored, I asked if they are going to take responsibility if the electrical items are fault and hurt someone my question was ignored. From the parcel being late, to the state the parcel arrived in to the customer service I have received from ASOS I will never use them again. I work full time, which is why I have ordered Xmas presents online I trusted Asos as a well known brand however the service I have received has been appalling, having worked in retail myself and also now working in customer service at a bank I cannot believe you think it is acceptable for this kind of service to be given to your customers. If you check my order history you will see that I have ordered from you many times, never again. I now have to find time during my 12 hour working day, 6 days a week to return the items even though it was not my fault they arrived this way. I will be taking my business elsewhere and I will be taking this further

name: Sarah Ford
title: If I could score less than 1* I would...
review:
Placed an order on Saturday to the value of £265, order accepted and provided with a delivery date of Wednesday. 

By 5pm on Wednesday afternoon, no sign of the order. Contacted customer service on the first occasion to be told by ‘Francesca’ that she could ASSURE me that my order would be delivered by the end of the day despite me not receiving an order update or tracking number. When I questioned the points made by ‘Francesca’ she cut off the chat. 

As predicted, since I hadn’t heard from the local courier, the order did not arrive. 

Contacted Customer Service online again on Thursday AM, to be informed that they could not provide a further update, no information was available. When I asked to speak to a Manager, ‘Rosie’ informed me that I could not speak to a manager or a more senior member of staff to escalate my concerns as they ‘don’t have managers’. Also informed that I could not obtain a refund, despite the company not fulfilling the order on time. 

Not satisfied with this response I contacted Customer Service again, to be informed by ‘Daniella’ that the issue had been passed to a ‘Specialist’ team to look into and that I should receive a response within 24 hours, so I expected when I did receive an email from the ‘Specialist’ team it was just an email to say they were looking into my order. 

All of this contact is made via chat or email, making it difficult to express concerns properly, which left me feeling really quite exasperated, as it is becoming more apparent that no communication about my order is not a concern for the company, as they have the money. It also appears that customers are just treated as a number.  

Contacted Customer Service on Friday for a further update, hopeful that the ‘Specialist’ team may have done something since the 1am email I received saying it was being looked into. 

Was put on a chat with ‘Edward’ who appeared to take great delight in informing me that there was no further update and I should just wait to hear. I asked again about escalating the issue and whether he could try and chase the ‘Specialist’ team and he said that wasn’t possible. They would be dealing with other queries and that he couldn’t give me a timescale as to when I could expect to have an update. 

It’s become really apparent that customer service is not a priority for ASOS as a whole. The advisors are not willing to help and seem so blase, avoiding answering questions and continually fobbing you off with a clearly generic response. Being spoken to in a more considerate manner would go someway to help even if it is to simply placate you until the issue is resolved. At no point have I received an apology and the way in which I have been spoken to is abysmal.

I appreciate that there can be delays with deliveries and would be more accepting of this if I had some information to go on but it doesn’t fill me with much confidence that I am still awaiting contact and delivery and the status of my order.

name: Si Bkken
title: Didn’t solve my issues
review: Didn’t solve my issues.  Been a loyal customer for over 10 years. Won’t shop here again.  Thanks

name: Jc12
title: awful customer service
review: problems with student discount for the past 2 years. ASOS are slow to reply and because you can never speak to the same person twice, they repeat themselves each time meaning your problem doesn’t get resolved. No online chat either. When calling customer services they have given me false information and didn’t want to help, just told me to email them, again being fobbed off each time, it’s a joke.

name: Alana
title: Order Issue
review:
Order Issue

I never received an order that we placed over a month ago and had to wait an exorbitant amount of time to be told that nothing could be done. Proper customer service would have offered to expedite ship the missing order at the company's expense due to the inconvenience caused to the customer but that was not even offered. Very poor customer service. Will not be shopping here again.

name: Caroline Carnoy
title: Asos please change your delivery service
review:
Don't get me wrong, asos is awesome BUT the delivery service they're using, GNEWT, is a the big problem. 

they're really terrible at keeping the customer updated, never give a tracking number and are almost always late in delivering.

I'm a super loyal customer but i'm slowly considering saying goodbye to them only because i'm done paying for a delivery service that's crap.

name: Tony
title: Had an issue with my premium delivery
review: Had an issue with my premium delivery, looking to get it sorted pretty sharply as we know clothes only stay in bag for an hour. Was on chat for 50mins and issue was not solved and was passed to customer service team and will get back to me in possibly over 24hrs.

name: Tahmid
title: Absolutely terrible
review: Absolutely terrible, had to wait forever for a reply and when i finally did, the customer service agent (Emma) was not helpful in any way, she wouldnt answer a question that id asked her 3 times, instead she kept telling me something that was written on their website. It seems to me that this live chat is pointless because the agents provide no solutions.

name: Grace Yeung
title: complain on CS and delivery service
review:
complain on CS and delivery service 

that is a terrible experience ii have. she is not responsible, while ASOS promise to give delivery in 7 days, now they ask me wait for 2 weeks. and not able to help any. how come a cs keep answering i cannot help in the conversation? so who can help me?

name: Mo Ismail
title: Unreliable and frankly, cr*p customer service.
review:
I usually find ASOS reliable but recently they’ve failed to deliver two orders on time. I even purchased premier delivery thinking it will arrive the next day as promised, and I was let down, again. 

Customer services was awfully textbook and robotic, showing no real understanding of what was going on. Extremely annoyed with this and lost £10 for the express delivery I didn’t even receive.

name: Ben Western
title: Couldn't tell me anything I needed to…
review: Couldn't tell me anything I needed to know. Had an email saying parcel had been dispatched but they couldn't confirm and kept telling me to come back the next day.

name: L3 F27
title: Extremely poor customer service
review: Extremely poor customer service

name: Jon
title: None existent
review: None existent, shocking customer service. Only solution they offer to problems is to wait 24 or 48 hours. Absolutely no help from people on live chat, almost like speaking to robots as they say the exact same things as each other. No compensation offered for any issues that is clearly the company's fault. Worst customer service care from any clothing company.

name: jack brooks
title: Premier delivery is a premier waste of time
review: I purchased premier delivery with my first ASOS order, which in theory should give your free next day delivery for a year. Premier delivery wasn’t added to my account so I contacted ASOS to resolve this. After sending emails back and forth for over a week I was sent on to a “specialist team” to deal with the issue who sent me an email the day after saying I’d been added to the premier delivery spreadsheet and would have it on my account within a few days. I then got an email saying premier delivery was added to my account and I was good to go. I have just tried to order and yet again premier delivery isn’t on my account. After searching google I finally found the customer service number, which they hide quite well, and was told to restart the emailing proof of purchase for premier delivery and then I would be sent over to the “specialist team” to be added to the spreadsheet again. For a company of this size and for the amount of people who buy premier delivery this shouldn’t be an issue and everyone I’ve spoken to doesn’t seem to care in the slightest and just wants me to email proof of purchase and start the same 2 week process I’ve already been through. It’s safe to say their “premier delivery” is an absolute premier waste of time.

name: Chez Foster
title: Terrible service from beginning to end
review: Terrible service from beginning to end. Had a real struggle trying to get a refund once ASOS had packaged my parcel inadequately causing it to ‘burst open’ on the way to depot. Only after I chased for a number of days 4 days after my parcel was meant to be delivered did I learn this. I have also been told that I have to wait for all my items from the burst package to trickle back to ASOS so I can receiving my refund potentially taking up to a month. Customer service very dismissive, unhelpful and not willing to resolve. This was a large order, they keep telling me to reorder which is NOT going to happen.

name: PG
title: Always an obstacle
review: Always an obstacle, never a solution. Customer service has always been bad and it just keeps getting worse.

name: Debbie
title: Waited almost an hour to chat with…
review: Waited almost an hour to chat with someone and unable to log into the website at all. Returned an item 10 business days ago but was told I would have to wait until tomorrow and then contact them since today is the 10th business day. UGH

name: M
title: Appalling
review: Appalling - closed chat abruptly when i mentioned that you can't offer a service that does not work .  It is not in accord with current consumer law!

name: Ryan
title: Poor service from ASOS
review: Ordered an item (14th) which was scheduled for next day delivery (15th) as I pay for the Premier Delivery Service, did not arrive! Contacted ASOS via live chat (18th) and was advised that late delivery can happen and that they can’t do anything until another 4 working days have passed and for me to look out for up to date courier messages in the meantime, this is their “process which needs to be followed” The said amount of days passed, still no order delivered. I contacted ASOS (22nd) through email and received a generic email informing me they will be getting their Customer Care Team to contact me, I’ve heard nothing so replied to the initial email (25th) as this is what is recommended by them. Still no response, still waiting, still no order received!

name: S Williams
title: Terrible customer service
review: Terrible customer service.  Rude, dismissive... even though a problem that I had was ENTIRELY their fault. No wonder they aren't as profitable as they'd like to be.  I will never use ASOS again.

name: Joan Quimpo
title: I still havent gotten my order!
review:
I still havent gotten my order. I expect this to be escalated. I need this for an event. Im so disappointed!

Order 448436707

name: Kennedy Boyle
title: Increasing decline in delivery time and customer services
review: I order from asos basically on a monthly basis, there range of clothing, accessories, makeup etc gets bigger and better every month. However, their delivery and customer service gets worse every month. The past several months I have had constant issues with deliveries arriving late, not just a day or two late but weeks late. I’ve had parcels come damaged and after being told I’ve got a replacement sent I’ve had to chase it up a week later because I’ve received no replacement. My most recent issue with asos is their ridiculous policy on items returned to them by their carriers. So this month November 2019 I made a large order with asos (which I tend to do monthly) after waiting for the delivery which was going to take over a week to get here I waited patiently. However, when tracking my parcel on the Hermes website to see when my parcel arrived it had “parcel returned to sender” it did not explain why, I revived no email or text to inform me on this. After getting in touch with asos I finally found out that my parcel was returned because it was damaged. But asos explained that they couldn’t resend my parcel straight away and I’d have to wait up to 10 days for my refund and then process the order again for ‘security reasons’. I find this beyond a joke and now a week later, still no refund and half of what I originally ordered is now SOLD OUT.

name: David Hetherington
title: Incompetent
review:
I applied to get my Student discount code in 2017, and even though I went through the entire process it never worked in the end. I decided in 2019 that I would try again as there was a 25% discount on the website. I contacted the customer support team to highlight that I did not have my code, and that the code originally given didn't actually work. 

The team took a considerable amount of time to reply (which I suppose is reasonable giving the time of year) and every time it was a different person, and each time they asked for a new piece of information; instead of asking for all the relevant documents at once. It currently been a week and I have still not resolved the issue. We continue to go around in roundabouts despite the fact they has all the relevant information required.

name: Amanda Carruthers
title: Bad customer service & not willing to fix their mistake!!
review: I ordered & paid for my products, however was sent the wrong product which was lesser value than the product I paid for. When contacting customer service I was advised I would have to send back the product sent to me in error pay for it out of my pocket & reorder the actual product I ordered in the first place. The product I did not receive was more expensive that the product I received however I was still told I’d have to reorder(& pay again) & until I sent back the incorrect product THEY sent I would be out of pocket! Not happy at all!! I tried to speak to someone in customer service but was not offered any apology! Really crap customer service & will be returning all items & wont be ordering from this store again!!!

name: drop psy
title: Iv'e sent the transcript ro your…
review:
Iv'e sent the transcript ro your costumer service care, the representative was rude and told me this and after few seconds closed the  chat without waiting for me to respond:
[08:00:50] However, I’ve given all the information I can for today and what the next steps are. If there no other questions about this query, I’ll go ahead and close the chat for you.
[08:00:56] ASOS have ended the chat

so rude and disrespectful

name: Kaela Wyche
title: I have been dealing with this issue for…
review: I have been dealing with this issue for the past 4 weeks. I am a loyal ASOS customer & this entire situation was uncalled-for. You all need a better way of tracking your items sent out to customers and a better way to keep track of pre-paid return labels.

name: Steve
title: Missing items, but replaced through live chat
review:
EDIT:

I placed an order for 2 shoes, 2 shirts, and 1 jacket. I only received 2 shoes and everything else was missing. Turns out whoever shipped my stuff out did not seal the bag because the plastic covering the adhesive was still there. I was promised a replacement for my missing items, and it took 48 hours to get a reply, by then they tell me the items went out of stock in my size but were able to ship 1 shirt that went missing. I check if the other 2 items were out of stock and they weren't. Turns out they don't want to replace those 2 other missing items because they weren't on sale anymore so instead they ship out the only item that was still on sale. Rediculous.

name: Anonymous
title: Poor customer service, delayed delivery
review: Poor customer service, order is due to come 4 days past that date I was told when placing the order, ASOS are no help each day it hasn’t come they tell me to message the next day, and this hasn’t helped me at all. This was the case for 2 orders I placed.

name: Sam
title: Absolute rubbish
review: Absolute rubbish. I’ve been ordering with asos for years now.... and when they mess up with orders.. (which happened to me twice in a row ) They react by deeming my activity suspicious and block my account! They sent me a mini skirt in my prev order for goodness sake, size 8! And I’m a size 12/14! I was asked to contact my payment provider for further correspondence!

name: taishan Jones
title: This company send me the wrong item and…
review:
This company send me the wrong item and didn't often any kind of help with it. all the agent keep saying was send the item back and then reorder the item if my size is still available and then I will receive a refund.

Sad just sad

name: Georgie
title: Disappointing
review: I have never had an issue with ASOS deliveries, however a recent one, I purchased some shoes which are usually very expensive during one of their 30% off sale periods. I paid for express shipping, and after a week I still had not received my parcel and the tracking had stopped, so I contacted customer service through the live chat. I had to talk to two separate people, and both tried to tell me that it had been delivered already, while I continually insisted it was not even possible. where I live, deliveries do not take place on Sunday's - which is when they were insisting it was delivered - at 5 in the morning even though the tracking stopped in the major city in my state, and never reached me.The incompetence of the customer service team was made evident even more, when after eventually being referred to a specialist team to investigate the issue, they emailed me informing me that they had refunded the amount of my order. Apart from the shipping. This meant I had to take more time to email them a very lengthy email about how ASOS had failed to deliver my order, and how I was unsure how them failing to do this meant I should still be paying a ridiculous amount of money for delivery. After this hassle, of course it would be reasonable to expect to be offered a coupon code etc to purchase the items at the same price as during the sale, but this is ASOS we're talking about, who have the most patronising and frustrating customer service I have ever encountered. I cannot stress enough how frustrating it is to order something for a specific date and not receive it not once, but twice. My recent order was for a wedding, where I had once again, attempted to order the shoes for this event, and received it three days too late.Can not recommend enough to not order anything late notice relying on what their delivery times are.

name: Laura Fabeiro Vilas
title: My order was supposed to arrive on the…
review:
My order was supposed to arrive on the 10th of November. I have been waiting for it and trying to track my delivery, however, no information has been provided. Today I have contacted Customer Services. They have just requested to replace my order and told me to wait 24hours for a confirmation email. (no more information/options to compensate any inconveniences that his has might caused)
I am disappointed as nobody has contacted me to inform me about any issues with my order. Also, Customer service has not given me any options to write a formal complaint/other actions I could take. I actually found them really rude as they kept saying 'as advised' over and over again like I was making questions that they had already replied before. Then they have closed the chat... 
What a shame that I cannot attach a screenshot of the conversation...Very disappointing!

name: Vee Jay
title: Awful
review: The worst delivery record of any online retailer. You have to fight with them to get an explanation about missing deliveries. They are so ineffective at sorting delivery issues because they basically accept no responsibility. If a courier misplaces your item then you are out of pocket, with no explanation until it finds it way back to them, which could take weeks. All ASOS can say is “it’s not our fault.” They have lied to me, ignored me... just the worst customer service for such a big company.

name: Daria Z
title: Terrible customer service
review: I have never had such a horrible customer experience. I ordered 7 items, only 1 was delivered. I requested the missing items replacement, which was confirmed to me, only to find out the next day that my entire order was cancelled because items were out of stock. The funny part is that all the items were in stock, not even low on stock. I was not reimbursed for what I paid in duties and taxes on all 7 items (6 of which weren't delivered) and extra fees for express shipping. I cannot reorder the items because I ordered  them during 25% sale, which is no longer valid. How hard would it be to just resend the missing items?

name: NDS
title: POOR SERVICE!
review: I  purchased an item from ASOS as a gift and it arrived in very badly damaged packaging - while I appreciate it is only packaging, the fact I am gifting the item makes this an issue. I immediately sought help from ASOS via their live chat and was connected to an adviser called Sadia. She did not offer much of a resolution, only ways that meant I was liable for all of the leg work which would inconvenience me further. I was extremely disappointed with their poor customer service and lack of apology, more so as I shop VERY regularly with ASOS. Ridiculous!

name: Jake
title: Worst shop iv ever used
review:
Worst shop iv ever used. 
Ban you if you return too many things. How are you meant to know how things fit unless you try them on. 
Staff get treat really bad too

name: Geva Ben Avraham
title: i wanted to ask another question but…
review: i wanted to ask another question but the chat closed withut saying anything

name: L
title: Terrible customer service!
review: Terrible customer service!

name: Noa
title: ASOS should be ashamed of their customer service - Bad solution, rude support rep.
review:
The customer support was rude - she did not allow me to finish what I had to ask and just closed the chat on me. On top of that the solution for diverting a delivery is absolutely ridiculous for a company that considers itself as a world class online e-commerce. Delivery and controlling delivery is a basic need for the user. And security reason is not a good enough reason to not divert a package - if Amazon can do it, so can you. 
I am absolutely shocked that my delivery which will be accidentally delivered to wrong address can not be refunded (because of a human error!!!) or at least reshipped to my correct address. And this error happened because of you saving my old address on my profile and not informing me that the billing address is not the delivery address. Very disappointed from my experience and will not use ASOS agai.

name: Sarah Hasty
title: I received the wrong shirt twice in a…
review:
I received the wrong shirt twice in a row. A waste of my time and my money as I’M the one having to pay out pocket EVERYTIME ASOS messes up my order! I am not allowed a refund to buy a new shirt until I send back their mistake. I should get the refund then and there!! 

And the customer service representative are not helpful or sympathetic.

name: zoe
title: Horrendous
review:
Horrendous - unsympitetic - basically called me a liar and wouldnt allow me to speak to a manager 

will not order with them again!

name: Charles
title: AVOID THIS COMPANY, RUDE, USELESS CUSTOMER SERVICE, NO ITEM DISPATCHED, WOULDN'T REFUND
review:
*WHEN CONTACTING CUSTOMER SERVICE OVER THE LIVE CHAT FUNCTION, BEFORE YOU CLOSE THE CHAT BOX, CLICK THE LETTER ICON AT THE TOP RIGHT TO SEND THE CHAT TRANSCRIPT TO YOURSELF, AS IT IS NOT AUTOMATIC, YOU MAY NEED IT AS I DID!*

Item didn't show on the delivery date, had to talk to 3 people (first one took 24 minutes to get to!) on ASOS customer service before I got a straight answer, the first 2 just told me to wait til midnight (they don't seem to realize that some people have to get up early!) to see if it arrived, which I did and as I guessed, no package. Last guy was pretty helpful, reckoned the parcel could have been lost on the way to the delivery depot so he issued a replacement with their fastest delivery but it still may not arrive on time for what I needed it for! Also said it was subject to stock availability, and I have noticed that one of the items on the order is out of stock, so I guess I'm not getting that part of the order! I will NOT be ordering from ASOS again after this, absolute joke.

EDIT: Contacted again after no email was received, they now said I was in a queue to get my problem solved. I was not happy, I spent quite a bit on my order and they just cast you aside like that? I asked for a refund as they had not delivered on their promise of a replacement and they then said I would be in a queue for that which could take days (I was fuming at this point). I then said that if my refund was not done within the hour, I would be contacting PayPal, to which they said "You're welcome to do that" followed by calling me the wrong name! After this useless customer service representative, I contacted PayPal and provided the transcripts of the SIX people I talked to (who all failed to solve the problem), they said this was out of order and I was refunded within the hour. I will NEVER shop at ASOS for as long as I live.

name: zaria brooks
title: Received shoes in the wrong size
review: Received shoes in the wrong size. And the item was sold out so I didn’t have the option to exchange them.

name: Rob Yates
title: Horrible
review: Horrible. I have over $100 in vouchers they expired less than 1 month ago they say they can't be reissued or refunded! Please help. I feel robbed

name: טליה אמסלם
title: Disappointment - a package that didn't go unanswered
review:
Worst and most disappointing service.
I was told that the package arrived about two months ago. But I didn't get it.
I contacted customer service through Facebook and every day send me an automatic message to give between 24-48 hours to check.
Very, very disappointed in you.
Not interested in this invitation is no longer relevant.
Hope you treat me already because I will not sit still.

name: Max O
title: Awful Customer Service
review: Awful customer support experience. Delay premier delivery service activation for up to 24 hours and then don't allow you to alter or cancel a delivery after an hour has passed. Quite literally an intentional scam. Spoke to James who spoke to me with derogatory language and had no sympathy or level of understanding whatsoever. He proceeded to patronize me as my frustration continued to grow. Would not recommend this service to anyone and I would love to be reimbursed for my order. It would be greatly appreciated if my order could be cancelled. I do not feel morally okay wearing ASOS clothing.

name: Charlotte
title: Awful delivery services stated time of…
review: Awful delivery services stated time of delivery and never attempted delivery. Payed for next day then they delivered 3 days later to a neighbour!

name: Travis
title: I received very bad service from ASOS I…
review: I received very bad service from ASOS I paid for service (premier delivery - next day delivery) and I didn’t received my product. I spoke to a very unhelpful individual in your live chat (Lauren) who refuse to help me. As a consumer I paid for a service as a provider you’re obligated to honour that agreement which we entered. Your adviser was not helpful in seeing it from that prospective and she ended the chat while I was still typing. I want to know where is my product? I ordered Thursday is now Saturday and she’s telling me I will t get it until Tuesday. That’s not acceptable.

name: Kerry Garrod
title: Shocking customer service
review: Shocking customer service. Unable to accommodate the simplist of requests. All that's given is quoted policies..Completely unacceptable for a on-line solely based company.

name: D
title: Their cancellation policy for an order…
review: Their cancellation policy for an order says one thing on their website and something else on their emails. And when you speak to asos directly they are helpless. Useless to speak to them for help.

name: Kristina
title: Awful attitude
review: Awful attitude! I've ordered a dress for wedding of my best friend, unfortunately they've sent me the cheaper dress I didn't order. I've  asked for refund, sent back the dress and I I was waiting for 3 months with no reply, I wrote an email, they promised, that the refund has been sent, however... One more month and money are still not on my account...

name: Anon
title: Awful just awful
review: I can not describe how bad the asos customer service is, they are so unhelpful and do not solve the issue at all and seem to make it out like its always the customers fault. The last two times they have lost my order somehow and yet make out like it's my problem. It has really put me off shopping on asos in the future as I worry that I will not always recieve the item I ordered. After speaking to a few advisors Paige was the only one who was able to get this sorted promptly after speaking with the rude Kainaat who could not solve the matter.

name: Ben Jacob
title: The poorest service i ve ever had !!
review: The poorest service i ve ever had !!

name: James McCarthy
title: Your way of handing international…
review: Your way of handing international shipments is pretty miserable. A lot of the value prop of buying online is to be able to see things and try them. But the handling of shipments and your unwillingness to register for GST/VAT in overseas markets means that customers can't buy and try without having to go through customs clearance headaches themselves, and then can't get any taxes back on returns.

name: a
title: I was mailed an incorrect item
review: I was mailed an incorrect item, one I didn't order, instead of the correct item, one that I needed for a trip tomorrow. I won't be compensated or given a discount code even for this major inconvenience, and it isn't the first time ASOS has disappointed me like this. Will not be doing business with them again.

name: Melissa
title: The absolute worst experience ever
review: The absolute worst experience ever. I placed order for a pair shoes. I receive the shoes, the shoes were wore and poorly made. There was glue all around the shoe. After the many attempts to get in contact with a agent online. Kelly Ann was not empathic at all. Please Save yourself the trouble and do not order from ASOS!!!

name: Sukhchain
title: Horrible customer service rep
review: Horrible customer service rep. Wasted over an hour and never understood anything I was saying. Worst customer service you can possibly have. All the rep was doing copping and pasting stuff from website. Not once cared to address the concern. For the whole time the rep either continued to keep on making lies or in real world they have worst policies. Definitely filing consumer protection complaints.

name: Conor Schafer
title: The pants I ordered were way too small
review: The pants I ordered were way too small. They were listed as 30x32, but I measured the waist and its only 28 inches. I bought these for an interview in a couple say and I needed a quick replacement so I hopped on the live chat. Mohammed, the rep, simply read me the store policy for returns and did nothing else to help me and offered no assistance with getting a faster replacement. Looks like my first ASOS order will be my last.

name: Emilia Hill
title: Stay clear
review: Stay clear, twice in two days they will send you the same wrong jeans twice, they take hours to response over social media and no obvious way to chat to people when these circumstances arrived.

name: Megan
title: Darby was really not very helpful Ive…
review:
Darby was really not very helpful Ive been a premier delivery customer for a few years and spent hundreds with ASOS. I had my student code of 25% so I got some trousers which unfortunately don’t fit my birthday is next week and the new size I need is low in stock which has happened to me before by the time the exchange occurs the item is out of stock. I therefore was asking if there was any way they would be held over in my new size for when my original trousers are returned or if I could receive a one off promo code to make a new order for them however Darby said no and sent me a returns policy link which I don’t need as I know it well enough. 
Just dissappointing when I love ASOS and there is nothing personal the company can do in these cases.

name: Rizwan Syed
title: Absolutely disgraceful customer service…
review: Absolutely disgraceful customer service they replaced a £240 order with “incorrect” items worth no more than £15 and then said I wouldn’t receive a refund till I myself returned this £15 item but also the customer service assistant told me a lie about how she couldn’t have my items delivered at a certain time the next day.

name: Edward
title: Disgusting service.
review:
Hello,

I am mortified with the service I have received both on your live chat and customer service line. I spoke to two people who were unwilling to help and rude. If you refer to the phone call around 13:00 today made regarding my order you will understand my upset and frustration. 

The issues was I needed a parcel for tomorrow evening for an event however you have sent it on the late delivery to my office between 6pm-10pm. I stressed the urgency of getting my parcel and that my office is closed so I need this to be delivered earlier. 

The customer service rep didn’t listen to me at all, didn’t give me steps to resolve the issue, didn’t care that I would be shoeless for my event and had a disgusting attitude. This is the worst service I have ever received, as someone who orders weekly from ASOS I do not expect this level of service. 

The lady on the live chat just sent me automated messages and then closed the chat. This is the most disgusting service I have every received and I will never order from ASOS again. 

Now I’ve had to arrange to drive half an hour across the city to collect the parcel that I was told nearly was returned!!!!

I need an explanation for this.

name: Jess Clancy
title: I am so frustrated
review: I am so frustrated. I have spoken to 3 different customer care reps and no one can tell me where my dress is.  There has been no additional tracking information since it left ASOS. I bought the dress in October for a wedding in December, it was supposed to arrive November 19th, and now I'm told to wait until December 11th before I contact ASOS again.  If it even does arrive by then this will give me no time for alterations. I shouldn't have to wait almost a month after I am supposed to receive an item. I am not impressed with this customer care at all.

name: ANGELA ANG Ang
title: Horrible experience
review: Horrible experience. Your customer support is hopeless!

name: Lucinda Zhang
title: Did not solve the problem
review: Did not solve the problem

name: Liz
title: Worst customer service ever and your…
review: Worst customer service ever and your website lies about giving the student discount. Not worth the 30 minutes I spent trying to sort out the issue. Will not be making the purchase I had planned and will never use this site for any future purchases.

name: Justin Daly
title: Ordered a product which for some reason…
review: Ordered a product which for some reason was undeliverable.  When I contacted them, was told that they could not resend the order in would have to repurchase but that I would get a refund.  Fast forward almost two months and still have not gotten a refund and only get told that I will receive an email within 24 hours with details about my refund...guess what I'm still waiting on months later. An absolute scam!

name: anom cust
title: Poor response to bad delivery.
review: Ordered Wednesday and said would deliver for Friday. No communication when it didn't deliver. When I chased up, I was told that it would take another 10 days unexplained? Was originally supposed to take 2 days. When I asked for a refund, I was told that it was not possible. Ties up the money I would spend on replacement products in a different store for the event I am attending. If the items were way late in delivery, I should be able to get a refund. Disappointed customer.

name: Anne Ka12
title: Terrible service with Asos
review: Terrible service with Asos! They tell you they can’t deliver and that the order is being returned to Asos, then once I’ve ordered the same item from somewhere else, they tell me the order is out for delivery and that I need to  return it if I no longer want the item. No care for the inconvenience of not having my item on time or for having to go out of my way to return the item. Terrible customer service team.

name: Charlie Betsy
title: Customer advisor may as well have been…disappointed.
review: Customer advisor may as well have been a bot. The answers I got were very “cut and paste”. I know it’s Sunday and he’s probably hangin after last night but would have expected better from ASOS.

name: ASOS Customer
title: Beware of Ongoing Scam!
review: hi everyone, be aware of a scam that has been going on with ASOS. After talking with a few other people I found out that I am actually not the only one this happened to. Recently I placed an order for a few items during a promotion. (If you spent over 130 you get 30 off) I spent a total of around 155 so I was eligible for the coupon. When my items arrived one of the shirts was folded inside out, had a ripped tag and stains all over the front of it. I immediately filled out the return label and sent it back. When ASOS received my item they told me they would only refund me 70 cents back. yes 70 cents... They told me that since I sent a shirt back, my spending mark was now only 129 (not 130) and therefore no longer eligible for the 30 off discount. So long story short, ASOS tells customers they are eligible for coupon codes when they spend over a certain amount. Then they send out damaged items. When you send back the damaged item, they keep the item and then take your original coupon away. This is totally fraudelent. A really bad people situation for people who are college students like myself and dont have the extra money to spare. Hope this helps, avoid ASOS if you can!

name: Rachel
title: Didn’t help in the least
review: Didn’t help in the least.

name: Unknown
title: Not happy with the service I have received
review: Not happy with the service I have received. Paid for next day delivery and Hermes confirmed an expected time slot. Surprise surprise it didn’t arrive, nor did it arrive the following day! Hermes never deliver on time or they leave parcels on the doorstep which isn’t secure! We are now on the third day let’s hope it arrives. Will not use ASOS again purely due to the fact that they operate with Hermes and their service is poor!

name: Fleur Jeffries
title: Appalling lack of customer care
review: Appalling lack of customer care. I ordered for next day delivery and it never arrived— my package since 14th November has been in the same place according to Hermes tracker, who I’ve been unable to contact. I asked ASOS to cancel the order as one would presume they are able to contact their outsourced courier service, but to no avail. I’ve been told twice by incredibly unhelpful representatives (over Twitter and messenger, as I’ve been unable to get through to calling them) that my package will potentially arrive on 21st November (no reason/ explanation why it’s that date specifically). So I’m now expected to wait at home (I have a full time job) and hope that it turns up, only then to post it back to them in order to be fully refunded. A complete farce and appalling customer service. I’ve been a loyal customer for 10 years and I’ve never known the customer service to be this bad. Equally ASOS, when signing off messages regarding complaints, it reads as very condescending to end a message with “have a nice day” after being totally unhelpful (either that or stop using bots to answer delivery issues).

name: Kalia Sianiou
title: The staff might be polite and tried to…
review: The staff might be polite and tried to help but I think something is really wrong. I placed an order for delivery to Cyprus and returned one item with my own cost. Even though they received the returned package, the refund was never credited to my account. I contacted them to chase it up and It's been a month now, saying that the refund is on the way since 7/11/19. Something is really going bad!!!

name: Sam Houghton
title: Shocking customer service - next day delivery never arrived.
review: Shocking customer service. Spoke to numerous employees over chat and not a single person wanted to help, some coming across as extremely rude. Ordered for next day delivery and wouldn't even speak to me until after midnight on the day it was supposed to be delivered. Not a single employee spoken to was apologetic or wanted to help. Was asked to wait up to another 4 days for it to arrive. The whole point of paying for next day delivery is to pick what day your parcel arrived - it is not a soft suggestion.

name: Sj
title: Useless
review: Orders not been delivered for over a week and I’ve been told I just have to ‘wait and see’ before I then get in contact with them to ask for a refund again. So many contact methods but chat is never available and no one replies on others for at least two days. Absolutely pointless!!!

name: Hannah
title: ASOS customer service
review: ASOS customer service did not  answer my concern nor have evidence that I had in fact should have known it was in AUD not NZD. My account always defaults to NZ so why would I have changed it to Aus?? One customer service person said the currency is on invoice which it isn’t ..... obviously not well informed of the process.

name: Spiros Nitis
title: Very bad costumer support
review: Very bad costumer support . Lately they are making mistakes on the orders , this is the second time that they are sending me the wrong item. I was waiting for about 15 minutes to chat with costumer service, because they do not provide a phone number like all other sites, and I asked how can we resolve the issue and send me the right item with out having to wait all this standard delivery time frame AGAIN, since it was a mistake from asos end . He replied like a machine , like I was communicating with a computer , apologizing and explaining to me the return procedure like I didn't know.. I'm shopping for years from Asos . Thanks for the big help and your excellent costumer support team asos.

name: Charlotte Gibson
title: Dont bother using, you’ll never receive it!
review: I cant say how disappointed i am in asos if im honest. I have ordered from asos for years and have never had a complaint, but i cant even explain how frustrated ive been. So coming onto here isent blatantly obvious that the team from asos put there own good reviews in as they start with a name everytime, and they must think people are stupid because thats what my management at work make us do to get the company score up as there doing so bad at the moment with customer service and deliverys. I spent £200 on a order on next day evening delivery for it not to turn up. I got in contact with ‘city sprint’ which i had never had as a courier before. They were rude on the phone and would not talk to me and said i had to go through asos to follow up my order. I went on asos live chat and was told it was due to floods, which i was calm about but knew i was getting fobbed off as they were able to go round but they refused to. after two tries to delivery, on the third day i knew the road was back open so there was no doubt in my mind that it would get delivered that day. Never heard anything from the delivery company in terms of tracking, delivery update or email to say it was on its way unlike the days before. 4 days went by before i got in contact with asos again to ask for them to get in contact with the company to follow up and where my order was, to then find out they had actually lost my delivery on the first day and never intended on telling me. i was furious but needed to stuff on my order so ordered again but went for next day delivery instead of evening, hoping for it to be hermes or DPD as i have never had problems with these company's. It was meant to be delivered on the 14th and it is now the 21st. This is threw hermes and on the 14th i was given a tracking code which assured me on the app that it was going to be delivered between 3-5pm that day. I had waited in ALL DAY downstairs to make sure i would not miss the knock on the door for it to never turn up. That night i went onto the live chat once again to explain how furious i was for a rude ‘Thomas’ to pie me off and tell me its out of there hands and i had to wait till the 20th to get back in contact before exiting the chat. I have tried getting in contact with asos last night and today, and keeping getting put in a chat with ‘Anastasia’ who wont reply back in the chat -.- on email they will not respond back to me and are taking no responsibility for the matter. Id try normal 3-5 day delivery but il just assume there just not going to deliver anything to me. What is the point letting me order if I'm never going to receive my order and you just keeping having to give my money back? Also it is ridiculous that you are unable to get in contact with someone superior, they told me they take my complains on board and that there isn't a complains procedure.. every company (specially one as big as asos) has a friggin complains procedure. What a joke pah. They wont take what I'm saying on board and keep just taking my delivery charge.. i want my order not a bloody charge took off for a delivery I'm never going to receive.

name: Jayme Randall
title: Kept asking for same information…
review: Kept asking for same information already provided. Then ended the chat before solving any issues

name: L
title: Just terrible customer service
review: Just terrible customer service, takes forever to get a response and nothing is ever sorted straight away. Never talk to the same person so everything get confuesed and often they do very little to help! Probably the worst customer service I have ever received.

name: Dorina
title: The 15 euros extra for fast delivery is…
review:
The 15 euros extra for fast delivery is bad. The parcel comes anyway late as if you would select the free delivery option. Flipping Liars. 
Also, when you get an email from Asos about you package, while clicking on the link under the "delivery update" or in Dutch "Bezorgingsupdate" you get to a page where it is always saying "Sorry, we can't find that page
or something has gone wrong...". And that page has been there for almost 2 years.

name: Jess Stam
title: Faulty product sent, unacceptable customer service.
review: Faulty product sent, poor customer service, policies about shipping refund explained after new order placed Placed. Multiple contacts required with customer service to get shipping refunded on replacement and multiple charges on credit card for one item. Customer service was very poor and suggested I keep and repair faulty item at my own cost which was frayed and not repairable. It could have been easy to put a shipping credit on account instead I’ll now waste over an hour of my time on a faulty order and wait for the product.

name: Andrea Penn
title: If i could give negative stars i would…
review: If i could give negative stars i would i have a event tomorrow an my shoes i ordered are the wrong size and my dress is not horrible to tight around the neck not only am i out of shoes a dress an money an you wnat me to wait 29 days for a refund I will never buy from this place ever again STAY CLEAR HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE SCAM

name: Sarah Parker
title: Lackluster faulty returns policy
review:
Got the shoes nice and fast however the left foot bed was lumpy and hurt to wear. 
Customer service advised me I had to return the item and wait for a refund and re buy the new one. This annoyed me greatly as 1) it puts me out of pocket while they organise the refund
2) it will take over 3 weeks (17 business days) for them to process it - which is unreasonable 
3) if the parcel i send back (by their return service) is lost, I am responsible for the loss of parcel!!
REALLY poor experience, and no one seemed to care.
Also took over 20 mins on chat for the customer service person to actually talk to me.Also tried to email the chat transcript which did not work, so I have no proof of what the rep said.

name: Max Backshell
title: Terrible customer service
review: Terrible customer service, didn’t listen to me. Wasn’t helpful.

name: All
title: Purchased an item with express delivery…
review:
Purchased an item with express delivery 
Item due to arrive Friday 22nd but Item arrived Monday 25th

The only reason why I purchased this particular item was that it was being delivered "on or before friday 22nd"

Asos said they can't do anything to help

Disappointed first-time customer

name: Razan
title: Even not 1 star
review: Even not 1 star. He's not helping. And the problem from the website. Im a customer with asos. I this problem wasn't expected

name: A Sargent
title: Disappointing delivery service
review: I live in New Zealand and I’ve ordered off ASOS plenty of times. I always raved about the great delivery and service however since changing their delivery carrier.. My latest package has not been delivered on time, so far 5 days late. When I have tracked my packages in the past, I’ve been kept up to date as to what country and city it’s in, along with when and where it’s in transit with clear details. This time around there has been none of that except “Parcel is eManifested for delivery” and been that way for 7 days. Overall disappointing delivery service and probably won’t bother ordering from ASOS again.

name: Mona
title: unhelpful and rude
review: unhelpful and rude

name: Georgie Cook
title: Alex
review:
Alex, my customer service rep was lovely and super professional in the face of adversity. 

ASOS has a terrible system, you should be able to amend orders after they've been placed. Even for a 15 minute window. It is ridiculous to do otherwise

name: Ashton Edwards
title: Ordered a present for a 30th birthday
review: Ordered a present for a 30th birthday, didn’t turn up, messaged twice on social media and had no response, finally got through on chat and been told to wait 24 hours. Not good service at all.

name: Linda Simpson
title: Difficulty placing my order - Address kept appearing wrong
review:
This review is only about my experience trying to place an order.
After I ordered and paid via Paypal, I noticed that my street address was incorrect. I tried to correct, but the incorrect address kept appearing even after my changes. I finally had to cancel the order and make a brand new one. The new order also gave me the same problem, but I was finally able to add my correct address. I hope that I am not charged for the cancelled order.

name: Lesley Lock
title: Absolutely disgusting customer service
review: Absolutely disgusting customer service. Purchased a gift card and it doesn’t work. Purchased at the beginning of October and tried to register on 11/10 and emailed ASOS immediately along with evidence of the gift card and screenshot of the card error. As of today 24/11 ASOS still haven’t replaced the card and resolved the issue so my son still has no Birthday gift. I am absolutely appalled. 8-10 emails gone back and forth and they keep saying they are looking In to it. Not good enough ASOS. All I want is what I paid for. Pull your finger out and sort this out. I will not recommend ASOS to ANYONE in my friends and  family circle and will make sure everyone knows your customer service is appalling. I suggest you contact me via my email address which you already have and sort this pronto. Remember ASOS that just a few bad reviews are more effective than a lifetime of good ones.

name: Gary Moore
title: Ordered a pair of boots for my wife's…
review:
Ordered a pair of boots for my wife's birthday. They arrived promptly but they were faulty out of the box.
Sent them back and ordered the same pair again. They were also faulty. 
Absolutely disgusted with the quality of their products.
I am now out of pocket due to having to use my lunch hour to drive to a post office twice and pay for parking. Courier collection was not an option due to nobody being home during the day.

I will never use this company again!

name: Dee PS
title: Nightmare that is ASOS...
review: Delayed delivery then the wrong item in the correct packaging dispatched. So I now have to reorder and wait, again. Let’s hope the warehouse check the products/returns better; you never know what you’re going to get. Let’s see if they refund the discount I lost and the delivery charges incurred because of their mistake!

name: Olivia
title: HORRIBLE Customer Service
review: Absolutely horrendous experience with everyone involved in this company. They refuse to take blame for their mistakes or offer any kind of help to fix their mistakes. I ordered a jacket from this site and the photo was in mid wash, the color was in mid wash, AND under product details it said "mid wash finish". the product name however, was ASOS jacket in light wash. Obviously VERY confusing, but THREE separate places were telling me mid wash. Of course, it comes in and it's light wash. I tried speaking to their customer service and the first time she told me "This was not a maufacturing error, this was a user error and we change the fact that you ordered the wrong item" !! Again, I understand that the product name had light wash in it, but the product details, photo, and color option were ALL mid wash!! This was not user error, this was an error on the part of the company. Immediately after I received that message she closed the conversation so I could no longer respond. So, I tried contacting them again, really all I wanted was to swap this jacket for a mid wash one. Well, this one also tells me it's my fault and shows me the correct item I should have ordered for mid wash. Except this one is $35 and my original one I ordered was only $25! And, my original was placed in part of a bigger order in which I received free shipping. So I originally paid $25 and free shipping, and now they're telling me it's my fault and to fix it I have to pay $35 PLUS shipping! BUT to make it worse, I already found the "mid wash variant" on their website (exact same product name and colors and everything) BUT FOR $28.50. So not only are they telling me that in order to get the one I want, I'll have to just repurchase a more expensive listing, but they are giving me a MORE expensive listing than their website even shows!! They absolutely refused to do an exchange, price match, give me a free shipping code, etc, anything at all. Just kept repeating this is my fault for ordering the wrong item (which I stand by that I did NOT. they listed the wrong item)

name: Rochelle Moore
title: Terrible customer service - Don't risk a Xmas present order
review: Placed an order for next day. Never came. 5 days later a very small package arrived with 70% of the order missing. I was then told they'll only replace the item subject to availability and that the items are deemed lost. They were never packaged in the tiny bag. I have no idea when and if they are going to arrive. Don't bother I had a later order from h & m and was provided with a 15% discount voucher to apologise. Much better care for their customers.

name: Sab Noordin
title: Late Delivery and No help from Customer Service
review: Stated on e app that item will arrive by 20th Nov 19. Item was purchased during the 11.11 sale. Did not get any help from the help centre. No tracking number given and i was told to check with my local courier. Shouldnt the checking be on their part?? Wasnt helpful at all as i dont know which local courier they using. So i just hv to wait and get back to them on 3 Dec should the item has yet to be delivered.

name: Jawharah Alsleem
title: Still haven’t receive my order witch i…
review: Still haven’t receive my order witch i placed on November 6th

name: Fred
title: Crocked asos and their shady practices
review:
Crocked asos and their shady practices. They're crocked and am officially going to file a complaint to the business bureau for their shady business practices. Worst experience ever. 

Why don't we have 0 stars to give this bankrupt asos company????? From the CEO to the customer service, I say scam, run while you can and dont be a victim like myself and many others. 

Consumer matters for Canada will also get involved. This shady unethical business practice has to stop.

Conor the chat rep was as useless as the trump towers. Took him forever to respond, he lied to me that my package was on it's way, when o told him in was going take everything to business bureau and asked him how he knew, he changed his answer and said it will arrive by November the 18th.

Am going to refuse the package and have it sent back to crocked asos. The CEO is a scam and he or she should be locked up in prison. 

They said free shipping and after you order they say no real time tracking number, seriously?? 

Asos should be closed ASAP.

name: Barbara
title: No Tracking Number
review: No Tracking Number. Delivery Not Completed on Time. Customer Staff unable to track parcel or assist with locating it.

name: NP
title: totally unhelpful
review: totally unhelpful, inflexible response.  i've waiting in for two days for my order and am now informed it will not arrive for another 5 days.  Having been told it was in transit and been given delivery times, this makes no sense.  Asos refused to cancel order or refund delivery.  useless

name: Mr JRR
title: Website illogic
review:
I get an email about a sale—obviously I have shopped ASOS before.  I get a banner telling me “Hey, you’re new here.  Get 15% off with code ASOSNEW15.  I put an item in my cart and proceed to checkout where it tells me the code is invalid.  I tried multiple time on multiple devices—each time I am offered a 15% discount code with ASOSNEW15 and each time it is refused.  

I wait 15 minutes to get into a chat where the first thing I am asked is my birthdate.  I am 67 years old and on the millennial set they are aiming for.  I am then told the code is only for new customers and it explains so in the T&C.  Don’t know (and don’t care) where the T&C info is as it was not offered up during the process.

Did they age discriminate?  Is their website logic flawed?  I think the answer is yes to both.

name: Kelly
title: I have paid for Asos' premier delivery
review:
I have paid for Asos' premier delivery, in order to ensure that my orders will be delivered the following day (providing I order before the deadline). 
On more than one occasion I have not received the delivery until a number of days later than sold to me and expected. This is simply not good enough, if I pay for premier delivery, I expect premier delivery and service. Asos has shows neither. 
I would understand if this was a one time thing, as every now and then things with delivery can go wrong, however this is not the case. 
Worse still, asos refuse to investigate further until 5/6 days have passed the agreed delivery date. I have paid for your service that promises something that it clearly can't deliver. 
As a paying and loyal asos customer, I am thoroughly disappointed.

name: Leeran
title: I would like to share with you a very…
review:
I would like to share with you a very poor customer experience I have had.

I made an order on your website and was promised a free express delivery for that order.

My order is now 3 days delayed and I was charged with an additional delivery fee except the customs fee and customs registration fee.

the additional delivery fee I was charged made me feel very much cheated as I was promised to get free express delivery.

Please be aware that the carrier company which you are using in Israel is charging your customers with an additional delivery fee.
looks like the carrier company is taking advantage of your customers. all in all the chats weren't helpful at all. and I'm really unhappy with my order.

Please consider using a better local carrier which won't hold my package hostage unless I'll pay them for the delivery.
I will be very surprised to hear that I'm the only one in Israel to compliant about this service with the carrier company.

This shopping experience was unsatisfying and made me feel like I'm not appreciated as a customer.

name: Matteo Vignoni
title: Very poor customer service!
review:
Very poor customer service. First they sad that my order was delivered. The next message was that they had lost the package. I received a message about the replacement and the day after they cancelled. I had a conversation about a next delivery, that was cancelled too.

Order arrived after 17 days.
No compensation.

Customer service unavailable in online live chat. Only on Facebook messenger. Responding time:1day, super slow.

name: JL
title: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS NOT HELPFUL AT ALL
review: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS NOT HELPFUL AT ALL

name: Donnella Collison
title: I was not helped at all
review: I was not helped at all. Asos made a mistake with my order and now I have to suffer the consequences! Completely UNFAIR!

name: Gary TD
title: Ordered some boots for a Shadow…
review:
Ordered some boots for a Shadow Trooper. It stated they were shipped. Never arrived. Contacted them and they stated they must have missed shipping or been lost. No info at FED EX receiving them. They say they are going to be shipped today, Oct 25th 2019.
 Have this week and will inform Credit Card Company.

name: ilnueh
title: The worst ever
review: I was told that my order was resent to Asos for an unspecified reason, then told it would be sent to me again, then finally told that it had in fact been returned to Asos. I waited 10 extra days for them to not even send me my items, refund me the actual wrong amount, then told that they could offer me no re-compensation for what had happened and were adamant that the right amount had been refunded. I actually have no words. Asos could do nothing for me and the delivery service Yodel was exceptionally bad.

name: Alt Johnston
title: Terrible customer service and return…
review: Terrible customer service and return system. Don't provide clear instructions for returning, and use false excuses to get around issuing a refund for items.  Never order from this site.

name: Matthew Roberts
title: Placed a order at around 9.30 am and…
review: Placed a order at around 9.30 am and paid for asos instant, for my order to be delivered by 10pm today. Nothing was delivered. Spoke to customer service on live chat, and they were no help. The tracking number I was given doesn't even work. So now i don't know when my order will be delivered.

name: Lalzo
title: Ive been an asos fan for years but have…
review:
Ive been an asos fan for years but have had too many problems with their deliveries recently.

Im sure they used to use DPD for my deliveries but now its Hermes. The Twitter customer service is useless at anything other than regurgitating their terms and conditions.

How dare they charge for a premium next day service when it takes 5 working days for the order to be delivered?!

name: Anne
title: Returning item and faulty
review:
Paid for the premier service, my dress was delivered two days late, then i sent the dress back requesting an exchange of another size. ASOS issue my with a refund instead of an exchange.

Within  the same week I order another dress went receiving the dress it was faulty.

I haven't used asos in two years, and my experience as a returning customer as been shocking. Very disappointing

name: Rain Kennedy
title: The worst cs experience I've ever had
review: The worst cs experience I've ever had

name: Abigail Ball
title: Let down by premiere delivery
review: Don’t bother paying for premiere delivery. I spoke with THAMEENA on the 22nd to find out where my parcel was as I purchased the 20th, it was stated to be expected on the 21st on the app. Hermes tracking wasn’t giving any indication of where it was or why it was late. I spoke on the chat and got absolutely no answers as to why it was delayed or what day it would exactly arrive. Just to contact them after the 27th!!!! If it still hadn’t arrived.

name: Teo
title: Been waiting for the replacement of my…
review: Been waiting for the replacement of my missing items for 3 days. Totally unacceptable

name: Mads Totland
title: The second time they haven't deliverd…
review:
The second time they haven't deliverd my order on time, and they offer no form of apology or compensation to make the experience i slight better.
I will never recommend anyone to order from this company that can't even deliver trace a parcel.

name: Zac
title: joke of a company
review: Representative was great, however the company sucks. Was spent the wrong color of adidas sneakers. Return program sucks, so compensation for the mistake on behalf of the company. Unfortunately will not be using this website.

name: Cara Egbe
title: Didn’t help me
review: Didn’t help me. And their next day delivery service is crap.

name: Samia El Jaafari
title: Terrible service
review: I chatted with Kris who was extremely unhelpful with yes/no answers and ended the chat on me when I clearly said I had another question. Terrible service, Kris might as well go do another job.

name: Jenny Fisher
title: very unhelpful
review: very unhelpful, kept trying to end the chat, utterly useless

name: Giselle
title: I have raised a problem that hasn't been resolved
review: I'm have raised a problem with my the faulty sizing of some jeans I have order. All the responses I have given have not actually apologised or found a solution, so I don't have to worry the next pair of jeans I order from ASOS are actually going to be the size on the label

name: Chanel
title: Spoke to a REP ADAM who was very rude…
review: Spoke to a REP ADAM who was very rude and inconsiderate of what i was asking him. Ended the chat abruptly by telling me this was going in circles. I feel customer service is a huge part of what makes a company successful and with REPS like ADAM, completely turned me off from ever ordering from ASOS ever again! Watch how you speak to your customers. Its disgusting!

name: 郭浩
title: The customer service is suck
review:
The customer service is suck. And they think the ivory and white is same color.

The product use photo is by photoshop make pant look more white on website.the true i received the jean color is more like ivory or light brown.

If I want get the refund I need pay the shipping fee. All deal like a fraud.and they don’t have to pay any responsibility.

name: Fay Neill
title: Just terrible
review: It pains me to say, after being a loyal ASOS customer, but I’m honestly considering not ordering with them again. I pay for Premier delivery (next day) - parcel should have been delivered today and the live chat couldn’t have been less helpful. Robotic responses, still none the wiser on when I’ll get my delivery, and a vague promise to look in to it further if it hasn’t been delivered in another week! No offer to refund my premier delivery payment. Terrible. ASOS need to start taking some responsibility for the couriers they use and their performance instead of disassociating themselves from them.

name: Jay
title: Absolutely disgusting customer service
review: Absolutely disgusting customer service, during webchat the agent Lydia just kept sending the same canned responses and couldn't be any more bothered about my query. No official complaint route given other than this link. Im doubtful of getting a call back.

name: Meg
title: Poor customer service.
review: Poor customer service.

name: N/A
title: YOUR COMPANY CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS!!!!
review:
YOUR COMPANY CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS!!!!

You sent me the wrong size I paid express shipping and you couldn’t help me at all. My correct size isn’t available anymore.  

I will never ever buy from ASOS again. I will be sure to tell all my friends and family.

name: Julie C
title: Clothes good quality
review: Clothes good quality, but  it's the last time I order from them. I swear they mess up my order every single time. It's not worth having to ship back items on all my orders. I have ordered three different times and this will be my last.

name: Karin
title: Very bad customer service
review:
The customer service is rude, unhelpful and unrespectful.
After I got a wrong item they asked me to send it back and pay for the return shipment. When I tried to asked for a refund , they ignored my messages.
In another case, when the package didn't arrive on time, the agent give me wrong information and asked me to send another message(and wasting more time on waiting in the queue) because it was 55 minutes before midnight .. then she just close the window, without letting me time to answer her.
Very disappointing, saving couple of Pounds doesn't worth the waste of time on this terrible customer service .

name: Aogan Keyes
title: Dreadful experience
