I am a registered and respected mental health nurse working in the NHS. I have also never had any problems with any other shopping company. So it’s safe to say that I am absolutely shocked and appalled by the unprofessionalism and poor customer service that I have received from ASOS. I would be happy to remove my post should this be rectified by ASOS, however my opinion will always be negative of ASOS going forward should this not be resolved. I have also paid my £10 delivery saver and would like this refunding due to being unable to take advantage of this in the future.  
#ASOS #Klarna #Delivery #Return #Refund #Refused #Disbelieved #Judged #NoExplanation #Blocked #BlockedAccount #Notabletocontact #Sterotyping #Misjudged #PoorCustomerService

name: Alisha
title: they said I am eligible for express…
review: they said I am eligible for express shipping but my package didn't get delivered. It has been more than 4 days now and i tried to track my package and was chatting with girl name Amber. I told her that my package was supposed to be delivered on 17th june as i was eligible for express shipping. I mean that was the whole point i bought items more than $200. I will be going out of country on 24th and i needed my package before that, but she said she can't do anything and left the chat. i told her what happened why it didn't got delivered but she just left the chat.

name: Tina
title: Charged me twice and then won't refund…POOR POOR POOR EFFORT ASOS
review: Charged me twice and then won't refund me until 48 hours pass so they can check 1 have paid twice even though I have provided them evidence! Very poor work ASOS - won't be shopping with you ever again POOR POOR POOR EFFORT!!!!!

name: mbacall
title: DO NOT ORDER FROM ASOS
review: I recently ordered and returned clothes a few days after receiving them. It has been over a month and i have yet to receive my refund ot get a clear answer as to why i haven't received it. The worst customer service i have ever had. If you look closely at their website they do not give you a phone number to call for issues. I have went back and forth only on emails and live chats to no help  AT ALL! They do not care if you have any issues, unprofessional and not to mention their clothes are horrible quality. Do yourself a favor just order from anywhere else!

name: stavros patsalidis
title: I have tried to make returns through…
review:
I have tried to make returns through the courier service they provide, but the courier's office was not in the mentioned location (although asos provided this location option in the return's form) but in other cities.
Tried to chat with them 2-3 times about my issue and the staff was not helpfull at all. One of them closed the chat before finishing the conversation and provided no solution.

No Free Returns since the consumer can not find the courier store to return it to and get his refund.

name: Nigel Garbutt
title: Don’t deserve even 1 star
review:
Don’t deserve even 1 star. Took 2 weeks to deliver then returned for different size. Carrier lost the return  in the post and asos keep telling me to wait for it to be returned before a refund can be given! 
Worst customer service ever.

name: Miroslava Bobeva
title: Not being refunded for a brand new top they've received back!
review:
Returned two orders in one bag to save on packaging, posting etc. Admittedly (and in hindsight very mistakenly) from two different accounts - my one and my friend's one when she had to order something for me last minute and had Premier Next Day delivery to help me out. Put both returns slips in the package and posted back -  received a refund from one order but haven't for the other.
Online chat was useless as the woman wrote that she "can't help me with getting my money back and can't advise me any further" just because I had returned orders from two accounts in one bag??
Didn't even try asking what the other order number or postal tracking number was! 
Unwilling to look into it further, unwilling to refund me for my return and unwilling to send the item back to me since I've paid for it at the end of the day! So annoyed at this lack of customer care.

name: Emily
title: Lost return parcel
review: I am disgusted with the service ASOS have provided!!!!!!!! After sending my parcel back for a return it has gone missing. The content of the parcel is £140 I have contacted the customer service 5 times in which they a literally useless not providing any help or solution! I will never shop on ASOS again as from such a big online retailer you wouldn't expect this service!

name: Ste
title: Knock knock who's there?
review: Someone signed for me and clearly the hermes driver sent it to the wrong address. Now asos expects me to knock on the doors of all the neighbours in the street before they will take further action wth? Maybe don't use a useless courier like hermes. Past deliveries from asos have been with dpd which I've never had a problem with. Glad I used klarna, hopefully their buyer protection will cover me if my clothes don't show up because I'm not paying almost £100 for a non-delivery!

name: Ioana Sitea
title: AWFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE, AWFUL SHIPPING, AWFUL EVERYTHING
review: My package was delivered to the wrong address and after chatting with multiple people about this I was told to close the chat because they cannot do anything about it. Like it's my fault!??!?!!? Never buying from them ever again :)

name: Iiris Halsvaha
title: DO NOT ORDER
review:
I have been ordering from ASOS for years, but won’t be after this. 
I placed an order 25th of May and it was supposed to be here on or before 5th of June. I haven’t even received a shipping confirmation email yet.
I have been in contact with them trough chat and they just tell me to wait (at first until 15th and now until 20th of June).
I can’t get real answers, just copy & paste responses and I had to ask them 6 times before they told me my package hasn’t even been shipped yet (at first they tried to hide it by telling me to check if it has been delivered to my neighbors and that there are delays in the shipping) 
I have also emailed them and sent them a message on Facebook but they have ignored it

name: Takura Sunguro
title: Don't stop 🛑 right now!!
review: Don't stop 🛑 right now!!! They are thieves and they have a bad image they are liars they don't send your items on time

name: Han Coss
title: Shocking Customer Service
review: You have to retype your email address each time you place an order. If you make an error (e.g hitmail ) by mistake, your order won’t appear on your account and you won’t get an email. They then try to blame this on something going wrong with the transaction. It takes constant emails / messaging / chats before finally after 5 days they can tell you what actually happened. Then even though by this time you have gone off the boil and probably shopped elsewhere instead, it’s tough because its too late to cancel apparently! Then you make complaint about the customer service you’ve received only to be told “ we don’t have a complaints department as we are all equally trained “ followed by “ if you have any questions please let me know”. Who ever trains these guys clearly has no knowledge on Customer Service.

name: danijel skrjanec
title: Disappointed
review: I placed an order on 10th with next day delivery and seven days later they didn’t even shipped yet! I don’t know what happened to them they used to be great..Do not order unless you can wait weeks.

name: Elena Ghinda
title: The very worst
review: The very worst! I ordered a pair of shoes 2 MONTHS ago and delivered them right the way back because of the bad quality and haven’t received my money yet!! It has been two months! When I wrote them, two times already, they confirmed the package has arrived back but the money is not sent because they have a technical problem. Are you kidding me?????? I don’t care what problems you have, they are yours!! Why do I have to suffer for that! The shoes are back! The money are not! I am so frustrated! First and last time ordering over ASOS and I am going to tell all my friends how bad this online shop is! The worst!

name: Becca
title: Horrible customer service + lowkey robbing people
review:
I ordered a pair of jeans off this website and they didn’t fit. They have free returns so I returned the jeans to my local UPS store. My UPS store did not issue me any sort of recipt. 

You are supposed to receive an email within 10 business days that your item has been received and an refund is being issued to your account. Its been 15 business days and my package has not been received yet. 

I have contacted customer care multiple times and they copy and paste the same message. They require proof of postage to look into this, although the other forms of proof of postage they require are included in the package that was sent back. I have voiced my concerns through their livechat and it always goes back to “you need proof of postage.” Which I explained I do not have. I asked this one person who was working the live chat a question, and her response was “now I see I have answered all your questions, I’m going to go ahead and end this chat.” and closed the chat 

So I started emailing. I have been passed on to different people and eventually asked if I could set up a phone call with them (because they don’t have a call center!) They said yes and asked me when. I told them the day and time I’m free, which was today, and I have not received a phone call from them. Instead, yesterday I received an email from a different member of customer service saying they were looking into this and will get back to me soon-still haven’t heard anything. 

So disappointed in them! I have lost $50 that I don’t think I will get back. Seeing that many people are experiencing this problem makes me feel less alone and stupid but more angered.

name: Trevor Ferguson
title: Terrible Customer Service!
review:
I came home last evening to an empty package on my porch. I have never made a claim like this and have shopped with them for over two years!  Below is the email that I received this morning:

“Hello,

After an assessment of your account, we've made the decision to not issue a refund for your items.

It’s very rare for items to go missing and ASOS have therefore made the decision to not accept any further orders from you.  

In order to take this further, we recommend contacting your payment provider to dispute any lost funds. Your payment provider may be in touch with ASOS and we'll be able to provide information regarding your account to support their investigations. Once they're happy this is a genuine claim, they may refund your account.  

In the event further orders are placed, they'll be cancelled. 

As we’re unable to help you further with this, any emails received about this matter will be automatically closed down with no response.”

THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE AND THE LEADERSHIP TEAM SHOULD BE CONCERNED. I have never made a public complaint against an organization but this one deserves public awareness as they have my $218 and I have no products and they are no longer willing to address. Is this even possible??? Very disappointed to say the least

name: Isaac Kennedy
title: i wish there was a zero star for this…
review: i wish there was a zero star for this company,they give me another month for my order to arrive,it was supposed to be a gift,feel like iam going to go crazy when you give them your hard earned money only to get a game of wait and see with your order, first time with this useless company and the last. dont get me started on their live chat people there is something annoying about someone whose not rude but doesnt give you the exact answers you want in a robotic kinda way.

name: Dan Kitchen
title: They advertise next day delivery if you…
review: They advertise next day delivery if you order before 11PM, but it never works - the stuff doesn't turn up, ASOS don't know where it is, and it ends up turning up the next day when it's too late. Don't advertise something you can't actually fulfil.

name: Daniela Valadez
title: DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE
review: My order was supposed to arrive two days after I placed it as I paid extra to ensure this and it did not. Three days after the package did not arrive FedEx contacted me and informed me the package was lost and would not be arriving.  My order consisted of an outfit and a bathing suit I planned on wearing that weekend on my bachelorette trip to Cabo, San Lucas. I contacted ASOS and they told me there was nothing they can do tholepin me. I lost over $80.00 on this website, do not trust them!!!

name: Cate Basic
title: One star is being too generous
review: One star is being too generous. I would rate this brand and company ZERO stars if I could. First of all, as soon as the order was late, I contacted Customer Service and they said I had to wait another 20 DAYS before they could do anything about it. When my order did arrive, not only was the order 9 days late, IT WAS THE WRONG ITEM AND THE WRONG SIZE. Not to mention, the product is poor quality. This was my first AND LAST time buying from this company.

name: Alex Maurer
title: Trash
review:
the biggest load of bullsht! 
never purchase anything from asos! 

proper trash

name: Vlad Mozharov
title: Never again!!!
review: Ordered shoes in black color, size 43. Got blue with white shoes of size 42. Customer service is useless, didn't provide me with any help that I needed, only standard replies. Moreover, in the end they just simply laid all the responsibility on Aramex, who are handling returns and did not help with anything. So I got a 3 weeks hassle because of their mistake! Never again!

name: Emma Marecki
title: Inadequate service in every way
review: On multiple occasions I have been sent the wrong items in the wrong sizes, they have subsequently run out of the correct item. Customer service were less than helpful; not only in the chat did they clearly not read my message correctly, they didn’t answer my questions and sounded in a hurry. For example when I said I had been sent the wrong dress, the reply I got was: I will have a look at why your order was sent to the wrong address. Very frustrating. I order online because my working hours make it difficult for me to shop in store. However I have now not had an outfit for events due to the time and money wasted at ASOS.

name: SIC
title: Watch out!
review:
Watch out! If you complain about a missing item they suspend your account & charge you for your items. 

I received one out of three items and sent them an email and this was their reaction. No one spoke to me. All cut and paste replies with no reasoning behind their descion. Shopped with them for 6+ years with no problem and liked their service before.

I’m £100 out of pocket and spent the day really upset at the tone of their email (accusing me of fraud)

I’ve heard their doing badly financially, so think this is their way of clawing back profits - refusing to refund people.

Be aware before you order.

name: Arianit Selmani
title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS WEBSITE!!! FLASE CLOTHING
review: I bought a jacket for £125 from ASOS, it arrived  yesterday and the quality of the jacket was very different to the jacket shown on the photograph. I tried this with my shirt on which left hair on it and totally ruined my shirt, returned the jacket and had to spend another £60pounds on a brand new shirt because your quality of clothes ruined it. I am very disappointed and I can assure you I will not be buying from ASOS EVER AGAIN!!! I WILL BE TELLING EVERYONE OF THE BAD QUALITY OF CLOTHING YOU HAVE AND SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF YOURSELF FOR CHARING SO HIGH PRICES.

name: NONYA
title: DO NOT BUY HERE
review:
DO NOT BUY HERE, THEY STEEL FROM YOU!!!!

Stole my money, order never arrived. NO customer service, never responds to emails.  My order 376241150 and never got it!!!

name: Jon Wheldon
title: The Reps Who Say “Meh”
review: Garbage return instructions. Handed return package to mail man and apparently I needed a receipt of some sort to show proof of shipment after discovering that the package hasn’t even left the states after 2 weeks of me handing the package over. They have no serial number on these prepaid labels so my package got lost somehow due to a failure in establishing an “activated” shipment and I only have my name and return address to work with in attempts towards locating the thing at the Post Office. I’m sure once I locate it it will also conveniently fall beyond the return date deadline since being MIA. The reps tell me I’m SOL now and both blatantly ended the chat convos before I could gather more info.. Really disappointing turn of events so I think I’m also done with ASOS. I shouldn’t have had to experience this. Bottom line.

name: Denis
title: Dont buy from this company!!!!
review:
Dear all,

Please read the review before you buy something on Asos.
I bough some staff there on Nov 18.I supposed to get my staff by Dec 6 how it was said on my account.
From Dec 6 i checked my post office almost every day and didn't get anything.
I called them as well yesterday, nothing.
Asos, you support team is terrible.They told me to wait till Dec 26.I waited.
Then again wait, wait.Then i said that i needed my money back, they said check you custom office and so on....Just wasting time.Then they made their investigation and off course they were right and not responsible for anything.

Guys, even when i buy some staff from China, they give my a track number even if i pay $10, i can track my order.You - nothing.No track number for free delivery.Common.....

I've sent a request for charge back....

People, don't buy from them.......

0 stars here............

name: Querijn Beijer
title: horrible customer service
review:
horrible customer service. Placed an order for EUR 350, and have waited for more than 3 weeks. Not responding to my questions. And I still haven't received the product. 

This is beginning to look like a real SCAM

name: Natalia Ferapontova
title: it's been over 10 days and still…
review: it's been over 10 days and still waiting for my order. I paid for express delivery mind you, Customer service is useless, and says just wait. If I have to refuse the order I have to wait  two months for the refund.

name: Gary
title: Made an order with Asos and requested delivery
review:
Made an order with Asos and requested delivery between 12 and 1pm sunday 16th June as I am meant to be out after 1. No delivery has been attempted and when I track it it says my order will be with me at my requested time that I paid £5.95 for! It now says DPD hasn't received my order but my delivery will be sent at time requested! Well I'm still waiting! Shocking service! No wonder why you're rated 1 star

Contacted a customer service agent at asos called Rajintha and he/she was outright rude, all he kept saying was you will have to wait until midnight for your delivery even tho I paid 5.95 for next day and a specific time slot! I'm not waiting up until midnight for a delivery I have work early. Shocking service and rude! Also said that I wont get a refund for the delivery service I Paid for! I will be getting a refund as I didn't get the service I PAID for!

*UPDATE*
Been in contact with DPD and they say Asos didn't even send the parcel to them for shipping! 

Contacted Asos back and they are unhelpful as usual, saying I will have to wait 24 hours for them to look into it, think I've waited long enough tbh. Just resend the order crying out loud instead of messing around!

name: Adam K
title: THOHAIB - RUDE
review: Spoke to customer service agent called THOHAIB who was straight rude and unwilling to help in anyway. Absolute crap service. They offer Next day delivery but dont provide that service!!

name: Hania Rihan
title: Absolutely awful!
review: Absolutely awful!

name: E Boyle
title: Long wait for standard and express delivery
review: I had to wait for a month to receive my order from Asos. I had to reorder it. I paid the second time for express delivery as my son wanted the clothes for a graduation. But they still didn't come in time.   And i had to change my original order as items were out of stock. It was pure time wasting contacting them . All the time just getting standard replies.  I was not in any way compensated. But thats ok I wont be ordering from them for along time

name: Jason Organ
title: ASOS OWN BRAND.
review: (This is strictly about ASOS OWN BRAND clothing). I recently bought a multipack of clothes from ASOS, after them being too large I sent them back and re-ordered the size smaller (XS) now unless you are 6ft or more, I wouldn’t bother ordering anything from their own brand. I’m 5’7 and the first set of T-shirts ordered in size S reached my knees. The second set ordered in XS reach the middle of my thighs. These are not long line, they’re just basic T-shirts. The model is 6’6 wearing a medium and its long on him. Ridiculous sizing.

name: Jenni
title: 5 weeks and still have not received my order
review: Ordered a dress costing me $90 on sale and had a delivery date of June 3. Package was shipped may 13 to Canada with no tracking apparently. I’ve contacted them 18 times. I keep getting a scripted reply from each associate that I need to check with my neighbours and call my local post office to see if it is there.I called Canada post they literally told me without a tracking number they can do nothing. I contacted them back and they told me if it does not arrive by June 23 to get back to them. Told me they are an online company and no managers to speak to. I asked for someone to call me and they refused. At this point I am thinking my dress is not coming and going to be contacting my credit card company in hopes of a refund. I will never and I mean never order from this company again. I’m not sure what’s happened but I’ve ordered about two years ago and never had an issue. ASOS you really need to get your crap together because seriously customers is what will keep you in business. This is the worst customer service I have experienced in my entire life.

name: Hugh
title: Very bad experience with CC
review:
Very bad experience with CC
My Premium delivery ran out and I wasn't made aware of that. Just made a £230 order and had to pay £5;95 for next day delivery. I got in touch with CC to cancel my order because I wanted to purchase Premium delivery and re book my order with no delivery fees. I wasn't able to cancel my order and was told I had to pay the delivery fees even if I wanted to purchase the Premium delivery. Spent 35 min on chat with CC to be told nothing could be done and no credit could be provided...... felt really stuck in the process and very disappointed by the experience with CC.

name: Luke Faldon
title: Terrible service
review:
Terrible service. 

My order was expected to be delivered on the 5th of June and it still has not arrived. I have contacted ASOS 3 times trying to locate it (via email and live chat) and they have no idea where it is. I went out my way to contact the courier service who say they don’t know where the parcel is located in their depot and since my location isn’t high priority (rural Scotland) they will get in touch in a couple of days when they locate it. I have now moved address and I dread trying to organise the order to be redelivered as I already know this is going to be an issue for them. 

This order was over £130’s and I am left here not knowing when or if I will even receive it.

name: Emily
title: So disappointed
review: So disappointed. Ordered a dress for a wedding, paid for next day delivery. On the day of delivery (Friday) , dpd emailed to say my order was delayed and wouldn’t be delivered til Monday. I contacted Asos live chat to cancel the order as Monday would be too late and they told me I can’t cancel my order! I then asked to make a complaint and was told that complaints are handled internally so I would not receive a response to my complaint. I contacted them again on twitter and email, never received a response. I have had to open a PayPal dispute to hopefully get my money back, Diabolical way to treat customers....never again !

name: David Gabriel Wahab
title: my bad shopping experience
review: Good morning, I would like to point out that until now you have not refunded me the golf shirt I bought on 29/11/2019, the order number is 456683316, I want the refund as soon as possible, it is important to note that you have failed me and my shopping experience is not plausible that I wait over a month to receive the money

name: Hayley Porter-Harris
title: Normally I love ASOS but had appalling…
review: Normally I love ASOS but had appalling service and delivery...in fact I’m still awaiting a Christmas present. Ordered on 23rd for next day delivery and said it would be here Xmas eve and still isn’t here. Appreciate delivery's can be delayed during the festive season but I haven’t even been given an update or at least tell me at the time of purchasing . Really unhappy and no apology. Hopefully I’ll get my package soon

name: Janet Cheng
title: Pay extra attention when using free delivery
review: My delivery has been held by the courier partner, Skynet, since 21 Dec when the first delivery was failed. Since then, the local courier can't be reached by email nor phone call. As of today 3 Jan, I don't know where my parcel status. Contacting ASOS Customer Care, and they suggested me to leave comment on my experience here. So, when can I get my order?

name: Anja
title: Rude and unprofessional
review: I've had two chats with two different people from Asos customer service and both times experienced rudeness, unfriendliness and unprofessionalism. Asos, you can do so much better.

name: JOHN MCILLMURRAY
title: If I could leave zero stars I would
review: If I could leave zero stars I would. I have experienced the worse end to end customer service from ASOS and their delivery partner Hermes ever. It is now 18 days since my order was placed for my daughters Christmas presents and all I am receiving are continuous expected delivery dates from Hermes and ASOS. ASOS have even told me separately that my parcel has been delivered and are now telling me to wait another 10 days. I have asked and asked for contact information to escalate and have been continuously ignored. Absolutely disgraceful service and ASOS have had my money for 16 days. The last email even asked me to leave a review with an embarrassed face emoji icon.

name: Customer
title: Do not order from ASOS whilst they use…
review: Do not order from ASOS whilst they use Hermes! Paid for next day delivery for NYE to be told I should expect to wait a week for delivery before asos will act - despite asos advertising delivery in time for NYE! Their attempt at customer service is p*** poor. Time will tell whether I will actually even receive my parcel.

name: K Pavlov
title: Awful service be careful buying e ticket vouchers
review:
Awful service! Honestly I am very surprised that a company like ASOS doesnt have a complaints department or procedure! 

I was given an online gift voucher and i bought a few items.. all good! Unfortunately a few items were not for me and I returned them within the timeframe. However my gift voucher was not returned with the refund!! As I can't find the booking reference and they will not refund the card!!! They won't search my name, account number or post code!!! Just keep asking for a reference number and have said they can't help until I find one.... If I had one why would i NOT give it to them!!!
I would expect this problem for a small company but NEVER ASOS!! Be very aware about buying friends or family gift/ e ticket vouchers!

name: Adam Mitchell
title: Poor customer service, disinterested in actually helping - AVOID.
review:
I have used ASOS religiously for about 8 years but have had the misfortune of crossing their customer service team one too many times in the last few months. I have encountered various issues with the orders I've placed over the past year, from damaged hair wax leaking all over other items, to jeans appearing completely different to how they look online and next day delivery orders not being honoured.

On each occasion, they seem incapable of viewing the circumstance from the customer's perspective. The most recent example - that of the hair wax - is the one which tipped me over the edge. Despite two other items being damaged, they have refused to refund them as it was "only the wax which was faulty". All customer queries go through the ridiculous 'Gnatta' online chat system, meaning you cannot have a proper conversation with anybody. There is no telephone number or written address available, and if you ask to escalate a complaint or speak to a supervisor you will be told "all complaints are reviewed and dealt with alternatively". It is all designed to protect the company rather than help the customer, and to deflect and ignore complaints as much as they possibly can.

The products and prices are good but if you ever have a problem with an order (which for me have become increasingly frequent) then you'll never want to shop there again.

name: Matt Townrow
title: Clearly been worn and returned
review: Received the item which smelt of men’s aftershave and had clearly been worn before

name: N
title: Was ignored for a week
review: Asked a simple question and they got back at me a week later, I’d already solved the problem but they had ignored my messages and tweets for a whole week....

name: Customer
title: Buyer beware
review: Ordered xmas presents on 18th December after checking that the delivery times were sufficient for xmas. Received an email from hermes on 21st to say parcel received and on it way that day. Then had an update to say parcel delayed at 23.45 that evening. Have contacted Asos to ask them to investigate as now 6 days on theres no further update. Asos dont seem to be concerned that my package is lost with the courier and tell me I have to give it untill the 9th of Jan before they can raise it as a lost parcel as they have to wait for it to come back after 3 failed delivery attempts!!!!  It has not even been attempted once its lost within the courier....... Thats 21 days from order!!!!!! Its clear Hermes have lost the package so why it takes 21 days to be able to claim is beyond me. Asos customer care is a big fat 0. I'll order elsewhere

name: Mahlet Haile
title: NOT HELPFUL!!
review: BAD Customer Service!!!

name: Anon
title: Premier Delivery means within 20 days now
review: I paid for premier delivery for the year and an item due to arrive 20th December will now apparently arrive any time before the 9th of January. This is completely unacceptable service frankly and I feel that the way it has been handled has also bit been good enough.

name: Simon
title: Shocking customer service and clueless staff
review:
Shocking customer service, would give 0 stars if possible.

Ordered and given a delivery date and a confirmation email for the date. On the day of delivery no timeslot given so I asked “customer services” (haha that’s ironic) what was going on. Told to wait for delivery date to pass before they could do anything.

The day after the CONFIRMED delivery date I receive a dispatch email! Unbelievable! 

Again carrier does not give me a timeslot so like a complete moron (maybe ASOS will give me a job) I contact “customer service” again and am now told to wait a further THREE DAYS for my next day delivery. 

Absolutely shoddy service from clueless staff. I can’t even cancel apparently as it’s with the carrier (how that is my issue I do not know)

AVOID AVOID AVOID

As a “Premier”customer shortly due for renewal it’s safe to say that won’t happen, nor will I ever use this company again. 

Clueless

name: אבי כהני
title: Just ridiculous!
review: Asos didn't supply an item from an order I've made without refund or any information abput that. so ridiculous!

name: John Evans
title: bad customer service
review:
Awful really awful

I ordered 2 weeks before Xmas and was told the items would be delivered around the 17th December!! It is the 28th now and still nothing received! The app states that my items were delivered on the 16th. I’ve spoken to ASOS in the live chat who day that this is an error and the items are not delivered. I asked for a refund and was told I have to wait till the 1st jan before this could be processed why??? Also I asked to make a complaint and the person I was speaking to just flatly told me they didn’t have a complaints process and he will just acknowledge what I say!! This is ridiculous i used to really like ASOS and never had a problem but this is the worst customer service I have ever seen!!

name: Katrine Nielsen
title: I ordered my package twice and did not…
review:
I ordered my package twice and did not receive it. I got in contact with customer service after several days, when they finally responded, the customer service guy just left the chat before I even was done. I find this so unacceptable... the worst customer care I have experienced.
And I still have not received my dress and ASOS won’t help me. I used to love asos,but if this is how they handle Christmas time and their customers, I have to say, I am very disappointed

name: Amber
title: Served by a very rude individual on…
review: Served by a very rude individual on live chat who was blatantly unwilling to help. They will take your money but refuse to help with a missing refund. Awful customer experience

name: Julie lewis
title: Returned 2 items on the 12 December
review: Returned 2 items on the 12 December . Still not showing as returned despite supplying asos with returns receipts and tracking numbers. Emailed about half a dozen times none of the so-called customer care team has solved the problem even emailed the chief executive don't know what's going on with them  I now going to have to escalate the complaint .

name: C Pratt
title: My parcels are regularly not delivered…
review: My parcels are regularly not delivered next day despite paying for next day delivery. The customer service team send a generic email saying sorry. Asos you need to stop using Hermes, they do not deliver on time, they are usually take 2 days and miss the time slot they say it will be delivered in. Please switch back to DPD.

name: Kyrani Reneau
title: horrible service
review: Don’t ever return an item to this place. You will not get your money back!

name: Jones
title: White airmax/already worn. ALOT
review: Ordered a pair of white air max trainers £100........they arrived looking like they had been used on a marathon. Scuffs, Ripped threads, food stains. No joke. The customer service trying to sort it out is a joke. Automated bots

name: Judy Gittelsohn
title: Unsatisfied
review: Charlotte did not express any concern or care for my predicament and lied about whether or not ASOS had a telephone number while I was on the phone with ASOS

name: MMX VIII
title: I have been charged at the checkout
review:
I have been charged at the checkout, PayPal has sent me the confirmation email, but the items l order are still in the bag showing as not ordered yet..

Customer care agent Kinga was zero help. 
Will shop elsewhere. Thanks for your checkout basically robbing me, and then providing no help, oh expect for telling me to just order it again,... Yeah pay twice, great service

name: kin hing li
title: Worst experience ever
review:
Worst experience ever. 
How they don’t have customer support. Tried to call over 30 times, there is no one answer the call and email. When I went to the centre getting my order, a staff’s attitude is very poor, blame me like I giving them the a trouble. Using skynet Is such nightmare

name: Sydney
title: Awful customer service
review: Awful customer service. I paid extra for 2 day shipping. My package never arrived and I was told to wait for two weeks to see if it showed up. My customer service rep Kashana advised that the package was no longer in her control and not her fault and continued to end the chat while I was still typing.

name: NS
title: Misleading exchange
review:
I ordered a variety of items from asos on 29/11/19 and recieved my delivery on 09/12/19. I kept the items that were suitable. 4 items were sent back on 10/12/19 at 13:47. 3 items had been selected for a refund and 1 was requested for an exchange. I recieved an email today at 16:57 stating all of the items had been refunded, which I did not want. I first attempted contact around 7pm but had no luck. I recontacted Asos at 23:08 explaining the occurrence to the unhelpful Marta. I was given this - 'I’ve had a look and can see that we still have the jacket in stock – I’m sorry we weren’t able to replace this for you. It could be that none were available when we went to replace your order, which is why we weren’t able to replace it for you' then this 'as the refund has already been accepted by your bank, we're unable to send a replacement.The refund was processed on 13th December. Please allow up to 10 working days for the money to appear in your account. If you'd like, you could place a new order for the jacket and I'll refund your delivery charge. After you've received your shipping confirmation email, just reply to this email with your new order number - and we'll arrange your refund.' I think offering me free delivery was a terrible option, considering it is a mistake on their part. I mentioned I didn't see why I should be paying the now full price for an item where I had asked for it to be exchanged when it was a mistake on their part. Along with wondering if they had my form to view this error on their end. I got offered a 20% voucher, still not good enough when the item was 30% less and I didn't make an error they did. I opted for their exchange service which they have not honoured. I was then given another sad response 'We would only be able to offer a 20% code. The jacket could have been out of stock at the time, in which scenario we would refund you, but may have come back into stock.
I'm not able to get your form, this would be at our warehouse.' The availability of this item in the size I have wanted has consistently been available every day since I sent the item back as that is what the website is still currently showing. I asked for this to be escalated as the outcome was not satisfying as I reiterate they have made the error. I was told it would not be escalated as the sales have ended. What does that matter? An escalation was my request. What I was finally left with... 'I completely understand, however the refund has been accepted by your bank and the price has changed so all I could offer is a 20% goodwill gesture.
*my response*
[23:25:49] What u are offering isn't enough
[23:25:57] I didnt ask for a refund
ASOS
[23:26:10] As I'm not able to help further and I've already given you a 20% promo code, I'll close the chat.
[23:26:11] ASOS have ended the chat

I think this is a real sign of a company trying to manipulate you to spend more on an item they offer exchanges regardless of being bought in the sale. The mistake is from their end and I am clearly being fobbed off with a good will gesture than a solution. Avoiding this being escalated is truly unprofessional.

name: Joanna Boura
title: Would give 0 stars if I could
review:
Would give 0 stars if I could! Have been waiting for a parcel since 28-11-19. 
Hermes tracking on the 10-12-19 said “parcel will be on the move within 24 hours” it is now the 18th December and no update! This is a disgrace!! ASOS said speak to Hermes and Hermes say speak to ASOS

name: jeannot costigan
title: My order was cancelled and  didn't…
review:
My order was cancelled and  didn't received any email
it was for christmas
waht a shame

name: Chủ Nhật
title: DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM
review: DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM. They are scam company that only want your money and you will need to wait more than a month for your parcel to be deliver. All the 5 stars reviews are fake and make by a bot.

name: Karen
title: BEWARE
review: If there were 0 stars they wouldnt get 1. I believe they make money by scamming people out of their money, keeping it for interest for months before agreeing to refund when products don’t turn up. They are rude, lie and appalling customer service. You can’t get a straight answer about where your order is and they refuse to cancel saying it’s on its way when it’s not then months later they offer a refund. STAY AWAY!

name: Rachael Heesom
title: Delivery was changed and I wasn't made…
review: Delivery was changed and I wasn't made aware so now left with out gifts for Christmas. Customer service chat was no help at all.

name: Melinda Cole
title: My order was lost in the warehouse.
review:
My order was lost in the warehouse.
No apologies. I was told to cancel and reorder. No good for me as I live on the Isle of Wight. Now I have to go shopping on Christmas Eve! And I purchased premium shipping for £9.95.

name: Daisy Lengthorn
title: MY SECOND POOR REVIEW IN TWO DAYS
review: MY SECOND POOR REVIEW IN TWO DAYS, after already having a crap journey with ASOS with them telling me 22 days after placing my order it was out of stock I requested a refund on Saturday. I received an update today to say that my parcel that was out of stock has now been delivered... no parcel?! For the guy to then turn around and say my refund was never even placed!!! So angry at this company and has anyone contacted me to apologise... nope. So very disappointed in this service. I understand it is Christmas and a busy time but do not run a company if you cannot manage it.

name: Yasmina Yasnab
title: Loyal Customer for 10 years !
review: I have been a loyal Asos customer for almost ten years now ! Never had any problems with them until 3 weeks ago when I received an order with 3 pairs of trainers missing, I contacted them and they gave me a refund. Then few days later I placed another order for some trainers again wich I never received ! Something with Asos and DPD, once again they refunded me. Once again I placed another order for another pair of trainers, and I received a beanie instead !🤦🏻‍♀️ i thought ok I’ll give them one more chance, ordered trainers again and a pair of ugg boots and some jeans. Received everything but the two pairs of shoes. Had to contact them again and now they blocked my account, banned me from buying from them and wants me to pay for the missing shoes ! Are you freaking kidding me Asos! Something is definitely wrong with their warehouse since November but instead of finding what is happening they blame the customer ! Do Not Buy From Them !

name: Mr David Clayden
title: no response or option to change
review: Needed to change my delivery address but was unable to do so. Contacted ASOS three times with no response and my order was returned back to them without me being given the option to change a delivery address with the courier. As a result the Black Friday discount has been and gone if I place a reorder this will no longer be available. There was no need for the items to be returned to ASOS I simply needed to be able to change my address. Not quite sure how such a big company can not even respond to 2 emails and their Facebook messenger or have a courier service that doesn’t allow you to redirect your order. A token 15% discount has been given on a future order but that won’t match what I originally ordered. Non existent customer service and an inadequate solution provided

name: Customer
title: SENT ME A USED SHIRT
review:
SENT ME A USED SHIRT

I know this sounds absurd...but I literally captured it on camera, and instead of my boots, I received a WORN IN, USED shirt with HAIR on it, and I also received new children's pants...like what?! I have returned my items for a refund because ASOS customer service denied me any compensation or anything for their mistake and instead, didn't refund me on shipping, made me go through this whole process...even though I received completely the incorrect order. Honestly, I contacted them on every platform and their response rates were awful, and they were rude as well. I have never been treated so poorly by a company. I had fine experiences with ASOS before, so I thought I could trust them...but this one AWFUL experience outweighs them all. please please dont trust ASOS.


Also im looking to write a review straight on the website on the item I purchased and they dont offer reviews per item....THERES A REASON...be cautious

name: Niamh
title: Asos customer service is absolutely…
review: Asos customer service is absolutely terrible. They do not reply to customers

name: Ky
title: BOYCOTT ASOS!!!
review:
IF ANYONE IS ABOUT TO ORDER ON ASOS DELIVERY FOR CHRISTMAS DONT DO IT!!!! ITS A SCAM!! 
What ASOS fail to tell you is that if you do a next day delivery and it does not show up, they cannot investigate until 4 DAYS passed your delivery due date!! As that is there contract with the couriers! You most probably won’t get your delivery before Christmas! ASOS will not do anything until then! In fact ASOS state that they allow those 4 extra days for the courier to deliver it. So why are YOU(ASOS) making  false promises on your website???? ALSO for everyone to know, IF you do a STANDARD delivery which is what I did, and it does not turn up on the day of delivery, they will  won’t investigate it until 7 DAYS AFTER THE DELIVERY DATE as they allow an extra 7 days for the courier to deliver!!!! 
SO PLEASE, DO NOT ORDER THINGS FROM ASOS IF YOU REALLY NEED SOMETHING BY A CERTAIN DATE AS THERE IS NO GUARANTEE IT WILL COME. WHEN IT DOESNT THAT WONT INVESTIGATE IT UNTIL 4-7 DAYS PASS! ASOS website is very misleading!! ASOS YOU NEED TO POST THIS ON YOUR WEBSITE BECAUSE YOUR OUT HERE RUINING PEOPLES LIVES & CHRISTMAS PRESENTS!!! Your quick to take our hard earned money but can not deliver what you advertise!!! THE COURIER IN PARTICULAR I AM REFERRING TO IS HERMES!!! THEY ARE ABSOLUTE CRUD!!! FIND A REPLACEMENT ASAPPPP!!! THE NEVER DELIVER ON TIME!! ALWAYS DAYS TO WEEKS LATER!!! SORT IT OUT ASOS!!!!! & TAKE RESPONSIBILITY!!!!! YOU SIGNED UP HERMES DON’T RUN AWAY FROM THIS!!!!
If you don’t mind waiting weeks/months for something the go ahead and order from ASOS, BUT if not don’t waste your time with ASOS!! Don’t waste your money paying £9.95 for the year either as that does not work either! ASOS do not take responsibility for their orders they just care about taking your money. TOTAL SCAMMERS!!!

IT THEN GETS WORSE!! MY DELIVERY FINALLY SHOWED UP THREE DAYS LATER, AND THEN IT HAS TWO ITEMS MISSING IN IT!!! THESE PEOPLE TAKE THE LIVING MICK!!!! THEN THEY TELL ME THEY CANT ORDER A REPLACEMENT FOR 48HRS & EVEN THEN IT WILL BE ON SUPPOSED NEXT DAY DELIVERY SO PLUS ANOTHER 24HRS!! I WONT BE SEEING THESE THINGS UNTIL NEXT WEEK!!! MY CHRISTMAS PRESENTS ARE RUINED!!! DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME ON ASOS!!! THEY ARE AN ABSOLUTE JOKE!! ALL THEY CARE ABOUT IS TAKING YOUR MONEY!!!

name: Rachel
title: Rude Rebecca
review:
Spoke to a woman called Rebecca and she was very rude.
I havent received my next day delivery order( which I was meant to receive yesterday) and I was told last night to speak to someone today and I have. Then just been told to wait till tomorrow. I am getting sick of not receiving my order and keep being told to wait till tomorrow, when I ordered next day delivery.

name: Jonathan Spence
title: If you want to buy goods and have them…
review: If you want to buy goods and have them delivered when you requested and paid for..... I dont know say NEXT DAY DELIVERY... then this isnt the company for you......and when you try to contact them they dont respond..... Tried facebook..... Live chat....... Phone lines....... No response on any.... But they took the £400 on time..... Shocking behaviour..... Will never use again..... Check out there facebook page and you will see theres more than me with this issue..... Find it strange how the reviews never get to this site though....... Hmmmm

name: Geo
title: Not good enough
review:
Unfortunately my experience has been similar to others. Placed an order on the 18th. Receive an email on the 19th informing me my parcel is with courier (Hermes) and to click here to track.

It's now the 22nd. Tracker states they have not received the order. I need this gift by the 23rd before I leave for Xmas. Spoke with Claudia at customer services and was told there's nothing they can do. She can't contact Hermes to find out the status of my order but they do have it, they just haven't scanned it yet. "Hopefully" it will arrive on the 23rd but there's no guarantees now, they might scan it today... Today is a Sunday. Hopefully isn't the answer I'm looking for, I appreciate Xmas is a busy period but I need this present to arrive on time or the ability to cancel and receive a refund so I can purchase a new gift elsewhere. Amazon and other have managed last minute (18th) orders fine. Claudia explained she's done all she can to help and promptly closed the chat. ASOS have to be able to contact their 3rd party courier to check an order and provide a status update. Maybes and hopefully's aren't good enough, sorry.

name: Stephanie Winder
title: Worst customer service!!!!!!
review: Worst customer service!!!!!!

name: Jamie Wilson
title: Gone Bald dealing with them
review:
Their customer service has me ripping my ******** hair out. 

I have been messaging them for the last 10days about a missing delivery and we still haven't got past the security questions. 
Every couple of days i get a message asking another single question.. answer.. 2 days later another question.. answer and so on.
Why not just ask me them all at once if you're so busy.

Save yourselves the pain

name: simon dutton
title: I placed an order on the 29th November…
review: I placed an order on the 29th November and the items were due for delivery on the 10th December. Items still hadn't arrived on the 16th so I decided to contact customer service via facebook messenger, this proved a very poor service as I only received automated messages and didn't get an answer to my question. I then decided to email which again only received very vague responses not answering my questions. I then tried the 3rd contact option which was live chat, finally i got to speak to someone. This person informed me that the order was cancelled due to an error with the card. I said this was impossible as I used Klarna, the customer service operator then apologised and said it was a tech issue. This was the reason why I wasn't informed, nor was my account updated. I then asked as it was an issue from ASOS end can they honer the price of the products i ordered. They said they couldn't, they could only offer me 15% which no where near covered the discount I received when placing the order! so all in all I lost out and received extremely poor and inadequate customer service from such a big company!

name: Izabela Adamczewska
title: rude and disrespectful
review: Spoke to Stuart about missing items in my order, he was so rude and closed the chat window on me giving generic (probably copy paste template) comment and that’s it, I was cut off. There goes the good work Lauren did yesterday. So disappointed with how this person handled the customer complaint... seriously considering if I’m gonna be using ASOS again.

name: circus vines
title: Worst experience ..
review: Worst experience ... i have order alot of stuff which was on sale on black friday  ... they told me your products will be deliver to you not more than 14days which was already too long but i didnt receive any email, message from asos team after waiting of almost 24days then i decided to contact them .... i have contacted them online after waiting one hour in a queue ... they told me your order was cancelled by asos... i told them you didn't gave me a single message about it ... they literally said you can order again  ... what a great disrespect i got from asos ... we used to buy alot of stuff from asos but now i strongly dislike the company because they dont give respect to their customers... i can give you proof if you want

name: Doris Escobar
title: Asos, dissapointed customer
review: Asos, people please dont order with asos, i placed an order on the first of december, they only not deliver my item to a click and collect point, the did not pass the informatio  to dpdof where the oarcel need it to go, they return the parcel to asos as dpd didnt have an address, but still have ti wait 7 to 10 days for refund of money, the time has gone snd still called them to ask for my money back snd they said the sustem its been down, so tgey can not access my account, my son was left without his xmas present, because asos failed him, its been 23 days since i orden ftom them and i dont have my money back, i urge people to rethink to order from asos, as you dont want to be dissapointed, and money stress over the xmas period

name: Luke Hardie
title: Couldn’t deliver in a brothel
review: Couldn’t deliver in a brothel. There customer service team is awful with the same generic responses. I’ve seen more intelligence on The Undateables.

name: A 1
title: ASOS Agent LUKE is so unkind
review:
ASOS Agent LUKE is so unkind
ASOS Agent LUKE does not say hello
ASOS Agent LUKE makes racism
ASOS Agent LUKE hates to work
ASOS Agent LUKE is a lot slow

name: Ruth Crook
title: I ordered on Black Friday with premium…
review:
I ordered on Black Friday with premium delivery. I was told it would arrive on the 11/11. You then used a subcontractor and they delivered to my work address between 7-10pm, once, with the promise of delivering twice more and if not successful this would be returned. I couldn’t reach anyone from your customer Services team and eventually on the 12th, it was refunded.
I haven’t been offered the product back at the reduced rate. Really disappointing service.

name: Laura Frood
title: Can’t handle the Christmas rush.
review:
Can’t handle the Christmas rush.

Ordered several items, Paid for next day delivery only to be now told they will be delivered in January? Refused to refund my money even though the items will be useless by the time they arrive as it’s after Christmas when I was giving them as gifts

name: Jenny Murphy
title: No order. No update. Avoid.
review:
I ordered my items 8th Dec for delivery on the 17th Dec as shown. This did not arrive by the 18th. Tracking revealed it had not reached Hermes. I contacted them on the 20th at 10am. I was told reorder would take 24 hours. No such reorder was completed. Today I had to call and cancel the order.

This is horrendous service. 1) delay; 2) no updates; 3) after chasing there was no follow through with the reorder. I have scheduled a refund but this has been a huge inconvenience. Me, my friends and family, will never use ASOS again.

name: Sophie
title: NEVER ORDERING ASOS AGAIN
review: I ordered around £150 worth of items from ASOS for Christmas presents which were meant to be delivered today. I got an email this morning saying that my items had been returned and would be refunded when they were never even delivered to me!!! I spoke to customer service on the chat function to ask what on earth had happened and when delivery would be done. They said that the items had been returned and that I had no other option that to reorder all of the items on the website if they were still available. I explained that this was not an acceptable solution because I was meant to be guaranteed delivery today and got no response. I have a concierge in my building there 8 - 8 7 days a week and I have been working from home to take the delivery and there is no way that they even bothered to try and deliver because neither myself nor the concierge were contacted. I explained that this would mean that the items would not arrive in time for Christmas and they did not care and I got no apology. I explained that I was very disappointed and upset and they just asked me to close the chat! Disgusted and completely unacceptable. No wonder ASOS is performing so poorly.

name: Chelsea Gibbs
title: Worst customer service ever!
review: I have used ASOS a fair amount over the years but over the last year I have not been happy with the quality of some products and found the customer service absolutely atrocious. I recently returned a coat that the poppers had broken off after less than a handful of wears to which they wouldn't refund me for as the warehouse had written that it wasn't a faulty item. Surely a popper is supposed to be used and sewn strong enough to handle that for more than 3 wears? I was told there was nothing they could do and they trust their warehouse staff to get it right (because obviously humans never make mistakes) basically insinuating that I am lying. This was the final straw and they have now lost a customer. There is a reason such a huge company has no contact numbers on their website, because they obviously couldn't handle the volume of calls they would get from unhappy customers. They only good thing they have going for them is Klarna...

name: H
title: ASOS plan
review: ASOS plan, heavily discount on black Friday to look appealing, then cancel orders and make people buy for full price or with minimal discount.

name: Ross Keele
title: Unreliable shipper and unresponsive service...
review: Items purchased a month before Christmas with a quoted 16 December delivery, and... nothing. Christmas Eve, and no gift for my son. So disappointed. Customer service could only suggest it may arrive by mid-January. Unable or unwilling to refund until that time. My other items from UK, purchased later than this one, arrived on time, as did purchase from China and USA.

name: Rob Thorogood
title: Rubbish service
review: Rubbish service, keep being told" bear with us" about my delivery not giving me any info on when I will recieve a new delivery date, my delivery didnt get delivered to the correct destination through Collect+ spoke to Collect+ about it and they investigated and found it was delivered somewhere else but it actually wasnt because I went to the destination it was accidentally delivered to, to find out it wasnt delivered and spoke to ASOS today with someone called JULYAN who didnt give me any update regarding my delivery, then ended the chat with me the customer when I still had questions regarding my delivery.

name: Sonia
title: One of the worst customer services…
review:
One of the worst customer services teams in the industry. I love the website but the service if you have any issues with your order is very very poor. This is why companies like Amazon and Apple or Nike thrive because they always think of a way how to help a customer, all I can hear from Asos is " Sorry, There is nothing we can do". A business at this level should never say that. 
For example I placed an order and for some reason there was a system or website glitch and it didnt't go through and I want to still place it but my discount code isn't working as it expired 6 hours ago. Instead of providing me with a new code or figuring out a way on how I can placed my order they prefer to loose me as a customer. 
Very disappointed with such a poor customer experience.

name: Emilie
title: I Will Never shop at Asos again
review:
Dear Asos. 
I was once a happy customer, but after today, I will Never purchase anything from you again. 
I have Never had this poor service from Asos. The 13th of december I purchased an item which should be a Christmas present. You charged my card the 17th of december. The item was set to arrive the 21st of december. The 20th of december I recieve a notification, that the parcel Will be a bit late - max one working day. 

However, even the 21st of december the order was not marked as shipped, so I became suspicious - the parcel could in no Way reach Denmark the same Day it was shipped. After trying to get in contact with your customerservice 4 times, finally I reach you via your chat function. Your employee looks into the matter and informs me that: 
 I was notified by e-mail that they made a mistake and the item was out of Stock. This e-mail should I have recieved the 21st of december. 

But I dont Think you ever sent that e-mail: It is not in my inbox, nor in my spam filter and the order has been marked as recieved until this moment - if you had notified my, Why would you not cancel the order in your own system as Well? It does not make sense. Fuethermore, when checking in your track your order it Said that the parcel was shipped from your warehouse - that seems impossible if you dont have it. 

You leave with a terrible experience of your service: If the item was not in Stock, Why would you wait notifying me until 7-8 days after the purchase? And Why on earth would you charge me for a product you dont even have? 
Now I must disappoint a person tomorrow Christmas eve, and I am really really disappointed that you at least have not informed me. Will I get my money back?

name: L
title: False advertisement of next day delivery
review:
ASOS advertise next day delivery and have advertised on their website if you order by the 23rd of December you will recive your delivery in time for christmas.
Unfortunately I have experienced that anytime Hermes are delivering it is never on time. I ordered on the 20th and no one is able to tell me if my christmas gifts will come on time. ASOS continue to use this company that is constantly letting people down and I am without gifts for Christmas. Don't false advertise if you cannot keep promises! I also have Premier Delivery which is pointless as I order about twice a month and in the last year I have had maybe 2 or 3 deliveries nexr day. I am going to cancel my account as the customer service team were also not helpful. Oh and they dont have an 'official complaints department...' No wonder...

name: San
title: Terrible so-called customer service
review: Terrible so-called customer service. They just go in circles around the clear solution. Offering everything but appropriate solutions to issues caused by them. This is the 5th time i’ve had to complain via twitter and they’re not so understanding. Better off directly calling  them as they’re less likely to be so ignorant

name: Niamh
title: Terrible online chat
review: I returned some items in the condition I had received them as they were not suitable. I got the refund from one item but I am still waiting on the refund for the second item for over a month. Any time I go to use the online chat help, they take forever to reply and then close the chat without any resolution. It's very frustrating

name: Anonymous
title: Awful customer service
review: Awful customer service, lied to me about when I will be receiving my refund for my missing parcel. When I contacted them to say I still haven't been refunded they ignored my message, I contacted them again and they said that my refund had now been processed but it would take 10 working days.

name: Nearly customer
title: Something has started to go very wrong at asos
review:
I used to absolutely love asos. I have had Premier Delivery for at least 3 years and never had an issue. I always select next day delivery and it always comes. 
However, for the second time in a fortnight I have not received my order on the day selected. I ordered on Monday for specific day delivery of Sunday. This never came on Sunday and decided to come on Monday instead - when I was at work and unable to receive it. I then placed an order on Friday afternoon for next day delivery on Saturday. It is now Sunday and still yet to receive my items.
Asos used to be great, but these two experiences in such a short amount of time make me think something has suddenly started to go very wrong at asos.

name: Rhonna Hamilton
title: Shocking service!
review: Shocking service ordered a Christmas present due to arrive on 18th December. Didn't come and delivery not attempted told it would be delivered on 19th. This didn't happen either. No way to contact the delivery partner ASOS use so as contract with ASOS I contacted them. They didn't respond for hours and eventually sent a message during the night saying to now wait until 31st December and then they will discuss replacement or refund. Then they promptly close chat!. Meanwhile if you make a new order they can despatch in time for Christmas! Not acceptable

name: customer
title: ASOS HUGELY LET DOWN AND FEEL DUPED
review: After ordering on Black Friday I sent one much waited for item that I had managed to get at a 70% reduction back for a smaller size which the form sent with the order said was ok to do....  I noticed a couple of days ago that I have been refunded not given an exchange.  I have never had an issue with ASOS in the 20 years that I have used them until now and I have been reading the reviews on here  and I see that what has happened to me  has happened to several others complaining on here..... ASOS shouldn't  send out a slip saying that it is ok to exchange  sizes/ colour if they have no intention of sending out one - I wouldn't have bothered sending a 12 back for a 10 if they had made it clear that as from what I can gather on here they expect me now to re-buy my £22.50 dress for full price at £75 even though the form with the order offered an exchange option which I selected.  Misinformation and very misleading/ lies. Disgusted.  ASOS really seem to be letting down A LOT of customers this Christmas from what I am  reading and what I have experienced and the saddest thing is, is that they really don't seem to give 2 *****.  I feel quite honestly tricked/ mislead into returning a dress I was desperate for under the advice from ASOS it would be exchanged only to have had it taken from me.  I am at a loss for words  at  how crap  this  company have became from what I have read.

name: Customer- Sile
title: ASOS no customer service
review:
Never again! My son (teenager) ordered clothes for himself for Christmas- I paid for it - package arrived thrown in front of workplace front porch - totally insecure - he could have easily handed It to the reception desk - we have it on cctv - the package had hole in it & 3 items missing - this was over a wk ago - I got onto to delivery company- they apologised & said they couldn’t do anytyabout the product so I’d have to contact ASOS - very tricky - after 4 days ASOS Responded asking the very questions we (my son & I ) have sent about 20 times now (what was your order no? Etc)
Really frustrating & time wasting - son very disappointed he only got half of his Christmas clothes!!
There’s no one to talk to in ASOS they make it soo hard to ask for help that you give up!

name: Laura Wood
title: Slow and poor response
review: Communication has been terrible. I have been trying to sort out a refund since October 23rd 2019 and still waiting to hear a reply on multiple channels - Facebook, Twitter and Email. Really discouraged from using ASOS again as I have had problems with this in the past too.

name: Dave Thomas
title: I have to say ASOS are probably the…
review:
I have to say ASOS are probably the best reason in the world to get back to Hight Street shopping, tried to buy shoes for my daughter for Xmas, the couriers Hermes lied 4 days running that they attempted delivery when I was home all of those days !!!! Spoke to ASOS everyday they were totally unhelpful bordering on arrogant, I suspect that older clients retired such as myself are probably treated as 2nd class customers. My advice would be to avoid ASOS at all costs, their Delivery logistics are overburdened, this results in pot luck when it comes to receiving your goods.
David Thomas

name: So
title: Awful service when things go wrong
review: Awful service when things go wrong, the chat function people take an age to respond and also zero information just quote policy can’t help and unable to help when failed deliveries

name: Charlotte
title: Non existent customer service!
review: My parcel was delivered to an address 10 minutes away, inside a terminal at the airport. I had to go and collect this, incurring fees that get charged to even enter the terminal . Customer service won’t even respond to me. I’ve had one response not even acknowledging what I have said. 100% won’t use again if they can’t even be bothered to read my messages and respond appropriately. I paid for delivery to then have to pay more charges to collect! Disgusting service.

name: Jay
title: Waste of time! AVOID!!!
review: Waited over 2 weeks for a update on my delivery. Never recieved the items. Tried contacting via facebook waited 5 days then they replied asking for further info, after providing they never replied. Then waited 45 minutes for their live chat and got told it was cancelled and I was never charged. Never recieved an email to confirm this, so I wasted my time for nothing. Avoid at all cost!!!

name: daniel hales
title: Jokers
review: Jokers ! They use Hermes which are by far the worst courier! ASOS also send automated messages which are no help whatsoever!

name: Bruce Aylward
title: Rubbish service
review: I placed an order and was told it had been shipped, when the expected delivery date arrived but no items arrived I checked only to find it said it was shipped on the delivery date, so I contacted ASOS to be told there was an issue and the items had not been shipped at all, this is the second time they have done this to me I have only used them twice, there will not be a third, appalling service and communication, there's plenty of other suppliers I'd advise try one of the others

title: No help
review: Kept disconnecting. Then told they could not help. When I asked for the number for customer services was told to use social media or live chat and that they do not have a customer number to call.Even though they were unable to help me on live chat! Went back and forth for over 40mins! I called 02077561000 - ASOS customer services. It does exist.

name: Kerry
title: Wish I could leave zero stars
review: Wish I could leave zero stars, rude and unhelpful, disgusting attitude. Poor performance all round.

name: Krystle
title: If you're sent the wrong item
review:
If you're sent the wrong item, expect that you will be asked to return these for a refund. By doing so, you forego any sales you took advantage of. They refuse to correct their mistakes and will not compensate you for the money, time or effort lost. You almost have to anticipate they'll make mistakes in your order and somehow foolproof it by buying multiple sizes and returning them because you can ABSOLUTELY TRUST that they will put their business above your needs as a customer. No point telling their support team as they have a script that they won't budge away from. Expect to talk to a recorded message. Apparently by saying "I'm sorry" and "I understand", it makes it 'personalised'.

Main message: if THEY make a mistake on your order, expect to cop the loss. Their size and popularity makes them believe they're above reproach. Vote with your money guys. There is no buyer guarantee here.

name: Anne Boyle
title: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE —- Order placed…
review: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE —- Order placed on 2 Dec, funds taken from bank 4 Dec, requested Click and Collect option with est delivery date of 11 Dec. No communication from ASOS at all. Chased ASOS up on Wed 18 Dec, as unable to access my account to track package. Since that date several emails have been sent to ASOS providing information they have requested to prove my identity, I have also provided evidence that payment has been made to ASOS. I was told at one point that the matter was being referred to a “specialist team” I have yet to hear from them.  What I have received though are several generic emails from customer service staff who have clearly not read the notes as if they had they would be aware that I am unable,to access my account and have already provided the information they have requested. I have requested that a I receive a full refund as goods have not been received and the fact that it was a Christmas present, this request has been completely ignored!!!!!!

name: Kay
title: Such a shame
review:
It's a shame you guys are not able to issue exchanges. Especially when I've sent in my item, you have confirmed receiving item.

I would like the same item, just one size bigger.  It shouldn't be difficult.

name: Amy
title: Such a horrendous experience..
review: Such a horrendous experience... paid for next day delivery nothing arrived, so waited a few extra days as I know it’s busy with Christmas. A week later still nothing and finally after about 20 messages to ASOS twitter they finally decide to track my order and realise it’s lost. I then get the option of replacement items being sent to me or a refund? I still wanted the items so replacement it was, to then be told 2 items were not available. Absolute joke.

name: mohamad safieddine
title: Bad quality and terrible customer service
review:
The quality of their branded clothing is disastrous. I ordered £200 worth of stuff and two of the sweaters had to be thrown away after one wash as they completely shrunk.

I asked for a refund but they make it difficult for you to claim back. It is apparent that dont care about their customers.

Wont be ordering from them again.

name: Nanna Duelund
title: Honestly I would have given no stars if…
review: Honestly I would have given no stars if I could. I received a dress with big ugly brown stains on it, obviously been used. It is probably the worst online service I've come across. I've tried to contact customer service for 5 days with no answer whatsoever. It's infuriating. Never buying from Asos again.

name: Alice
title: Delivery very poor items didn’t arrive
review:
Delivery very poor items didn’t arrive, I paid for next day delivery however I was told I had to wait a week before the will consider giving me a refund incase the items 
turn up.
After waiting 4 day for a response on Facebook messenger, I managed to finally get a response. I also tried online chat but it kept bouncing back and not letting me open chat.

name: Samuel
title: I have paid for next day delivery for…
review: I have paid for next day delivery for Christmas, delivery never arrived after waiting in all day, courier claims to have attempted to deliver and they have not. All Christmas presents currently missing, no refund available for the next day delivery I paid, unable to leave the parcel in a safe place and will not re-direct the delivery to my place of work after their error. Disgraceful

name: michael mather
title: Poor service.
review:
Cannot be bothered to reply to my messages.

Purchased jeans in sale then returned asking for a diffrent size. They cancel and refunded wich i wanted diffrent size.

Now if i want them i have to pay the full price. Mickey mouse customer service.

name: Nancy TH
title: BUYERS BEWARE!!!
review: Ordered an item for Christmas almost a month ago. It’s not here. So disappointed. Ether is no phone number to call. They ask you to tweet or email and then you get no response. DO NOY BUY ANYTHING from this company if you want it in a reasonable time frame.

name: Erika
title: Cheaters
review:
First we ordered 2 pregnant jeans, one black and one blue. The black one was over the bump and around 200 dhs. They sent us a black under the bump style which was the half price of the over the bump and aesthetic of it as well. So we paid the double price for a jeans which was actually way cheaper. Well done. 
The next - and last - I've ordered shirts and blazer over 500 dhs. I've never received the order however in the app stands the delivery was signed by my husband. 500 waste for NOTHING. 
WORST COMPANY EVER!

name: Ed
title: Unacceptable service and horrible experience.
review: If I had an opportunity, I would put 0 stars for the service and delivery. Item was ordered 3 weeks ago, I then received a delivery tracking number 2 days later, however there hasn't been any update since and it only says that item hasn't been handed to courier. Contacted ASOS several times after my order didn't arrive on set delivery date, all they saying is to wait another 2 working days, then another 3 working days, now they advised to wait additional 7 working days. What should I be waiting for if item hasn't been even shipped? Absolutely disgusting service! Would never suggest to anyone.

name: Woodpeckers
title: Placed an order that has not been…
review: Placed an order that has not been dispatched, delivered and I can’t get a refund.

name: Karen
title: Impossible to get anyone in customer…
review: Impossible to get anyone in customer services to look into a late delivery. Took the money immediately but don’t bother if the parcel never turns up.

name: Laura Jane
title: Ordered 9 days ago and it still hasn’t…
review: Ordered 9 days ago and it still hasn’t even been SHIPPED yet

name: Lesley Land
title: ASOS ripping customers off as usual
review:
Sadly incredibly poor service from ASOS and still no resolution. 

I renewed and paid for my ASOS Premier on 11th Nov but it hasn’t seemed to register on the site so when I went to place an order with the Black Friday discounts it refused to offer me free Premier Delivery and wanted to charge me £5.95 for next day delivery. Despite chasing ASOS repeatedly to question what happened, everything was selling out. 

After having their iT team look into it, it started working yesterday - Tuesday. When everything I wanted was out of stock. How very convenient. 

I am now incredibly disappointed to see you’ve started charging me from the day I ordered it despite not being able to use it. I asked for the start date to be amended to yesterday and not the 11th Nov as it’s an error with the company that I haven’t been able to do so. I was told they couldn’t do this for ‘legal and security reasons’ which doesn’t make any sense. 

I am fuming and will be taking this further.

name: Alice Wilson
title: There’s always trouble with next day…
review: There’s always trouble with next day delivery. They use the cheapest courier services which always manage to deliver the packages to the wrong addresses.

name: Salman Khan
title: Delivery came on time but the item was damaged!
review:
Delivery came on time but the item was faulty and damaged. Not happy.

Customer service otherwise good!

name: Beth Chick
title: Terrible customer service
review: I am utterly disgusted with the substandard service I received today. I pay for next day delivery and I am having to wait 13 days for my parcel to arrive. Apparently it was my fault, even though EVERY time I place an order It gets sent on my premier delivery. They would do nothing about it and were frankly RUDE to me and said 'well we didn't unselect it for you Beth'. I do not pay for NEXT DAY for it to come in 13 days!!!!

name: Rachael E Pavitt
title: Disgusting customer service
review:
Disgusting customer service! 
Waiting 10 days for an order which hadn't even left their warehouse, not even an email to explain this. 
I had to call to ask them and the only response I got was 'I dont know where this is' which clearly is not good enough! 
I then recieved an email to state itll be delivered on the 9th of december which by no surprise it hasn't turned up!
I havent had a single response to 1 of emails which I have sent 4 all together throughout the 10 days simply asking where my order was. 
The fact I have had to still wait for my order when I knew they could of sent this to me next day delivery when I called and complained but they didn't want to fork out on £6 which is highly embarrassing! 

Personally I wouldn't bother buying from asos you will be left with nothing and no explanation as to why!

name: Roz
title: This order has brought me no end of…
review:
