title: The absolute pinnacle of horrendous customer care
review:
The absolute pinnacle of horrendous customer service. 

It’s like talking to a robot, only, worse. Because with a robot you know it’s a robot so you don’t expect any genuine consideration or care.

The staff are as useful as a bicycle to a fish, repetitively unhelpful, incredulously incompetent and utterly moronic. 

Do yourself a favour and shop absolutely anywhere else.

name: LG
title: Paid 5.95 for nextday delivery on…
review: Paid 5.95 for nextday delivery on Thursday  so expected my parcel on Friday yet I’m still waiting for my parcel today (Monday) talked to the chat about asking for a refund on my extra payment on delivery and all they can offer is to sign up to there newsletter! Disgusting

name: Jacob P
title: STOP!!!!
review:
STOP!!!!
Don't buy anything here...
I bought some this for my wedding the 28/5 express delivery set to the next day.
They withdraw my money 3/6. 

I have not received anything yet..
Can't cancel it...
Still waiting in limbo..
They can't give me an straight up answer..

name: Gemma
title: need new customer service!!!
review: Shocking customer service took 3days to even get a response I no it’s Xmas but really?  When you get an email saying your Hermes driver as you parcel it will be delivered between 12-4 oh yeh great it’s now Monday and nothing, I just get fobbed of by them saying he has till the 31st of dec to deliver correct me if am wrong but when you get a time slot for a delivery you normally get it all there bothered about is he as till the 31st literally talking to my self and won’t explain why I got that email and tracking.there is a time slot for a reason and don’t even get me started contacting Hermes you would be quicker applying to nasa.sick to death of chasing people had enough online shopping forget it especially ASOS

name: Sophie
title: awful customer care and premier delivery is a scam
review: Their customer care is slow and to be honest not very good when you do finally get through. I paid for premier delivery 2 days ago and it still won’t work. All customer care has told me is to log out and back in and that took 20 minutes. Total scam not worth £9.95. wouldn’t recommend. After waiting OVER A MONTH they refunded me instead. There’s cheaper companies who have perfect premier delivery why can’t ASOS (who are more expensive) be able to do the same?

name: Stella Kosma
title: I ordered a pair of shoes from  this…
review:
I ordered a pair of shoes from  this damn website for the first time.It was the first time i did not  check the reviews of the people  they used it and literally i gave them a gift of 55 euros for a pair of shoes which apparently is never going to be delivered and no refund is going to be made.
This website  is a FRAUD.
PAY ATTENTION-FRAUD WEBSITE-ASOS NEDERLANDS

name: Toni Shaw
title: Awful delivery partner
review:
Awful delivery partner - Hermes. 

Still waiting a week later for a parcel, that were Christmas presents. Was told to get in touch at 23.59pm on the 24th December. When I went to do so the chat was offline. I'd sent a message through facebook earlier that day and I'm still waiting a reply. It's now the 27th. The advice now is to wait 48 hours for a replacement order to be processed so god knows when that will be delivered! Instead of keeping customers happy they make excuses for the delivery company. You'd think they would send the replacement order with another company and get it sent next day to make up for it, or even some sort of good will gesture. But no! Absolutely useless.

name: Brady
title: Received incorrect size to what I’d…
review: Received incorrect size to what I’d ordered and ASOS were unable to exchange until I’d waited for the other to be returned. The item went out of stock. Disappointing.

name: Rebecca T
title: Poor customer service
review: Poor customer service. I had paid for Premier delivery (next day delivery for the year) and my parcel arrived after 2 days. No apology, no explanation even when I had contacted them. They could not provide a refund for the delivery or any form of compensation and just stated that delays can happen. Absolutely ridiculous. DO NOT PAY FOR PREMIER NEXT DAY DELIVERY AS ITS A WASTE OF MONEY.

name: Caryn Connor
title: Where is my order??????????
review:
I placed a large order for my sons Christmas and birthday presents (his birthday is the 26th December)  on the 20th December. I paid for next day delivery to ensure we received the order before Christmas. To date I have not received my order, have no confirmation of when it might arrive, have been offered no explanation from ASOS (only an ineffectual ‘sorry’) and no compensation for the fact both his Christmas and birthday were ruined.

Asos take customer service and customer care to a new level of low!

name: kathryn kelly
title: I’ve closed my account
review: I’ve closed my account. It shouldn’t be the customer constantly chasing up an order. The customer should be updated about an order, which didn’t arrive after 20 days of waiting. I was refunded and told to reorder....out of stock! Hmmm?!

name: Justyna K
title: Never received my package
review: Never received my package. Now when I talked to the customer service for the second time they said they can't send me my package. This is a joke! Never ordering from this site again!

name: Victoria Allen
title: I will never rely on Asos delivery dates...
review:
I will never rely on Asos delivery again. My item that I ordered was a game for Xmas day. It never arrived. I ordered this on 12th December and I pay for Asos premier to get next day delivery and it’s Boxing Day and still hasn’t arrived! I got in touch with customer services who have confirmed that there was an issue with the order leaving the warehouse but have never contacted me to tell me this! 
Useless!

name: Asosuser
title: Horrible service
review: After 10 years usung asos and never had single problem in a few days i had all type of problems like discount offers not taken. wrong shipping items and horrible coustemer replay service.

name: Aisling Claffey
title: late delivery even though I paid 12 euro! Ridiculous
review: Out of the 4 delivery options that were given to me at the checkout for ASOS I chose next day delivery which cost €12 as I was led to believe by reviews and friends that their service was reliable. I needed a new dress for a wedding which is why I paid extra for their service. My parcel was due to be delivered on the 27th of December and it is now the 28th of December and there is no sign of my parcel. Their customer care has now told me that my parcel could either be delivered on the 30th of December or the 2nd January. This is so disappointing as my wedding is on the 30th of December, so any parcel delivered would be useless to me. I’m so disappointed that a service which was so highly recommended has let me down and want to warn others about their late delivery, even if you paid extra.

name: Tyrone Smiley
title: THREE MONTHS LATER I AM STILL BANNED…
review:
THREE MONTHS LATER I AM STILL BANNED FROM ASOS AFTER ONE OF MY ITEM WAS STOLEN NO REFUND OR REPLACEMENT HAVE BEEN GIVEN!

ASOS works with DPD delivering company who delivers their items. I had a pair of trainers which was stolen by a driver, I was not present at home to confront the driver on my  tampered packaging.

When I came home to my parcel it had holes at the back of the packaging which was resealed with the ASOS reaseable tape.  I presume the driver poked holes into the packaging to check what was on the receipt, when he saw what was on the receipt the driver opened up the parcel and took the trainers out and re-sealed the packaging. 

When I emailed ASOS with photo evidence on what had happened they told me I would receive an email within 24 hours in regards to my order.

When I received the email it stated it is rare for their items to go missing, therefore they would not deal with the issue and I should contact my bank for a refund. I called multiple times to speak to a manager in regards to this case the first person who I spoked to said I would receive a phone call within 48 hours. When I contacted the ASOS customer care team in regards to speaking to a manager they said due to my case a manager will not be able to speak to me I tried to plead with the customer care team in regards to speaking to a manager to deal with this situation, the customer care team had little care and told me it's out of her hands and I would need to speak to my bank in regards to a refund.

ASOS do not care about their customers they rather label their loyal customers as theifs instead of dealing with their complaints. It's a pity ASOS works in partnership with a untrustworthy company such as DPD. Three months have gone by I have yet to receive an apology or a refund for my missing product also I am Banned from ASOS from making a complaint about my item being stolen!

name: Mo
title: As usual, customer care hands are tight!
review: I am afraid. Customer service could not help with my issue, and instead they asked me to wait for my order to arrive (internationally) then return it for free. I had given different suggestions to the representative, however, they still could not help. I decided to completely cancel and return the whole order as a result. I do not think I will be ordering again from ASOS.

name: Shana Nadine
title: I am quite frustrated after this most…
review: I am quite frustrated after this most recent chat. Not necessarily with the agent but with the process. Today is the 10th day since my return was received by ASOS and I have yet to receive my refund. The information that the agent provided does not agree with the information associated with the tracking number provided by ASOS and UPS. Not to mention the fact that it is quite ridiculous that its 2019 and it takes your company 10 DAYS to process a refund for an item that has been sitting in your warehouse since Monday, December 9th @ 2:20 PM.

name: Claire
title: Terrible service from customer…
review: Terrible service from customer services. Package did not show and alex from asos seemed less than bothered. Do not use - plenty other websites with better service.

name: Elle Luhman
title: Been waiting 2 WEEKS for my delivery…
review:
Been waiting 2 WEEKS for my delivery and still don’t have it
Shocking

name: Jill Lawrence
title: Non delivery of my order
review: I placed an Order for a £25 voucher on 18th Dec for delivery by email 20th Dec.  22nd Dec and it has still not been received.  Tried several times to get on to chat, but system just hangs for hours, and hours and hours with no success getting through to ask about my order.  Very disappointed with this company customer services and will not use them again.

name: Sophie lambert
title: I wanted to order a pair of trainers…
review: I wanted to order a pair of trainers and saw they were new in stock full price. On searching to see if there were any more I liked I saw the same pair on their site but at a reduced price (same image advertised), but out of stock. They had different product codes but exact same pair. On chatting to Asos they state they do not offer price promise anymore and cannot honour the lower price as the cheaper we’re ‘old stock’. I think this is misleading. The were exactly the same product!

name: Shopaholic 😉
title: Disgusting, disgusting, disgusting!!!!!
review:
Shocking customer service, Incomplete parcels sent (especially when placing order at night) Missing items, no way to get anything sorted at all. Customer service keeps reassuring you that they’ll send you a replacement of the missing items but it never happens. Rude emails as respond to your query “if you don’t like it just send it back” Misleading information on the website, so be careful because some products might be sold as pack of two but they’ll send you one and if you’ll claim for missing item they’ll change the item description on the website to single to avoid responsibility!!! Disgusting is an understatement! Despite having screenshots of the previous description they’ll just ignore you and say it’s a mistake and get over it! No email with confirmation after a live chat is ended. Ridiculous and disgusting customer service.
Literally you pay a money for a product and ends up being charged for an air in a bag, when you trying to claim a missing items from a parcel, make sure you’re ready to be ignored for long time and then they’ll do everything to prove that you’re not entitled to it. Nobody is there for you to get it sorted!!!
I can’t trust this company anymore as to whether I’ll receive full order or just part of it and then again if I will find myself in a situation to fight over a few quid with customer service or not.

name: Mrs E Irving
title: Do not order from this company they are…
review: Do not order from this company they are a disgrace , I ordered a Xmas present at the end of November, delivery 11th dec , not received , contacted them on Wednesday 18th told me they couldn’t track by parcel and they would get it back to the warehouse and reissue next with another , I would get it on the 19th dec express delivery , I still didn’t get it , I contacted them again on the Friday 20th told me definitely be delivered on  today ( Saturday) told me they would email me , I m still waiting email !!! , contacted them again 3rd time just now , told me item isn’t in stock and have refunded me , call themselves professional they haven’t a clue what they are doing - will not be using them again!!!!- stay away Christmas is ruined as I can’t get the item anywhere else what do I tell my daughter???

name: Tracey Macbeth
title: POOR CUSTOMER SEEVICE.  ALSO WHY DO YOU HAVE TWO TRUST PILOT ACCOUNTS, I CAN SEE THE OTHER ACCOUNT IS NOT GREAT....
review: Ordered Christmas present for my daughter on 20th December and have paid for a years subscription for next day delivery so expected item delivered on 21st December.  Contacted ASOS on 23rd who told me, I would not have them until 30th.  Customer Service would neither refund so I could buy elsewhere or ensure another replacement in time for Christmas so now my I’m going to have to tell my daughter she has no present. Really think you should not advertise delivery in time for Xmas if you cannot deliver in time.  Will be closing my account. Shame you cannot look after your customers as I have been a good customer for many years!

name: Adam
title: ASOS and Hermes..
review: ASOS and Hermes... could you think of a worse combination? Il wait...

name: Kimberley
title: They have lost a loyal customer
review: Terrible and unhelpful customer service. No order when it should have been with me 2 days ago and no clue on when it will be turning up as they have no information on my parcel. I have had to take time out to chase my parcel - as a customer it has caused me stress. I will NEVER be shopping with ASOS again and I suggest others don't unless they change their courier and vastly improve their customer service who can actually do something!

name: Yasmin Russell
title: Awful service incompetent staff
review:
Awful service
Ordered a dress in the Black Friday sale, it didn’t fit so i sent it back and requested another size
I was refunded as they said they didn’t have it in stock so I asked if I could have the difference refunded as it had now gone up in price. The advisor told me that I could have the difference refunded so I ordered it again. Then when I wen to request the refund they’ve changed their minds and said they couldn’t do it!!!! Just appalling lazy service, no apology

name: Proust75032
title: Ordered trainers on 16th December which…
review: Ordered trainers on 16th December which were supposed to be delivered within 3-5 days. Still not delivered on 23rd December. No communication from asos and when contacted, they won't allow me to cancel my order. Appalling appaling service. Chat pretty poor too. I will not use asos again.

name: Sarah Hitchen
title: I am really disappointed with ASOS
review: I am really disappointed with ASOS. After shopping with them for over 12 years their service has suddenly taken a deep and dramatic decline. Black Friday seems to have been a problem from which they are yet to recover. I have a complaint that is relatively simple and minor but have literally had no resolution in over 12 days, despite chasing multiple times. They seem to think that generic holding messages such as "we a really busy right now" will pass muster - they won't. I am seriously considering whether or not to shop with them again, which is sad. I was a Premier customer who spent a relatively large amount of money with them - I doubt I will be the only customer who feels like taking their custom elsewhere. Be careful ASOS, you need to sort things out quickly or experience commercial repercussions...

name: Anonymous
title: AVOID ASOS AT ALL COSTS TERRIBLE…
review: AVOID ASOS AT ALL COSTS TERRIBLE TERRIBLE COMPANY!!! WILL NOT LET ME EXCHANGE MY SHOES FOR THE RIGHT SIZE THAT IS .5 BIGGER. ANY OTHER SHOE COMPANY WOULD LET YOU EXCHANGE BUT NOOOOO NOT ASOS, THEY JUST PROVIDE YOU WITH COLD, NASTY AND RUDE CUSTOMER SERVICE

name: Mia Lev
title: rude and unprofessional
review: rude and unprofessional

name: Mary
title: Poor Service
review: They lost my parcel. They were virtually impossible to contact and apparently have no formal complaint procedure.

name: Lynn Smith
title: Very disappointed..
review:
Very disappointed... I would have left 0 starts if that was an option.  After purchasing trainers with black Friday discount, I then received the wrong size.  I returned with instructions to swap for the correct size that were still in stock only to receive a refund and to be informed that I could re order with only 10% rather than the 30% black Friday offer and that I would then need to pay delivery and contact them after to try and claim back as this was their fault.  

Very poor service from such a large company.  No higher authority and no phone number to speak with someone!!!

name: Lianpher Santiago
title: Been 25 days and my item still has not…
review: Been 25 days and my item still has not arrived and tracking still has not been updated for since 25 days ago.

name: Jamie-lee Tose
title: Returned my items for a refund 12 days…
review:
Returned my items for a refund 12 days ago and yet to receive an email saying ASOS have recieved my goods, let alone a refund. 
Having tried to reach out to them via the messenger (with zero reply) I have taken to email and still have not had my issue resolved. 
Disgusting service

name: James Carter
title: 1 star is been generous
review: 1 star is been generous. Lost my first item and then  it was out of stock and had to wait 2 weeks for a refund.then the 2nd item i found online for half the price and asked for a refund or price match to which they said they dont price match now waiting for ANOTHER  refund

name: Sophie Willott
title: Worst customer service ever
review: Worst customer service ever! The fact they use Hermes deserves a 0 start review! So disappointing

name: Michelle
title: Thanks Asos for the Christmas stress
review:
Early November I started planning what gifts to purchase for family and friends using the Asos app saved items functionality I’ve used successfully over over 10 years (I’m a massive fan of Asos and must have spent thousands of pounds over the years) I waited until the regular Black Friday offers and on 29th November I ordered a number of items to the value of £238. I eagerly awaited my items to be delivered. On Tuesday 10th I receive an email from ASOS stating they have refunded me £238, then on Wednesday I receive an email to say “your order is on its way”. Slightly confused I try to find how to contact someone to ask what is happening here as I’ve now spent 12 days waiting for my order to be delivered (I would like to add in past years I’ve never waited as long for orders as I have this year- the delay in ordered being received across this year has been disappointing)

I contact a very responsive twitter customer service team on Wednesday who after a number of messages can only apologise as they aren’t sure why the order has been randomly cancelled. The only suggestion I receive is feel free to order them again, this isn’t an option for a number of reasons 
- Many items now out of stock
- Not being sold at the low price Black Friday prices I officially purchased for
- With delivery being so slow I won’t get these in time for Christmas now

After my messages backwards and forwards I’m simply told they can’t do anything as they’ve refunded me!

I’m so disappointed especially as I’m now going to have to sacrifice time with my 4 year old once I’m finally finished work for Christmas to go out last minute shopping and probably now spend far more than I had planned. If I had know in advance I could have benefited from other stores Black Friday offers

name: Jazz
title: wrong order delivered and no customer service reply!
review: Absolutely appalling customer service I ordered 3 tracksuits on the 29th November, finally order came on the 10th dec only for me to open it and someone else’s order is in the box!! I’ve paid £70 for tracksuits and received a novelty Christmas tie, socks, a book and drawstring bag!!!! I’ve tried to contact via Facebook messenger and email and had no reply. I have ordered from ASOS previously in the year and never had any issues but this is ridiculous.

name: Amelia
title: As a long standing customer of ASOS I…
review: As a long standing customer of ASOS I shop with them alot and up until now the customer service has been great. Over the last few weeks I have had parcels go missing, items missing from orders, refunds not being processed and absolutely no reply when trying to speak to customer service. I don't know if something has gone wrong over the last couple of weeks or they cannot handle the busy Christmas period - but they have lost a customer in me. I would rate less than 1 star if I could.

name: Oslo
title: They stole my girlfriends money
review:
They stole my girlfriends money. 
They shouldn't even have one star, extremely poor customer service. Don't trust them, use Mastercard so you have some kind of insurance if you absolutely need to shop from them.

name: Katy
title: Appalling service! Thought better of Asos!
review: I found the assistant was unwilling to help or understand my concern. Really bad customer service from ASOS. Expected a lot better being a loyal customer that spends a lot of money with you guys and now lost out on a sale for the sake of a few quid!

name: Nicola Beard
title: Do NOT buy from this dreadful company
review: Do NOT buy from this dreadful company. The customer service is the worst I have ever experienced. Money taken, goods not delivered, no explanation, lied to, ignored, no apology, no customer service telephone number. Literally, do not give a damn about failing to deliver, especially at Christmas time. I honestly believe it is a scam, they take your money even though the item is not in stock and then fob you off for weeks and weeks with lies whilst earning a nice bit of interest on your money. I really wish I could do something more about these illegal practises as I can see that there are many others who feel the same.  Avoid this faceless company at all costs.

name: Kate Hubbard
title: Customer service extremely unhelpful…
review: Customer service extremely unhelpful regarding lost order. Waited 45 mins to talk to an operator for her not be able to help in the slightest.

name: Lauren Shamy
title: Absolute NIGHTMARE: ASOS:24277436
review:
It has been a full week of stress and anxiety attempting to get ASOS to fulfil their Consumer Rights commitment. I actually think my hair is falling out at this point. 

I have been a loyal customer of ASOS for 5 years now, both in New Zealand and in the UK. I have never had any issues until this week long saga has made me question whether ASOS really values their customers above their delivery partner, or at all, at all. 

I’ve spent the last week out of pocket from a missing parcel (which I replaced in good faith that your customer care team would see is an obvious case of driver fraud and refund my money) and on the phone to customer care at both ASOS and DPD.

DPD have treated me like absolute trash, running a half hearted investigation into the false “safe place” request that did not come from myself, refusing to open another (after ASOS initially did not provide them with screenshots I sent on December 4th - day of delivery) cutting off my calls and denying their culpability. Last night Deniz from the ASOS customer care team agreed my case was worthy of reopening an investigation, attempted to ring DPD and was hung up on 3 times. 

Your colleague then suggested I go straight to my card holder as this was worthy of a refund.

My card holder has now also agreed I absolutely have a case due to all the screenshots but has said the refund will need to come from ASOS and will take up to 3 weeks to process. So I am trying one last time to implore you to take away the middle man and honour my rights in the Consumer Rights Act 2015.

Your customer care team have agreed I am in the right 

My card holder has told me I am in the right 

I KNOW I am in the right. 

I IMPLORE you to honour your contract with ME as the consumer and not just treat this like a stock standard case of DPD getting away with crappy service.

If not, i will continue my case with my card holder in which I have been assured I will get my money back in due time however I ask that instead you honour my rights, value my 5 years of loyalty, believe me and refund this order or you have sadly lost a customer forever. 

Thank you 

Lauren Shamy

name: Tina Garb
title: I ordered a dress from Asos and they…
review: I ordered a dress from Asos and they gave it to Hermes to deliver. Hermes delivered it to a wrong address.  I tried to get in touch with Asos but it was simply impossible. Up until now my dress is missing and I haven't heard from them.I would advise people to be careful when ordering with them because,  they may not even receive their items.

name: Alice
title: Sent faulty items. Customer service did not fix problem. Rude and unhelpful. Avoid.
review: Awful company which I recommend you boycot for their faulty items and rude customer service advisors. Been a customer for many years but customer service is so bad when there is a problem they do not care nor fix it. I ordered an item which arrvied faulty. Asos would not do anything about it just told me to send it back for an exchange. So I did. I then got refunded the item, when it was still in stock the whole time. I didn't want a refund I wanted the item ordered specifically for an event. They refused to re send it. Told me to re order. I did not wish to do this paying for delivery again. In the end I never got the bag. Asos do not care about customers and did not compensate me and offered a poor 10% off future orders which is a joke, especially so as I get that for student discount anyway, so they offered me nothing. They do not quality check items nor resolve complaints. You are better off going to primark. A few weeks prior I ordered some earrings which arrvied broken. They were refunded without issue but there was no apology and the bag was never replaced. 2 faulty items in a row. Disgraceful. Highly disappointed from assos.

name: Rebekka Platz
title: Bad customer service
review: They were no help at all!!

name: Maddy Digs Sweed
title: Order NO.:454615035
review:
Order NO.:454615035
Madelaine D
I love shopping at ASOS and buy clothes from them at least once a month. While I have rarely ever had issues with the clothes , recently the customer service has been awful. They have introduced Facebook messenger and the waiting time is crazy. I accidently put my old address down for my order and I have no idea where the TrakPak depot is, the local post office say they don't have it but here in Melilla there's no other site. I got no answer about the depot from ASOS despite stating that it's time sensitive . so it looks like all the items I bought in the sale will be returned, great!

name: Carol
title: Send a live chat on the 1st December…
review:
Send a live chat on the 1st December letting them know I couldnt apply the 25% off offer code on their website had no response, wrong items have been sent and nobody seems interested to get this resolved! worst customer service team to date.
Never get replies always in a "que"

name: L Curtis
title: So annoyed with the service I have…
review: So annoyed with the service I have received. Not able to help with my order so told to download Klarna and order the items again absolute joke.

name: Aaron Chamberlain
title: Don’t buy from them
review: Bad customer services. Enough said

name: Tara
title: :/ no exceptions for illness RE return…
review: :/ no exceptions for illness RE return timeframes

name: George T
title: Asos went from top to rock bottom
review: Faulty items are been sent over and over.2 of them in my last three orders.Wrong information + images that mean wrong orders by customers . And the assistants don't understand what's going on but follow asos orders.Way to go Asos

name: CB
title: Won't ever be using ASOS again
review: Won't ever be using ASOS again. They've clearly been making cuts to improve their profit margins and it's showing with their customer experience. They've failed to deliver an order that should have arrived 5 days ago and their customer service team are impossible to get a response from (other than the copy and paste first-response message. AVOID.

name: Maria Coleto Serrano
title: Horrible customer care
review: Horrible customer care. I had a problem with an order as I had been charged a delivery but I had purchased a free delivery pass prior to order the item so I contacted customer care via chat to request a delivery fee refund for that particular order. When and contacted customer care I was taken care by Kirsteen. This person states that the order was placed in standard delivery so she wasn't going to issue the refund. I place three order that day and only that didn't go through with regards to the free delivery. I asked for at least a voucher to cover that fee as you can see that it was a mistake and I was going to place more order. This person wouldn't listen to what I was saying and closed the chat. This is an horrible customer service. I work in customer service myself and I don't understand this behaviour toward a customer.

name: Rory Wilson
title: Bad service all round
review: Bad, don't bother with them, they will just let you down.

name: Josh
title: Delivery delays
review: I pay for next day premium delivery for the year, I placed an order at 7:30pm (usually the cut off is 10:30-11pm) and then received a notification that I wouldn’t received the package until a day later when I actually needed it sooner, I contacted customer service and they said as they’re busy there’s nothing they could do. So because if Black Friday I can’t received my parcel even though I’ve paid for a service (next day delivery) didn’t offer to reimburse my £9.95, as a loyal customer who uses ASOS all the time I am extremely disappointed!

name: Steve
title: Customer service disappointing
review:
For such a big organisation, I'm very dissatisfied and disappointed with the customer service.

As a new customer I ordered costly items and paid via vouchers obtained through a work scheme (7% discount). Did it via the vouchers due to the discount but had to order the vouchers first before placing an order so was considerably out of pocket to start with.

Placed the order and paid the small balance via PayPal and received confirmation of the payment. Never received confirmation of the order from asos. Followed it up the following day and my account stated that no orders present. I followed this up with an email and no response for several hours. Contacted live chat and they couldn't deal with it and forward an email to another team. I was told it could be 24 hours before I get a response. Likely to be over the weekend so I was not expecting any reply until the following week.

In the meantime I don't know if the order had been placed or not. I run the risk of it going out of stock and being left with vouchers that I ordered to get a discount.

Poor customer service. I suppose that's the risk of online shopping, but I expected better from a large organisation.

name: Laura
title: Amazing clothes BUT
review: Amazing clothes, great delivery (usually, unless it's Black Friday) but jesus christ they have the WORST customer service known to man. On Twitter they don't read a word you're saying and use standard copy and paste replies which drive you INSANE. I'd stop shopping with them due to their terrible customer service if they didn't cater to plus size so well.

name: hannah
title: Paid for premier delivery which is £10…
review: Paid for premier delivery which is £10 to get next day delivery all year round. I had an order a few weeks back which came 2 days later but decided to leave it as I can wait a day. But now I have placed an order and the it is estimated to come 11 days later. Unacceptable! So I contact customer service, pretty confident they would treat me well being a loyal customer and I have never had a problem with ASOS before. But no! I was told I wouldn't be getting my parcel earlier and wouldn't be getting a refund for the premier delivery. To top it off the woman I spoke to, Sarah, was outright rude, little apologies and wanted me to leave the chat. I think she asked me 4 times to leave the chat. I feel so disappointed in this service when I have loved asos for a very long time.

name: Georgia Morris
title: Terrible delivery service
review: Terrible delivery service, robotic customer service, delayed delivery, refunds. Third time this has happened and I pay for yearly next day delivery.

name: Polly
title: Very disorganised and difficult to…
review:
Very disorganised and difficult to contact with an issue. Takes a long time for a reply.
Delivery options are not honoured and when delivery reorganised refunds are not given on next day delivery options.

name: IN
title: Worst customer service ever
review:
Worst customer service ever. 
I was meant to receive my order on the 31st Nov. 10 days later and it still hasn't arrived, I received no notifications or updates about it. No one is replying to my emails or messages on Facebook / Instagram. 
I just need to understand what is happening, whether I will still receive my items or expect a refund. No one has replied to me in a week. 
A waste of time and money

name: Bet
title: Asos refuses to refund the money of my…
review:
Asos refuses to refund the money of my order, which is over 1000€.
Of course I will never buy anything in this store again and I recommend you to not do it either.

name: Mary Sharpe
title: Ordered something black Friday as a…
review:
Ordered something black Friday as a replacement since the original order I made the day before was a shambles! I received an item that didn't even have tags and seemed worn, but the worst of it I received a NON-ASOS item which was a ragged dirty stained stinking Ralph Lauren polo which someone has obviously sent out instead of what I ordered. I contacted ASOS who didn't have a care in the world about how they had sent me someone's dirty top and didn't offer to help fix the situation considering the top I actually ordered was now out of stock and it would be unlikely that I could buy it again at the Black Friday price. 

Good luck to you if you ever have an issue as you will receive automated generic responses from people who aren't interested at all. The shock of receiving someone's perfectly folded tissue wrapped old manky t-shirt shows it must have been someone who works there! Either that or they just send orders out in the dark!!!

name: Leah Mcdonough
title: Had my GHD's drop kicked over my back…
review: Had my GHD's drop kicked over my back fence by Hermes. Customer service at Asos shrugged it off. I won't be shopping with them again.

name: James
title: Not worth paying for Premier Delivery
review:
Poor customer service, simply citing 'it's not company policy' when I ask how I will be compensated for a late delivery. I pay a premium for next day delivery so if it doesn't happen surely ASOS should offer some kind of compensation as a gesture of good will?

Apparently not.

name: Ranju
title: If I could I would give them a 0 for…
review: If I could I would give them a 0 for yesterday’s experience. So very unhelpful and no replies to messages after being a premium member for over 6years . Very disappointed .

name: Y
title: Next Day Delivery.. Yeah right!
review: I constantly have to ask where my order is. I have yearly next day delivery, yet my order will take up to 5 days to get to me, which is ridiculous. Also the sizing is ridiculous. I wear a UK 14, yet I have to order a UK 18 on asos. 🤯 I think once my next day delivery runs out I will stop ordering with asos.

name: Maimoona
title: Didn’t deliver my parcel on time
review: Didn’t deliver my parcel on time, and disgusting service by their customer care team

name: Suzanne
title: £250 taken but no parcel and no refund.
review: Ordered £250 of clothing for Winter. 2 weeks down the line I hadn't received anything although they had taken the funds out of my account. Spoke to the courier Yodel who advised me that the parcel was lost and advised me to speak to Asos.  Asos now won't refund me until they have taken it up with the courier.  This isn't my problem in my opnion and they should refund me straight away.  I'm not getting anywhere speaking to someone on live chat as they just end the chat when they feel they can't answer my questions.  I am seeking legal advice today.

name: Darren McA
title: I have had the worst experiencing with…
review: I have had the worst experiencing with ordering a pair of shoes that the carrier destroyed and failed to deliver, as they admitted to.  I reordered the shoes, now paying twice for the same pair and not having any shoes.  The customer service at ASOS is non existent unless you want to hear sorry, because that is all your going to get, they hide behind email and chat with no resolution ability.  I plan to take this with PAYPAL as they will protect my purchase thankfully. Be warned............ POOR SERVICE!

name: Kirandip Gill
title: When parcels get split one always gets…
review: When parcels get split one always gets lost. Delivery by hermes is a mess. Makes me avoid shopping with asos

name: Vanessa M
title: The worst experience ever
review: The worst experience ever ! my order arrived in terrible condition and the parcel was completely damaged ! When I tried to contact the customer service no one gave a solution and they ended the chat within minutes without helping me ! I'll never order from Asos again ! Your customer service sucks and your products too !

name: Stephen
title: Ordered 6 items
review:
Ordered 6 items, they said it had been delivered but I haven't received the goods.

Emailed their online contact (via the form) twice. No response.

Used their online 'chat' 4 times. No response whatsoever on any occasions. 

Still none the wiser where my order is or if they have even received my messages!! Utterly hopeless.

name: Ashleigh Mcdougall
title: Should be an option for 0 stars
review: If I could have voted 0 stars I would have. Spoke with val on the phone. Throughout the call I was polite and did not raise my voice. Val was giving me an email address to complain as my parcel has still not being delivered I made val aware that I have dyslexia so to make sure the email is correct I need to take my time. Val proceed to try and get me off the phone when I asked her to hold on 2 seconds while I wrote it down she then replied I've already waited 2 seconds and I don't have time to tolerate this. Then hung up the line on me. Worst customer service I've ever had.

name: Olivia Wilmington
title: Left security tag in clothing but were…
review: Left security tag in clothing but were not very helpful in resolving issue.

name: Miss Poppy Barr
title: Bad Delivery and customer exeriance - Callum was no help!!!!!
review:
Very bad customer experience with delivery. After paying for next day delivery and prime membership on Wednesday it is now Friday and they are now telling me after i chased it that my delivery wont be with me till next Wednesday. 
Customer Service Callum wasn't very interested at first and I had to ask him to look into it after he just said sorry to hear you haven't received it yet. Following looking into it he told me it wont be with me till next Wednesday and there was nothing he could do. He wouldn't even refund my delivery or give me any compensation for the service.
Very disappointing as wanted it for the weekend (hence why i paid more for delivery) and now i'm going to have to go to the shops anyway to buy something.
WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY!

name: Ruth Lavelle
title: Poor quality fast fashion
review: Awful customer service, a company this big should have a telephone line to call. Quality of ASOS products is poor and also some of the brands they stock.

name: Huong PTQ
title: Probably should have checked the…
review: Probably should have checked the reviews before ordering with them. I have placed an order via ASOS with estimate delivery is 14Nov. Until now, my parcel hasn't still arrived and the status still remains at "DEPARTED ASOS" which unchanged from 26Oct. My order has been delayed as it did not arrive by the expected date. Delivery company also hasn't provided any tracking info. I used live chat to try to find out where the my order is/why it's delayed, I was told to wait until the end of the expected day and report the issue again. I reported issue once again the next tine on the live chat and was told to wait until 8Dec. ASOS never again, horrible service!

name: Rachel
title: worst customer service
review: Order made on 17th (next day delivery), still no sign of my order. Contacted ‘customer services’ & was told this should arrive by 22nd latest if not contact us. The worst customer service & no concern for customers. Not the first time I’ve had a poor experience with asid

name: Will Fensom
title: Seriously delivery is appalling
review: Seriously delivery is appalling, been advised that dpd have made a mistake and Mia routed my parce thus will be delivered one day late but dpd are instructed not to remediate the problem without ASOS approval. ASOS are saying they can’t do anything until the delivery date is missed. So much for paying for next day delivery

name: Yusuf
title: Poor customer service
review: Poor customer service, after reassuring me several times I will receive my order on that specific date and the item showed up late! On the day I received the item, the price dropped significantly online, the rude customer service agents then refused to refund me difference and also did not care at all that the item arrived late and said it was out of there control, after it took them 4 days just to dispatch the item

name: Natasha
title: Horrible experience
review: Horrible experience. Spent nearly £6.00 on next day delivery for an £150 order (ordered way before the cut off time). The items came 3 days later in damaged boxes with one item missing. Went online and used the chat option to explain the situation, and the advisor said she would pass the matter onto a 'specialist team'. Nobody got back to me and just by chance I checked my account and saw the missing item had been refunded. What about my apology? My explanation? My refund for my next day delivery when it came late? Terrible customer service and would never shop with asos again

name: Jonny Calverley
title: Very poor customer service
review:
Very poor customer service. Managers / supervisors or team leaders can’t be spoken too - They call you back but it will be 2 days.
Was promised next day delivery for clothing & this didn’t happen. However still got charged for it - No professional customer service.

Still awaiting delivery & got told I have to ring back requesting the refund on delivery charge.
.

name: pohl
title: Wish I could give zero stars
review:
Wish I could give zero stars

The problem persists. The package was set to be delivered Sep 28, track and trace not working. No delivery on Sep 28, 29, 30 or Oct 1st and track and trace still not working.

Contact attempt made by me on Oct 1, requesting information about the package and asking for a new track and trace. Reply by customer service informing there was a problem with DHL and that now the package was to be delivered Oct 5. No new track and trace code was provided.

I replied asking again for a track and trace that worked, customer service replied stating to wait to get in touch until Oct 8, when the package was supposed to be delivered, to which I replied asking if the delivery was supposed to happen on the 5 or 8, as the information was confusing.

Customer service replied stating that it was set to be delivered on Oct 5 and for me to wait to inquire about it only after that. Besides that, customer service tells me to edit my delivery information, despite it being accurate. No delivery attempt on Oct 5 and track and trace STILL doesn’t work.

I've gotten in touch Saturday night, after spending the whole day at home, waiting for a miracle to happen and so far NO RESPONSE. 

Got in touch via chat... despite being nice, all the customer service representative did was to let me know that my case would be escalated and that they would get in touch via email. 

What the heck

name: Hanh
title: Poor delivery service and lack of…
review: Poor delivery service and lack of communication, next day delivery took 4 days to come.

name: Mhfnfogejng gkggfgb
title: Have to leave another review....their…
review: Have to leave another review....their customer service is the worst ruddest CS ever....You don't get that in the US. They send wrong items and then refuse to refund you for their mistake and make you go through the hassle. After asking me to prove to them that my box has arrived to the warehouse for a refund, and I showed them the UPS receipt with the tracking code #, they gave me a BS reason and closed the chat on me without accepting that as a proof that they received it.

name: Adam Hinchcliffe
title: ASOS YOU ARE COMPLETE TRASH
review:
Asos Premier Delivery is a complete waste of time. 

It would be quicker and safer to have you parcel shipped via horse and cart! 

Customer Service is non existent, well thats a lie. Theres someone to talk too, but there's zero service. If you've got a complaint, they literally don't care at all and will close your ticket on you. 

If you're shopping on Asos, have fun getting your order on time and in a brand new condition.

name: Adina
title: Worst company I ve bought from..
review: Worst company I ve bought from..

name: KATE G
title: Terrible customer service
review: Terrible customer service. Used once, payment taken but order didn't arrive and was listed as not processed - not given to Hermes - for 12 days. After following up every day and having to re-explain myself over and over again, they eventually refunded without telling me. Lets just say I won't bother again.

name: hamzah yusif
title: Can’t believe what they have done
review: Can’t believe what they have done, just spend nearly £400 and they have the audacity to send me a email saying it’s been successful, and then immediately after say it’s been cancelled and they blocked my account. I find this unacceptable and how they find it reasonable to just delete my account and refuse to serve me when all I’m doing is trying to buy new clothes. I will be informing people I know and posting it on other social media sites to show how disgusting there attitude is.

name: Catherine
title: I have been a loyal customer of ASOS…
review:
I have been a loyal customer of ASOS for years. If I had written a review a month or so ago, I would likely have given them a higher rating. However, I am completely shocked and upset by how they are treating customers. 

Their change in returns policy means you receive gift vouchers instead of refunds. Therefore, if you paid via a credit company such as Klarna (which is very popular now) they will not be reimbursed when you return the items.

I have contacted ASOS several times and have received awful customer service. In one situation, I was cut off mid sentence and told that it was their new policy, before they then put down the phone.

The lack of care for their customers is appalling and changing their policy to ensure customers go into debt is awful. They clearly only care about money.

name: Asha Iqbal
title: Absolutely unreliable for deliveries…
review: Absolutely unreliable for deliveries and customer service has gone downhill

name: Liam Croft
title: The worst customer service I have ever received.
review:
Absolutely shocking customer service. I paid a premium for evening next day delivery, which was guaranteed by ASOS if ordered within the time frame, which my order was. It is now 4 days later and my order has still not arrived. Furthermore, I emailed their customer service team yesterday and still have not received a reply, despite ASOS claiming their team works 7 days a week.

It is one thing to deliver an order late, it is another thing entirely to lie about the service this brand's customers can expect to receive. I am entirely disappointed and feel that ASOS' efforts pale in comparison to other retailers, even those at lower price ranges.

name: Thomas
title: I've shopped with Asos for a while now
review:
I've shopped with Asos for a while now, but have been really let down by them. I ordered a large order of clothes, which 2 weeks later had still not turned up. This is annoying as it is. I then get an email saying that the package will never turn up as it was damaged in transit so has been returned to their depot.

But here's the crazy. Despite never delivering my clothes, they now say I have to wait 7 days for the items to be processed by them, then 10 days to issue a refund. But they know they have never delivered the items to me!!!

So they will have had my hard earned cash for over a month, and it's all their fault. Why can't you just refund me straight away now you know the package will never turn up.

Very unhappy.

name: Ari Sioz
title: Lost my packet
review:
I ordered two limited edition vintage items from ASOS. They never came to my house and instead went to a different city signed by a different person. I tried to find the parcel for a week and DHL told me that it was lost, and that they could do nothing about it. So did ASOS. They refunded me a week after. 
In the meantime I did my own research and found the person who signed for my parcel on facebook. She was eager to send it back to me but I told her to contact ASOS instead and send it back to them. When I contacted ASOS they told me that the items were sold right away without even caring of contacting me or just saying a simple "Thanks for your honesty man". 
This is the last time I am getting anything from ASOS, these guys are a real headache.

name: Holly C
title: False Advertisement.
review:
Terrible customer service and false advertising.

I purchased over £90 worth of ASOS clothing. I returned one item in perfect condition, worth £26.50.
A week passed with no contact from ASOS. Then a partial refund of only £11.50 came through. Upon questioning the missing £15, their reasoning was that it covered the rest of the discount code that was applied when I hit a certain amount. With no prior correspondence and no warning of this, before and after the purchase, they’re holding back £15 after returning a £26.50 item.

The ASOS assistant on the live chat was less than helpful when asked about the issue. This is clearly false advertisement and is frankly unacceptable.

name: Tiff
title: Claim they cannot contractually have contact with their own courier to help with missing delivery
review: After spending thousands over the years at ASOS, I made a next day delivery purchase and for the first time it hadn’t arrived. This is because in the last month, their courier Hermes have constantly been not delivering my parcels and having what seems like a glitch with my address. I asked ASOS to contact Hermes as a) Hermes are uncontactable b) they make you speak only through the retailer eg ASOS c) the glitch means I have no idea where the parcel is and when it will come d) every other retailer has happily contacted Hermes on my behalf to request to know where the parcel is. On the ASOS online chat to Bethany, she informed that they cannot contractually speak to Hermes on my behalf!!!! Which means I can’t contact them and they can’t but I have paid money for a product they have no control over. I HIGHLY doubt that they are contractually obliged to no contact with their own couriers. They said to allow 6 days for a next day delivery. All I want is to know when it will come because the online tracking is stuck on a delivery time that passed long ago and this happens over and over again. I’m pretty appalled at the absurdity of them having this contract of silence with their own courier. I feel fobbed off and lied to.

name: Camilla FitzGibbon
title: Very poor customer service
review: Very poor customer service. You can only communicate through live chat (the phone lines no longer work and the email link directs you back to chat). My order was due to arrive on the 2nd and after three changes of delivery time, the notification was to try the follow day for updates. The system has not been updated since then (even though ASOS says it was updated on the 3rd but it does not show on my tracking or the link they sent) and I have not received my order. They took payment on 30th September and they say I now have to wait until 14th October to even apply for a refund. I have had no explanation, apology, or any other communication from ASOS other than in response to my communications. Very poor service and communications

name: Simon Smith
title: The agent wasn't helpful at all
review:
The agent wasn't helpful at all. I requested a refund of next day delivery charges due to an email received stating my order would be delayed by 1 working day.

The agent advised me they couldn't do anything ie change delivery address or refund charges until the day after.

I was advised the parcel was not with the courier, so I could not understand why it was not possible to change the delivery address?

name: Alice
title: 4 day delay on my parcel and customer…
review: 4 day delay on my parcel and customer service not helpful and would not speak to hermes to find out why and get a delivery date.  so have to wait another 48 hours to 'see it it turns up'

name: Gemma Brereton
title: Poor service
review:
My parcel has not arrived! I contacted them
24 hours ago and still no resolution! Poor service

name: E123
title: Not even worth one star
review:
Not even worth one star. I had a jacket, within 4 / 5 month it became faulty.  I asked for an exchange instead of this I was given a £115 voucher (the coat coat £135 I originally had a £20 discount). 

The coat was still in stock so I re ordered it but Asos were reluctant to offer me the same £20 discount and didn’t  exchange as I told I could request. It leaves me to think that they do this deliberately to gain an additional £20. 

The second coat arrived (exactly the same product) with no tags. I wore it once and noticed it smelt of someone else’s perfume. When I took the coat off I noticed this one was also faulty!!! Do they not check the items they send out?? 

I have been in contact on the live chat multiple times and by email. I’ve spoken to over 8 people at Asos (the same person never replies to the email thread). All as unhelpful as each other. I’ve been told different things each time I’ve had a reply. One person told me I should have had a refund to my card as the item was faulty not a voucher. 

I’ve now received another voucher for the second faulty coat but this is only for £109.05?!? They have then tried to tell me that the £6.95 reduction is for next day delivery despite me already paying for this with my card?!?!? Which I can prove. 

It’s an absolute joke and I am so angry!! I’ve been on the live chat tonight & they have told me yet again that they had read through my previous chats...and have no come the conclusion that I should have been given a refund. This has been going on since the beginning of September it’s now been passed to the “specialist team” which has apparently happened before. 

Literally have no faith in them, it’s ridiculous!! Better off ordering from the brand directly!

name: John
title: Absolutely terrible customer service. Still no parcel
review:
Absolutely terrible. I placed my order with next day delivery and have been waiting for over a week. I didn’t even receive a tracking number and still haven’t receive my parcel.

One ASOS agent advised me that due to technical difficulties, the parcel is not traceable. Another agent told me the parcel is just delayed for one day (it’s been a week), some other told me it wasn’t shipped yet and to top it off, 4 different agents give me 4 different dates until which I have to wait before they can do anything.

This is the absolute worst. They only send out automatic replies and give me random dates to have me wait longer.

Nobody is assisting me and I can’t even call them.

Pathetic and appalling. Absolute worst customer service ever. These are really the most incompetent customer service agents I have ever seen.

name: Alison Knight
title: Poor customer service ASOS
review: I ordered trainers on Saturday and pay for next day delivery, they didn’t turn up and from tracking and conversations with DPD I knew the parcel had not been sent by ASOS. But they insisted I wait 72 hours to sort it out, this is wholly unacceptable. In the end, after me having to become rude, I have now been given a refund ( which takes up to 10 days to reflect in my bank) not good customer service at all !!

name: Georgia Robinson
title: Shocking customer service
review: Shocking customer service! Honestly don’t even bother!

name: Gabrio
title: @ASOS  has the most ridiculous returns…
review:
@ASOS  has the most ridiculous returns and refund policy on the planet - stay away or really make sure your orders are right! otherwise it might take up almost to a month to get your refund! love 
@amazon  which rocks in this sense instead!!!!!! will not get on asos again.

name: Martin Triboulet
title: Inadmissible
review: Inadmissible

name: Mrs Robinson
title: Awful customer service
review: Sent me the wrong items. Said they wouldn't send me the correct item,I'd have to order it again myself and pay postage. Totally rude customer service adviser too. AVOID.

name: Catherine Taylor
title: Ordered a bunch of clothes to be…
review: Ordered a bunch of clothes to be delivered next day 21 September.  Received confirmation email and delivery email, checked the Hermes tracking site showing 'got your parcel', this then changed to 'delayed'.  Contacted customer service via chat as the order is now a day late, spent 45min dealing with them.  They couldn't tell me why the parcel was delayed or why it couldn't be delivered given it showed as being with Hermes.  They told me to wait until 26 September and then get back in contact, told them I was very unhappy about this, asked if I could cancel and the retrieve the order from Hermes, said they could request the parcel back but was no guarantee and would h ave to wait 7 days to see if they received it before they would refund.  Asked if there were any other options/mitigation/compensation and told no, asked to escalate the issue and also basically told no - chat operator then ended the chat.

name: customer
title: Rubbish service ever
review: Rubbish, how can you offer an ordering service and charge people extra on top of there already next day service agreement and then not deliver. You cant blame the couriers as you decided to use them, this is a bad call on your company’s part. I won’t be using ASOS again (which I used to use a lot) complete let down. And you have made me stay up until midnight on the off chance it might arrive, and now telling me at 1AM there is nothing more you can do to help and no refund can be issued as I have to wait another 4 days for it to possibly arrive??? Ridiculous, I will be happy to go shopping in future and pay extra for the clothing.

name: Jackie Reid
title: Delivery not arrived and customer service don't seem bothered about helping
review:
Placed an order for nearly £1000 for delivery to the Middle East. Order left the uk 10 days ago and still hasnt arrived. I've contacted the customer service team 5 times to find out where it is and kept getting told the same generic responses,  telling me to wait another day and check the tracking. Noone actually bothering to properly look into it. They also claim they cant contact the courier and suggesting I should!
Worst customer service I've received in a long time. Been ordering from them for over 10 years, wont bother again.

name: Liam
title: ASOS used to be good
review: ASOS used to be good - they've gone downhill recently and their customer service is pretty appalling. I paid for their 'premium' delivery subscription and placed an order to be delivered on Sunday. It was shipped with Hermes (terrible courier company) and they were 'delayed.' They then failed to delivery on Monday, and Tuesday because I was at work (despite me requesting that it be left in my safe place where Amazon and DPD always leave stuff). I reached out to ASOS to see if they could help and they literally shrugged it off saying that it's not their responsibility anymore and that they can't change Hermes service. Of course, I don't expect them to change Hermes service... but they could just stick with more reputable couriers like UKMail, DPD, Gnewt etc... I think my days of shopping with them are over.

name: Stephen
title: Been on the phone to Asos to enquire…
review: Been on the phone to Asos to enquire about my return only to be met by a disgusting customer service representative called Russell who apparently didn't like my tone of voice, and wouldn't be able to proceed with the call, basked him countless times could I speak to a supervisor or manager qnd he wouldn't put me through,he was more interested in trying to cause an argument and proceeded to question everything I said to him, until I completely lost my temper with him, Asos customer service it one of the most shocking experiences I have ever come across and I will not ever use this cowboy company ever again.

name: Niamh Fitzpatrick
title: Avoid
review:
Avoid ASOS if you actually want to receive your parcel.

Been using them for years and even paid for premier delivery. However, they are no help when your parcel does not arrive and just blame their delivery partner. It has been 12 weeks since I should have received my parcel but customer services want me to wait for more days. They know fine well hermes are terrible but are quite happy to take all the money for this order out of my account and not give it back. Not using them again and I suggest others do the same.

name: Impressed or not...
title: Horrendous customer service
review:
Horrendous customer service. All scripted ‘chats.’ I have been lied to by at least one person. They use a courier service which is equally awful. I had a cardboard box of paper greetings cards chucked over a fence in the rain. Needless to say they were ruined. No apology or mention of compensation. 

Latest order, premier delivery should mean next day. I ask where it is at 22:30 on the expected day and am told it may be delivered before midnight and so they will do nothing (I do not believe this). It doesn’t arrived so I ask about it and am told it could be any time in the next four days as they have a problem with the carrier. This was not said at checkout. They again offer no apology and only automated responses which they say are not automated but are clearly copy and pasted and they reuse statements. 

Avoid.

name: Josh Hoeppner-Joy
title: Don’t recommend asos
review: Ordered an item which requires instructions asps failed to send the instructions. Now are telling me I need to place a second order for the item again in order to get instructions and then send back the replacement item meaning I will be charged for 2 items in order to get the set of instructions. It’s a 50/50 split with wether what you get is any good or not and the customer service is awful. I don’t really recommend ASOS to anyone as the customer service is awful they don’t respond properly or even read your questions properly.

name: Missy
title: Lost parcel
review: Lost parcel . Was a birthday gift . It’s common sense if a courier has no tracking it’s LOST . However I’m told to WAIT . Yeah go figure was not delivered . Can see this being a absolute nightmare now . ASOS seem to have a big issue with missing parcels so it seems ! Avoid

name: Silvija
title: The customer service was extremely rude…
review: The customer service was extremely rude and ended the chat without even asking if there’s anything else I need. ASOS did not deliver my items on time, whereas I paid for the next day delivery. They did not offer to neither refund the next day delivery fee nor have they offered a discount on the next purchase.

name: Pamela
title: Why do you use Hermes delivery!!
review: Why do you use Hermes delivery. My last 2 orders-one which I’ve paid premium delivery for, both delayed for several days for no valid reason. ASOS is a big enough company to pay for a decent courier! Will not order off this site again

name: Olivia Mcentegart
title: Worst chat ever
review:
Worst chat ever. 
They just say they will contact you in 24 hours over email?

Pointless. Don't use.

name: Jacob Dean
title: Can you give less than 1*?
review:
Can you give less than 1*?

I placed an order on September 28th for two pairs of boots. I receive an email saying that one of the pairs is out of stock (annoying but these things happen).

The real issue cones from the delivery service! They use HERMES, who are a terrible company to be associated with. I ordered my boots to be with me by October 5th (my Birthday) and instead I am now told to wait until the 14th, as there has been an error?!

After speaking to ASOS I have realised that they are not interested in taking responsibility when issues occur with HERMES.

I would recommend staying away until they use a different delivery company, I know I certainly won't be buying anything else.

name: Briagh
title: That was the most useless customer…
review: That was the most useless customer service. I chatted earlier to say my parcel wasn't tracking but was due today. Mark said he couldn't tell me anything until the day had ended. So after the day ended I spoke with Sophie and her great advice was to wait another month. She refused to tell me what would happen at the end of the month or why Mark couldn't have just told me to wait a month when I chatted with him earlier. This was so frustrating.

name: Gail
title: Utterly disappointed with ASOS today
review:
Utterly disappointed with ASOS today. I pay for Premier Delivery with them so that I can get my items the NEXT DAY. The service is not cheap! Their contract is with Hermes who are a disgrace! Expecting my Premier delivery today but Hermes have texted to say they will not be coming.

ASOS likes to absolve themselves of blame by saying yes we are happy to take your money for Premier delivery service but if our contractor doesn't deliver it has nothing to do with us.

Absolutely fuming & let down by ASOS!!!!

name: Mel Dabell
title: Delivery left next to the street, now it’s missing!
review:
I ordered some items for my daughter for her birthday. I received a message from the courier company in the morning to say they would deliver within two days. They messaged me again within the hour to say they had delivered my parcel when I wasn’t home. I arrived home to find a card had been pushed through the door and the delivery driver said he left my parcel in a ‘safe’ place behind the bin (in full view of the street a few feet away). It wasn’t there. I reported it to ASOS and the delivery company. ASOS have now sent me the very confusing message (below). 

Hi   Thank you for waiting to hear back from us about your parcel.  I've just heard back from the courier and they have suggested that they have requested to have this parcel sent to you, however they cannot guarantee that the depot will receive this request in time to action the return to sender, due to the parcel being very close to the delivery location.  If successful, your parcel will be returned to you within the next 3-5 working days.  Enjoy your weekend. Best Wishes, ASOS Customer Care

I don’t know what it means. How can the delivery company redeliver my item if they have already delivered it and it’s missing? How can they return my item back to ASOS if they haven’t got my item. I can’t get a straight answer out of anyone. I’m so disappointed.

name: Tara
title: I have just experienced the worst…
review: I have just experienced the worst customer experience. I have repeatedly contacted asos about problems with the courier hermes and the fact my (next day) deliveries are 4 days late.  I have been fobbed off, dismissed, told the same information by asos ( repetition of terms and conditions)...even told to investigate the issue myself with hermes!  Why are ASOS not going to look into a repeated problem with their courier? And finally today, your advisor ended the chat, ignoring my questions...basically a final dismissive slap in the face. ASOS, you may as well get rid of your customer service staff and whoever trained them...replace them with an auto reply 'we don't care'...it would be the truth and just as useful.

name: tyler archard
title: My parcel was meant to come today so…
review:
My parcel was meant to come today so I've sat in all day waiting. Was our for deliver for 7 hours and then sent back to the depot?? But ASOS are unsure why? Ridiculous! 
It's now going to be delivered tomorrow which is incoinvent as I have a hospital app. And chances it will come whilst I am out at 99%. That also means having to wait another day so I can collect from the depot. Not only that, I've just had my tonsils out and am not meant to leave the house due to catching an infection but I guess I'll have to take that risk because Yodel cant deliver a simple parcel. The last time I ordered from ASOS and Yodel delivered, two of my parcels worth £200+ went missing!!! Really disappointed with this service. I wont be using ASOS again.

name: Shelley Rosser
title: I wouldn’t really give them one star.
review:
I wouldn’t really give them one star.
Received a gift card as a present, upon redemption it said it had already been used. The scratch part hadn’t been removed were the pin was so it hadn’t been tampered with.
Four days later passed pillar to post by ASOS and still not resolved

name: Sarah
title: To be honest it's not even worth 1…
review: To be honest it's not even worth 1 star.  You pay extra for a premium service of next day delivery and when it doesn't turn up you spent half an hour trying to find contact details, just to be told it will be at least a 6 day service, save your money and go elsewhere because you'll be waiting for a refund until the next millennium!!!  Joke of a company and poor customer service.

name: JAKE75 H
title: Sent shirt back and they said they…
review: Sent shirt back and they said they never got it! Absolute joke of a company!!!

name: Marsha Anderson
title: I ordered my dress since Sunday paid…
review: I ordered my dress since Sunday paid for Express delivery anticipated shipping date was 2 days here I am day 5 no estimate delivery date horrible service I need my money back

name: Molly
title: Horrendous customer services
review: Horrendous customer services! I have paid for next day delivery for the year yet my order says it’s being delivered standard. I rang up to ask why and they said because you clicked that. When I said that’s funny as when you put your items into the bag and go to check out it’s already clicked onto next day delivery. He accused me of lying stating that never happens when he places orders and he’s done so loads recently. So very rude. Wouldn’t amend my delivery option and wouldn’t cancel order or put me through to a manager. My order hasn’t been dispatched so don’t see the problem but there is.

name: Jade
title: Absolute Shambles of a company.
review:
Absolute Shambles of a company.
Customer Service is Terrible!!!

Ordered swimwear for my holidays on the 3rd August 2019.

on the Thursday 8th August I went on the tracking to see where my items were it said there is a delay on your item and we will have it out within the next 24 hours.

I Never received my item, I left the weekend to pass then on the 11th August I spoke with Kristofer from the customer service team who was no help what so ever, the responses and lies are an absolute joke. Basically told me I have to wait until the 20th August until they can do anything, I was raging at this point as tracking was updated on Friday the 9th August stating ' we are unable to deliver your parcel please contact sender' which is what I was doing when speaking to Kristofer. I requested a refund and he just said back to me ' we are unable to issue you a refund as your parcel is in transit to you' What a joke! obviously I had to reiterate the fact hermes stted they are NOT delivering my Parcel so why is he lying to me.

Anyway, I didn't believe him so I called up on Monday 12th August and spoke to another customer service team and they were a little more helpful as they explained the reason I had to wait until the 20th was due to the 'contract' they have with Hermes which is an absolute disgrace of a service! He also told me there is nothing they can do until the 20th August.

Today is the 20th August! I Have just spoken to Arfana and now she is saying I have to wait until the 21st August which is tomorrow. Not really sure what difference a day makes but on two different occasions I was told they couldn't do anything until today and now I am being fobbed off again! Company is a F**king joke. Customer service have no clue what they are talking about clearly!.

And still no Item. Due to go on my holidays 2 items of swimwear down, as well as lost money! Absolutely Raging. 

We will see what there excuse is tomorrow. No doubt they will fob me off with a refund and a little 10/20% discount I mean what a joke of a company! if they think a refund and 10/20% of next order is ok when I have waited nearly 3 weeks for an order they keep trying to tell me is coming. At least Hermes have updated me letting me know they are NOT delivering the item.

name: An
title: Charged and never delivered!
review: Ordered 700.00 dollars worth of items on 9/19 and chose 2 day air. Got an email the following day stating it was shipped. Check the fedex tracking number they sent and it stated to be delivered 9/23. 9/23 no delivery. Contacted ASOS via their chat and asked them to check on it. Person on the other end told me October 2nd arrival.  October 2nd, no delivery. Contacted ASOS and fedex—neither had responses regarding the package. I have 6 emails with ASOS customer service where their only response is “thank you for your email. A customer care representative will reach out to you.” Needing the items for a wedding this weekend, I contacted my bank and disputed the transaction. Will NEVER order with them again!

name: H.Xibi98
title: Student discount - what a laugh
review: Was allowed for three years to have a student discount and apparently this year as a postgraduate student doing a master degree, i am not allowed as now my country is not listed. And to what reason was I allowed in the first place? And for what reasons not all countries are eligible to this discount?

name: Deven
title: sent Me empty box without trainers
review: Bunch of useless people they sent me my order of £200 trainers with just a empty box there was no trainers in the box at all theives I tell ya the delivery drivers are thieves  and the Asos team are knobs how can u send me a order with no product like what even

name: Lina
title: Bye, Bye Asos was a great first experience with you!
review: Oh dear, oh dear Asos. What to say? Asos refund and exchange policy went right out the window with me, you want to exchange your shoes? Right, so they leave you a sheet to fill in with your return details, done. They promise to keep you updated on when they receive the returned item and when the exchanged one will be dispatched. Absolutely ZERO EMAILS, I didn't even know I was given a refund until two weeks later when I took it upon myself to find out where my exchanged shoes where. Guess where they were? Out of stock, and guess what? I WASN'T TOLD ANYTHING ABOUT IT! (no email in my spam folder either) so, I've been waiting for my lovely £30 shoes with express delivery for well over a month now, no contact, no information unless you personally go out of your way to chat with them which is also a fairly sad experience as there is minimum customer service skills present. Anyway, after my chat with them, I went to TKK MAXX and got two pairs of just as lovely shoes for only £22 :)

name: Jefrey Joy
title: WORST SERVICE
review:
I ordered something 16 days ago. Did NOT get the package. They charge me $20 for Premium shipping .
Package was damaged according to tracking. So I contacted them and they said they are sending another one. Never got it, never updated the tracking. I contacted them again and they say "Sorry here is your refund".

Did not get the suit.
Refund is an easy way out. (What about my event that I needed a suit ?) ; 16 days wasted; and now I have to go out and buy a new one 2 days before the event. No time to for adjustments on the suit.
Worst part is that they did not have the decency to let me know it was damaged, the second shipment was NOT sent. They would have kept their mouth shut and took my money if I did not contact them. 
Note that I have been a loyal customer to them and bought over $1500 worth of clothing from them.

name: Lauren
title: Terrible service
review: Terrible service - I paid for next day delivery. The order didn't show up and I got a message saying they tried to deliver - they didn't (it was to my work address and no one came in). When I contacted them they couldn't tell me where my parcel was and then told me I couldn't make a complaint and closed the chat! I will never shop with them again; clearly customer service isn't one of their priorities.

name: Kieran
title: Charge £3 for delivery and offer 'free'…
review: Charge £3 for delivery and offer 'free' returns, but will not refund your original delivery costs. Ask for a size change and just get a refund without being told the reason.

name: Nancy Rapciak
title: If I could rate this site a 0 I would
review: If I could rate this site a 0 I would. I ordered a dress they took my money and I never received my item or even a confirmation. When I contacted customers service I’ve emailed back and forth 10 times!! And each time was a different person. I gave them all of my information including a screenshot of my transaction with my credit card company and they still wouldn’t give me MY purchase information!! They refused to. It was like talking to a bunch of robots. Til this day I still haven’t received my merchandise. Never again will I be ordering from such a terrible website.

name: Mina
title: Scam...ignore this website!!!!!!
