I am a member of a group of buyers in the Asos store, which exists on Facebook and read similar complaints every day. Why is the store management not taking action? Many have stopped shopping at this store.

name: Miuccia
title: I had good experiences with Asos
review: I had good experiences with Asos, and bad ones also, of course we usually recall more the bad than the good ones (welcome to being human :D) I made 4 orders so far, the first two went smooth and everything arrived as planned, the third one, was 3 jackets, one came with the wrong size, other was right and the third one I found it too big, so they told me to return and order a new one, which I did which leads to the fourth order where I order the jacket I wanted in XS, and I received a bag instead :/ I complain but they said well return it, I did and took a long time to get a refund. Since then I never order again, I get I was a bit off with 2 good experiences, 2 bad ones. I prolly will sometime soon try again.

name: Zoe J
title: ASOS chat have been an absolute…
review:
ASOS chat have been an absolute nightmare to deal with! I have had endless trouble over the past few months and have spoken to more than 5 different people on their chat system. All but one were rude and unhelpful. They all took an age to reply to anything and then one said they couldn't help and closed the chat before I could respond!

I have to give some thanks to Oludayo who was the only person who actually explained what the problem was to me and gave me a solution so thank you!

As soon as I can get access again to my account I will be cancelling my subscription to the 'premier delivery service' (which I haven't been able to use despite paying for!) and never using them again!! It is such a shame as ASOS used to be so good but they have gone massively down hill

name: Marcos Carpio
title: 2 stars only
review:
2 stars only. The guys from ASOS would say why? What did we wrong?

I already ordered a couple of things and it came on time, perfect :) . When i opened the parcel it was the right size and it was ironed and clean, good.

BUT i ordered i couple of clothes and shoes ASOS brand. The design for the price is nice, but shoes are not comfy, and the jacket inside is the worst made i saw in my life.

So, use Asos for ordering clothes but my suggestion is do never order ASOS brand clothes made in china with the cheapest materials you will regret it.

Totally disappointed with your quality brand clothes guys. Personally i would increase your quality controls.

Although I'll keep ordering other brands in your webpage.

name: samantha yates
title: Finally ASOS has said they are going to…
review:
Finally ASOS has said they are going to refund me back but...
there are still issues, I had to get in contact with them, and they wouldn’t have let me know anything about my refund if I hadn’t said anything, they are also only refunding me for 3 items when I sent back 4, and so are refunding me the wrong amount. I really thought I was going to get my refund sorted and has been over a month now and still hasn’t.

name: Alidad Moghaddam
title: Very poor customer service
review:
Good inventory of items and convenient to be able to shop online but if something goes wrong then good luck!  The quality of customer care on numerous occasions has been shockingly poor.  
Customer service reps are clearly disengaged, impatient and uninterested.  Their tone is often condescending and they are unwilling to make any extra effort to resolve issues.  They actually make you feel like you are burdening them by calling when the problem is often related to system delays, courier issues, etc...

name: Ellie Fratelli
title: Customer service like robots
review:
I pay an extra £9.99 per year for next day delivery. Most of the time my orders arrive in the allotted time. 

However when they don't their customer service are lacking in empathy and do not help to solve the problem. 

Delivery time today between 10-12pm its now 15:13 and no parcel. Asos customer service tell me to wait until tomorrow to get in touch. Not really good enough when I need the item TODAY.

name: Mark William Jackson
title: THEY USE YODEL!! There's no hope
review: THEY USE YODEL!!! WE HAVE NO HOPE. I give up with any company that use yodel to deliver anything to your house. The drivers seem to be unqualified to even use a sat nav or knock a door

name: Sarah Spindler
title: Shocking
review: I've been shopping with ASOS for years, however recently for the first time have experienced an issue. I was supposed to receive an order on 02-Feb-2019 however due to a delay, could be 10 days late. I requested compensation however ASOS straight up refused. Their ability to handle complaints is shocking and its truly a shame as I do like the website. After this experience I will not be buying from ASOS again.

name: Chloe Scott
title: Usually good but terrible CS when things go wrong!
review: I’m a very regular customer with Asos and nearly all of my orders have completed without issue, however I recently returned over £50 worth of goods that were unsuitable, only for Asos to deem that no refund was due, despite confirming they had received all the goods back in original condition. Over a month later I’m still waiting for my money to be paid into my account, and this never would’ve happened had I not noticed that my refund was never paid. I’ve been told more than 3 times over the past month that a refund will be paid in 72 hours and I’m still waiting.  I haven’t even received an apology. Very poor and will be contacting my credit card company if my refund is not processed on Monday.

name: NH
title: What happened to customer service?
review: Usually like ordering from ASOS but ordered a Christmas present over a week ago for it to have arrived opened and without its original Emporio Armani packaging and taped up with Hermes tape! I emailed over a day and a half ago with no response asking for a replacement to be sent out, sent another chaser email with no response before calling up and being told I need to sent it back before getting a new one. If customer service was key they would have firstly apologised for using a horrific company like Hermes to deliver items and offer to send out the item next day paid for. After complaining that that is not service the gentleman in the phone did say I could pay for next day and he would refund me for it however the size I needed is now out of stock so I am now left with less than a week to get a Christmas present let alone wasting my time queuing up at a post office! No compensation offered for the waste of my time from start to finish.

name: Steve dalgleish
title: Have been using ASOS for years & never…
review:
Have been using ASOS for years & never had many problems until they have started using DHL for delivery’s. Second time item is just not delivered, no emails to say why, no apologies. 
Why do I pay for next day delivery when your company can’t deliver. 
Please start using DPD again

name: Howden
title: Let’s be honest
review: Let’s be honest - quality isn’t great especially with their own brand items. Get what you pay for I guess.

name: Saj Patel
title: Stop using Hermes !
review:
Stop using Hermes !

Just read the reviews on this delivery company.

Waited for delivery and Hermes delivery driver attempted to just post the slip through the letter box, fortunately I was by the door and shouted the driver back..

Please please stop using this awful delivery company.

name: P Elton
title: Shop elsewhere!
review:
Paid for premium delivery - £9.95 for a years worth of next day delivery. 9/10 they do not deliver next day. I also raised this issue for a refund of the £9.95 as they don’t give you what you have paid for. 

Asos clothes are good but there delivery service is not. Plenty of other online clothing companies that are way better.

In my opinion - shop elsewhere!

name: Lola
title: Horrible customer services
review:
Very rarely experienced any issues, most reliable delivery that I use. Decent selection of clothes.

I spoke too soon. I have had to update my review because speaking to customer services when things have gone wrong recently has been such a soul destroying experience that I am definitely put off continuing to order.

name: Dave Tee
title: Return/refunds
review: Return and refunds are a shambles - They do not acknowledge receipt of the returned items and take a long time processing the refund. Far longer than any other clothing company I deal with. You always have to chase them for answers too. Poor service ASOS.

name: Sarah Dean
title: Gone downhill
review:
Won't be using ASOS in future since they've announced customers who return stuff are basically going to be banned and not refunded. 

Range began increasingly poor in terms of quality and fit, I would recommend taking pictures of a variety of body sizes to avoid returns and sort out the sizes. It's not the customer's fault. 

Completely disgusted at their returns policy and will be buying elsewhere from now on.

name: Amanda Wheeler
title: Unfortunate experience with missing delivery.
review:
Hi there!

I've been a very loyal ASOS customer for a number of years now. I subscribe to the Premier membership and make a purchase at least once a month, if not, once a week. I was really counting on this delivery coming through for my 40th bday and felt that customer service just sort of threw their hands up in the air without jumping on a solution. I took matters into my own hands and repurchased the pants I needed in hopes they would arrive on time. I hope in the future that customer service reps will be empowered to do whatever it takes to make the customer experience exceed satisfaction.

name: Seyi Abudu
title: Customer care was very bad
review: Customer care was very bad

name: Chris
title: ASOS help line
review: I did not receive my package. I emailed the help line but the response was slow so I chatted with a representative and he was diligent in understanding my problem and confirming a refund.

name: poppy rayner
title: Customer care team where quick to…
review: Customer care team where quick to respond to delivery issues even over the Christmas holidays. Helpful, friendly service. I will however stick to ordering ASOS when I'm in the UK. Most of my orders whilst I've been living abroad have had at least one issue, no issues with this whilst I'm in UK though

name: Clare Young
title: Online chat is useful
review: Online chat is useful, although I was waiting for over 12 minutes before I was connected. I wanted to exchange an item, but there is no info online as to how to do this, which is a little frustrating - so you have to get in touch.

name: Amy Randalls
title: Hermes delivery is so poor. A real shame as the customer service is great.
review: Hermes delivery service is ridiculous. Poor tracking, you can’t phone and speak to customer services, the updates you do receive are far from helpful. A real shame as ASOS customer service and the selection of products is great. Just the delivery service that is a real allergy down.

name: josh brough
title: Helpdesk saves the day
review:
Mobile app doesn't offer the best user experience when straying from the best path - I was notified that my order was unsuccessful, with no clear indication of how to amend the order details.

Thankfully, Lauren from the support team was on hand via live chat. She was able to get to the root of the problem quickly, and set me back on track without hassle. Friendly and proactive help - thanks again!

name: Cecilia Leyva
title: Great store for people in the US
review: The store has many beautiful options, but I wouldn't recommend it if you live outside the U. S. The dress I ordered didn't arrive, but I got great attention from their customer service

name: Romy O
title: Misleading Delivery Timeline On…
review:
Misleading Delivery Timeline On Standard Delivery:
1. Placed an order on Nov 10th. Estimated Delivery Dec 2nd, received on Dec 24th
2. Placed another other for a red dress to wear for a christmas event on Nov 25th. Estimated delivery date, Dec 15th. I'm yet to receive this order and christmas is over.
I usually don't have issues when I go with Express Delivery. Not impressed with my recent delivery experience.

name: Ingibjörg
title: Missing item lost twice
review: I placed an order and an item was missing, then my replacement order got lost in the mail. Now they are trying to replace the order again but the item may be out of stock. It really sucks.

name: Kiara
title: As Expected
review: I was sent the completely wrong item so I contacted customer service and they basically just told me to return it and they'd pay for the express shipping to re-order what will hopefully be the right item. It was helpful, but what was expected of a brand who has made a mistake; nothing above and beyond about the experience. Super disappointed that I received the wrong item though, I've been shopping here for years and I've never once had them send me the wrong thing.

name: Sandra Abarca
title: the rep was great however they did the…
review: the rep was great however they did the best they could to help we with ordering the correct size.

name: Ulliyana dA'SILVA
title: apply all applicable charges to avoid…
review: apply all applicable charges to avoid surprise unexpected charges and hoping for this error on my delivery i do not incur extra charges

name: jilda lawson
title: They gave me a wrong order but they…
review: They gave me a wrong order but they wouldn't replace it but it was their mistake.

name: Ashley Fredericks
title: I can truly say that the assistance I…
review: I can truly say that the assistance I received from Aaron today in trying to locate my return order and then arrange the process of a refund with the internal team all while keeping me in the loop every step of the way via their Chat platform was Top Draw and certainly the best part of my Asos experience overall.

name: MemeLover
title: An odyssey with a happy ending
review:
Despite having a general overall bad experience (my order was shipped almost a week after it was placed, the courier didn't deliver it and I personally had to go to collect it at the depot, the parcel was damaged and one item was missing), contacting the customer care was the best thing I could do.
My case was dealt with quite promptly but very professionally - kudos to Carolina! She was professional but friendly and approachable and organised a refund for my missing item, no question asked.
Carolina, if you ever happen to read this, please know you turned a sad little girl into a happy one -still a little girl though- and hope your good job doesn't go unnoticed.

name: Aadam
title: Qasim is great and helpful
review: Qasim is great and helpful - a dedicated member of staff in spite of his company's flaws

name: Abdellah Maghfour
title: the customer service is great but the…
review: the customer service is great but the delevery time is terrible, please fix the transportation issues

name: Natalie Laranjeira
title: I had a long wait to get through.
review: It took a while to get through. It was 18.30 Spanish time. I had to reorder a pair of shoes that had reduced in price , but I could have reduced the carbon footprint of you had just reimbursed me the difference. A complete waste of time.

name: s
title: Returns take forever
review: Returns take forever, also working with aramex is really bad they took almost a month to come pick up my return package.

name: Jessica Grech
title: Cancelled order!
review:
Stephan was the only person able to tell me that my order was lost. I had spoken to Emma who was only able to tell me to wait another 4 days but was not able to tell me that the order will never come as it was lost. I believe they just copy and paste templates to get rid of us. 
I had ordered a next day delivery on 13th December and hence I was very frustrated to be told to wait more days.

name: Sharon Elisha
title: Very nice representative
review: Very nice representative

name: Joana
title: I have not received what I ordered and…
review:
I have not received what I ordered and when I tried to place a new order, the size I originally ordered wasn't available.
However the customer service assistant was excelent.

name: H J
title: I'm normally so happy with Asos
review:
I'm normally so happy with Asos. I recieve orders quickly and it all goes to plan. 
But they obviously can't handle the demands of black Friday as everything I ordered then still hasn't been delivered. I've emailed and messaged and hardly had a response (I got one email back telling me to wait longer). Then finally got onto chatting about my order with someone only to be told all they could do is refund me or try and re-create the order - but only if the stuff was still in stock. Really disappointed with how much they failed over the black friday period.

name: Hayley
title: Poor delivery service
review: ASOS are brilliant, their choice of delivery partner is not. Almost a week later I have still not received an order that I paid a premium for next day delivery.

name: Rebecca Leech
title: Returns/exchanges and contact
review:
Love the items that I have received. 
However I wish there was a better way of contacting asos. I have been waiting two weeks to find out if they had received my return item which I asked to be exchanged. 
I sent it via Royal Mail tracking and it was delivered two weeks ago.
I’m not sure if there is a general delay with it being close to Christmas or if they didn’t see my messages as I have needed to chase this.
Returns and exchanges I didn’t feel was straight forward. Other online shopping allows you to inform the retailer that you are returning an item however Asos didn’t offer this via Royal Mail but provided an return label in the bag.

name: Ana Luisa Verde Araiza
title: ASOS online chat for a 10 day delayed order
review:
I had 5 chats over the online chat to ask for help with a delayed on my order (10 days delayed). 2 times out of those 5, I’ve spoken with very nice and helpful persons (Waq and Adil) the rest... Jasmin, Laura and I can’t  remember the name of the third, weren’t helpful at all and even a bit rude. 
Anyways, thank you to the first 2 I mentioned for taking the time to explain the situation to me and dealing with my query.

name: SEr Gal
title: Average customer service
review: Very slow response to queries

name: Andy
title: Bought an item
review: Bought an item. Arrived damaged. Chatted online with a rep. and stated that I can repurchase the item at the same price when size/colour available. Found said item restocked. Chatted online with rep. whom initially declined to honour said same price of initial purchase. Chatted/respectfully complained that this isn't fair; cited previous chatlog/history; Item purchased at said initial price after 40 minutes. Had to jump thru hoops to receive an item at a price I was initially offered at.

name: Elizabeth price
title: Although Harry was very nice to chat…
review: Although Harry was very nice to chat with, he wasn't able to help me with my issue.  I realize it wasn't his fault but it really doesn't speak well for ASOS and their policies for helping customers

name: Lauren
title: Merry Christmas
review:
I placed an order on 01/12/19 and was advised that the latest delivery date would be 11/12/19. It never arrived and hermes had not recieved it either. So I gave you benefit of the doubt being christmas time and waited aa few days before contacting you to chase it up. Was then advised it never left the warehouse and that it would be sent next day delivery as it was needed for the coming weekend for a secret santa gift. The confirmation email for the replacement then comes through missing the one this from the order that I actually needed and was advised it was now out of stock. So I now have no secret santa gift for this weekend and no opportunity to shop for a replacement as I am a nurse working ridiculous hours up until the one time I can squeeze in seeing my friends this weekend. Not very happy at all. 
The one positive thing I can feedback is the help from the staff on the online chat, they do a great job and even attempted to cheer me up by cracking a joke, thanks kevin!

name: k-pop
title: HERMES!!!
review: ASOS is great, but their courier service, Hermes, really lets them down.  I'm a premier delivery customer,waited in for 2 days on my 'next day' order.  Three days later, still waiting.  Disgusting service.

name: Dee
title: Took forever to get a refund
review: Took forever to get a refund. Their customer service is pretty bad.

name: Patrick
title: I've spoken with 3 customer services…
review:
I've spoken with 3 customer services reps this week.

Tisharne was not helpful at all and kept asking the exact same questions and not able to help with a warehouse lost item. She then seemed irritated when I kept asking questions and ended my chat.

Hibo, was pretty helpful with what he could do.

The best help I've received this week was from Sabrina, who saw my frustration and went to ask the warehouse to expedite shipping to make right a tough situation

name: Courtney O'Sullivan
title: 10 day waiting game
review:
After a 10 day waiting game, of what clearly was the ordeal of Hermes having lost my parcel, ASOS finally done something about it.
However it did mean losing half my order as most had gone out of stock by the time they sent out the replacement parcel.
Nobody can even exactly tell me what happened to my parcel, and until I spoke to a lovely lady called ANTHONIA, the customer service helpers were useless.
One, Stuart, just point blank refused to help me with anything until I had waited a further 8 hours and got back in touch the following day.

name: Chloe
title: Stop using Hermes
review: The agent i communicated with via live chat was helpful. She was assisting with a refund as like countless other customers, i have not received an order i made on 23rd November. I suggest ASOS and all other companies withdraw from using myhermes in future as they are a disgrace of a company

name: Masma
title: nobody can give me an exact answer.
review: nobody can give me an exact answer.

name: Jay
title: I ordered my goods on 5/12 however it’s…
review: I ordered my goods on 5/12 however it’s not delivered until now . Seek help from the customer service , the staff react quick and helpful .

name: Nikita Cremona
title: Excellent customer service.
review: Excellent customer service.

name: natalie drew
title: I hope its done for christmas...
review: I would've liked my issue to be resolved a little quicker but I have been assured that my issue will be resolved before Christmas. I understand this is a really busy time of year but I thought that the issue I had could be rectified easily.

name: Robert Rosalvi
title: Incomplete Orders
review: Great! But second time I receive incomplete orders.

name: Michael
title: Customer service is a little difficult…
review: Customer service is a little difficult to get hold of and not the easiest to get your problem solved.

name: Danielle Chiz
title: Slow responses
review: Slow responses. No solutions

name: Cards
title: Connor helped smooth thing over to the…
review: Connor helped smooth thing over to the best of his ability. Oliver was rude and curt and could really use so customer service training. issue is not resolved but policy is policy. Nothing that can be done about receiving a BROKEN item. Can only return and not receive a replacement.

name: Callie Rose
title: Didn't get anything I ordered and now they are sold out.
review: The customer service was good, I felt like the person was really trying to help me. However it wouldn't have been needed if ASOS had got my order right! I ordered three dresses and received none of them, I got a different person's order. Now all the dresses are sold out and I am extremely disappointed.

name: Alexandra Grandy
title: Frustrated with the false estimated delivery…
review: Frustrated with the false estimated delivery date but how can you be mad at Misty? She was very kind .

name: Louisa Prvulovich
title: Premier delivery issues
review: i found it very difficult to get in touch with anyone, but once i was they were very helpful and gave me useful advice. that said, i waited for around half an hour on multiple pages to be able to get in touch. ASOS cancelled premier delivery due to black friday - but there were no signs on the website, and i only saw after i placed my order when the arrival date was later. given that i paid for premier next day delivery, and really wanted to get my order in sooner rather than later this was vvvv annoying!

name: Ming Hao
title: I was abruptly informed that I…
review:
I was abruptly informed that I initiated a refund which i did not. Turns out the order was cancelled and I had to take the initiative to find out what happened. That brought a lot of inconvenience and it's close to Christmas, I may not be able to get a replacement present in time. 

Elysha was helpful and courteous nonetheless. Great customer service.

name: Mariam
title: It’s like talking to a robot
review: It’s like talking to a robot

name: Sarah Dawn Denning
title: I Struggle with online shopping and I…
review: I Struggle with online shopping and I was so grateful for how quick my problems were resolved

name: Ciaran
title: ASOS? Great. Delivery Drivers? Awful.
review: ASOS themselves are great but I have so many problems with their delivery drivers, DPD especially. They fail to understand how to deliver parcels properly.

name: Teresa Santosus
title: Return process is frustrating
review:
Return process is poor.  I pay for premium shipping and yet 3 out of 5 items were not in the shipment.  I need to go through Facebook messenger to communicate and it takes a long time to hear back.  

I am still not sure if the missing items have shipped.  If yes, they should ship immediately, but I have no way of knowing.

name: Rose
title: ASOS always send wrong quantity of…
review: ASOS always send wrong quantity of order, but customer services are very good.

name: Corinne Hector
title: The customer service associate was…
review: The customer service associate was great. Unfortunately, he did not have any resources to help me therefore I am unsatisfied with this customer service overall

name: Hend Al Alaiwat
title: Refund is so late
review:
I’m not sure if i should be reviewing asos in general or my customer service experience. I love asos and have been a customer for quite some time now. 
The experience with the chat was okay, I’m just disappointed that they were not able to give me any information regarding my refund that is very late. Otherwise, Michaela was very friendly and did her job well. Thanks.

name: Sam
title: Didn't seemed to be very reputable
review: Didn't seemed to be very reputable, was quite shocking about his/her grammar. Couldn't rlly help me. Maybe he/she was new in the customer service.

name: G
title: good service
review: good service, not satisfying answer based on previous conversation

name: Leyla
title: Yonis was incredibly helpful five…
review: Yonis was incredibly helpful five stars! But ASOS procedures regarding returns and admitting fault 1 star!

name: Jess Buck
title: Parcel delivery
review: I ordered a parcel for an event on 7th December. I ordered it to be delivered on the 3rd. There was a problem with delivery (Hermes) so it was sent back. They say they will try to deliver up to 3 times after that. Nothing. All week. The event comes and I have nothing as that parcel was for the 7th. I try and contact ASOS all week and get nothing back. I finally get the online chat working and someone called Talia speaks to me. They help me out but say I have to wait until the 9th to get a full refund on my parcel because of the contract they have with Hermes. The outfit I ordered was specifically for the event on the 7th and could not go because I did not have my parcel. Hermes say they will try and deliver it up to 3 times but no attempt to delivery was made but yet I still have to wait until the 9th to get a full refund. Not happy. I use ASOS all the time and this is the worst experience I have had with them. I like ASOS hence the 3 stars and Talias help otherwise it would have been less.

name: just someone
title: My parcel was opened on delivery…
review: My parcel was opened on delivery without any reason. Asos have no clue why carriers are opening customers parcels, just to be noisy I guess. Carriers need to step up with their job and deliver parcels without opening them.

name: Jacqueline Lim
title: Customer service helpline.
review:
Customer service helpline specifically chat now. 
Oliver has been a great help as a customer service agent understanding and all kinds of patient regarding my order that has yet to reach me. Unlike MIsty, one of your customer service agents who sounded hostile with an attitude and do not sound keen to help. This has to be improved.

name: Kate Petra
title: Bit slow to respond but helpful.
review: Bit slow to respond but helpful.

name: Ashley
title: Had some trouble with my delivery and…
review: Had some trouble with my delivery and chatted with Adil from ASOS support. All my questions got answered in a timely manner and I was 100% satisfied with the help I received. Need more support operators like Adil!!

name: Ioanna
title: Both Support representatives I've…
review:
Both Support representatives I've spoken with, were really polite and willing to help. 
But for resolving my problem I had to contact you too many times because of your returns policy on incorrect items. First of all I had to wait many days for receiving my item and after realising you have sent me an incorrect item, I had to contact you 4-5 times to get everything done.  For those cases you need to review your policy, if you actually care for customer satisfaction.  Now you are making the Customer spend time and money for "fixing" your fault.  The customer needs to place a new order, pay for it, create a new returns form, pay for it and go to the post-office to send you back the incorrect item and wait for approximately a month for receiving a refund.  This is not acceptable for something that is your fault.

name: Hannah
title: Not very customer friendly policies
review:
(Through no fault of ASOS) my order didn't get delivered. The post office lost it then returned it to sender. 
I asked for my order to be resent and was told ASOS would not do this.
Instead I have to wait another 10 days (it's already been 6 weeks) for my money to be refunded and reorder. So I originally ordered in October and likly, with how long deliveries take over Christmas, wont get my order till January.
The person I spoke with is going to organise a promo code so that I won't be out of pocket, (I bought the items on sale) so that's good, but otherwise this was a bad experience.
The person I spoke to did seem to be genuinely trying their best to help me, which was the one redeeming part of this experience.

name: Melos Krasniqi
title: the help chat was very helpful
review: the help chat was very helpful

name: Chloe Renwick
title: The chat service and other customer care services
review: The chat service, although the wait was quite long, was useful and helped me get the answers I needed with my faulty order. Although this service was useful I would avoid contacting by email or Facebook messenger chat as I did not here back from either yet and I had been waiting nearly a week!

name: Domenico
title: Great products choice and prices... but average on delivery.
review:
Placed an order, payed for same day delivery, the day after no information about where is my parcel. Customer care staff has been kind, but no resolution was effectively provided: seems they cannot do anything till the order is 'despatched'.
In conclusion: great choice of products, very good prices, but how can this be valid if you fail on delivery? Dear Asos you can do better than this.

name: nicola davies
title: Good site and quality generally okay…
review: Good site and quality generally okay just the delivery is getting worse. You use to be able to order standard delivery and it arrive within a few days now unless you pay for next day or premier member you have to wait well over a week. Your order isn’t even looked at for days. Getting worse

name: Mindy
title: I hope the overall customer experiencer…
review: I hope the overall customer experiencer can be improved. it took me 3 days to try to get a promo code sorted and I still haven't receive anything.

name: Alya
title: Charlie was satisfying and helpful
review: Charlie was satisfying and helpful

name: Mariama
title: I have placed a couple orders and never…
review: I have placed a couple orders and never received them which is the reason of my 3 stars and before i could get a refund it takes at least 1 month extra. I am based in Montreal, Canada and you don't have a tracking number with our local postal office. This is not a small town and you should be able to get a tracking for us. I have placed order with much smaller companies overseas and they always provide a tracking number with the same Postal Courrier. However i have received 2 other orders and was never disappointed with what i have ordered. Quality was good and beautiful. You gotta do better with these tracking numbers so at least we can follow up with them.

name: SunnySunbeams☀️
title: Missing items from a set...
review: Well packaged and average delivery time, however on arrival of my parcel there was items of a set missing. Disappointing since by the time they would be exchanged it will be too late for what I needed them for. So instead I have had to request a refund and miss out on the item. ASOS helped to arrange a collection to send them back, so I cannot fault the customer service, however I would have naturally just preferred what I ordered.

name: Tanesha Monique
title: Majorly slow response time
review: Tried several times to use the chat now service through the site as this is normally quicker than other ways of contacting however I never got through to anyone. Then used the Facebook chat feature and yet again was not responded to until 24 hours later after I’d decided to use twitter and finally got my query answered however after r being told to dm and waiting a while I had to ask them to even acknowledge the dm

name: Ismail
title: Hey ASOS
review: Hey ASOS! I really like you to shop with you but one  of you I was ask my refund for chats box she /he didn’t treat me well her/ his names is Oliver and I am not happy the way she/ he treating even she is end up for conversation without say good by and I was asking questions such as .where is my refund? It is not nice the way she/ he treats me

name: Jayne W Homes
title: you suuuuuuuck
review:
Ok so I love that I got to speak with an actual person (only 'cause I asked, BEGGED actually) but WT actual F! I accidentally had my old address as the shipping address, and I didn't notice because my new address was the billing address but WHY CAN'T YOU CALL FEDEX AND RE-ROUT HE DAMN PACKAGE?!??!?!?!?!? 

Like, I know I'm dumb but I spoke to FedEx before I called you, or rather you called me, and they said all they needed was an "Ok" from you and they'd re-route it. Now I have to call and cancel the package through them (which UTTERLY f**ks up my Holiday plans which I paid expedited shipping for) all because you couldn't do this tiny little favor... Makes me want to not shop here anymore. I have excellent customer service experiences with other shops but you guys do f**kall to help with orders.

Sidebar, the guy who actually DID call me was a GEM! He was awesome and deserves a raise.

but seriously ASOS, step your game up.

name: Nan Xin Wang
title: Difficult to get in contact. Website error.
review: I've always used ASOS and the delivery and return has always been superb. This time round my parcel did not arrive on the estimated delivery date. And trying to reach them have been pretty blood boiling. It is constantly requiring me to sign in even when I was signed in. The website just does not work very well.

name: Chris Hawkridge
title: Although the service was very good
review: Although the service was very good - my issue was not resolved and the chat window took a super long time to be connected to someone so can't provide a 5 star review.

name: Anna Burmistrova
title: Always issues with customs
review: Always issues with customs, not even in my country, so if it’s passing through another countries on the way to me, how I supposed to know the route ? Then appears issues with customs in other countries, then ASOS sends message I need to contact customer care service and they are not helpful at all, looks like you are talking to scam. Still didn’t solve the problem

name: Moish Marilus
title: The chat with Clare was very good and…
review:
The chat with Clare was very good and good for her. 

But I tried to mail you and to send a messenger but without any reply

name: Zoe Jefferson
title: Great someone is there to respond but…
review:
Great someone is there to respond but nothings been sorted I've been passed off to someone to by emailed within 4 days! 

Ruined a birthday by not delivering items.

name: Evie Lynch
title: I ordered a dress it never arrived…
review: I ordered a dress it never arrived despite being told it had been dispatched. Next thing I got an email saying 'we got your return your refund is on the way' but I never got the dress in the first place. Messaged them and their response was, we lost it in the warehouse so we thought it was best to refund it but you can order it again if yih want..... If you can 'find' it for my new order why not just send me that one and not refund me. I had nothing to wear for the event that was ordered for, because in good faith I thought it was on its way?

name: Caroline
title: Charles was a great help but the wait…
review: Charles was a great help but the wait time was too long both waiting to get on chat and response time

name: wut
title: A Bot or Not?
review:
The reply was fast but honestly it did feel a bit like I was chatting with a bot. When I said I had a birthday on Saturday and so I’m disappointed i didn’t get my package she said “happy birthday to Saturday”. 
Lol

name: Ashleigh
title: Difficulties with delivery
review: Difficulties with delivery. I pay for a premier delivery service but three days later have still not received my items. I have not received sufficient tracking information. I have had to reorder the items to my work place and will have to return the original items if and when they finally arrive.

name: Maria Charalampaki
title: He was helpful but I had to ask more…
review: He was helpful but I had to ask more and more to get my answer. He had prepared his answers and gave them to me without much effort to listen to my issue. At last he assisted me and hopefully everything will be ok

name: Sharanya Shukla
title: As previously have faced delivery issue…
review: As previously have faced delivery issue I hope I receive on time she was helpful to explain me but in the end doubtful reply was not expected thank you.

name: Kyna Mac
title: Dont pay extra for delivery its shonky
review: Usually Asos is great as an online shopping experience but when they tell you they are going to deliver something by a certain date and you pay extra for that guaranteed date it is off putting when that doesnt happen. Its a bit shonky actually because if you pay no extra for delivery you get it at the same time

name: Eliza
title: Chat was helpful but the returns policy…
review: Chat was helpful but the returns policy is frustrating. Everything has to be sent back for ‘inspection’ and then you have to hope there is a replacement in stock in your size. Just frustrating.

name: Daria Zavyalova
title: Will be ordering again
review: Overall I love ordering from ASOS as everything comes on time and the quality is good. However, the last time I ordered I had a problem with my parcel being delivered. Nevertheless, the issue had been resolved after I reached out to the ASOS online chat team.

name: Gra
title: Damaged package and reorder cost
review: Had an issue with a damaged package and had to reorder this as needed for an event. I was refunded the express shipping fee however having to pay for the order again even though the package was rejected by the courrier was not what I'd expect from asos. Customer care did their best and explained the situation. This was more an issue with the courrier but still should not have been put in a position where I had to pay a second time for my items when the package never got as far as me.

name: Ruby
title: Great customer service but poor packaging
review: I ordered a product, it came broken. The customer service by I believe it was Julyen was excellent and it came the next day. Unfortunately the replacement was broken too! So clearly that is a warehouse problem, and packaging should be addressed. But then Chelsea sorted me out a refund so quickly so thank you Chelsea. All in all - great customer service but poor in the warehouse.

name: KOL
title: In the past 12 months there have been 2…
review: In the past 12 months there have been 2 orders which arrived well outside the communicated timeframes and i found out by engaging with the ASOS team via chat - So thats me, the customer, having to chase ASOS to be told there is a delay (which ASOS knew about) as opposed to ASOS "Proactively" contacting the customer to manage their expectations versus "Reactively" dealing with a customer query. As i said - this is the second similar poor experience i have had in the past 12 months and i would not deem this acceptable particularly in your competitive market landscape!

name: Samantha Foster
title: Not entirely satisfied
review: Not entirely satisfied and I placed an order and paid full price to find that every item was reduced the very next day (£15.49 difference if I'd of ordered a day later) I contacted them and asked if anything could be done but sadly the only option would be to return all items, get a refund and re order. I would of done this but I'd then have to pay twice for delivery as I dont have premium and need the items asap.

name: anon
title: shipping labels
review: Customer rep was great, but need better options for printing return labels. I remember being able to just bring in the package and a barcode to the post office and returning it that way.

name: Wacko
title: I ordered a pair of shoes and socks and…
review: I ordered a pair of shoes and socks and I’ve waited for almost 2months their tracking is worst then I contacted the customer service and they respond, well I’m not really satisfied in their tracking process. After that they said my item is lost and so they return my payment after 10working days then after a week my item came and I chat their customer service and they say they wont me recharge for my item, so it’s FREE!!!thank you ASOS.

name: Lyric Edwards
title: We don’t have your clothes, here’s some trash instead!
review: I received my package with less than half of what I ordered, no receipt, and there was literally an empty chip bag in my package. I don’t appreciate the fact that I spent $100+ and I received actual garbage. Also don’t appreciate that there’s not option to call. Live chat sucks and you have no idea how long you’ll have to wait to talk to someone. Eventually I tried again and they resolved my issues. But I like Asos clothes and this was my first time having issues with them. Not sure I’ll order from them again.

name: Anastasia Gutnova
title: I spoke to Francesca who was lovely and…
review: I spoke to Francesca who was lovely and very friendly. However I am not happy with how my situation regarding quality of the product was handled: it is highly wasteful and scammy so sell products that disintegrate after just one wash.

name: JK
title: Asis - Missing Delivery Support
review:
Although, I got in contact for quite a serious issue 'regarding a missing parcel' i was dealt with accordingly and respectfully. Customer service webchat help team are very friendly and supportive and although I had a bad experience I would still (hopefully) look to using ASOS again in the near future.

Although, the issue wasn't dealt with and handled on the spot and still needs a 5 day wait period. I don't feel anxious or as angry as before about the order.

name: Joe Michael Chilmaid
title: Chat was helpful but delivery awful
review: The online chat was helpful and somewhat resolved the issue. But the delivery never turned up next day and was planned to turn up a week later! Had to re-order the order just to get it in time!

name: Alicia
title: replies are quite slow
review: replies are quite slow. Had to wait 20 minutes for chat just to start and then 3 minutes between a replies

name: Dom
title: you should offer exchanges for the wrong sizes
review: the team member in the chat was very helpful. just disappointing i bought the wrong size on sale and now have to pay full price for the size i need.

name: Simon P
title: My return docket never got sent to me
review:
My return docket never got sent to me, and i was unable to generate new one. I ended up having to create an excel document that the help staff turned into a manual docket.
The issue you should never have occurred nor become my issue to resolve, however with what the team member Charlotte could do in her scope, she was was extremely helpful.

name: Jovan Novakovic
title: Package missing
review: I ordered my parcel that was meant to arrive on the 26th of September. Still has not arrived even though it states received on my account. Currently in touch with support trying to locate package.

name: Roxanne
title: 3rd time lucky
review:
got in touch via live chat twice this morning, the first time qasim ended the chat on me before being given the chance to explain anything. the second chat i was given an email and brushed off by the advisor - not helpful at all.

on my third attempt i was put through to Claude on live chat, he was able to help me with my query rather than ending the chat or trying to send me elsewhere to get an answer. I would have definitely given a higher rating to Claude if he was the first advisor i was put through to

name: emily
title: refunds...
review: I like the clothes but the customer service wasn’t very helpful. i was waiting ages just to find out that there was an issue with my parcel and that i was getting a refund and haven’t even received the refund yet.

name: Jesse
title: I have some different experiences with…
review: I have some different experiences with them but of course the collection is great!

name: Richard
title: Becoming a little disappointed
review: Becoming a little disappointed with ASOS regarding Premier Delivery.  I paid £9.95 for the year and have since learned the charge has been increased to £15 so won't be paying next time.  In my area, ASOS uses Collect +.  I have recently had quite a few deliveries take longer than 'next-day'.  Surely next-day should mean next-day!?  Or maybe I'm expecting too much....

name: Princess
title: I ordered a US 10 and received a US 8
review: I ordered a US 10 and received a US 8. When I reported the issue, I was told that a UK 8 is a US 10, as if I was supposed to believe that the 8 on the tag and the sticker on the sole were UK 8 instead of US 8, even though I cannot put my foot in the boot. 😂 Strangely enough, the box had two labels; one said UK 6 and the other said UK 8. Maybe that is where they should focus their Quality Control efforts.

name: Neema Hokes Bethune
title: Customer service is of little service
review:
I love Asos and shop here from time to time. Most often I’m satisfied with the pricing, shipping and quality of items. If anything, it’s the lack of flexibility of the customer service reps that could use some work. 
I placed an order and immediately realized that I selected the wrong shipping address. Three minutes later I’m chatting with someone, great on the timing, but the response was that the address could not be changed once the order was placed. I would have to cancel and place it again. Only 1) I used a coupon code and didn’t want to take the chance that it wouldn’t work the second time around and 2) one of the items I purchased was the last in that size. I was afraid that it would take some time to update availability and I wouldn’t see the size as an option to placed in my cart. So ultimately the order will be sent to the wrong address and I’ll make a trip there to collect it. 

My other issue is that when you do use a coupon to buy something, if you need to exchange it for some reason, even for a reason outside of your control (e.g. wrong size was sent or item is defective), they will never give you a code, credit or option for exchange. You always have to return the item and repurchase it at the current website pricing. If I saved $10 on a dress the first time I bought it, I don’t want to lose that discount because you sent me the wrong size. It’s disappointing that they have zero flexibility and always give you a canned response. For instance, I had a coupon when I purchased the dress I received today. Only I ordered a medium and in the bag was a small. Now all I can do is return and place a brand new order sans coupon. Not great.

name: Natasha Ferkel
title: Restock
review: I like how easy it is to contact them, but I am trying to buy wedding suits through this company and cannot figure out if they will restock the suit that we want. Because they are not giving us a clear answer, we will probably have to go with a different company, even though we love their suits.

name: Sana
title: I bought on asos for the first time 4…
review: I bought on asos for the first time 4 earrings. I actually was only half happy but not 100%. The delivery was quite good within 9 days package was delivered but the quality of the earrings is really not recommendable for that amount of prize. One was quite rusty😑 and the others I had problems with locking. I had fear they may get distorted. Wouldn't recommend buying earrings...

name: Sarah Howes
title: It took 35minutes for my problem to be…
review: It took 35minutes for my problem to be resolved but the person resolving was helpful

name: justANT
title: I placed an order with the premiere…
review: I placed an order with the premiere delivery service. When I reported to ASOS that I didn't receive my order in 2 days, I was told that they couldn't issue a refund until after 13 days had past (although FedEx already reported that the package was undeliverable because the parcel was empty). I contacted ASOS after 13 days and then I was told that someone would email me within 24 hours. I'm beyond frustrated with all of the back and forth. It's never been this hard for a shipping issue to be resolved -RIDICULOUS!

name: Lukas Tell
title: Overall good but issues tend to be thrown around within the company.
review:
On the whole, I like Asos, but lately the same problems are emerging again and again.

Asos has good prices, student discounts,  virtual catwalk to see how clothes fit, a wide product range and customer support are always nice to you. 

However, something that often happens is that the delivery is wrong and even if the staff are nice and wants to help, it feels like there is a lack of communication between customer service and other branches like purchasing, stock etc.

The matter is often sent around between different people within the company and usually to the level that someone forgets to answer so you do not hear back from them and you'll have to contact them again.

Most of the time I'm missing items or a package is missing which get really frustrating when it happens too often. 

Besides this issue i would recommend Asos.

name: andrea downer
title: I used to shop with ASOS a lot
review: I used to shop with ASOS a lot, I think getting items shipped to America is harder for them than the U.K., for this reason I limited my shopping. One one occasion I received two left shoes, a dirty sock attached to the dresser I ordered, on multiple  occasions I’ve received shoes three times smaller than what I ordered. It’s too much of a hassle to re send items back to them. Overall they are a good site, just don’t buy shoes with them, you’ll get the wrong size every time.

name: Hussain
title: Didnt help me understand what the issue…
review: Didnt help me understand what the issue regarding my return was, only let me know theyre passing the job on. Tried to make excuses that dont fit the situation.

name: Tanja Hunger
title: Great products, bad delivery partnership
review: Great products, good customer service, but their partnership with Hermes for delivery will be their undoing. Hermes have not delivered my items to a safe place on more than one occasion. Unacceptable.

name: tia battey
title: Beautiful dress
review: Beautiful dress. I was excited to wear it to an upcoming event. When it arrived, to my disappointment it was stained.

name: fairywingsenchanted
title: not the best customer service i've…
review: not the best customer service i've received from asos

name: Louise
title: I've been struggling to get consistent…
review: I've been struggling to get consistent support from ASOS lately, sometimes is good, sometimes is just awful.

name: Anthony Pough
title: Pretty slow responses
review: Pretty slow responses. and unhelpful

name: Jess
title: My delivery arrived the morning it was…
review: My delivery arrived the morning it was expected. Although my dress arrived dirty, the ladies I spoke to regarding this matter, dealt with it very efficiently and covered the expense of the next day delivery cost for my new dress.

name: Tiara Monique Gay
title: My item arrived damaged that is why I…
review: My item arrived damaged that is why I am giving them a 3 star rating. But delivery was easy and stressless and customer service was excellent.

name: moeen
title: i hope to get my order .
review: i hope to get my order .. good service

name: Mika Limore
title: The help chat i just was extremely useful but prime service is poor.
review:
The help chat I just had was extremely useful and he helped solved the problem.

However I recently renewed my Prime Membership and my deliveries are not arriving on time which is annoying because I specifically pay for this service. Not only this, but you charged more money for this service, and then refunded with a voucher.. I am paying more for a less efficient service ! Not a great look. 

I then couldn't download the Hermes collection form as there seemed to be a glitch. 

All in all i have previously thought the service was fantastic but I'm not impressed at the moment. 

Its a shame, because the reliability has gone down I will now look at other sites who CAN deliver on time.

name: Naoual A.
title: Dissapointed
review: I realy love the website. Love shopping on asos BUT what is happening with the company they are working with to send orders to Belgium? This is the 2nd time I've ordered and that there are problems with delivery! It takes 3 weeks instead of the 5 days Asos said it would take. Very dissapointed. Would not order on Asos again just because of that. Back to Zalando.

name: Katy
title: Normally have no issues with asos and…
review: Normally have no issues with asos and their delivery times but I don't think I'll choose evening delivery again. Had I known I would have to wait up until midnight for an order when the website and tracking system clearly states 6pm to 10pm I wouldn't have selected it! For future orders extra communication would be appreciated if the parcel is going to be late etc.

name: Charlie
title: Polite and shared as much information…
review: Polite and shared as much information as possible but ultimately couldn't help with my issues

name: Emily Ellis
title: I ordered some trainers and the day…
review: I ordered some trainers and the day they arrived they went in the sale. When I contacted Asos, they said they were unable to refund the difference, instead I'd have to send them back and order again to get the sale price. Slightly frustrating.

name: Cyril Bordat
title: Payment issue with the android app
review:
hi

using the app for the second time (first time went well), and paying through paypal i had a bad behavior with the app, charging my paypal but not sending the order through.

I been told by the support i will have my money back in 48 hours ( we will see about that, cannot confirm yet). Assuming the bug would be fixed the day after i tried again and the same issue occurred.

i'm surprised by how slow the company is to react to such issues, with all the competition on the market you want your client to be confident when paying through an app, and now i became skeptical about it.

it worked well with the web platform though.(just ordered tonight using paypal).

Working in software engineering i would take several actions with my PO and address with the dev team  rapidly how to face such issues for the clients.

I understand you want to get paid before the order goes through, but  you should validate if the order is successfully sent before charging paypal and not the other way around. (i find that approach creepy), and if the order is not sent through don't allow the payment (something like  that).

Anyhow, that's why i'm rating 3 stars my experience, although i think we should have Orders in the main menu and not under My account, beside that i love the dark theme, the videos for the items and the app in its globality.

thank you for reading me.

Cyril.

name: Diane Hanson- Byassee
title: I'm a loyal ASOS frustrated shopper
review: I'm a loyal ASOS shopper.  I love the clothes and pay for two day delivery service.  Over the past month I've had four problems with orders where I'm missing 1-2 or the whole order!  The packages come opened and it looks like the clothes have been rifled through.  This is ridiculous since I pay extra for the 2-day service.  It's not easy trying to connect with ASOS.  The chat talk is not the easiest.  It would be nice to have a number to call and talk to a live person.  The service is becoming less and less unfortunately.  There are many online stores to choose from.  If the services continues to go down, I will no longer be a customer.

name: Jake
title: Missing item, wrong size
review:
Please note that this is a review for my experience and not for the customer service member I spoke with.

I ordered 5 items and only 4 arrive.  Of those 4, 1 item was the wrong size.  After speaking with my CSR Narina, I found that the shoes (1307188) are listed on the website as US half-sizes (I ordered 10.5), while the actual shoe is made in UK whole sizes (I received a 10).
Obviously the shoe didn't fit and now I have to return it for a refund.  It also looks like the size I would need is out of stock, so I won't be able to wear the shoe at all.

Remains to be seen what happens with the missing item.  Given that the bag arrived open it's likely not the fault of ASOS, but hopefully I can get my item before the event I purchased it for.

So far, a pretty lousy experience for me.

Narina was nice enough.  Polite and helped me about as much as they could.

name: Panicos Michael
title: Received the shoes..
review: Received the shoes... Minor damage in the front of the shoe... Not really happy with it...

name: Assi Nikkinen
title: Returnings
review: Returning was very complex and confusing, but I got friendly help quickly from help chat. Otherwise I like Asos and ordering was easy.

name: becky m
title: I really want to give Asos five stars…
review:
I really want to give Asos five stars as I have been shopping with them for years and have had very little need to complain about in that time. You order something, it arrives the next day, keep it or you send it back. No problem. 
However, recently the company has been using the courier Hermes and the last 3 orders I’ve made have been delayed, one order took 5 days to arrive. 
The chat rep I spoke to was really nice and friendly as I told her that I was making a complaint about Hermes, she took the complaint, confirmed the delays and told me this would be investigated internally. 
   My advice would be that more people do this, complain to ASOS about Hermes (as Hermes has no customer service) and hopefully they might change courier. At the moment I’m thinking twice about ordering from ASOS until they get rid of Hermes.

name: Steph
title: Very slow to reply
review: Very slow to reply. Took a long time to access the chat. Had to keep phone from locking out in order to keep the chat active.

name: Prince Azeem Mohamed
title: Not details service
review: Responses are very slow

name: G
title: Next day Delivery dose not exist!!
review: Next day Delivery dose not exist....Pay for yearly Next day delivery and on more than one occasions have not received it feel cheated and customer service is no help either very disappointed as this is a waste of time and money.

name: kat
title: The product came quickly.However,
review: The product came quickly.However, the fabric was very thin, cheap and see through. I definitely could have used the same amount of money I spent on this item to buy a similar item of much better quality. Also,the top was baggy yet the sleeves were really short (the sizing was rather out of proportion).

name: Daphne B
title: Returned an item almost a month ago and…
review: Returned an item almost a month ago and still no confirmation from Asos that this has been received - very worrying! Attempting to get in contact with someone about this but no luck yet!

name: Elena
title: Shipping price
review:
Hi, 

Your shipping its to expensive, 11 euros for a standard delivery very expensive. It was okay 3 euro. Please pretty please lower the shipping price. I have been ordering many years, now i cannot afford it. :(

name: Anthony O’Brien
title: Received the wrong products
review: Received the wrong products

name: Valeria Gaia Marinelli
title: Good but misleading descriptions
review: Fast shipping, great disposability for any problem, but it’s the second time that I pick a product because in the description it says “ inside fleeced” but when it arrives it isn’t at all. So misleading product descriptions

name: Harvey
title: Not great service overall as my order…
review: Not great service overall as my order was extremely late and even though it arrived in the end it wasn’t the right size

name: Lindsay
title: Poor customer service
review:
Poor customer service
Lost my package, was never informed until I contacted them. then they only have a chat portal for issues and all I was told was I’m sorry. 
Won’t be spending my money here anymore.

name: Carmen
title: Good products, substandard delivery...
review: I just ordered from ASOS for the first time and was so happy with the app and selection (and prices). When my order was about a week past the estimated delivery date, I came onto Trust Pilot to read some reviews and immediately started to panic. Normally I’d check reviews before buying but I knew ASOS has been around for a while, and since many Instagram influencers promote ASOS I didn’t see much reason to investigate until after the late delivery. Anyway, I went to customer service right away and they weren’t helpful at all. They had no way of tracking my package and couldn’t even tell me when it had left the UK. They basically just extended the delivery time and told me to contact them if I still hadn’t received my items after that date. I was very short with the rep and feel a bit bad about it now because the package did actually show up within a week after contacting them. I ordered two tops and a belt and love all 3 (all ASOS brand). The quality is good and they’re as pictured on the site. I will consider ordering again based on the fact that shipping and duties were free and I ended up happy with my items, but the delivery time and overall delivery system is substandard. I would definitely not order from ASOS if you’re banking on having the items in time for a specific occasion, unless you’re ordering months in advance.

name: Naz
title: I've payed for next day delivery and…
review: I've payed for next day delivery and its still not here and I've spoke to multiple people from asos help on twitter to the online chat which constantly just shut me down. It was becoming the end of the day with no hope left for my parcel to arrive so I thought id try the chat one more time and Paul provided the best service he was amazing with the reponses and reassured me both with a refund on premier delivery and making sure my delivery "should" come by tomorrow and he was a great laugh they need more people like Paul and less Hermes crappy delivery

name: Jack Adam Green
title: 've ordered Adidas sneakers
review:
Wanted to share my expereience using ASOS:

I have ordered a paris of Adidas sneakers a month ago.

It was sent to me without any delays, but the package literally lost somewhere, it could not be tracked. I have contacted the delivery company and they have not received the package too.

The customer support is literally the worst I've ever met. They had no information regarding the package and did not agree to refund.
After several days, they told me that the package will be returned to them. Wanna know what happened next? I've received the package in two days after it happened.

The items are great, the overall experience is not so good. If you do not care about delivery time and so on, feel free to order items but do not hope that CS will help you.

name: Amy Dotre
title: Always find what you need with latest…
review: Always find what you need with latest trends. An effort to do with the visuals of the clothes cause sometimes quality or colors could be a little different when you receive it..

name: Amanda
title: Not the best experience with service
review: Not the best experience with service, but at least I got my order!

name: Elle
title: I usually have good things to write…
review: I usually have good things to write about ASOS but today I was very disappointedz I ordered collision slim mom jeans in dark stone wash and they are rubbish. The colour is nothing like the photo it’s much lighter and second you can not call them mom jeans, they were in my size but we’re way too tight around my waist and just reached my belly button, mom jeans are high waisted and they 100% were not. I’m very disappointed.

name: Aida Kayani
title: A very Poor experience
review:
SAARA - ASOS  worst live chat representative she was so RUDE , UNQUALIFIED  and very INCOMPETENT ,  unhappy customer like my self who has received the wrong size and the wrong colour ( wanted item out of stock in all sizes) would expect much better services however she  was clearly not ready to assist,  she was sending me general copy-past template about how to return the item and refused to even offer me an apology. AND END UP CLOSING THE CHAT ON ME I mean really !! Is this how ASOS trained you to treat their customer ??  

Claudi was  heplfull understanding and listening to the customer query, even if there was NO GWG offered  I wouldn't  doubt his skills of explaining him self as a humain being rather then sending templates like his colleague who was too lazy to do The job she is getting paid for . I've wasted 2 hours for a query that could of being dealt with within couple of minutes

Many Thanks to Claudi for being a stunning example for ASOS customer care agent  5 starts and honestly if I can rate  0 star to person named SAARA  I would do so  , and I would suggest her to  find a different job as customer satfactory is something to hard for her to achieve she is absolutely HORRIBLE.. and what she is advising is an absolute joke and her collègue CLAUDI has proved she is not qualified enough .

Cheers .

name: customer1
title: Whats going on ?
review: Ive had problems over xmas...but i tried ordering items in the last hour as there is a promocode with 20%off. I could not access my saved items to buy them or put anything into the basket. The new year promo is only from 7-9. It makes me think it is a scam...i isually hae no problems thats why i gave a 3

name: Florea Alina
title: Francesca from  customer service was… Francesca from  customer service was very friendly and solved the issue immediately .  Thanks !
review: Difficult to get in touch with customer service .

name: Ricky
title: Great products but not customer service
review:
Products in 90% really decent and easy to use app
But if some goes wrong with an order customer service really poor and no option to talk to someone on the phone is a real problem .. comparing to next , eBay where this option is available

name: Gabrielle Fehily
title: I had issues with my express delivery
review: I had issues with my express delivery. It was suppose to be delivered within 3 days but now I’ve been told it could be 14 days. I am disappointed however when contacting support via online chat I spoke to Natika, whom was friendly and able to refund me the shipping cost. Thank you Natika, despite the potential of not having my dress for the event I planned, it helps to have some sympathy and respect.

name: Ryan Yuan
title: Good service but taking so long to get refunded
review: Good products and service. I love ASOS because of their regular promotion. However, the refund is getting way too long. It used to be very good. Recently they have changed the policy. It says it can take 30-45 days. But it has taken me more than 2 months, yet it has not been solved. They also did not email me if they received my item or not. I kept wondering if the courier lost my parcel. I had to contact customer service to ask about my refund.

name: Kat K.
title: Good shop, minor issues
review:
Large selection of items. Ordering is pretty simple. Order arrived reasonably fast, and the items were as expected. Returnin items was free, which is good/necessary for online shopping. 

The query I contacted the online Customer Service with was solved politely and efficiently, though it took quite a long time. 

The main problem was that I went to pick up the shipment to discover they had shipped all the items in one huge box, without e.g. handles. Had the post office not loaned me a hand truck, it would've been impossible to get it home. They should consider dividing larger shipments. Also all the packages should definitely have handles/string/rope attached, so that they can be carried.

You also have to print the returns label yourself - it's obviously a big problem if you don't own a printer. They should include the label with your package. Failing that, you should be able to e.g. write the return details on the package.

name: Sharon Swan
title: Taking far too long to refund money
review:
Very good service from Adam. Finally got my refund processed  after waiting 2 weeks. 
Let's see if it hits my account

name: Mrs Blanka Ramsay
title: ASOS are great, but Hermes are a failure
review: ASOS are great and their CS team are very good. Would have given them 5 stars if they stopped using Hermes, who are completely unreliable, have no CS at all (cannot speak to anyone) and lie about their drivers attempting to deliver when there is no evidence of it (no show, no tracking updates, no calling cards). Please stick to DPD or get an alternative haulier, people pay you for the service they don’t receive.

name: R Hughes
title: Poor delivery from Hermes. Great customer service from ASOS
review: I didn’t receive my order even though Hermes said they delivered it. However Liam on the customer service chat was polite, friendly and very helpful in sorting a replacement

name: Jessica Miranda
title: eh...
review:
I really love the idea and merchandise of ASOS, but their customer service is horrible.  I love how they have a wide range of clothing type like wide shoes, clothes for petite women and larger breasts. 
 They have sales and promotions but screw you over in the fine print when you need to return something.  Stay away from buy a certain amount and get a certain amount off.  And their sales rep get very smart with you too.  Just be careful when you buy and think about if you really want to go through the hassle if anything were to happen.

name: Miss Tianna Charles
title: I do love shopping on ASOS and I do…
review: I do love shopping on ASOS and I do very frequently! Although my experiences during my last few orders have been very shocking for an establishment that I spend soo much money at. I placed a few orders and haven't received them, I've contacted customers services to be 1- ignored on live chat, 2- been given false information and 3- not being kept in the loop about order issues and or delays. Although today I was kindly greeted by the lovely Lauren who was very attentive, helpful and friendly. Soo many the Lauren in customer services who answered my questions and but my mind at ease. Unlike Arnie who ended my live chat before it had even begun (for reference these was chat ref 24151845).

name: Lauren
title: Really disappointed with ASOS
review: Really disappointed with ASOS. I have been a loyal customer and made an order last week. After wondering why my order had not been dispatched, I tried logging into my account only to find it had been blocked (no notification or email sent to inform me of this). I have been back and forth with customer service emails and still NOTHING has happened and my account is still blocked. I understand and appreciate security, but there is no excuse to take my money, block my account and not dispatch my order on time.

name: Tony
title: Tracking returns
review: I would prefer having a section on the website/app to track the status of my returns instead of waiting 8 minutes to chat with someone.

name: sashia
title: The customer service representative was…
review:
The customer service representative was really helpful, however it took me 58:20 minutes just to solve a minor issue. I did this chat service when I finished work, at home with a computer. I tried doing it with my mobile phone, It didn't connect properly. I had to keep on refreshing. Also the 58 minutes of solving an issue is a bit too much, which in my opinion can be done in less than 5 minutes on a phone call when talking in person.
Overall, Renee was lovely into helping in solving my issue and hope she's always having a wonderful day.

name: Jordie J
title: Customer satisfaction isn't their priority
review: Hasan was very pleasant but he of course had to adhere to asos regulations which weren't very flexible. I made two very reasonable suggestions on how they could resolve my issue. Briefly this was: their delays meant the recipient will have left the country before that time came. I couldn't alter delivery address even though they'd not yet prepared the package. I could order again and send the original package back upon arrival but it had gone up in price and they wouldn't honour the original price paid.Bit of a shame as I assumed asos would be more like amazon in that they clearly value the customer over everything, even if they take a bit of a hit but sadly not.

name: Dee M.
title: Ordering shoes from ASOS suck!!
review: Ordering shoes from them, its a horrible experience! Because they use the UK sizes and I’m American. So If I order a US10, they always send me a UK9, which ends up being small as hell, and about the same size as a US9, so obviously not my size. I feel like you have to go up a size based on there sizing chart to actually get the right shoe size. But either way it’s annoying as hell being this has happened few times to me and don’t wanna have to remember to go up a shoe size every freakin time I order. So that whole shoe system alone could be better.

name: Mr J Hughes
title: Long hold and return policy needs…
review: Long hold and return policy needs reviewed but advisor was great

name: John
title: Next Day Delivery
review: Don't bother paying that £9.95, literal waste of money. The order always comes a day after the next even when ordered within the time limit.

name: Rachael
title: Unhappy with a response given by an…
review: Unhappy with a response given by an advisor, when asking for an email to further this I was told this is not available. Not good service for a customer and meaning having to leave a bad review which isn’t what I wanted to do. Customer service these days is not how it use to be.

name: Miss Avara Netherton
title: Not overly impressed
review:
The dress I received had a slit in the wrong spot which was cleverly portrayed differently in the photos displayed.
In the same order, I received my shoes in the wrong colour to what I orders, and when I spoke to one of your team members to see what could be done about this, he advised that I had to pay for a new pair of shoes, as well as express shipping, so they could arrive in time, and then arrange for a refund of this shipping cost, and return the shoes that were the wrong colour. 
I just spoke with Nigel who was very quick and helpful in processing this postal fee redund, which was nice. But overall I wasn't impressed with my experience.

name: Kirsty Golledge
title: Good service, minor improvements needed.
review: I thought the service was good and I was pleased with the outcome but it took almost ten minutes of me just waiting. I think it would be better if we were given updates, even if we had to still wait. I was beginning to think no one was working in my issue or that I was just speaking to a computer. That being said, the lady who helped me was very good and helpful and I appreciated it.

name: Mary Doyle
title: Ordered a few items for my holiday on…
review: Ordered a few items for my holiday on Monday, chose next day delivery. By 11pm the next morning I had not received my 1hour time-slot from the courier, so I checked DPD’s tracking which stated they had not received the parcel yet from ASOS. I then contacted DPD and they confirmed that even if the parcel was delivered into their network today, it would be impossible to deliver to me today. I contacted Asos via live chat, the representative fobbed me off and told me I needed to “wait and see” if it delivered, even though I assured her three times that DPD hadn’t even received the parcel and so it was impossible for it to be delivered. I asked her to contact the Asos warehouse to see if there was any update and to avoid any further delays. She refused and said I had to wait until the end of the day. It is now 11:30 at night and the tracking says the DPD have still not received the parcel. Feeling really dissatisfied with the customer service and disappointed that my order has not delivered, with no clue as to when it might.

name: Rob Sampogna
title: Stylish, easy, but be careful...
review: Overall, I've been generally satisfied with ASOS. The clothing and styles are unique and funky, which is great depending on your style. But there are also plenty of simple items, so it's a great place for all your need. Recently had an interesting situation with an order with a suspicious item in the pocket, but I worked with Sebastian and he was very responsive to deal with it swiftly.

name: Thomas Bell
title: Great prices terrible delivery
review: Great prices, terrible delivery!

name: C Biss
title: Dissapointing me more and more
review:
Cannot fault ASOS for their wide range of products available, however everytime I order with them it is always touch and go - their standard delivery takes AGES (at least a week) to get to me and then it is delievered by Hermes who can never get it to me on the day stated. So takes even longer.

ASOS customer service never seem to understand my issue when I contact them about delivery problems or queries or get the urgency.
