I used to have their Premium Delivery which gave me free NDD which was great but now the price has increased and I feel like the service received has gone downhill. 

I think when you spend over £100 on an order you should at least get a bonus NDD for free if you aren't on premier.

name: Mihaela Georgia Chirca
title: Not so happy
review: Not helping much.

name: Anthoney
title: Asos are so moderately average
review:
Asos are so moderately average. Where they do have a large variety of lines, most of which are nice. However, what seems to be a reoccurring factor that counteracts this companies service is the delivery. 

There have been many occasions where I have paid for next day delivery and it has not come next day, I tend to think often this is normal. On the other hand as it happened recently, it had led me to think...what service am I actually paying for if it doesn't arrive next day? After being in touch with their customer service team several times, it seems that they are too blasé to actually want to help their customers. No sense of urgency, no sense of compassion and not a thought of compensation.

The attitude many Asos workers seem to bring really make me want to reduce the business I conduct with them, which is an awful pity.

name: JD
title: No order confirmation email or order number generated but my credit card was still charged
review: I placed my first ever order to ASOS for a pair of boots for my daughter. After completing the order, I realized a few days later I'd never received an email confirmation. Meanwhile my credit card was charged and posted for the total amount.  I got nowhere with two ASOS online chat help sessions. I was finally told my credit card had been denied and my order canceled, and I would receive credit in 10 business days. However, they were not able to explain to me how the credit card charge was posted and cleared if it was "denied." Based on my experience, I am NOT waiting for this "refund", as they claim no order even exists! I have initiated a dispute with my credit card. Meanwhile, the item is now out of stock, and I was unable to order it since they no longer had my daughter's size.  Oddly, I was texting my daughter about this whole thing while it was going on, and she went online (she is in another state) and ASOS showed availability in the boot in her size. What!?!  And no, it wasn't her cart that had taken what I wanted.  My end showed no availability before, during and after hers did. So I had her order it, but I don't trust that she will get them until I actually see them!  I will never order from them again.  UPDATE: I am upgrading my review to 3 stars (from 1 originally) because a very pleasant higher level customer service person called me today and she was finally able to tell me what had happened with my order. It turns out that my order did ship, and that the two agents with whom I'd previously chatted online had given me incorrect information. I am supposed to receive the boots in about a week, and I have since canceled my dispute with my credit card.  Because ASOS finally got it straightened out and gave me a discount code for my next purchase as a way of acknowledgment and apology, I give them an upgrade for getting to the bottom of it. Of course now I will have to return one pair but at least return shipping is free.

name: Jenifer Rodriguez
title: Took some time to get..
review: Took some time to get... clothes were good.

name: Charlotte
title: There was a mix up with DPD (they lost…
review: There was a mix up with DPD (they lost my package) and it took 3 weeks for the issue to be resolved (when I got my refund). The customer care people on facebook were quick to respond but it's really annoying when a different person deals with you every time and it's clearly a stock message. It wasn't my fault that the package was lost and you still held my £50 for 3 weeks until you were able to process is. Surely that's not on? Overall I use ASOS regularly but this was handled poorly

name: Gerard McGowan
title: Absolutely disgusting
review: Absolutely disgusting. £160 dress from ASOS just chucked over the fence and left in the rain all day. Directions to leave in garden shed which was left open as well as the side gate ignored. Worst delivery service. Wish places like ASOS would use Royal Mail instead. Dress is nice and good quality a shame about delivery service chosen.

name: Konstantinos Siampanopoulos
title: Good store
review: Good store, good delivery! Descent products!

name: Tristan Salvador
title: Slow shipping :/
review: sooo shipping time is bad considering it’s coming from the UK. I had a package that was expected to arrive on the 9th but was pushed back to the 16th. The products themselves are pretty good but get ready to wait a while for your package. It’s a shame because Boohoo shipping is way faster than ASOS.

name: Elliot Pearson
title: Sent the wrong size dress for my wife
review: Sent the wrong size dress for my wife, but they did refund us, so alls well that ends well.

name: Nika
title: So-so
review:
+ fast delivery to Russia. 
- prices and the quality is questionable.

name: Becky
title: I ordered a dress for an event weeks in advance....
review:
I ordered a dress for an event weeks in advance, Asos had a spend £50+ free standard delivery deal on so I assumed as I had over two weeks it'll arrive on time. Asos dispatched the item pretty fast and it was scanned into the trackable delivery system (Hermes), estimated for within 5days of dispatch, it didn't arrive. I attempted to contact Asos only finding "live Chat" so I spoke to a member of their team who just stated there has been a problem with the delivery company and it will arrive in two days time, she said she will update the tracking and I will receive an email stating this change, this I didn't receive (also checking my Junk folders) .
Another week passed of waiting (as well as the event) so I decided I wanted to cancel the order, as I had purchased an alternative dress from another company, so I spoke to another member of their team via live chat and asked if it was possible to cancel the order as the event the dress was required for had passed, he stated: He understands and has passed it onto a specialist team that will contact me within 72 hours. I then received an email two days later saying they've refunded  the amount and it will appear 5-10days in my bank, it arrived the next day so I cannot fault them for this as its their chosen delivery company that are at fault. However, I would strongly prefer a number to call rather than live chat having my first live chat attempt fail and having absolutely zero outcome from it!

name: Barbara Wukale
title: Customer sservice kept me ont he phone…
review: Customer sservice kept me ont he phone for more than 3 hours for a simple delivery change. Happy with the purchase

name: Antoine Vassallo
title: Expensive return fees
review: I used to like this online store. Good selection, never had any issues with deliveries and no issues with customer service or refunds. I used to be a frequent buyer on this website until last month when they introduced the 15 euro charge on any returns. Very disappointed.

name: Mia
title: Cheaply made clothing
review: Cheaply made clothing. Bought boots that didn’t zip up my calf. I’m 5’3” and 100 pounds, this shouldn’t happen!

name: Ben Daecher
title: Support team doesn't care about the…
review:
Support team doesn't care about the customers. 

I was waiting for 20+ days just to know the size spreadsheet which can't be loaded on the web page..

However, no questions to the other features. All my wardrobe i buy on asos

name: Tiffany
title: Asos Review
review: I’ve been shopping online with Asos for a little over two years. When they first came out with the 2-day shipping for $20 a year, it was great! However. As of late 2018 they started declining. Now I don’t get my shipments for at least 4-5 days. Which isn’t horrible, just not what I originally paid for. On a more positive note, the clothes do arrive neatly packaged and the return process is fairly easy. Video reviews and pictures of items on my IG page @TiffTheStiff

name: Андрей
title: advantages

name: Sorya
title: Effective, however, very slow
review: Very long waiting times & responses are extremely slow, otherwise the agent is very effective in dealing with enquiries

name: Sam Palmer
title: I ordered a sweatshirt for Xmas eve
review: I ordered a sweatshirt for Xmas eve. The delivery came in time but the top was not what it showed in pic. Thanks for getting it in time but need to look at what you sell

name: Karen Bloomer
title: Very slow delivery
review: Very slow delivery, ordered on 29th November and haven't received anything yet. Contacted ASOS via Facebook messenger as was suggested on their 'contact' page but haven't received a reply.

name: Dan
title: This used to be five stars until I had…
review: This used to be five stars until I had a parcel go missing. Getting a response from customer service wasn’t good. But saying that after almost four days of trying once I finally got through. The response was quick friendly and very helpful

name: Alessia C
title: Customer care was great but paid a lot…
review: Customer care was great but paid a lot for next day delivery and didn't receive anything nor have I received updates on my order.

name: Heather Sault
title: Christmas waiting and other problems
review:
I had to wait almost 40 minutes to speak to an advisor which can be very distressing when you have a problem. I had to really work hard to get over my issues to be understood clearly, but once that was done I got the help and advice I was looking for.

I understand it’s a busy time for everyone this time of year but I feel that ‘the customer ‘ service of lots of services/industries is being eroded and we are great when placing an order but a nuscience when we have an issue.

Thank you

name: Mr Poyntz-Roberts
title: I'm not really happy with ASOS
review: I'm not really happy with ASOS, but the chat service is fine.

name: Emily Broadbent
title: Very helpful once I got a response
review: Very helpful once I got a response, I think the online chat is maybe slightly slow, in total 16 minutes on the online chat to get to the bottom of the problem. But Joe was helpful in the end, thanks Joseph!

name: Karla Smith
title: I reached out to Asos about a return I…
review: I reached out to Asos about a return I was never credited for. I was told a specialist would contact me in 24 hours. It was not the response I expected to receive regarding the missing return. I was hoping some immediate action would be taken.

name: Nazanin
title: Bad delivery service/wrong item
review:
I paid for next day delivery and received the wrong item (with one day delay) The chat customer service refunded me the postage cost. But overall asos let me down.
The delivery man came and without buzzing left and later said ‘attempted delivery and a card left’ no attempt was made and no card was left. Had to re-arrange for a pick up location the following day, only to receive the wrong item.

name: JC
title: Parcel delayed - Nobody has a clue whats going on.
review: Parcel delayed, nobody taking accountability, nobody can get an update. The last tracking update was Monday. Told have to wait 4 days? Wouldnt mind the update if anybody knew what was going on.

name: Mr Daniel Johnson
title: The adviser (Daniel) was good but the…
review: The adviser (Daniel) was good but the return experience was dreadful. I even contacted the team with my proof of return asking if my exchange could be processed. It was my first ever order and the item was a birthday present but they weren't prepared to help me out so I put the trust into the returns team and they messed it up by processing a refund instead of the exchange.

name: sinita
title: Very slow to give refunds
review: Very slow to give refunds. Not very responsive customer service

name: James G.
title: Oliver's customer service was excellent…
review:
Oliver's customer service was excellent and the three stars don't represent her customer service skills. She gets 5 stars from me!

However the procedure that you have for returning items that have been sent to the wrong address needs to be streamlined.

it should be as simple as dropping the package off to the nearest post office instead of myself (not an ASOS customer) having to keep hold of one of your customers packages indefinitely, until and a member of your team gets back to me to tell me what to do next.

name: Kara Taverner
title: ASOS/Yodel
review: ASOS website is very good, easy to use and ordering my products was straightforward. The issues was with the delivery - ASOS uses the courier Yodel. I paid extra for a shorter delivery and my delivery information stated my order would arrive in two days (a Saturday) which was great as I needed the products by Sunday to showcase them to the bride of the wedding I am part of. However, when tracking my delivery despite the ASOS tracking saying Saturday, Yodel tracking said Monday. Obviously, the parcel was not delivered Saturday. On Monday whilst out, I received a message from Yodel saying my delivery was left in a 'safe' place, but when I arrived home it was left in plain site at my front door. This isn't safe at all and anyone could pick it up! Despite this I am happy with the products even though I will have to now wait to visit the bride when we are both free again.

name: Jade Ellis
title: The quality isnt that good but the…
review: The quality isnt that good but the delivery is really fast! Some nice stuff.

name: Sarah
title: Great delivery but weird catalogue of clothes
review:
I'm really surprised at all the bad reviews on here regarding delivery. I order from ASOS fairly regularly and always get my order either early or on time and returns are so easy and straight-forward.

Generally, I'm very happy with my orders, although finding stuff that I like can be difficult. A lot of clothes are so close to being really nice but there's always something a little off. It could be anything from extra ruffles or weird colours to a strange cut. Despite this I always find myself coming back to see what's new and I generally find their simpler clothes to be quite nice.

I also primarily get my jeans from here although this can also be a bit dicey. I regularly order the Curve Ridley Jeans and I recently ordered 2 pairs - one dark blue wash and one a 'nanette darkwash', the dark blue wash fitted as normal but the nanette darkwash was very loose. They were the exact same style and size of jean but there was such disparity in how they fit, it was very strange. But I kept both and use the latter when I want a very casual outfit.

If I could, I would give ASOS 3.5 stars, they're not quite at 4 or 5 stars given the outlined issues above.

name: Silja Charlotte Håndstad
title: Never getting back in stock.
review: Shopping at ASOS is nice and everything. But it’s a pain in the *** when they never refill their stocks. It’s super annoying, and when you write to them, they will not do anything.

name: Danielle
title: I like the products but the customer…
review: I like the products but the customer service was bad.

name: PB
title: Lacking in customer service and issues with the website
review: Never really had any major issues with ASOS until recently.  I placed an order, which arrived in good time.  I had an issue and I wanted to ask a question.  I tried contacting them using the 'need help' link after logging in - but the option to 'Chat Now' or 'Send an email' don't appear to work.  For example if you try to 'Chat Now' you're then given the option to sign in (even though you're already signed in).  And when you try to sign in you're taken back to the same page you started with.

name: SARAH
title: This is the first time I've had a…
review: This is the first time I've had a problem with an order although it taken a couple of days to sort I happy with the outcome. This might change if I do not receive what I have ordered.

name: Glenn Patterson
title: Takes very long to have a chat on line
review: Takes very long to have a chat on line

name: Holly Griffiths
title: Very difficult experience
review: Very difficult experience with trying to find out the status of my package - spoke with 2 different people 1 on messenger and 1 on twitter - both asked for different things to find my order. Did not get timely responses on messenger from ‘Amy’ and had some issues with Hermes contacting me through text an email. Initially told parcel with 13 clothing items had been delivered through my letter box (no chance) and then delivery updates did not update & got a text with a window of time for delivery and it was an hour and a half late of that.

name: Josie
title: Was enquiring about a return but had…
review: Was enquiring about a return but had lost the proof of postage so will now have to chase that up. I guess this isn’t ASOS fault but I did have to wait 40 minutes to get through to someone on the online chat and other times it hasn’t worked at all

name: Desmond Flannelly
title: Staff very helpful in chat,return process painful
review: Staff very helpful in chat. Ordering us easy, but the returns process, especially if getting a replacement product would put me off using them again. I should just receive new item and he billed accordingly - waiting for an item to be returned and then new one arriving is looking like a 2 week turnaround. Very frustrating & off putting.

name: Catherine Hartshorne
title: Problems with Hermes when delivering Asos parcels
review: Love Asos and when I received the deliveries via DPD I never had any issues, but since they also use my Hermes I never received the deliveries on time when it’s my Hermes delivering. It would be good if you could select the courier at check out I would be happy to pay more delivery charges

name: lcd86
title: delivery letting ASOS down
review: While I absolutely love ASOS and have never had any problems with the clothes I order the delivery is really letting you down, I’ve had 3 orders in the last 2 weeks and the delivery service from Hermes has been terrible! As much as I like ASOS I doubt I’ll ever order again purely because of the delivery ☹️

name: Melanie Else
title: This is based on the customer service i…
review: This is based on the customer service i received from Brian...i have not had my parcel and brian told me what to do in order to get it back . Well done

name: John Mcdermott
title: Everything I order on here never looks…
review:
Everything I order on here never looks like it does in the photos when it arrives. This is no exaggeration, I have bought 17 items off ASOS in the past year, some for me, and some as gifts.
In total how many have I kept.... 1!!
The quality is terrible, the fit of the clothes do not look like they do in the photos / descriptions.
To order items on here for nights out, do not rely on this as your only option would be my advice.

name: Bell
title: Love!
review: Love ASOS next day delivery! Saved me a lot of hassle.

name: Luky
title: good but nothing special
review: good quality/price ratio especially when you have a promo code. but nothing special.

name: Tara Reed
title: Good brand
review: Good brand, issues with delivery sometimes.

name: ARETI
title: LONG delays......and no delivery
review:
I have ordered so many times from Asos, and the delivery was prompt. The products always arrived by the date they had mentioned. This time something is really wrong. The items have not even left the warehouse. There is no tracking number, and on the courier site it shows that for 3 days they are scanning the items. :-(. 
Contacted costumer service yesterday and they just told me they are sorry and that my order should arrive by tomorrow (it is still in the warehouse). Do miracles happen? Asos should really think of changing their delivery company.

EDIT: So I changed my first review from one to three stars, as my order actuallly arrived with one day delay. The problem was there was no email notification regarding the dispatch of the delivery and no tracking number.

name: Miss Deborah Saliba
title: Small!!
review: Ordered shoes and nursing tops and despite being the same size, the fit was smaller. Disappointed ☹️

name: Cari
title: I've used asos since 2006
review:
I've used asos for many years and will keep using.

Only problem ive ever had was a mistake order to an old default address. Asos refused to cancel or change the address. They were absolutely unhelpful and told me to intercept the £300+ parcel at the door of a students flat. And pretty much, you're on your own! Not their problem. Even though it was the most straightforward thing to change the address. That was it. It hadnt been dispatched. They refused to cancel the order even though it took them a further 3 - 5 days to dispatch and it had not been packed. It was beyond frustrating, I kept asking them to cancel and it was going round in circles being fobbed off and told to wait until the courier gets my parcel and then the students at the address can return to sender (as if a struggling student is likely to return a parcel they received! They'd simply keep it and it was so much stress explaining this to Asos and for them to palm me off and to tell me they were sending it anyway, and can you sort it out? It hasn't been dispatched or packaged yet but we have a policy to send it our regardless. 
This is a really dumb policy and must cause chaos for your poor buyers

I dont drive and it would of cost me a further £70 a taxi! 

I messaged Asos yet again on day 5 explaining the problem and that i was about to lose over £300 quid and as requested to get back in touch so they can message the courier and have it returned.


They said we will message the courier, and to message them again if i dont hear back confirmation and they might be able to get the parcel returned to sender. In the end i contacted the Yodel courier myself explaining the mess - and Asos refusing the whole time to cancel the order or the incorrect address and they were given plenty of notice from myself.


The parcel was returned to sender without i understand being handed to strangers at a student flat.

But it was one of the most stressful experiences ever. Asos needs to sort out this policy they have! 

Apart from this
They dispatch in a decent time frame, pretty straightforward and dont sell items out of stock its more bam its yours - and on its way to you


I used Asos since i was 16 so since 2006. Its been OK generally. The clothes are great and true to size!

name: Mike Walker
title: Took ages to get my order!
review: Took ages to get my order!

name: Barbara
title: Serious sizing issues
review: I ordered tops which are perfect but the Jean's I ordered were tiny, I'm a size 12, and they wouldn't go past my knees! And love the picture so ordered 2 sizes bigger (16). What I got which did actually close, looked nothing like the picture. I'm 5'3" and supposedly cropped Jean's were down past my ankles. Ridiculous sizing. Not sure if I will order again to be honest. Still waiting for the refund for the size 6, I mean 12 pair too!

name: Morgan Russel
title: There's always surprises in asos…
review: There's always surprises in asos orders... I feel like the items looks very different in real compared to the pics you can see, that's why I use them only to order some stuff I've already seen/tried cause they have good prices cant deny.

name: KJB_233
title: When its good its very good, when its bad its very bad
review: when everything goes to plan it is so great (definitely 5/5) - easy to use, prompt delivery and eco vans. but when something goes wring trying to get it resolved is so difficult, you get stuck in a loop of the same response time and time again, clearly no one is actually reading the emails.

name: Jules Grygiel
title: ASOS is not what it used to be
review:
ASOS is not what it used to be, this does not concern their stock, that’s still excellent, a huge variety of labels and you will always find what you’re looking for. 
Their service however has drastically changed and I could just about ignore their decline because they’re one of the only companies that still send a printed return label in their orders! But once your order is placed you receive no tracking, recently it came through 10 days after I had taken delivery! But most recently I received an email from them saying that recently I had returned a ‘higher than average’ amount of orders and whilst they weren’t about to act on this they wanted to let me know that their has been a high amount of customers that have been ‘abusing’ their service and items returned were not in their original condition etc that they had located a specific number of these abusers and closed their accounts, not to worry, they weren’t doing that with mine, 
What am I meant to think about this? I am a 47 yr old woman who will order a few things (always in the sale) for choice and return them if they don’t suit me or THEY HAVE CLEARLY BEEN WORN BEFORE!!! three days after I received this email I received an order I had placed of bra’s, it’s hard to find a bra that fits well, so I was pleased to find that both bras fitted, however one of these bras ( a Gossard ) had absolutely been worn, it stank to high heaven of B.O and their were underarm stains when I looked closer,whilst trying it on I just began to smell this horrific B.o smell so it wasn’t like it was unnoticeable, well someone re-packed it and thought it was good enough to send out!! 
The thing is, I kept the bra, despite it’s condition, because it was on sale, Gossard is a good make and it fit me!! That’s hard to find and I knew if I sent it back and asked for a replacement it would be out of stock because it was on sale,
I’m not an abuser of ASOS or any other online clothes store, I have been however a victim of it on more than one occasion with ASOS but do you think I’m going to return something in the future and say I think it’s been worn? Absolutely not, because after their email to me it’s going to seem like I am guilty if I do, so therefore I close my own account with ASOS. Because I was so offended by their email, clearly pointing the finger in my direction that I no longer want to shop with them.

name: Sophia
title: Fantastic and cheap clothing, bad customer service
review: Good quality for a cheap price and great selection! But the customer service is bad, took multiple emails and chats to get the money back for a mixed up order (mistake was made on their end)

name: barbara
title: The quality isn’t the same anymore
review: The quality isn’t the same anymore. And the sales just aren’t as good as they used to be.

name: Impossible 28
title: ASOS delivery
review: ASOS delivery, returns and pricing are great. The reason I've knocked it down to three stars is because if you do have a problem and you need to get hold of them there is no phone line. Relying on social media contact methods is infuriating. I had some issues in the past with delivery charges and it took a long time to get sorted out and I dreaded getting in touch with them because I just wanted to speak to someone.

name: Danielle
title: Asos used to be my favourite shop but I…
review: Asos used to be my favourite shop but I no longer shop there. I find that the prices have gotten way more expensive and the quality has dropped.

name: Sara
title: It's a great hub for different brands...BUT
review: It's a great hub for different brands, but it is what it is, cheap fashion, fast, and cheap, like really cheap. And this affects what you get, it's kinda like playing Russian roulette, sometimes it's good and most of the times not so much... Lately it's getting worse (and we are talking about the cheaper brands, like the own ASOS brand), there's always something that's off, you find your dream garment ´, but it's cut weird, or the fabric is awful, or the pattern..or... ASOS just can't seem to get it right. Many of these clothes is very similar to to cheap ones at wish, and I often wonder ''who wears this??'', and ''who CAN wear this?'' it's often very poorly sewn, and not washable, like I said, there's just always something that's off, it's the common saying of ''You get what you pay for''. All this said, it's great hub for different brands, and kudos the stylist on ASOS, they always make the clothes on the models look like a million dollars!

name: Sasha
title: Love the delivery option I paid for the…
review: Love the delivery option I paid for the year its so easy and quick. Just slightly gutted you removed the points/reward system last year. You did say that something was going to put into place instead on the email I received but I didn't get anything. Will you introduce something in the future?

name: Tom
title: Stay away from own brand items
review: Stay away from own brand items. The others are quite good. 3/5 not bad.

name: Charlotte Malcolm
title: The customer help on the chat facility…
review: The customer help on the chat facility were great but the ordering system was appalling. Placed and order which they then cancelled for some reason and cannot tell me why. They sent an email telling me they had cancelled and to respond to it if I had any questions. I responded, they didn't. Used their on-line chat and Kevin was very helpful and polite even though there was nothing he could do.  So 5 stars for Kevin and 1 star for ASOS

name: Rhiannon Campbell
title: Gone downhill
review:
I used to buy products from ASOS at least once a month- either for myself or partner.  I had an item due for next day delivery with DHL, but as this has now been over a week again (with the event it was needed for passed) it is safe to say I am unimpressed. After contacting ASOS with DHS’ ludacris replies, the summed up response of ASOS was ‘not our problem you’ll get it when it gets there’.
Safe to say they’ve lost a good bit of business, I don’t have time for unreliable companies.

name: Denise anjela Amon
title: Just OK
review: Fine. I got my product 5 days after.. but I reckon, the product was not worth the price I paid.

name: CB
title: Re-introduce return and refund confirmation emails!
review:
When I first began buying from ASOS some years ago the process of returning and receiving confirmation of refunds was excellent as ASOS emailed every time a return had been received and informed me of the refund to my card.
However in recent months this has changed and ASOS no longer inform the customer that either the return has been received, or a refund authorised.  I now have to check my proof of postage to see when it was received by ASOS and then send an email to customer service with the order number and request confirmation of refund.  This lessens the quality of the shopping experience and is annoying.  I am much less likely to now recommend ASOS shopping to friends.

name: youri sidunov
title: the seem never to deliver on time
review:
I ordered men boots from them. Received the message from Hermes, courier they use, to expect the delivery on Monday 3/12, then received another message on Monday evening saying  my parcel has been delivered and signed for by... me. Obviously haven’t received any delivery and the signature in tracking information wasn’t mine. Wasted my time next day contacting ASOS and Hermes trying to find out where the parcel was. Eventually received the delivery two day later (why lie in the first place!). 
Partner had the same issue. Ordered bow tie to be delivered on certain date in time for Christmas party. Received message from them on the day saying they won’t deliver. 
Very poor service!

name: TomB
title: Shame about the chosen delivery service!
review: Good prices and products.  It's just a shame their chosen delivery service lets them down.

name: Tink
title: May was helpful
review: May was helpful. She did not explain why the dress I received was different from what was advertised but she provided the information to return the dress and answered my questions thoroughly.

name: Ram MT-07
title: Lauren needs a pay rise.
review: Although an outcome was not realised, the assistant was very helpful and knowledgeable. My circumstances were exceptional and I was at least given helpful links to continue the resolution of my issue.

name: Connor
title: Botched order resolved in 10mins
review: I had an order that was never dispatched. However I got in touch with their online chat team and spoke to someone name Abbel, who was lovely and helpful - within 10minutes I was offered a refund or the order to be sent with a sped up delivery time and should be receiving this within 72 hours.

name: nompumelelo mahlangu
title: Thank you so much with the quick…
review: Thank you so much with the quick Respond and assistance Rem.

name: C.
title: Quick help-Not waiting for too long
review: Quick help-Not waiting for too long. Problem should be solved but no result yet

name: roxanne mehrtens
title: Quick help
review: Quick help . Resolved the problem in a short amount of time. .

name: Cathy
title: Great service if you need to return
review: Good selection of clothes,  very fast refund (got it the same day I took it back to the Post Office), which was excellent!

name: Dee
title: Easy transactions and quick delivery.
review: Easy transactions and quick delivery.

name: Lydia Breden-Thorpe
title: Have always found Asos to be quick and…
review: Have always found Asos to be quick and efficient with high quality products. Only thing that let it down this time was the massively delayed next day delivery over the Christmas period. I feel though this has more to do with Hermes than Asos itself. However, the live chat feature they have is a great way of sorting issues quickly and the reps are always happy to help.

name: Zoe Munkh
title: Samantha was very responsive.
review: Samantha was very responsive.

name: ke Sun
title: I hope you can change the courier company.
review: The products on the website are good, but the courier company （Hermes) is too rubbish. I hope your company can change a courier company to cooperate, otherwise it will affect your business.

name: Jay
title: Refunds
review: Customer service very helpful

name: Stephanie
title: with thanks to LAURA on live chat.
review:
Just want to put out a special thank you to customer service live chat host- 'Laura' who I spoke to about my refunds queries on 2/1/20.
I could tell she was trying her very best to solve my questions, she was polite and positive. Thank you so much and happy new year to you. X

name: Leon Poehls
title: Customer service is always very helpful…
review: Customer service is always very helpful and responds quickly.

name: Anonymous
title: Great support with sorting my refund…
review: Great support with sorting my refund from Adeebah..

name: Saleh Bawazir
title: Thank you guys
review: Thank you guys

name: alistair
title: Order no. 461783274
review: Items got lost while in transit. Alexandru was of great help in tracking and having my items replaced. Efficient customer service.

name: Bon Chan
title: Quick response and good attitude
review: Quick response and good attitude ! Keep on and many thanks to them !

name: Sarah Davies
title: Helpful and pretty quick
review: Oliver was helpful and sorted my problem quickly. The problem wasn’t fully rectified, I didn’t get the exchange I wanted, and my question about the problem with the order wasn’t answered, but a refund was authorised so I was happy with that.

name: Rafael
title: Good service.
review: 👍Very professional responses. 👎10 minutes to get in touch.

name: Paul
title: Rem was very helpful with my enquiry…
review: Rem was very helpful with my enquiry and resolved everything. Took a little while to respond initially but it was a very busy time of year.

name: Sara
title: I had the worst experience with…
review: I had the worst experience with ordering from asos because of the long time period of waiting with enthusiasm for the shipment but when it arrived I found out it was missing items. The customer care were really nice and helped with understanding the situation and solved the problem that wasn’t necessary to even happen in the first place. Thank you.

name: Tina
title: Gift voucher issue
review: Chelsea was very helpful, pleasant and polite.

name: Kristal Richardson
title: Dealt professionally with my query.
review: Dealt professionally with my query.

name: R.Kenny Temowo
title: Friendly and helpful
review: Friendly and helpful. I had to wait quite a while, hence the reason I didn’t give 5 stars. But it was just after Christmas hence understandable. I would’ve given 4.5 stars if possible.

name: Loren
title: Missing parcel from Hermes
review: My issue was sorted within 30 minutes on the live chat option. My parcel wasn’t received by Hermes with a few problems with the process given. A refund was issued after the relevant checks. Couldn’t have asked for more.

name: Alice Drinkwater
title: I spoke with Chelsea on the chat and…
review: I spoke with Chelsea on the chat and she was very quick responding and helped with the query. She was also very friendly

name: Shatha Alshetwi
title: The costumer services was excellent i… but shipping the worst
review:
The costumer services was excellent i had problems with Aramex delivery!! 
The shipment I received was broken and two items missing from box!!! 
Directly contact with live chat in asos and the refunds the item. 
Thank you Mr. Oliver for professional work
And i hope asos change the shipping company (Aramex) because have worst service in Saudi arabia.

name: jeff nguyen
title: Joe was very helpful with my answers…
review: Joe was very helpful with my answers but I wasn't satisfied with the delivery since I am a long term customers with ASOS.

name: Marcellous
title: I have multiple orders from ASOS and my…
review: I have multiple orders from ASOS and my last order said it was delivered to me but I never received it. They gave me a list of steps to follow to make sure it didn’t end up somewhere on accident. After reviewing everything they offered to refund/replace my order. I chose to replace it and will see in a few days if that actually went through. If it does in fact go through I will keep shopping through ASOS as well as keep referring people to them as well.

name: Alexandra Mar
title: I didn't receive my package
review: I didn't receive my package. I was waiting for a package to arrive on December 3rd... as of January 3rd, it hasn't arrived yet. I have confirmed with my neighbors, guard, etc and they haven't got the package

name: Lærke Jensen
title: Semi fast delivery and good prices.
review:
Semi fast delivery and good prices.

Their garments of their own brand is of varying quality though.

name: Julius Anthony Rubio
title: Jamal was very good at answering my…
review: Jamal was very good at answering my multiple questions and getting everything handled.

name: myra
title: helpful customer service person
review: The customer service person was very helpful. But you should improve on your shipping method and monitoring.

name: Lily Wilson
title: very helpful !
review: very helpful !

name: Agi Sarr
title: I think Asos need to change their…
review: I think Asos need to change their delivery courier

name: Martha Scerri
title: Helpful
review: Although it sometimes takes a while to get a response, I always got the help I needed! Thank you!!

name: Ieva Vestmane
title: Very fast and useful help-desk.
review: Very fast and useful help-desk.

name: Marlon Stewart
title: Amaar was very efficient and helpful
review: Amaar was very efficient and helpful

name: Sue
title: Delivery arrived before expected but…
review:
Delivery arrived before expected but without one item because it ran out of stock.
Customer care was very good explaining that an e-mail was sent and a refund was already made.

name: Fanni Kis
title: The helping staff was very nice and…
review:
The helping staff was very nice and helpful with me.
But it is wierd that they cant send a pair of shoelace and i have to return my shoes what i really like and wanna use them. I spend more than a £100 plus £6 for delivery on this order i would think they can give my shoelaces for me.

name: mansi gaur
title: The agent was able to process the…
review:
The agent was able to process the refund request. Really thankful to Yasmin.

It was the timing of the refund that was disappointing and different to my usual experience - which is that as soon as the items are in the mail I receive the refund within 1-3 days. This time it's been a week and I still haven't received my refund.
Again however after following this up on a live chat the team were very helpful and explained the delay/difference in process (because of the way I had to send the gowns back). Hoping this last chat will see everything actioned now in the next couple of days.

review: Quite a wait to speak to someone, but it is close to Christmas to that's understandable. Once I was able to speak to someone, the problem I had with the order was solved very quickly and with a positive outcome. Shame the issue occurred in the first place (a 3 week wait for a parcel on a 5-7 day delivery quote), but happy with the customer service I received when querying the issue. I shop regularly with ASOS, and will continue to shop with them in the future.

name: Paul
title: Donique was a great help and got my…
review:
Donique was a great help and got my delivery issue sorted!

Makes a change to get great customer service from a supplier for once.

Lets just hope the replacement turns up in time!

review: The customer service is honestly amazing

title: Customer service
review: Would be nice to be able to speak to people on the phone but when I finally got a response Devinia on the live chat was great and sorted my problem really quickly.

name: Trishana Russell
title: Empower your agents!
review:
Empower your agents!

I've spoken with two ASOS agents today. Both were courteous, understanding, knowledgable and tried their best to assist me as much as they could. 

However, they can't do much in their capacity to solve more complex issues like the one I have and as basically the ONLY point of contact, they should be able to do things like tell me exactly where my package is or at least point me in the right direction. "It's with FedEx" isn't enough information when you're racing against the clock to have an issue sorted out. 

Nevertheless, great customer service.

name: Yasha
title: Dimensions puzzle
review:
I've got a trousers of the size where the dimension that played a role was Hips, not Waist. That changed everything and I could not understand how what I received fits reality at all. I've figuratively got an elephant instead of a fly: not a mistake of half a size you normally do. After some very inappropriate cliched explanations, service operator Rebecca has provided, I succeeded to explain her the case and she changed her modus operandi. One and a half hour later we've got if not the final solution, but at least an explanation of what happened and some plan for me what to do now. 

For the site I would suggest to mention near this specific item, that it does not sit on waist and hips do only matter.

review:
Always great service from the Asos team, however i was slightly disappointed that my order made on Black Friday did not arrive.
The package contained gifts for family and i was not able to find a replacement gift in time for Christmas. 

Also, the purchases came with the 25% discount for black friday and given that the refund was made, that means i couldnt purchase the items again at the same price. Not the biggest issue but would have been better if i was informed earlier of the inability to deliver the package. The status on the Asos site consistently showed that the package was in the process of being delivered.

thanks

review: After having my parcel left in a bucket of water by the courier and all my items ending up soaked, I was extremely frustrated and disappointed. She understood my frustration in needing one of the items in time for Christmas and suggested I return the parcel and reorder the items with next day delivery and the delivery charge would be refunded to me. This was great quick service and resolved my issue in the best way she could’ve. Thank you.

That wasn't possible, so I asked her to cancel my original order and I'll just place it again with the promo code. That ALSO wasn't possible, so now I am going to re-place my order with the promo code and return the original order when I get it. Just seems like a waste of ASOS' money and resources!

name: Daniel
title: My orders went missing, great support team
review: My orders went missing, but Channa from the support team was able to help sort the situation

name: JR
title: ASOS is legit!! I would order again
review:
ASOS is legit!  I’ve never ordered a dress online before. But I did and it was 90% accurate to the photo that was posted. It was well made and looked nice... just not that nice on me... so I returned it. Got my money back and they’re communication with me was spot on and timely!  I would recommend this site. 
The only thing I was disappointed with (but not to the fault of ASOS) was the customs I had to pay and the fact that it was delayed for 6 weeks because my package was randomly selected at customs to be charged. So I paid $370 for my dress, but had to pay $137 on customs when it arrived. I’ve applied to Canadian customs to get my money back since I returned the dress. Hopefully I get it back. But this is just a reminder about possible additional fees when you purchase a dress... and possible delays. My sister also ordered an $80 dress which was also very pretty and well made but didn’t suit her and she didn’t experience any delays or have to pay customs.  But again this is not to the fault of ASOS company!!!

name: Rebecca H
title: Helpful customer service officer but problematic delivery!
review: Rebecca was patient and helpful with my queries, though there seems to be some logistic issues with ASOS delivery. I've only received 1 out of the 4 parcels that were deemed to be delivered on the same day.

name: Spring
title: They have great clothes
review: They have great clothes, I have been shopping with them for years. I really wanted to give 3.5 stars though because on two occasions, out of maybe 15, they have been so late with my delivery that I either had to go buy something else, like my dad’s funeral, or I had to just wear what I had, like my graduation. Both times I paid for 2 day shipping and ordered way in advance just in case and both times I was left scrambling. Also, I always have a issue with my refund. I’m always told my return hadn’t made it, most recently I returned something a month and a half earlier and still had to hound them over it. But I keep shopping here so 3 stars wouldn’t be fair. I just know if you NEED the item try finding something similar elsewhere or you may suffer.

I have found the customer service chat staff to be quite mixed. Whilst some were quite helpful, others were quick to make assurances that they couldn't guarantee, such as stock guarantee and email update assurances. They all apologise for any inconvenience, but this doesn't extend to any acts of goodwill such as discounts or freebies.

ASOS delivery and returns processes are very good but need to improve in customer service aspect of rectifying issues.

review: ASOS has delivery problems between late and missing deliveries, but the customer service people I got were very helpful. Paul in particular was helpful and efficient and cleared things up for me.

title: Lost Package
review: I've ordered from Asos many times, and I've never had any issues until today. I've had such great experiences that I decided to pay the annual fee for free 2-day shipping. On Monday 12/8/19, I ordered a dress for a holiday party, and for whatever reason FedEx said it was delivered but the package never made it to my house. I had to go through customer service to get a refund. They made the refund process very easy. I only wish I was able to get the dress replaced via rush delivery instead of getting my money back. The customer service agent said they couldn't guarantee the 2 day rush delivery in this instance. :(

name: KT G
title: Selena was an excellent representative…
review: Selena was an excellent representative for ASOS. She was very prompt and thorough. Helped resolve my concerns

review: Agent was very polite and friendly. Used proper spelling and grammar which a lot of your staff lack. Clearly came from a redbrick uni. Give him praise since, Daniel is a star employee

review: Prices are pretty equal to the quality you receive. Unfortunately my last shipment was lost but was sorted out very promptly and shockingly pleasant!

name: Isa Pesque

review: I had a problem with my delivery but when contact costumer service by chat they were quick, professional and offered a solution for my problem.

review: Adam was fantastic help! What wasn’t helpful was no reply previous and not being able to email ASOS because their inbox is full....

name: Celia Coles
title: Dealt with x2 people, Alison really good, Elise, AWFUL.
review:
I spoke with two people. First person was called Elise, and the second Alison. The reason why I've rated highly was because of Alison. Alison was super helpful and amazing. I ordered my items on Cyber Monday with the premier delivery which I needed for Friday, obviously I know it might take longer than a couple of days so I patiently waited. It is now Thursday and DPD have said that my items are being sent back to ASOS and I just wanted to know why. One item size was out of stock of the size I chose and are now out of sale but Alison managed to honor the sale prices to me, which was extremely kind. 5* for Alison.

Elise, however, was extremely unhelpful, rude and just closed the chat when I asked why my order had been sent back. I wasn't being rude, she just wasn't giving me any answers which Alison managed to give me. She also told me the only way I can get my items are to reorder with the out of sale prices...? Why on earth would I do that when this whole thing has been completely out of my power? She said she wasn't able to do anything about it, to just "reorder my items if I want them" and then just shut the conversation. All I wanted was to know why my items were being sent back. I'm a loyal customer of ASOS, and to be spoken to and treated like that is totally unacceptable. Thankfully Alison managed to make it a lot better for me.

-5* for you, Elise.

review: Although my problem isn’t resolved yet, Daniel was committed to helping me throughout our conversation. Will hope to hear my good news tomorrow.

title: Ravika was very helpful
review: This time Ravika was very helpful so it would be a five star, but last time I contacted customer care with an issue they did not give any solution and they primised to get back later but nothing happened.

name: Kayleigh woodward
title: Amazing customer service
review: Shinea was very helpful with my missing item in my order and arranging a refund very swiftly for me. 5 stars. Thank you

name: Emma
title: Amazing choice of items
review:
Amazing choice of items! Love their sales. 
I cant fault their delivery and returns. 
Trying to get a problem sorted can be a little long winded, being passed to a specialist team with no time scales. 
Been using for years and only ever had 2 problems though that got sorted.

name: Yogeshswar Basoodelsing
title: ASOS products are superb.
review:
ASOS products are superb.

Been an ASOS customer for about 4 to 5 years now.

Unfortunately, lately getting shipping problems.

name: D
title: Order Cancellation
review: I used the live chat feature to try to cancel an order so I can purchase it in a different color. Taun, was very helpful and prompt. I love shopping with Asos.

name: Karina
title: Fast and accurate
review: Helpful, Fast and accurate

name: Maha
title: He was helpful and promised a replacement
review: He was helpful and promised a replacement since I couldn’t get any track about my package

name: Alicia Meyer
title: The customer service chat was great
review: The customer service chat was great! but the delivery was terrible.

name: Caroline Lillywhite
title: Easy to get hold of customer support…
review: Easy to get hold of customer support for help (Rem (assistant who helped in particular), quick and helpful replies, solved issue quickly and easily.

name: PHSN
title: ASOS very good value, selection and customer service. Shame about the delivery company
review:
ASOS have been very good with prices, selection, dispatching orders and handling returns. The customer service is excellent.
 
Unfortunately it is the delivery company they use in my area, Hermes, which continually disappoints (missing and late deliveries!). DPD used to deliver in the past and were always on time. This is the only area that needs rectifying.

name: Amie
title: ASOS were and always are very helpful
review: ASOS were and always are very helpful. It is Hermes I am disappointed in.

name: T
title: Lloy gave me a solution to my problem…
review: Lloy gave me a solution to my problem but didn’t seem very understanding at first, although I believe the fault was on your end with the delay and not informing me. However, if the solution works, then all is well and resolved.

name: Ellie Dwyer
title: clear and helpful
review: clear and helpful, I spoke to a woman named daisy who was clear about everything (as my parcel never showed up) and we came to a clear solution. only problem I could think of would be the long wait for the chat but other than that it was really helpful.

name: Rashida Walk
title: Customer service was great in resolving…
review: Customer service was great in resolving my concern with delivery of an order. Thank you Arnie for your assistance.

name: L
title: Issue was resolved quickly!
review: Issue was resolved quickly!

name: Kelly
title: helpful advisor.
review: The advisor was very helpful and reassuring he put my mind at ease and confirmed my order had gone through following an email about it being cancelled. Just awaiting the order to arrive now. The advisor was quick to respond. Thank you

name: Jorden joon yan
title: Pretty efficient and fast response
review: Pretty efficient and fast response

name: RJ
title: Kinga was very helpful but it is…
review: Kinga was very helpful but it is unfortunate that I my parcels are lost and I complained the day before and the advisor that I spoke to literally copy and pasted a script even though my parcel was would be 3 days delayed by then. I paid for next day delivery and ordered 3 items of only 1 arrived.

name: Danni
title: Online Chat
review: Using online Chat - it took a while for anyone to answer my chat call, I almost gave up thinking it had frozen and no one would answer. However, I left this running whilst I got on with some other bits and then someone responded almost an hour after I first opened the chat. Tamara was really helpful in dealing with my concerns and resolved the issues efficiently. Thank you

name: Jay
title: Never order something on next day…
review: Never order something on next day delivery if you actually need it the next day as it’s guaranteed not to show. Customer service not forthcoming in refunding the next day delivery charge.

name: Kate Fay
title: Customer service were very helpful…
review: Customer service were very helpful having order that has been held up with carrier company resent. However there should be more options than only being able to deliver with Hermes. Item ordered on next day delivery over a week ago and still not out for delivery.

name: עדי ניאזוב
title: It was really helpful
review: It was really helpful, I got all I needed

name: Simone Golzio
title: Very efficient and patient agent
review: Very efficient and patient agent

name: jordan davies
title: Nice guy Patrick cheers
review: Nice guy Patrick cheers

name: Selon Robley
title: ordering was smooth but tracking my…
review: ordering was smooth but tracking my order has been non existent.

name: Charmaine
title: ASOS Wedding Dress!!!
review:
I ordered the ASOS edition sequin kimono sleeve wedding dress in a size 0 (which was a tad loose in the shoulders and hips) and let me just say how beautiful it was! The dress is absolutely fabulous! Very elegant and First Lady like...  I received compliments the entire evening. The dress was purchased so I could wear it to my run clubs annual gala extravaganza, which was 11-30-19. From the moment I walked in, heads were turned, and mouths were agape. 

If you are considering purchasing this dress, don’t hesitate! If you desire to stand out amongst everyone then this is the perfect dress for you! It’s authentic, classy, chic, elegant, Royal, with a hint of sexiness! You’ll be the talk of your event for days to come!

name: Rishi Baldeo
title: My order was missing an item
review:
My order was missing an item, which is very frustrating.
I spoke with Narina over the chat to discuss the situation. She was very friendly and incredibly helpful. Couldn't ask for any better customer service

name: Per
title: Fast shipping and good quality
review: Fast shipping and good quality

name: Mohamed
title: Very fast delivery
review: Very fast delivery, although the prices could be lower

name: Richard
title: Please Stop Using Hermes
review:
Delivery with Hermes is always an issue. The local courier in the area causes problems. I have had at least 2 issues with Hermes deliveries going missing over the last year. Any other courier is able to deliver fine. 

ASOS support have been able to resolve my issue quickly with either refund or replacement when possible and have nothing but positive experiences dealing with them. The issue lies with Hermes. Please consider using alternatives.

name: Kelly Small
title: Really helpful with helping me resolve…
review: Really helpful with helping me resolve some faulty earrings I purchased. They lost a star just because the wait time was pretty long on their instant chat, 25 minutes in total, but I'm very happy with the end result and their customer service.

name: Nicole Candiotto
title: Experienced bad customer service with…
review: Experienced bad customer service with the previous adviser, but Mohamed was very nice and helpful.

review: Was able to answer my question and provide info on order tracking

name: Ema

review: Daniel was very helpful in aiding me to find and resolve my missing delivery

name: Judy
title: Missing items from order.
review: Missing items from order.  Open up an online chat and sorted within 15 minutes.  Now waiting receipt of replacement goods.

review: Waited a little while for a response even though I had hoped it could have been dealt with straight away. But once someone got in touch in response to my messages they were very helpful and resolved it quickly and to my satisfaction. Thanks!

name: Ben Saunders
title: If you’re lucky enough to get your…
review:
If you’re lucky enough to get your parcels delivered by DPD, ASOS provide a brilliant service that you cannot match from anywhere else, especially on there returns.
Anything ordered that is delivered by Hermes, I have had nothing but problems with such as, them not delivering in the time frame, saying it’s delivered and signing it themselves and it not being delivered on that day altogether

name: Zoe Lawrence
title: Helpful
review: Lots of choice and good customer service

name: Jo Baillie
title: I made my first purchase with ASOS this…
review: I made my first purchase with ASOS this week. I was a bit skeptical after hearing varying stories about the quality and the service. I was however pleasantly surprised. The dress I ordered was lovely but had to return it as I was not the correct woman for that style! But  Abdirahman on the "chat" advised me how to return and reassured me that they wouldn't blame me for the dress having quite a strong smell of nice but very sweet perfume as it turned up that way!  will order again..

name: Romey Jackson
title: Review & rating
review: A long wait to get through to an agent. Once connected  the agent (Sarah) was a great help.

name: Donna
title: The chat was very fast and officiant.
review: The chat was very fast and officiant.

review: My first order been cancelled without reason and got charged debit orders can only give proper feedback if my second order will be send

name: Kate
title: Missing Items but Helpful Chat
review: I was missing two items from my parcel and after an initial first message via facebook which was not responded to, I was connected to Dani via the interactive chat who was incredibly helpful and informative. They looked into my case and have now attempted to sort the issue. I have a few days now to wait until I receive a further response regarding the issue, but after my experience chatting with Dani I am now hoping for a more positive outcome than initially expected.

name: K
title: Order not found after it’s said delivered on the app.
review: I just didn’t get my order and I sent an email to that regards, I didn’t get a response for three days until I resorted to chatting. The agent was able to respond and hopefully I’ll get the replacement in due time.

name: Katherine
title: Knowledgable staff which dealt with my…
review: Knowledgable staff which dealt with my enquiry promptly, in full. Great that there’s different options to communicate such as social media and email.

name: John D
title: Got the order wrong (half the items…
review: Got the order wrong (half the items missing) but customer service legitimately went out of their way to solve it within my timeframe for me.

review: Good customer service from Kristofer. Took a long time to get an agent though.

review: My returns money did not arrive back and I had to get in touch with someone after two weeks, however the online ASOS chat was very helpful and dealt with well and quickly

name: Preeti Bali
title: Four stars for delivering on time and…
review: Four stars for delivering on time and packaging was good. However one of my items was covered in mud marks so that's why it's a 4. CS team are quick to help. Overall good experience with ASOS just a shame about one faulty item, but the customer service team were very quick to counter for this mistake and resolve it efficiently.

name: Rachel
title: Super helpful
review: Super helpful. Refunded even after the 45 days which I appreciated. Nobody replied to my message for a week however as soon as I sent a second message it was sorted. Otherwise would've been 5 stars.

name: Elishia Diehm
title: After an awful 10 days of customer…
review: After an awful 10 days of customer service received from ASOS, I finally reached a member of staff after a long 10 days who took the time to listen and resolve my issue. Just goes to show, there really are people who care about their job, and the customers experience. Thank you Jake for making me feel so much more valued as a customer, trying your upmost best to resolve this for me, compared to my previous shocking experience.

name: Junior S.
title: It takes a while to connect to a staff…
review: It takes a while to connect to a staff but the service is REALLY efficient, as they provide you with accurate answers to your situations as well as solutions and I'm really pleased to have had no headaches over a lost package, aside from the headache of it being lost, per say.

name: P
title: Efficient customer service
review: Live chat is very helpful and quick to respond.

name: Faith

review: Mary was very patient, understanding and helpful in clarifying my questions on refund. Cheerio!

name: Jamie
title: Napreev was a lot of help to kick start…
review: Napreev was a lot of help to kick start the finding of why I havnt received my parcel.

name: Marianna
title: In general customer experience at ASOS is good
review: In general customer experience at ASOS is really nice. But, two times some items that i have ordered were not available. This was something that has not happened before and i was disappointed. And also on the email i received was written that one item was not available but two items where not available not only one!

name: David
title: BYREN is so helpful and quick response.
review: BYREN is so helpful and quick response.

name: Kemi
title: A woman named Courtney helped for a…
review: A woman named Courtney helped for a long period time with my issues and helped me sort it properly

name: Josée D.
title: Love ASOS as a bigger woman
review: The products are a great value for the price. Great variety of styles, a lot of choice for bigger girls and boys!  If there are problems with orders/products, costumer service is quick and fair in resolving the issues. It's a bit expensive to return items and delivery to Canada can sometimes be longer than other companies but it's usually worth the wait

name: Lisa
title: Helpful customer service
review: Helpful customer service

name: Ben
title: Mia was very nice
review: Mia was very nice

name: bzdfq
title: Reasonable price
review:
Reasonable price, quick delivery but slow customer service.

I don't understand why they wouldn't use a ticketing system for the customer service. it's a pain to use the chat via mobile and how many of us really use Twitter for customer inquiries?

name: Brian Saghy
title: Great clothes, mediocre service
review: Great clothes, but often have glitches with shipping, delivery, customer service, returns.

name: Harriet
title: I am reviewing the online chat
review:
I am reviewing the online chat help centre.
I spoke to Rebecca and she was quite helpful

name: Tatiana Gnatenko
title: Additional stress for no reason lol
review: I have received some answers to my question, however I still need to do some additional investigation to where my order is myself. ASOS has wrongly issued a tracking number for supposedly untraceable shipment and that makes me nervous as there are no updates for my order

name: Amalie Caramés
title: It’s great
review: Sometimes, if it's a big order, it can go wrong and they ship a few items in the wrong size.  However, they have a super sweet and helpful customer service, and also free returns.  Overall, I am super happy with Asos and it is my favorite shopping app.

name: 윤문석
title: Thanks charlie.
review: Thanks charlie.

review: really friendly help service, I'm totally happy with it

review: Yonis was helpful.

review: Issue was dealt with quickly and efficiently. Thank you.

name: Celina Quayle
title: Ben was great in assisting and…
review: Ben was great in assisting and confirming things the other representatives were not able to do. I've been waiting two weeks for a package that had express delivery and when I asked for my two dresses two be re-shipped out, I was told they would be. I've been waiting, again. Ben confirmed there was a miscommunication but that he will send out a new shipment. If I do not receive my shipment, I will be contacting again for a full refund. I give this 4 stars due to Ben's assistance but I am greatly disappointed with ASOS overall.

name: Ryslan Brikos
title: I think they understand me
review: I think they understand me

review: Usually perfect and never had a problem but my parcel last Saturday arrived damaged, all the items were enclosed but were wet/damp

review: great service and nice staff

name: Oakley Weddle
title: Asos' clothes are great and their…
review: Asos' clothes are great and their customer service is quick and easy. However, it is not clear when you are buying the US site vs. the UK site is confusing and allows for a difficult delivery experience.

name: Andrew
title: 3rd Re-order
review:
Took a little while to connect but the issue was addressed and hopefully resolved. After ordering something that was in stock twice, it was unsuccessful each time. I spoke with a rep named Callum, he verified the item was in stock and said to try it through the desktop browser. Hopefully that works out.

The first two times I tried paying via Klarna. I noticed that the 3rd time there was a price change, the item was now listed under $50.  With Klarna you can only make purchases with items over $50. Wondering if maybe that price change caused some kind of glitch & had something to do with the item not going through the first two times. Or if, in fact, it did have something to do with the iPhone app.

Anyway, appreciate the help.  Hope my order goes through, I really want that jacket!

Andrew

name: Justyna Tylek
title: Long waiting time for response
review: Long waiting time for response

name: Holly Chalmers
title: Really helpful advisor who answered my…
review: Really helpful advisor who answered my query quickly and kindly

name: Dalal Alhamlan
title: Good but Late
review: Good but Late

name: Billie
title: Great service as usual
review: Great service as usual. They help out and are super patient. I’ve never had a bad experience with ASOS customer service! It’s easy and simple!

name: Eytan Dayan
title: Service is very good
review: Service is very good , thank you Darius

name: Scott Gallagher
title: Helpful and informative
review: Helpful and informative

name: Nicole
title: Chat great but delivery shocking
review: The online chat was great BUT the reason I used it was because, two weeks after ordering, my order never arrived. Now that time has elapsed I'm being given a refund. Delivery is terrible! Hermes is terrible! I love Asos stuff and would like to buy again but what's the point? Hermes is renowned for being terrible. Asos needs to sort out its delivery service. Cannot order anything for fear of losing money and never seeing it arrive.

name: Amber Peaks
title: faulty order rectified by outstanding customer service
review: Although I have received a couple of faulty orders. The customer service I received after has been outstanding. Fast and easy they have rectified all orders with next day delivery for any missed out items! It isn’t ideal to have your order be faulty or missing but everything they have done to put this right has been fantastic.

name: claire
title: Chelsea was great
review: Chelsea was great, efficient and nice.

name: Charlotte Billingham
title: Sorted my problem out for me
review: Sorted my problem out for me. Give me a few options to pick from. Really helpful. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because it took abit to long but other then that. I couldn't complain. Happy with the end result.

name: Fanita
title: Aaron was very helpful
review: Aaron was very helpful.  There is follow up needed for this exchange - I hope it is as successful as this interaction.

name: Louise E Smith
title: Quite a lengthy delay to get through to…
review: Quite a lengthy delay to get through to someone but quick and informative response to my query when addressed.

name: Jack
title: Sorted out my issue and referred me…
review: Sorted out my issue and referred me onto the services to best sort my problem.

name: Salo Cohen
title: Great Service
review:
Great Service, But I have waited for a long time to get served.
Thank you.

name: Kayleigh Prowen
title: Thank you, Ria!
review: Ria handled my complaint very well, and managed to resolve it for me during our online chat. I was upset due to a courier returning my parcel to ASOS and causing me all sorts of headaches but Ria did all she could to resolve it and succeeded. Thank you for being so patient with me!

name: Renee King
title: Joanna did a great job in helping me
review: Joanna did a great job in helping me.  She was quick, efficient and straight to the point.  That's what you need with good customer service.

name: Bintberry
title: My most recent interaction with Roheel…
review: My most recent interaction with Roheel appears to have gone well.  I was promised a replacement for my shipment which never arrived. I would feel better if I had received a confirmation number. I'm just not happy I had to wait so long for resolution

name: Camilla Malandri
title: Satisfied
review:
Joseph was nice and very helpful in solving my problem with my refund but I feel like the service in general has slowed down. 
I was used to not waiting at all when getting into the chat process with the asos team while this time I had to wait in queue for a little under 10 minutes before someone was available to help.

name: Lisa De Sousa
title: After several emails arguing with what…
review: After several emails arguing with what seemed like a robot over a faulty order (constantly copy and pasting the same email over and over again). I decided to go on the online chat again and spoke with a lady called Ellie, she resolved my query within minutes. More staff like this ASOS.

name: samsam
title: Prompt and professional dealing with my order issue
review: great staff helped me promptly with my issue. i caused damage to my hand and broke two nails in the simple process of trying to remove an earring from the pakacging however becuase the clasp of the earring was damaged it was near impossible getting it off without breaking the earring. Ell was able to help me quickly and professionally with my dilemma which lessened the pain cuased from trying to get the earring off the packaging

name: Ting
title: Third time lucky!
review: Did not have good customer service with 2 people I chatted with, but Mihaela was third time lucky and very helpful. Resolved my issue very efficiently!

name: Gold Cocoa Milk
title: Very helpful and assured me the issues…
review: Very helpful and assured me the issues would be resolved within 2 days

name: Daeja Brooks
title: customer chat
review: Easy and convenient!

name: Connor Blennerhassett
title: Alycia - Well Done
review:
After speaking to a gentleman on the phone who was extremely unhelpful Alycia was on hand on the chat service ASOS provide and dealt with my queries quickly and efficiently and therefore deserving a special mention. 

Kudos, Alycia.

Connor Blennerhassett

name: Patrice Bunch
title: Asked a question
review: Asked a question, got an answer in a timely fashion.

name: Amanda

review: good and professional assistance, but connection sometimes was off and took a while to load.

title: Good customer service
review: Very good customer service

review: The way they handle issues is professional and I appreciate their support

title: Quick resolution
review: It took a few days to get through on live chat when i had a problem with my order. But when i got through it was resolved super fast and was resolved excellently

name: Adenike Bediako
title: Asos customer service is very efficient
review: The person I spoke to was called chloe and she was professional and helped me with my query within 5 minutes.

name: Rebekah
title: The customer service agent was…GREAT!
review: The customer service agent was professional and efficient. It would be nice if ASOS emailed the customer once the return/exchange was received, so we know what the situation is. I have been waiting over two weeks re: an exchange that never was mailed out to me. Luckily, the customer service agent was able to help. I rate Channa's service 5/5, I rate the company (from purchase to attempt of exchanging), 4/5.

name: Dyana
title: It would be nice if ASOS could ship…
review: It would be nice if ASOS could ship beauty products to Indonesia. They wouldn't be banned and we as customers could handle the customs clearance process by ourselves too.

name: Charl
title: I love ASOS
review: I love ASOS. It is my favourite place to buy from online, the next day delivery for a year is great and fantastic value. They are always very helpful on ASOS chat - bar one incident where I was speaking to a very rude man. They are always happy to help and it’s a great app and great place to shop

name: Sara Mohammad
title: So helpful and fast
review: So helpful and fast, thank you

name: Gareth Sykes
title: Great help when contacted via the chat…
review: Great help when contacted via the chat for the 2nd time by Thomas. However, not great that it has taken us to contact the company twice and 10 days to resolve the issue.

name: Dima Aoun
title: Disappointed but happy at the end
review: I was so disappointed to not get my order delivered, Ell give me 2 options, refund or delivery again after checked everything was okay.

name: Aleohs
title: Jessica was helpful in answering my query.
review: Jessica was helpful in answering my query to why and where the parcel could be. And if it didn’t arrive how I could send the parcel back as I would be away. She also replied swiftly.

name: Sam Plunkett
title: Great customer service
review: Great customer service

name: Ami
title: Typically I'd rate ASOS 5 star
review: Typically I'd rate ASOS 5 star, and the reason I'm giving a 4 is because they resolved the issue quickly as soon as I made them aware of the situation. My items were 'delivered' on the 18/11, I came home to a calling card, which stated my item was in a 'safe place' however, the item wasn't anywhere to be seen. This isn't ASOS' fault, and I don't believe it's Yodels fault, but some thieving individual!!

name: Indi
title: Polite advisor, Long queue times, No immediate action/response
review:
The advisor I spoke with was very polite and helpful.
I would have liked a quicker response/action to my missing parcel, but this was not the advisors fault.
I did spend over two hours trying to speak to an advisor about my missing parcel and had to give up and try again the next day.

name: Emma Thomas
title: Had an issue, sorted immediately
review: Had an issue with an order delivery (order hadn't arrived and no news from the courier). Contacted ASOS via live chat, and Alycia sorted out a replacement order immediately for me. Very swift and polite assistance!

name: Judith Tarrant McGettigan
title: Laura was efficient & friendly in a…
review: Laura was efficient & friendly in a stressful situation.

name: Mayela Lau
title: My package was delayed but they are solving it
review:
I order some dresses and they didn't arrive on time, some one at Customer Services ask me to wait for another 20 days before making a claim.

The days have passed and I reached Customer Services again, the person who assisted me was very kind and offer to make an express shipment for one dress and a refund for the other one that was out of stock.
I am currently waiting, if arrives on time I will definitely improve my review --->

The shipment arrived and the dress was really nice. 

I would say if whatever you are ordering is urgent to you, pay the express shipment, else, it will arrive eventually, not in the near future, but with good quality

name: Anitah Novshadian
title: The worker who assisted me when i did…
review: The worker who assisted me when i did not receive my package was very thorough and helpful with the process. While i am upset with the fact that i never received a package (hence the missing star) the customer service was above par (hence the remainder of the stars)

name: Muhtasim
title: Well mannered and gave me a good idea…
review: Well mannered and gave me a good idea on why my order was late to be delivered and clear instructions too.

name: Ashleigh Bullen
title: Very helpful service and lovely lady!
review: Very helpful service and lovely lady!

name: YY P
title: Favourite place to shop.
review: I have been shopping with ASOS for a very long time and I've never had any major problems with them. There have been times where they have sent me the wrong order, however, they have always been relatively quick to resolve the issue. When I do get in contact with them the staff are very friendly and helpful. It is my favourite place to purchase clothes and I love how they have a petite section.

name: Jason morrison
title: Magdalena was very helpful 😁
review: Magdalena was very helpful 😁

name: Lindsay Bailey
title: Kris was great!
