review: Kris was great! I worked with another representative first who was really not helpful and exited the chat before resolving the return issue. At that point, I was very concerned that this was going to be a scam and I was going to be out over $1000. I exited the chat because I had no other choice and began talking with Kris who resolved the issue with additional help on my end that I was not expecting, but ultimately after an hour, I was able to get the shipping labels for the return.

name: sonja kennedy
title: They are so good at responding to your complaint
review:
They are so good at responding to your complaint. The ladies I assume I was chatting with on twitter were really fantastic at helping me out with my problem 
Can’t fault them at all.

name: Seya Ben Amar
title: Hannah from the chat escalated my issue…
review: Hannah from the chat escalated my issue to her colleagues in the specialist team and provided a professional reply to my inquiry.

name: Knut Lorentzen
title: Shipping to norway a bit slow
review: Shipping to norway a bit slow, no tracking. one Necklace lost its color on the "stone" after i used it twice. But the service is excellent and they will replace it and Even refund If replacement is the same quality. Nice products

name: El
title: He was helpful and quick to reply.
review: He was helpful and quick to reply.

name: Layla Bee
title: I have had issues with customer service…
review: I have had issues with customer service in the past, so I won't give them 5 stars. However, I had an order that was lost recently and using the live chat, they immediately sent me a new package and were able to change the address for me, since I was leaving town. Quite satisfied with customer service this time around.

name: Jane
title: I had question about refunds
review: I had question about refunds. Operator Dani really helped to my with my problem. She was really kind. She care about my problem.

name: Jemima Nicholls
title: very efficient service however had to…
review: very efficient service however had to wait in a queue for a while to be seen

name: Melissa O'Halloran
title: The chat online resolved my issue…
review: The chat online resolved my issue although it would have been nice if I didn’t have to contact Asos twice about my missing item as it’s now out of stock and the courier has lost it so no coat for me!

name: Maryam
title: Their products are authentic and good
review: Their products are authentic and good. Their Customer Care team is brilliant, the chatters are very professional. But I wish if the company would stick to shipping orders with reliable shipping services providers. When parcels are shipped with certain carriers, all delivery problems happen, lost orders, very very late delivery, I mean 6 weeks late!, damaged goods and so on. It happened with me multiple times and it's very disappointing. However, I must say that whenever I contact Customer Care they're quick apologize about the inconvenience and to either reship the order or issue a refund.

name: Mor
title: good service and knowledge
review:
good service and knowledge
took a little while to get someone on the chat, but overall very good

name: Thomas Acott
title: Thank you Kathryn for all your help !
review: Thank you Kathryn for all your help !! ❤️

name: Emily
title: Dealing with ASOS directly has been…
review: Dealing with ASOS directly has been fine but I had to speak with Yodel first who were delivering my parcel and they were not helpful at all. Firstly, they have said they failed to deliver my parcel on Saturday because they could not locate the property. In 25 years I have never had a problem with parcels been delivered to this address. They also never tried to phone. I was using the tracker online and the status was that it would be delivered the next day - which it wan't. I then had to contact them directly - after verifying all of the address information, they told me it didnt match and ended the chat very abruptly. This experience would seriously make me reconsider ordering with ASOS again as I now don't think I will get my delivery for when i need it.

name: Rachel Brotman
title: Lianne was very helpful
review:
Lianne was very helpful, but another Customer Service rep is the reason I will never shop at ASOS again.

I reached out because I did not receive an order confirmation email but the order was processed and posted on my credit card statement. When I initially reached out, the first representative I spoke to named Grant, told me the order had never been processed because my card declined the payment. I told him I was looking at my card statement and was seeing it as having been processed and posted. He told me I would need to reach out to American Express and take it up with them and disconnected the chat before I would share confirmation from Amex that I had been charged the close to $200 for the order. 

I connected to another rep, Lianne and she was far more helpful. I explained the situation, shared the Amex provided statement with her and she actually asked for some additional info including my address, full name and birthdate. She then escalated to the correct team that can further assist me. I appreciate her help, but this will likely be the first and last time I purchase from ASOS because this experience was pretty horrible.

name: James Chilton
title: Great customer service from live chat not so great from Twitter
review: It took a few attempts of talking to different people who didn’t seem interested in what I had to say on Twitter. I eventually spoke to Alisha on live chat and she listened to the issues and passed on the information to the the right people to sort it out. There was an issue with products being incorrectly labelled so I received the wrong item twice and wanted to make sure it didn’t keep happening. It was a bit of a unique problem so I can understand the confusion and the cookie cutter responses on twitter, but I’d recommend using live chat for any unique issue like this.

name: Ama Addo
title: Prompt and attentive to details
review: Prompt and attentive to details

name: Apostolos Fallesen
title: Would totally shop there again.
review:
Fast delivery in Denmark, came after 2 days with the premium option.
The quality for the price is great as well, really great.
The only thing that's a bit off is the sizes on the jeans, my sweater and shoes had a perfect fit where my jeans were too small but I ordered the exact same size that I normally wear, but could be the jeans that I wore that were wrong, not big of a deal.

Overall, would totally shop again, I really don't know why people hate ASOS so much.

name: Mandeep
title: Helpful but slow to start
review: The Asos representative was very helpful and got to my answer quickly when engaged. It did take a while for the conversation to start  (15 mins) but was resolved very quickly and efficiently when it got going hence 4 stars.

name: Luz Gomez
title: I wish I could do an exchanges
review: I wish I could do an exchanges, I would rather just be able to send back the product knowing that it will be in stock rather than wait for my refund to be refunded until I place the order again.

name: Nicola
title: Only giving 4* thanks to their chat…
review:
Only giving 4* thanks to their chat service, not their delivery service! 

I raised a complaint using the chat function, and had it resolved easily within 10 minutes. The advisor was very polite and helpful, and the process was quick and easy. Given that I'd had a bad order experience (the order arrived two days late on the next day service, and my refund is now late too), being able to speak to someone helpful did improve my experience.

I'm less likely to order from ASOS again, but want to praise their chat advisors!

name: Jennifer Luan
title: Damaine was very nice
review: Damaine was very nice, but I do think the overall response and wait time was a bit slower than usual when compared to other brands' customer service. However, she helped direct me towards what I should do about my issue. Now I will wait and see for the asos specialist email and see if my issue can be resolved.

name: Imogen Sassi
title: Asos customers service
review: Asos customers service are good fix problems quickly

name: Jenna Cormier
title: Responsive and professional but didn't…
review: Responsive and professional but didn't have answers I needed, which was not his fault, just didn't learn anything new about my issue.

name: Vicky S
title: Wedding
review: Quick and easy shopping using the app. Great customer service and fast delivery

name: Chloe Baoyu Chen
title: Helpful
review: I was asking for help in terms of return parcel. The customer service associate is helpful and patient. But I am not sure if my problem is solved.

name: Thomas Fulconis
title: Quick refund of 1-day delivery fees…
review: Quick refund of 1-day delivery fees after delay in receiving my order

name: Steven Ellison
title: Equal opportunity sizes
review:
Hello ASOS !, I’ve noticed that you are all about equal opportunity. I think you should pave the way and have incorporate shorter male and females to  model your clothes. Being the largest online retailer you could make an incredible revolution for modeling, branding, while promoting that you don’t have to be tall to be successful. There are average sizes, plus size, and y’all. Typically these model sizes exclude small and below. 
Also, it’s hard to gauge how a certain set of items will fit when only shown on tall models. 
Thank you for reading this!

name: Amadi Eni
title: With respect to Asos delivery to…
review:
With respect to Asos delivery to Nigeria, I would rather Asos works on allowing her customers choose who should deliver their products rather than use her current system. 

Regards

name: Glory Mak
title: helpful and can provide a advice
review: helpful and can provide a advice

name: N/A
title: Quick, helpful responses!
review: My package was lost in the mail so I chatted with Caroline and she was super friendly and apologetic. She said she would get a replacement package out to me ASAP! Only problem is that they’re out of stock with one of the items and didn’t offer something else, just a refund.

name: Antonia
title: Resolved issues promptly
review:
Usually rate ASOS 5/5 but due to recent delivery issues with Hermes, have had the same order placed and eventually cancelled due to non-delivery twice. 
Saying that, ASOS have asked me to reorder and have given a 25% off code (which I asked for) so I can order at the same cost as the first order I placed, which was in their promo period. 
Always deal with any issues promptly. 
Hermes has been the issue, but ASOS are great.

name: Eshan Govil
title: Fast responsive care team but they…
review: Fast responsive care team but they forgot items from my order in the first place

name: Viola Tebah
title: I spoke with Frankie and he/she was…
review: I spoke with Frankie and he/she was very helpful. Thanks for helping resolve the issue of my missing item in a professional & friendly manner.

name: zeno wens
title: Live life peacefull
review: He helped me to find the solution so he did his job. It took a while tho. But that wasn't a big deal.

name: Nicole Chiam
title: Very good experience !staff
review: Very good experience !staff : Somerlily is very responsive and helpful ! Thanks !

name: Quy
title: 4/5 Stars
review: Been a long-time customer, great deals and cheap stuff! However, recently I was delivered two wrong products. Unfortunately, I will miss an event because of that. Support came through and only offered free expressed shipping and that was it.

name: Abrielle Ramirez
title: I received wrong items within my order…
review: I received wrong items within my order and missing other items I purchased, but was assisted instantly with a soultion by a helpful person Jamal, GREAT HELP!

name: Claudia Maria Roman Santiago
title: I love ASOS
review: I love ASOS, their clothes are stylish and unique. Some items are pricey, but you get what you paying for. They could improve the customer service, it took awhile to get a response.

name: Shan Joseph
title: Hi Fran was very helpful in giving…
review: Hi Fran was very helpful in giving advise on how to purchase ASOS gift card with my love2shop card

name: Rima
title: Good customer service from Chloe
review: Chloe was helpful in looking into my problem and escalating it to the relevant team. Good customer service

name: Kelly Wakefield
title: Spoke to a lovely lady named Elaina who…
review: Spoke to a lovely lady named Elaina who helped me with a returns problem. I order a lot from Asos & this is the first time I've ever had to return anything, she could not have been more helpful!

name: Aiden Symons
title: ASOS great, courier companies not so much
review: I would give 5 stars as ASOS are always incredibly helpful and any issues you do have are which are rare are dealt with. Unfortunately courier companies like Hermes let ASOS down as they really are terrible and I wouldn’t be surprised if most of the customer service ASOS staff deal with  are a result of Hermes poor service.

name: Chloe
title: Happy with ASOS chat function for easy contact
review:
Wait wasn’t too long, about 7 minutes, which I don’t mind as I can do other things while waiting rather than being on hold on a phone call. 

The advisor was helpful and quick to respond.

I think ASOS should offer to take action against the courier sooner than 5 days / full working week of delays. I pay for next day delivery so for the courier to delay delivery 5 days in a row without consequence is unreasonable in my opinion.

name: Toqa Mohammed
title: Perfect
review: It's a nice application, but i'm so upset because they always missing items .

name: Rose Park
title: LOVE BUT ISSUES WITH THEFT TOO COMMON
review: i love asos but things are often stolen from the packages during transit or in the hands of delivery people.

name: Jesse Goldstone
title: Fast inquiry
review: Fast inquiry. All my questions were answered.

name: Monty
title: Karmal was really calm and helpful!
review: Karmal was really calm and helpful!

name: Philip Pou
title: Great service
review: Very straight foward

name: Chiara Falcone
title: Despite being disappointed by the fact…
review: Despite being disappointed by the fact that I got a wrongly labelled/sized item, I still got great service from julyan and Leighann. Leighann was very informative, quii and to the point.

name: N
title: Darius was very helpful!
review: Darius was very helpful!

name: Luigi Andrea Galea
title: High returns charge especially for…
review: High returns charge especially for malta.

name: Adya Sinha
title: Asos service is brilliant
review: Asos service is brilliant. Gnewt however is shocking and appalling, honestly have not had a SINGLE good delivery with them.Had parcels go missing, lies about attempting to deliver, the whole lot. Seriously tempted to stop ordering from asos if gnewt remains the delivery company

name: Baidel Bite
title: Fast support
review: Fast support, answers on all your questions.

name: Arefe KH
title: I'm an Asos customer I love the range…
review: I'm an Asos customer I love the range of products and the delivery has been always on time! Except for this time that i haven't received my order and received an email saying that it has been delivered!! Dont know what's happened but did a live chat with the customer service and hopefully will receive my money back for an item which didn't receive!!!!

name: Becca
title: My delivery was a bit delayed
review: My delivery was a bit delayed, but the clothing selection and great customer support makes up for it!

name: Choco❤️
title: ASOS is doing a great job but the…
review: ASOS is doing a great job but the carriers are the problem, my 4th and 5th September orders are still not dlivered, This is very frustrating. Please do something about it. Dpd or Aramex was doing a great job for me and now this happens. I’m soo upset now

name: Andreia Chagas
title: nice
review: it was very fast and answered all my questions

name: Rawnyah Jm
title: he's respectful.
review: he's respectful.

name: Amy Bellwood
title: Helpful
review: Friendly. Issue wasn’t resolved but I am to be contacted at later date.

name: Zaynab
title: Great!
review: A very vibrant website, with top-notch items to purchase and an excellent customer care. But items are sometimes a bit expensive, even with the discounts.

name: Shez
title: My experience with the live chat help…
review: My experience with the live chat help was great! She was fast, listened and sorted the problem out straight away!

name: Лиза Эрман
title: Pony Express is terrible!
review: I’ highly recommend to change you the delivery service in Russia named Pony Express. It is the worst postal organization in Russia. There are a lot of negative feedbacks. СДЭК, DHL are the best solutions. Thank you.

name: Will
title: ASOS Customer Service Great, Courier Rubbish
review: I am a bit annoyed because I have not yet received my order when I paid next day delivery. However, ASOS were super quick to respond to my query on it, and have even refunded the next day charge to me. So customer service is impeccable. I would recommend to ASOS not to use Hermes as a courier, I have had awful experiences with them in the past and they are very unreliable

name: Evandro
title: I used the site for the first time last…
review: I used the site for the first time last month. I liked the delivery time of the order. Great quality clothes! There were no problems.

name: Zoe Gillen
title: very helpful were the staff on…
review: very helpful were the staff on messenger just still disappointed that the exchange wasnt made initially but thankful for the staff for giving free next day to get the parcel sooner !

name: Akinsulere Olusola
title: I am happy with their timely deliveries
review: I am happy with their timely deliveries

name: Bithy Mazumder
title: Suzanne was helpful
review: Suzanne was helpful

name: 张荻风
title: Everything is fine
review: Everything is fine, except that he said at the beginning that the information I provided was nonsense.

name: Blue Beard Clan
title: ASOS Return
review: Harry helped me out with some returns through chat, worked out a charm and was super easy. That's about it. Good guy 👍

name: Geryd Lee Steffek
title: Great customer service.
review: I placed my order on 9/11/19 and paid for express (2 day) shipping. UPS messed up somewhere and it's going to end up being a week. I asked ASOS for a refund on the shipping charges and they were amazing. No questions asked just like "yup not a problem here you go!" Will definitely being ordering again.

name: Izzy Since
title: Information request
review: Explanation clear and made following my request for information

name: Jamie Briscoe
title: Retuns dispute
review: Retuns dispute was handled effectively and efficiently by Mia who was extremely helpful, knowledgeable and understanding with my returns dispute.

name: Tamtam
title: It was good but my issue was not…
review: It was good but my issue was not resolved right away

name: Amy Harris
title: I have the £9.99 delivery and it’s…
review: I have the £9.99 delivery and it’s brilliant! Was well worth having at xmas when I needed loads of delivers last min

name: Kate K
title: Always had great service from ASOS
review: Always had great service from ASOS.  Unfortunately they're not great at refunding the correct items so I always have to check my refund emails thoroughly. However, when I do complain they are always quick to respond.

name: Ashley Simmonds
title: Love Asos!
review: Always order from here, never had any issues! Just got a lot of things for my Europe trip at great prices, sizing was also pretty accurate.

name: Kateryna Lebedeva
title: I actually love ASOS
review: I actually love ASOS. The best variety of cloth and accessories. I only once had delay with shipping,for one day,but that was not a big deal.  I like that they have prepaid labels to return,no problems with refunds. You need to make sure what kinda brands you are buying ,cause some of them (pretty little thing) have the worst quality. I am able to buy cloth that is not available in US so I am very happy about it.

name: Jenny F
title: It was ok
review: It was ok! Quick delivery!

name: alia amira
title: Good Services
review: Good services

name: Christian
title: only downfall was delivery
review: I was skeptical at first because of all these reviews but decided to take the risk since the product was not expensive. The only downfall to my expierence was the two day delivery was actually one week. Other than that everything went smooth. I was able to return the item and got a refund within 10 days.

name: Anh Tuan
title: Quality of jacket is good but delivery is not too good
review: I ordered a jacket in Italy and they delivered 3 days late. When I wrote an e-mail to delivery service to complaint and I received immediate response that they would deliver on the day after and they did, so I was impressed with their behavior although they was late. Finally, quality of jacket is good but delivery is not too good

name: Nathan Taylor
title: Dealt with my returns issue effectively…
review: Dealt with my returns issue effectively and i now have the correct outfit!  Thank you!

name: Melanie
title: I figured I should share my experience..
review: I figured I should share my experience with ASOS because their ratings seem to be low..anyways, this is my first time ordering from them. I purchased a pair of jeans. Overall, I love the jeans. They’re good quality and look like the picture. They fit perfectly as well (I used their fit guide quiz). My only complaint was that they look slightly different on me than the model, but that could be boiled down to height and body type. My order was estimated to arrive by April 3rd, and it actually came early on March 30th, which I was quite happy with because most people seem to be complaining about shipping. I did not pay the extra price for the express shipping, because in my experience, items never seem to arrive earlier, no matter the company.

name: Kristina Tesanovic
title: Delivery needs improvements, but stuff is good
review: Ok, so I ordered three dresses from the Asos on 11th of May, I think, and it said it despatched on 13th. First it said it is going to be here on 23th of May, then on 3rd of June, then on 6th of June,  then it said 17th of june. Seeing them prolong delivery time has been stressfull, but dresses have arrived today (5th of June). So its great, cause my ocassion that I bought them for is tomorow. I contacted customer service via live chat on Web site, they were nice but they said they cannot do anything, maybe they did. Dresses are great, I like the quality, they are Asos brand. Only thing is that, I bought size 38 expecting to alter dresses, and I even lost some weight and they are almost too small. So go size up if u are buying non lace dress.

name: Jonguye
title: Nothing wrong with ASOS
review:
Never had problems with shipping, refunds or customerservice. Wide range of clothing, definitely recommend. The one thing that is absolutely annoying though, is the way they present clothing now (the videos). They film 360s and go up close to the faces of the models. Cant see a thing of the product.

En voor de nederlanders, ik heb geen idee hoe jullie een slechte ervaring hebben gehad met refunds. Misschien niet duidelijk genoeg geweest.

name: Helen
title: I think Asos is great
review: I have bought loads of things from ASOS - most of my wardrobe - and they are a great service. I find it  really easy to return unwanted products, with quick refunds and they have such a range that I can usually get exactly what I’m looking for at a good price. I have only once had trouble with them - an order (one of many) came maybe 3 days late, but when I contacted them they gave me updates and were had very good customer service.

name: Christine Goodspeak
title: Really quick delivery of my new Little…
review: Really quick delivery of my new Little Mistress dress, saved my Friday night! Thanks ASOS

name: Peh Choon Meng
title: Good service with all my items…
review: Good service with all my items delivered to me just that it was delayed for a few days not a hassle at all even though I heard about the negative feedbacks on Asos I think it is a hit or miss but definitely good on my side

name: Ms Kylie Zamboyaga
title: my package took way too long to arrive
review: my package took way too long to arrive, and i purchased express shipping...customer service stated it had been delivered when in fact it had not, however the package did finally arrive and the items were great, so i give 4 stars

name: Alison Bahnick
title: Cute! No complaints.
review: I was a little hesitant to use this company but everything has gone very smoothly. I bought a lot of clothes for $200. The quality is good! I really like a couple of the items! I returned a couple of items due to simply not likely the way they fit-not anything wrong with it. The return process was easy. I have no complaints.

name: madelyn s
title: Give it a try!
review: I bought on Jan 3 for the first time in ASOS Website. I only bought one item because I’ve read poor reviews from consumers. I received my item today Jan 9 (estimated delivery is on Jan 11) in Singapore with a free standard shipping . For a cheap price item , I find it a good quality and fit true to size. So I was expecting a worsed quality or service  but so far so good. Let’s see again with my 2nd order soon.

name: S Jones
title: Beccy from customer care was very…
review:
Beccy from customer care was very helpful. 
I am disappointed that my delivery did not turn up for Xmas.

name: etaize anstis
title: I've had 2 orders in a row where items…
review: I've had 2 orders in a row where items have been forgotten, an incorrect dress was sent out and I now have received a dress meant for NYE with crystals literally hanging by a thread and STINKING of sweat and body odour. There's no way their staff could have missed it. They just don't care about their jobs or customers enough. I tried to sort it out via a Live Chat but their representative, Remonul, was no help. Clearly didn't bother to read my messages and just sent pre written standard replies that were of no use. ASOS' quality and customer service have massively declined and are generally spotty

name: Matthew Penrose
title: Wasn't in for delivery
review:
Wasn't in for delivery, tried to rearrange delivery and couldn't so Emma on the customer service team had to arrange for a new delivery be sent so don't know what happened to the last parcel.

Good customer service on this occasion but very bad delivery. I think this is due to the new courier service they are using since mid-2019.

name: yoyo spencer
title: Helpful ASOS, BAD Hermes
review:
naeem was the person i spoke to about my order. He was very helpful.

My only issue is that asos sometimes delivers through hermes. Hermes delivered to another address allowing them to sign as 'mumma', name taken down as 'J', and with no slip or any indication that the order was delivered to another address. On an order worth over £200 this is just not acceptable.

But ASOS has resent the order, so i have no issue with them.

name: MOSHE SHAYA
title: You have failed me
review:
Hello 
I find it hard to understand the fact your system let me order and then after  week and half choose to send mails thats says i got refound...
Soo..i see this as act of running from your commitments.
I am not your teacher or pearents ...
If this the way your coustmers work ...
Your in deep trouble....
I work in clothes company in israel...
I never saw support thata talk like this 
Sending refound..., Instead of resending the same package... 
This is  annoying i work alot with you and you faild me in the second time.
If it wont be solve i have no choice but to quit use your site and guide all my friend that joined to do the same...
And publish the mails and talks we had that others will know how committed your site to coustmers.
Un acceptable treatment... 
This is not the way you act to people you could have done many things to fix it but you choose to stand on your Backfeet and tell the same mantra: "package damaged... You can reorder".
Do as u wish you are the system here .
But sometime the system can change instead of working like robots

Mary xmas
Asos
My your packages wont get ever damaged agine.
I am out , do as you wish :)

name: תומר בן צבי
title: mark is very good
review: mark is very good

name: Luke Akridas
title: Great customer service, poor courier choice
review: Customer service was really helpful in understanding and resolving the problem of not receiving my requested exchange, despite the overall incident's annoyance. I believe using another courier could avoid such problems. I've had problems with Hermes half the times I've used it

name: Veronica
title: Not the usual great experience...
review: Not as pleased with Asos as I normally am. I returned 3 dresses but was only refunded for one of them. However, after speaking with Oliver, the situation is now hopefully being handled. Oliver was helpful and kind, just took a while to answer me but that's okay. I really wish Asos would have a phone service. It goes so much faster than sitting in front of a screen for 20 minutes waiting for a response. Thank you for helping me with my return though, I hope to have my usual great experience in the future!

name: Elliott Jones
title: Ella on Chat Now was great, other methods not so good!
review:
Ella was the agent I spoke to on Live Chat. She was really helpful and prompt with her replies. She was one of the best I have spoken to for a while and has changed my opinion somewhat. 

It would have been a 5* but unfortunately other contact methods such as Facebook and DM’s on Twitter take so long to get a response, is any!

name: Lindsey McAlister
title: Helpful
review: Martin was helpful & has passed on my enquiry to the appropriate team, hopefully the matter will be resolved.

name: Understanding Israel
title: Mixed results
review:
Uneven delivery and service. I have received great items quickly and the wrong item so slowly the event was over.
However they have been great on returns and refunds and some items are real keepers in my wardrobe.

name: Emma Verhoeven
title: Was hard to get hold of anyone but once…
review: Was hard to get hold of anyone but once I did, Jordan was very helpful. I hope ASOS refund me the correct amount as very concerned I can only log a refund in AED when I shopped in POUNDS .

name: Sharon Fraser
title: Item not received in parcel
review: Item, not in delivery and had no response from 1st email, however the live chat was productive and the reason for the 3 stars. I've given an overall rating of 4 as I order from ASOS a lot and they are usually very good.

name: Laura
title: Fault item
review: I spoke with Harry as my legging came with holes in the thigh area not been correctly stitched at the finishing end. And he gave me a replacement without any issues! Thank you

name: Kristy Griffiths
title: Helpful
review: Helpful, quick, easy

name: E1989
title: ASOS customer chat
review: Good service!

name: Oneshia Shade
title: Very helpful and informative!
review: Very helpful and informative!

name: Daniel Farrant
title: Great customer
review: Great customer service after dealing with an issue.

name: Mónica
title: Great website and customer care.
review:
Great website and customer care.
It's just too bad there isn't exchange option for Switzerland

name: Shawn Olsen
title: Customer service is top notch
review: Customer service is top notch! I've had a couple of order packing and delivery mishaps along with some of the merchandise not being the greatest. Overall I am not going to stop using ASOS. It is a really good option and value.

name: Jamie Damon Smirk
title: Good
review: Good,  just a bit slow with returns which is a shame

name: Fran
title: Fast service
review: Fast service, easy to order from and return. Only fault is sometime the sizing can differ, but it’s no problem to return/swap. Also very good discounts.

name: Simon
title: Took aroud 5 mins to connect with…
review: Took aroud 5 mins to connect with someone. Expected this time of the year I guess but could be quicker. Other than that, all good.

name: Matt Chetcuti
title: There have been a few technical issues…
review: There have been a few technical issues lately, but the customer service is always excellent.

name: Georgia
title: Adam was very helpful
review: Adam was very helpful, made me feel like I was being listened to. Although he was unable to resolve the issue he assured it would be passed onto the relevant team. Quicker responses at the start of the chat would have been an added bonus. Thanks Adam!

name: Claire
title: Polite and straight to the point and…
review: Polite and straight to the point and very quick

name: Lucy
title: Lost parcel
review: Tried contacting about my lost parcel and no luck then I contacted the live chat and spoke to Krissy and I now have a replacement being sent out. Very happy, the parcel was a lot of money and was a Christmas present.

name: Veron
title: Excellent service communication was…
review: Excellent service communication was great they respond to me and I’m going to let my order deliver in 48 hours I’m very disappointed with the delivery company which is arm is there not a very good delivery company so I wouldn’t advise anyone to use Hermes because they are slacking so please try to find a different alternative way to do your delivery but not with Hermes but your service is quite excellent thank you

name: Lewis192
title: Had to wait a bit but once connected…
review: Had to wait a bit but once connected got what I needed without any hassle.

name: Hadeel
title: The chart was very smooth and fast
review: The chart was very smooth and fast, the operator was very sufficient and help me find what I was looking for

name: DEAN RAFFO
title: Live chat was very helpful
review: Live chat was very helpful

name: Nicole Bancroft
title: Good customer service
review: Good customer service, easy to get a hold of via chat and quick to fix issues, however this is the second order I've made in a couple of months where the parcel has been delivered damaged and items have been missing. This time it was a box that was gaping open and last time the bag had rips in it. Not great, but I'm not sure if it's Asos's fault or the delivery company.

name: laura stewart
title: Really helpful
review: Danielle was really helpful today sorting out my order of refund.

name: Nicola
title: Asos
review: Great customer service!

name: guli TT
title: I was given the information I had…
review: I was given the information I had requested regarding my returns.. although it took a little time for the advisor to respond but it was fine after a little wait..

name: Anette Jaani
title: I had to wait a little bit
review: I had to wait a little bit, but the customer support was great!

name: Ak myers
title: Asos is great for its vast content
review: Asos is great for its vast content, but be warned if your not prepared to scroll for hours asos isn't the shop for you

name: keyede osuntokun
title: Was helpful in a timely manner
review: Was helpful in a timely manner

name: Kathleen Tablada
title: Friendly and Helpful Customer Service
review: Packaged arrived in fairly reasonable time. Items are in good condition, but me of my palettes were missing. ASOS was very helpful and friendly. They managed sort out my problem quickly.

name: Wanirada nomai
title: I like your clothes but your stupid…
review: I like your clothes but your stupid euro currency got me messed up spending so much more than i thought. I also don’t like you using fedex PLEASE stick to UPS

name: Heejung Yang Yang
title: She provides good and fast service
review: She provides good and fast service. Thank you so much

name: Iasonas Santorinios
title: Thanks
review: Thanks, Chelsea

name: Angela García Achalandabaso
title: Very helpful
review: Very helpful

name: AFRECIA JOB
title: Customer Service is fantastic, delays with order is an issue
review: Great customer service

name: Venky
title: Fresh, Fun selection and a great companion app
review: I like shopping on ASOS. Cool fresh/fashionable selection, great price and snappy app/customer experience. While the return policy is flexible and comparable to other ecomm places, the refund processing could get better. I am not sure how it happened, i wasn't correctly refunded for what i returned. The customer service (Rebecca) was great and promised to investigate. I hope to get the correct refund soon.

name: Ana
title: my problem was solved
review: my problem was solved . no problems with the help i had. 5stars to Yonis . but took i while for someone to talk to me.

name: LD
title: Bhavesh was really clear and helpful…
review: Bhavesh was really clear and helpful with helping resolve my issue after receiving faulty trainers. I was previously losing connection with the live chat which was really frustrating, hence why I have 4 stars instead of 5. However, Bhavesh was very apologetic and helpful.

name: Malam
title: Jasmitha was wonderful to help found…
review: Jasmitha was wonderful to help found out about my order

name: Olivia Prince
title: Fast delivery and helpful customer service
review: Took a little bit of time to get through to the online chat but once through, Chloe was very helpful. It is slightly frustrating that you cannot speak to someone personally over the phone but overall a positive experience.

name: Georgina Fanny Bridgett
title: ive Been shopping with ASOS a while and…
review: ive Been shopping with ASOS a while and I do honestly love ASOS, their range of products is great, I shop there that much that I use the free next day delivery for 12 months....but this is where they lose points but due to using Hermes who are getting worse it’s 50/50 if I get my parcel the next day, some orders just lately I’ve been waiting 3/4 days and I’ve even had my parcels left on a different garden :/ if they didn’t use Hermes they would be 10/10

name: Ruth Moshodi
title: The chat is pretty quick and helpful. No need to wait for email responses
review: The chat is pretty quick and very helpful. I like Asos, this is my second purchase with them However, in both cases, I expected delivery to made sooner than when I actually received them.

name: Polly Lyons
title: Anita on the Customer Chat tool was so helpful
review:
Anita on the Customer Chat tool was extremely helpful when dealing with a stressful situation regarding ASOS taking 2 payments from my account when I only placed 1 order. 

She didn't brush the issue off as my fault and looked into things properly and took the appropriate action. I would have given 5 stars if the issue could have been sorted straight away, but this is not the fault of the staff, probably more a process within the company. 

Thanks Anita! ⭐️

name: abbie
title: very helpful but would it better if…
review: very helpful but would it better if there was a queue system

name: Jamie lee
title: Roheel was great to deal with and…
review:
Roheel was great to deal with and arranged to replace my faulty item.
I do however think you guys need a better system for when faulty items are sent out 

Kinda regards
Jamie lee

name: HT
title: Very helpful chat
review: Very helpful chat, cleared up my problem.

name: Linda Isabella Davies
title: Great in many ways, they should partner with better shipping companies
review:
ASOS is great on it's own but the deliveries when are not express are a nightmare.  The customer service is awesome always willing to help.

My parcel was delivered to who know where and someone whit a complete different name to me signed for it. Now my items are lost

name: Dorka Szabó
title: Great customer service!
review: Great customer service!! Actually I was suprised how goog their customer services is. I have ordered from Asos many times, sometimes the quality of the product was very poor, I've returned the item and got my money back in few days. The other time I haven't received my package on time and they've provided me with full refund. I give them 1 star minus because sometimes the quality is very poor.. Especially thediscounted items during sale period, I have the feeling that they are selling bad quality products for quite a lot of money. Besides this, I'm very satisfied with their service.

name: zuzana
title: Very happy with ASOS itself however had…
review:
Very happy with ASOS itself however had a horrible experience with their delivery partner Hermes. When returning an item, it offered Hermes home pick up service which I selected. I created the request directly on Hermes website, printed the label, driver never arrived to pick up. I contacted their customer service to ask to send someone over only to hear a clear lie why it wasn't completed they offered they will forward my complaint to another Hermes team who would contact me within 48 hours and 'try' to help me (!!) Why wouldn't you just send somebody over to pick up? Especially when you clearly made a mistake? I ended up walking half an hour to a nearest post office to get it returned on time. Shocking approach from Hermes let ASOS and me down. 
If returning, save yourself time and nerves and go with another provider.

name: Mrs Simran kaur
title: To add an option for all orders if to make it as a gift and to write a small personal message to let recepient notify who is the sender.
review: Had some issues with my order as it was a gift but at the end i never got a chance or any option to mark it as a gift and write my name as a sender or a small message so the recipient would know who is it from plus was bit worried if the recipient will by mistake gets the invoice as well with package (which I never wanted) so had to chat with one of the member at ASOS, she helped me as much as she could but at the end i feel that people like me who have always got things delivered for ourselves and find it hard when we order something straight to recipient as a gift. ASOS should make an option while before asking for payment whether its a gift and to give an option to write  small message of no more than 20 to 30 words for the recipient to let them know who is it coming from.

name: Natalie Budziosz
title: Had a issue with my item not being…
review: Had a issue with my item not being delivered by Hermes and the Asos team were quick to help and send replacement stock out.

name: Ana
title: Jack was very helpfull
review:
Jack was very helpfull! Thanks!
I hope to receve my items in a few days!

name: Bhaskar “0 1 i5 L!f3” saikia
title: Amazing expereince
review: I ordered 2 boots 1 was missing in the delivery. I told the customer care and they sorted it out by replacement.

name: Beth
title: Benjamin was very helpful when dealing…
review: Benjamin was very helpful when dealing with my query :)

name: A
title: Today I received damaged parcel with…
review: Today I received damaged parcel with miss item! Taylor was great helping me out! And finding the fastest solution! Thank you

name: Samia Haque
title: very helpful in sorting out my issues
review: very helpful in sorting out my issues

name: Yuval Goldstein
title: Nice and helpful
review: Nice and helpful

name: Lois Irvine
title: Great chat customer service
review: Asos have such a good quality customer service! Quick & easy to get issues resolved! Only issue is sometimes deliveries are late, however this could arguably be Hermes fault and not asos!

name: Hollie Mackenzie
title: Jerri was very prompt in responding
review: Jerri was very prompt in responding, looked into it straight away and confirmed what action was going to be taken next. Waiting on results...

name: Jeanene (Tiki) Baldwin Collins
title: Always give refunds or an exchange credit PLEASE
review: I like what I see I just think that in the event we cannot wear the items that we should always be able to exchange, even if a refund is not possible. I say that because the sizes in the U.S. are different from the U.K. We should always have the option where we don't lost our money. I hope they will honor that!

name: Ella
title: Charlene was great!
review: Charlene was great! She couldn't help with my query but she was very kind and helpful.

name: Clémence Azema
title: Good and fast service
review: Good and fast service

name: Lauren Cooke
title: Quick enough responses and informative
review: Quick enough responses and informative

name: soravee radwongwate
title: Unable to amend the order address placed with afterpay
review: Could have been better if we could amend the address after placing the order with afterpay.

name: Dan
title: 4.5 stars?
review: I generally think ASOS offer a really good service 4 stars is probably a little harsh but 5 is perfection... 4 and a bit would be fairer.

name: Rhodes Edewor-Thorley
title: Slow on the responses but very helpful
review: Slow on the responses but very helpful

name: Rutendo Deve
title: Thanks ASOS for quick customer care - stolen watch replaced
review: I had a devastating incident this past weekend where an MK designer watch I had ordered on ASOS was stolen from the package and I received an empty parcel. However, ASOS has really impressed me by how it responded to my issue. My parcel arrived empty on Sunday and by Tuesday they had already replaced my lost item with another one. My husband's birthday surprise was ruined, however I was not expecting them to act so quickly and sort my issue out within 48 hours. I had lost all faith in online shopping and was utterly devastated but I must say their customer care towards my issue has been very reassuring. My husband now has his watch and I am sooo relieved...On the other hand a token of apology for the inconvenience would have sorted this for good...anyhow I'm just glad I did not lose my money forever.  Thanks ASOS

name: Shanice
title: I've shopped with ASOS for years now
review:
I've shopped with ASOS for years now, and the quality has always been all round. Any issues I've ever had have been rectified quickly, efficiently and above standard. The prices for their clothing vs. the quality has always been on par, and they truly are a brand doing all they can for this generations fashion whilst having such a good personality. 
The only downfall for them is using Hermes, but this is adjacent to them and they will still do their best to help in these scenarios.

name: Marella
title: Really good!
review:
I always purchase from ASOS and can’t quite understand all of the bad reviews they get. Yes sometimes refunds take quite a while which is quite annoying but other places are like that too. A few times I’ve received faulty items and they have been quick to send me out a replacement for free which has been helpful. 
I would recommend ASOS!

name: Fill Mayers
title: I order here pretty often
review:
I order here pretty often, everything was ok
Cheap stuff, quick delivery

name: Siobhan Maguire
title: Have ordered from Asos lots of times…
review: Have ordered from Asos lots of times and have never had any issues. Lots of different delivery options as well. One of the best online retailers in my opinion.

name: Gareth
title: Always love shopping on ASOS
review: Always love shopping on ASOS, reliable delivery and obviously an amazing selection!

name: Alicia
title: Still one of the better online fashion stores
review: Been buying off from ASOS for years now, never really experienced anything significantly negative and will continue to patron them. Great selection of fashion choices, fast delivery and no issue returns. Pricing is competitive but not always the cheapest.

name: Elizabeth
title: Lovely flower dress
review: Lovely flower dress

name: hamida
title: maternity evening dress
review: I got a maternity evening dress, it arrived after a week as the picture and description was accurate.

name: Patti Krebbs
title: GREAT QUALITY PRODUCTS!
review:
This company's shipping was slow, it took awhile to get my items. When I did get 
the items I purchased, they were very high quality, not cheaply made like so many of the website's I have ordered from. I will definitely order again from this company!!!!

name: Jessie
title: My second time buying from ASOS
review: My second time buying from ASOS. Shipping took longer than expected but overall happy with my purchase.

name: Ali
title: Generally quite happy with the service
review: Generally quite happy with the service. Usually on time and customer service reliable

name: James McCarthy
title: More hits than misses
review: Mostly hits on the quality of clothing, with few misses. I would always recommend avoiding the ASOS branded clothing and find an alternative, but the delivery is fast, well worth buying premier delivery and the app is very intuitive.

name: Felix
title: Fast delivery
review: Fast delivery. Decent customer service.

name: MICHAEL HAYES
title: Great online retailer
review:
I have never had a problem with the delivery or return of my orders.

Also really like the Fit Assistant that they provide when ordering clothes online to compare how an item will fit in comparison with my previous orders.

Only downside was the recent decision to scrap the A List reward program. I feel this used to set the company apart from the other online retailers.

name: Lauren
title: Had some problems in the past
review: Had some problems in the past, but I think compared to other clothing shops they're the best option.

name: anthe
title: FINE
review:
It is the first time that i order something from asos and i was a little concerned because of all the bad critics and the poor ratings here.
My order came on time, and all the products were right.
My only complain is that the quality of a pair of shoes that i ordered wasn't the best and the size was larger than i expected.
But generally i am satisfied!

name: Charlotte
title: Order off here’s pretty much every week
review:
Ordered off here pretty much every week for 2 years 
Only had 2 bad experiences and that was on Hermes end which Asos have sorted out every time 
Ordered some sports bras and work out leggings a few months back and someone stole it off the Hermes van so Asos resent it free of charge via Royal Mail and a different time they forgot an item out of my order but sent it straight away and that’s about it for “bad things”
Great returns , I have the 9.99 unlimited year next day delivery and always turns up on time well packaged , any problems I contact them via Facebook messenger and they’re always happy to help great quality both  their own brand and the majority of other brands they stock

name: Ting Mel
title: Great company
review: Great company, I always buy their multipack clothes. They’re such good value for money, even though the quality isn’t as good.

name: Anne
title: Love this shop !
review: Love this shop !

name: R
title: Bad reviews aplenty, but...
review:
I have shopped with ASOS around 3 times. No bumps in the road ever and I live in Australia. I guess I’m one of the lucky ones judging by the other reviews! 

Items are true to size, and fabrics are good (if you’re specifically looking for them- so many polyester and other synthetic fabric items). Items wear for a long time. 

Only thing is express shipping takes a week if not more. Too long for express.

name: Beatrix Jones
title: Support Line +1*8*5*5*2*9*8*2*5*O*7____
review: They sure lie about the 2 days shipping blaming the carrier company for it. They do not take any responsibility even tho it takes more than 15 days in a order of 2 days shipping. The customer service sucks, they do not help you at all and they just tell you to wait because it is the delivery company fault not yours. After looking at the reviews I see now that I am not the only one that they have been done this. DONT PAY THE EXPRESS DELIVERY!!

name: Casey
title: Just need to stop using Hermes.
review: Just need to stop using Hermes.

name: frigjet
title: A distinctive feature of Asos is a huge…
review: A distinctive feature of Asos is a huge number of product lines and a huge mass of information under each product. Strict rule - under each product is indicated the growth of the model, the size of the thing on it, and besides the photo, you can watch the video! This is really great because the photos don`t always show the material, fitting, and the model of the thing. In addition, under each product, there is a dimensional table of a specific brand and specific things. Choosing on them, the chance to settle with the size will be minimal. The main thing is not to forget that you need to look at these tables! You can also enter your parameters and the site will automatically calculate the desired size according to the table.

name: Sadia Zafar
title: Incredibly frustrated with Hermes…
review:
Incredibly frustrated with Hermes delivery... you need to stop using them! 
My parcel wasn’t at the place ‘in the picture’ 

Thanks the the ASOS team for solving the issue.

name: Kelly
title: Good customer service
review: Had a bad experience as parcel said it was delivered when I wasn't, however customer service turned that around for me and solved the issue as soon as they could.

name: Marium Shah
title: The online chatting service is…
review: The online chatting service is available 24/7 which is great so you don’t have to stress till the next day or the next working day to have your issue resolved. They are quick to reply and very helpful. I am one Satisfied customer :)

name: Nóri O.
title: I do the majority of my shoppings…
review: I do the majority of my shoppings online and one of my main site for this is Asos because I can find everything in the same place. I think they should provide more coupon codes for European customers but other than this, I really do enjoy using their app to shop. Sometimes I have some issues placing my order because I have to place it twice, before I get a confirmation number but then the transaction is doubled in PayPal and I have to wait to get that cancelled. This is what happened today but the customer service team (Jamal) was really helpful and friendly, and he helped me figure out what happened. Many thanks for that! Xx

name: svitlana novosolova
title: Happy with the company
review: Happy with the company. Always easy to order and return. Items can hit or miss depends what you order but I love how easy it is to shop.

name: Luciana Selvaggio
title: Refund not processed- more than 10 days
review: Customer care I always giving me information but the problem itself hasn’t been resolved yet

name: Nik
title: Problem with the delivery
review:
I was waiting for my parcel to come on on Friday, has ordered several things, the price was fair, and the number of goods I could select from was decent as well. Everything was good except for one thing, which has spoiled everything.

So basically delivery must have come to the UPS access point, from which I would take my clothing. When I have checked where is my order, it was written that it is being returned to the ASOS! I was highly frustrated and disappointed and decided to in deep and analyze why it wasn't delivered and basically it was written that UPS station refused to take my order! I was shocked. Was calling UPS, no answer. Reached to the ASOS support, and they told me that my order is going to be refunded in 10 days...... I simply lost control, as I am leaving in 9days from the UK and needed this clothing urgently.

I am very disappointed that I should order this clothing again, but at first wait for a refund, then try to catch my size in stock and then again wait for the order to come. NICE :)

name: Jasin Trimble
title: My parcel was delivered to the wrong…
review: My parcel was delivered to the wrong address (all my fault) but the kind Tara with customer service help me get a replacement...great work Tara!

name: Katie Gough
title: Really straight forward helpful advice…
review: I needed help to return an item without a returns note. Received really straight forward helpful advice resolved my query in less than 10 minutes. Thanks to Rebecca. 😊

name: Karen
title: Missing Delivery but soon sorted
review: Usually I have no issues but had a missing delivery. Took some time to sort out, I’d advise using the instant chat rather than email or messenger options. All sorted now. Not be deterred from ordering again

name: Stella Silagy
title: I love that ASOS does free returns
review: I love that ASOS does free returns - It really helps because online shopping can be so hit or miss. Some clothes don't have the best quality but over all, there's a lot to choose from on ASOS so I can usually find a couple different options to order. The returns process is really easy and every time I've contacted customer service they've been super helpful.

name: Client
title: Nice Website
review:
Nice Website! Nice goods!! prices have increased over time while quality overall decreased.. that's a shame.. 

The company is although great and I highly enjoy shopping online with them.

name: Rachel
title: Chat experience
review: It took a long time for me to finally get connected to someone to discuss my query, but once I did, Morgan was incredibly helpful and gave me all the information I needed as quickly as possible

name: Bree
title: You just need to deal with the right adviser!
review:
They can be awful when it comes to customer service but Shannon was brilliant. After waiting 2 weeks for a delivery and refund issue to be resolved and after speaking to 12 customer service members, she sorted it after taking the time to read all previous history!

That's the reason I can't give 5 stars - it took 2 weeks to resolve an issue but when it gets done right it's all good.

name: customer
title: Happy they were able to talk at these…
review: Happy they were able to talk at these ungodly hours! Left the conversation happy that action will be taking place. Could have been clearer on what was needed in regards to pics etc

name: Samantha
title: Great and friendyl!
review: Great and friendyl!

name: SERKAN OZMEN
title: Hasan on the live chat was really…
review: Hasan on the live chat was really polite and helpful !

name: Stephen
title: ASOS Customer care online chat experience
review: I had a few issues with the Christmas jumper ordered as it had some snags in it on arrival, but their customer care team have been great via the online chat. I could either have a full refund on return of the faulty goods or recommended a local clothing repair shop where the repair cost would be refunded. So off to do the latter as its a lovely jumper so loathe to return when their out of stock. Fingers crossed they'll get repaired, otherwise I'm going to be gutted that its a return for full refund option only!

name: Terry Ward
title: Reasonably good stuff!
review: Reasonably good stuff!

name: Emma Devlin
title: Top choice
review:
ASOS is my go to for the majority of my clothes, the variety of brands is great, and always has something I like. ASOS own brand clothes however are a bit more hit and miss. The quality is poor, but you get what you’re paying for I guess (e.g. my ‘non-iron’ blouse creases so easily and needs ironing after about 5 minutes of wearing it!)
The next day delivery is amazing and I’ve never had a problem with it, however their customer service isn’t the best, as I’ve had conflicting statements given to me from different members of staff.

name: RD88
title: Next Day Delivery is Great!
review: I've been a premium member for a few years now and next day delivery is great. If an item isn't right returns are really straightforward as well, unlike other online clothes stores

name: Zhara M
title: Mohammed was nice on customer services
review:
Mohammed was nice on customer services

annoyed at how ASOS' courier lost my parcel after a 3 week wait- PATHETIC.

name: Courtney Cole
title: May way great help!.
review: May way great help!.

name: Ms Collins
title: Always quick answers to queries even if…
review: Always quick answers to queries even if it’s not what you want to hear but you know where you are

name: razvan l  stoica
title: I am ordering quite often from them as…
review: I am ordering quite often from them as they have size 2 for shoes. Clothing or shoes fit me well. I don't have any experience with returns so that's why I cannot give 5 stars. I haven't looked at the reviews before ordering as i was desperate to find shoes my size.

name: alex
title: Great clothes and easy refunds
review:
I did 3 recent orders with Asos and had no problems at all. I ordered through Klarna , which is perhaps why my refund was received quickly and transferred smoothly. The parcels did arrive on the due date ( standard delivery ), however I did do one next day delivery which I paid £5.95 for , but did not receive the next day. I emailed their customer service and they replied quickly, saying that I had ordered after 12pm so therefore it would come two days later, not one. This was fine for me, but the website had told me if I paid for next day, I would receive it the next day, so  it would have been a lot more useful if they actually made this delivery date estimate  more accurate. I did email them back asking if I could have my next day delivery fee refunded as it didn’t come the next day and this could have been very inconvenient for me however I was told it wasn’t possible.
Overall, ASOS has a great range of products and uses partially recycled delivery packaging ( a bonus !) , their customer service was good, however I would have liked more details on the next day delivery as I had paid it all for nothing !

name: Angela
title: So here's the thing with Asos
review:
So here's the thing with Asos. 

Clothes may not look the same as they did online and quality might not be as good as expected when you buy the cheapest brands they offer. You may get lucky though and get some cheap nice stuff, it's not all bad quality in my experience. They do offer other quality brands you can buy albeit for a higher price point. You get what you pay for, and a 5 quid jumper is not going to be great and not a reason to moan online.

Shipping is quick and returns are easy. You can use the same packaging they used to send your stuff, it comes with a slip you can fill in and you only need to drop it off at the post office. Once they receive your return, they'll refund you pretty quick. This has happened to me a few times and I've never had any issues with it. 

However, if you try to get any customer service from them it's only going to make things difficult for you. It's slow and useless, so don't even try. If you have any issues just return the item for a refund, if you need a smaller size just buy a new one and return the other one. The returns process is so easy that it's not worth getting worked up over their customer service.

name: alexandra
title: never had any problems
review: never had any problems, I recommend this website:)

name: Summer
title: Fave
review: I’ve always found ASOS to have something I am looking for, great student discount

name: Kenneth Wallingford
title: Good experience
review: So far, my experience with ASOS has been stellar. The clothing quality is a good value and the shipping comes fast and free.

name: Helen Smith
title: Good service as always
review: Good service as always - never had any issues!

name: Yasmine
title: Usually perfect :(
review:
Usually perfect :(

Ordered 3 items from Asos and 1 was missing. I returned the 2 items that I received as they hadn’t suited my body shape and stated on the returns form the 3rd was missing. I received an email about the refunds for the 2 returned but nothing about the missing 3rd. Never really had a problem with asos before

name: christine alslev
title: I have made around 30 orders at ASOS
review:
I have made around 30 orders at ASOS, and every time The package has arrived at time, or before. 
Very pretty clothe and Good custom service 

Only one i time i did not get my money back when trying to return an order

name: Dafne Moran Toha
title: Great company, but uses Hermes delivery
review: Great clothes and very helpful customer service. Only drawback is they use Hermes for deliveries, which service is terrible at least in my area.

name: Elizabeth D.
title: ASOS has great products but almost non-existent customer service
review:
If you had asked me a few months ago, I would have given ASOS a 5/5 but recently I had a lot of issues with customer service and returns. My family and I were going on vacation and I ordered swimsuits for my brother and father and then sunglasses and accessories for myself. I got express shipping which said it would be delivered in two business days (I was ordering on a Wednesday morning and it estimated Friday as the delivery – we were leaving for our trip on Saturday). 

I placed the order but when I got the confirmation, it had Monday as the delivery date. I spent over 30 minutes chatting with customer service and they said there was nothing I could do as that was the fastest shipping speed. They would not let me cancel the order since you only get 15 minutes to cancel yet they had me chatting in the customer service chatroom for 30+ minutes and only told me this at the end of our conversation. They then told me I could just return the whole package, which I agreed to. I then went back online and re-ordered EVERYTHING and got one-day shipping (the most expensive option). Come Friday, I get BOTH the one-day and the express orders, so I ordered double for no reason and the customer service lied when they said Monday was the soonest they could ship these items. It was very disappointing. 

Now that all being said, the quality of ASOS products is usually amazing (their size chart is a bit off though, so make sure to carefully read the sizing for each item). Their return policy is also very nice and the fact it is free is great too. I regularly use ASOS and I really like their clothing, size range, and accessories, but they need better customer service and more effective communication.

name: Mrs Gail Hanson
title: Very helpful and quick in resolving my…
review: Very helpful and quick in resolving my delivery issues.

name: Millie
title: Quick Response
review: My Chat operators name was Bhavesh and I was provided with a quick response to my query. Bhavesh looked into my problem and we found a solution quickly. I don't use chat services for support but on this occasion it worked. Well done ASOS.

name: Dana
title: Pretty good selection and swift…
review: Pretty good selection and swift delivery. No problems sending items back.

name: amy
title: Leith was a little slow to respond…
review: Leith was a little slow to respond probably due to the volume of live chats he received but he he was helpful.

name: Tierra Powell
title: I love ASOS for their vast option
review: I love ASOS for their vast options with ranging prices. Unfortunately I’ve noticed a lot of negative inconsistencies with their promised delivery dates for both their express & standard shipping over the last few months (prior) to the holiday season.

name: Clide B.
title: great clothing for price
review: i recieved exactly what i wanted for a great price. not expensive. delivery was slower than some others but was not in rush to recieve. thank you.

name: james wilson
title: Bit slow but good useful personal…
review: Bit slow but good useful personal advice from Bhavesh

name: Jamie Graham
title: Mixed experiences, generally top notch.
review: I've had mixed experiences with ASOS but in general I have always been impressed with the quick service and good customer care. I would recommend ASOS to anyone who wants the better side of online shopping for clothes. I was pleasantly surprised by the ease of returning unwanted items and it really takes the uncertainty away from clothes shopping online.

name: Jenny Jo
title: Quick response from Denisa in the chat
review: Quick response from Denisa in the chat. she was very understanding and found a solution straight away. Really good customer service!

name: Sandra Jones
title: Overall a good experience but my last…
review: Overall a good experience but my last oreder was a bit late. Will still use ASOS!!

name: Laura Innis
title: I think ASOS is great
review: I think ASOS is great, good value and good quality.

name: Rachel Mam
title: Ordered a new dress from asos
review: Ordered a new dress from asos, shipping was great, super fast but the colour isn't as bright as it looks!

name: Tom
title: Very helpful and informative chat with…
review: Very helpful and informative chat with customer service. Great range of clothes! Would be nice if I could see if the clothes were eco friendly by having a little icon or something next to the item. Apart from that great!

name: K7
title: Recently gone downhill
review:
ASOS are ok if you're looking for specific items such as branded clothing- they normally have sales and discounts. The website is easy to navigate and easy to favourite items to look at again. 

Delivery and returns are simple. It makes you feel at ease if you can return something you are unsure of hassle free. I'd advise if you're a frequent shopper to buy 1 year's next day delivery- it pays for itself.  

Avoid buying ASOS branded products. They are generally poor quality. 

They issue discounts on your birthday and for holidays such as Black Friday and Bank Holidays so if you're not desperate, wait for a discount code.

Recently, I've had to contact ASOS for a couple of orders. I got sent the wrong item and used my next day delivery as I needed them the next day. Had to send them back and told someone on the customer chat that I had been sent the wrong item and it was a complete waste of my time- they didn't even apologise for the mistake. He also said he'd refund the next day delivery- but never did. The other order I sent a pair of shoes back to request another size, I got an email nearly a week later saying I was being refunded even though I checked the website and the size was available. I had used a bankhol code and explained I couldn't reorder the item as the team member was suggesting as I wouldn't get a discount. They very kindly said they'd send me a new code- so I guess we'll see if that comes through.

The only other downside is how long it takes to process returns or exchanges. And if you've bought next day delivery for the year- it doesn't work on exchanged items so its best to return the item and reorder (if you haven't used a discount code)

The fact I was told I would be issued another code has redeemed my review to 4 stars- that may change.

name: Farzana El-syed
title: Friendly
review: Friendly, quick and easy!

name: Belinda
title: I was about to give 5 stars but…
review: I was about to give 5 stars but withheld one of the stars.. I will explain.. I only ever purchased two items.. a pair of shoes for my hubby last year and a dress for myself last month.. the shoes arrived swiftly and perfectly and so did my dress.. the dress was beautiful but not nice on me so I returned it on the same day.. the money was back in my account in no time so I was thinking, happy days!! asos are brilliant! Then I received an email.. it was kind of like a warning about returning too many items and basically I felt uncomfortable after reading it.. my initial thoughts were, oh no.. I’m afraid to buy anything off them again now.. i’ll Feel pressured to keep it and not return it etc.  Just now I have read reviews from others who have had accounts cancelled for doing exactly what I have done.. so while my experience before that email and reading the reviews would have definitely earned them 5 stars without a doubt.. I now feel reluctant to buy from ASOS again.. 🥴

name: Joseph A
title: ASOS are amazing
review: ASOS are amazing, items come on item and often as described and they are the most reliable site to order clothes online !

name: Courtney J
title: Responsive and resolved my issue.
review:
Responsive and resolved my issue.
Although Yodel lost my package or left it somewhere for someone to claim for themselves (I was never told what the outcome of ASOS' investigation with Yodel was), ASOS re-sent my order. Although some of the products were no longer available I still think ASOS were good at providing the customer with the best possible outcome. The instant chat function on their website is really good. They should stick to their previous delivery company, and stop paying Yodel immediately. I've only heard bad things about Yodel.

name: Daniella
title: Never any issues
review: Never any issues. Always received what i ordered and right on time too! Would def order from here again

name: Miami Santiago
title: I’ve been shopping with asos since 2007…
review: I’ve been shopping with asos since 2007 and I’ve never had a problem they couldn’t or didn’t solve. I had bought a RI bag from them and after 6 months of owning it, the item had begun to wear away. I contacted asos and they issued me with a full refund. Only once asos had sent me two different sizes shoes, but luckily I was able to get an exchange. Next day deliveries always arrive. I have the same amazing delivery people each time from DPD and Hermes. My returns have always arrived and been either exchanged or refunded using collectplus tracking. The only thing I will say is that refunds do take some time after the parcel has been returned. But that’s to be expected. I received a damaged eyeshadow palette along with a brand new one so now I have two minus a yellow shade. I had bought a acne light thingy by Foreo for my cousin that didn’t work for her. After a week she sent it back and I got my refund. Asos customer service, in my opinion, has been good to me and I will continue to shop with them as they DO! care about their customers.

name: MalayanWolf
title: Better service compared to before but ask your delivery people to call before or when they reach the house not after.
review: So far all my orders have reached my house. The shipping used to be worst part. I had to wait for months but the new tracking system is far more helpful than the previous one. They reach my house faster now although from months to weeks but my orders are international, so I give it a pass. However, Tell your delivery guys to call before or when they reach my house not after. I don't have super-hearing and my time is not that flexible. They have delayed my order twice now.

name: Gwen Ludrick
title: Start off with shipment- was super
review:
Start off with shipment- was super. Arrived home (even without a front door order) within 5 days. 
As for quality-do yourself a favor and DON'T order from the asos brand, they quality is just poor.
But, other brands- this is the place to buy them. best prices and a great variety. My top favorites - weekday, pretty little thing, boohoo.

name: L Jones
title: On the whole OK
review: On the whole OK.  Can be very helpful but definitely DPD is the better of the delivery companies used by ASOS.

name: Ciara Emery
title: Old faithful with room for improvement
review:
ive been using ASOS since 2010 and i can honestly say its been a bit of a lifesaver when it comes to online shopping. But it does have its cons as well!

Pros
The product selection grows from year to year and I know that when the high street lets me down I can always rely on ASOS to deliver something i like!

premier delivery - £9.99 for a year is worth every penny, over 9 years i have only ever had a small hand full of delivery issues and i think it might be due to me using premier delivery - guaranteed next day delivery and an easy returns process (as far as ticking a box and sticking a return label on the front!) my area delivers Asos via DPD which i don't really get many problems with.

a mixture of own brand and high street products - well why pay for delivery on that item I want from river island or new look if they have it on ASOS and you get free delivery?

Cons
Sizing and sells outs - considering how big asos are I do think they need to up their game when it comes to getting accurate sizing details and replenishment of sell-out items - as a customer there is nothing worse than finding something you love... then seeing its only available in a UK size 4...

customer service - over the past 9 years the customer service has definitely taken a turn for the worst. Response times are not great and then the physical responses are so scripted it defeats the point in trying to contact them....

delivery - when i do on occasion have a delivery issue (mainly with Hermes!) ASOS are not at all helpful and state the issue lies with the courier (which it does 9 times out of 10) but i feel that asos should take on a bit more responsibility - especially when you look through these reviews and can see that the vast majority are due to delivery or logistic issues

name: Carla
title: Very good
review: Very good experience so far

name: Peter McConnochie
title: Not ‘delivered’ by Hermes but saved by ASOS
review: My order was ‘delivered’ by Hermes but never actually delivered. The messenger help service was slow and useless but the on;one chat with ASOS was great, a helpful advisor who was able to sort things out.

name: Vanessa
title: The chat service is a bit slow but the…
review: The chat service is a bit slow but the staff is very helpfull

name: Clare Hill
title: Have had a mixed experience with ASOS…
review: Have had a mixed experience with ASOS customer service in the past but recent order that was delivered damaged with an item missing, all it took was a few quick DM's on twitter and the missing item was refunded immediately.

name: Lynn Donovan
title: I had a good chat with Mihaela
review: I had a good chat with Mihaela, as i have been waiting for a delivery for over a week, she was helpful

name: Simon Skov
title: Great service
review: Great service. Couldn't remember if I was verified for student ID. Talked to customer service and they help me out. Turns out I was. Could have been nice if there was somewhere you could see, if you have a verified student-account or not.

name: Jasmine
title: Brilliant customer service.
review: Ordered a coat off ASOS, it came with a hole in it.  However, I was advised by Jenna from the live chat option to exchange it even though I had taken the tags off.  Unfortunately, rather than an exchange, I was provided with a refund.  Contacted ASOS on Facebook Messenger and within 2 days had a response from Florence who offered me a reorder of the coat with free next day delivery.  Very pleased with customer service.  A shame the exchange and refund were mixed up.  Have had other good purchases from here so would definitely order from here again.

name: Ingrid Flower
title: The live chat from Luke was helpful
review: The live chat from Luke was helpful - I hope he can sort out my lost delivery!

name: Tigran Hayrapetyan
title: I've made 2 orders on 9th and 12th…
review: I've made 2 orders on 9th and 12th February. They shipped 13th February. The estimated delivery dates were 28th February and 1th March. But i recieved them only 14th March. The costumer service is bad, because they don't correctly answer your questions in particular where is the orders, because they don't have the tracking information. But in orders information they were! My orders came directly what i ordered, but the lack of tracking information and customer service inspired me to put 4 stars. P.S. Their Asos design wear has good very good quality for it's price.

name: Sara ley
title: Overall Okay
review: I don't understand why they have so many bad reviews here . They got my order right but they are a bit slow with shipping and some of their items run big so check before hand.

name: Kaval
title: No complaints :)
